items.title: Donald Trump and Kim Jong Un out by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Donald Trump ceases to hold the office of President of the United States and Kim Jong Un ceases to hold the office of Supreme Leader of North Korea by official announcement or internationally recognized confirmation before or by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerPresident of the United States@content_dividerthe head of the executive branch of the US government, elected for a four-year term – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerSupreme Leader of North Korea@content_dividerthe highest political and military authority of North Korea, as declared by the North Korean government – Oxford Dictionary)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official government sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial government sources@content_dividerincluding US government official announcements, North Korean state media, or widely recognized international organizations)_$ANNOTATION$_ or credible tier-1 media with explicit verification _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerTier-1 media@content_dividermajor established news organizations with rigorous editorial standards)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm by _$TIME_1 that both leaders have formally resigned, been removed, or otherwise ceased to hold their respective offices.

This market resolves 'No' if by _$TIME_1 no such official or internationally recognized confirmation is available, if either leader remains in office, if the event is indefinitely postponed or cancelled, or if verification data is unavailable or contradictory. In disputes, official government declarations take precedence. This market also resolves 'No' if the event never occurred or never existed.

items.title: VfB Stuttgart wins vs FC Basel by October 2, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether VfB Stuttgart officially wins the football match against FC Basel scheduled for October 2, 2025, based on the final score after full regulation time as confirmed by UEFA and match officials _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerUEFA@content_dividerUnion of European Football Associations, governing body of European football – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official UEFA match results _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial UEFA match results@content_dividerpublished on UEFA's website or official communications – https://www.uefa.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm VfB Stuttgart won by having a higher final score than FC Basel at the end of regulation time by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes verified announcements from both clubs' official websites or major media outlets corroborated by two tier-1 sources.

This market resolves 'No' if VfB Stuttgart does not win by the deadline, if the match is cancelled, postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if official UEFA results are unavailable or contradictory. In case of conflicting data, UEFA's official match report takes precedence. This market also resolves 'No' if the match never occurs or is not scheduled as specified.

items.title: New York Knicks reach NBA Eastern Conference Finals by May 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the New York Knicks basketball team officially qualifies for and participates in the NBA Eastern Conference Finals on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerNBA Eastern Conference Finals@content_dividerthe penultimate playoff round in the National Basketball Association Eastern Conference, determining the conference champion – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, as confirmed by official NBA sources and verified playoff results.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the NBA confirms the Knicks' advancement to the Eastern Conference Finals by _$TIME_1 through official NBA announcements _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial NBA announcements@content_dividerstatements or publications on nba.com or verified NBA social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_ or authoritative media reports _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerMajor media reports@content_dividercoverage by at least two tier-1 sports news organizations such as ESPN, Sports Illustrated, or The Athletic)_$ANNOTATION$_, supported by official game results and playoff brackets published by the NBA.

This market resolves 'No' if the Knicks do not reach the Eastern Conference Finals by _$TIME_1, if the NBA season or playoffs are cancelled or indefinitely postponed by that deadline, if official verification is unavailable or contradictory, or if the Knicks fail to qualify. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official NBA data. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never occurs or if the Knicks do not participate in the specified playoff round.

items.title: Cleveland Cavaliers NBA Finals win by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Cleveland Cavaliers win the 2026 NBA Finals championship as officially announced by the National Basketball Association (NBA) by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerNBA Finals@content_dividerthe championship series of the National Basketball Association, determining the league champion – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if the NBA officially declares the Cleveland Cavaliers as the 2026 NBA Finals champions in an authoritative announcement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerNBA official announcement@content_dividerofficial statement published on NBA.com or verified NBA social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Verification includes NBA press releases, NBA Finals series results posted on NBA.com, or major sports media outlets confirming with at least two tier-1 sources. Backup verification includes archival records from the Internet Archive _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerInternet Archive@content_dividera digital archive of the World Wide Web and other information – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and official NBA statistical databases.

Resolves 'No' if the Cleveland Cavaliers are not officially declared champions by _$TIME_1, if the NBA Finals are cancelled or postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory. If the event does not occur or the NBA Finals do not take place in 2026, the market resolves 'No'. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing NBA official sources, followed by major verified sports media. In case of data unavailability, archival records and multiple independent sources are consulted.

items.title: Darren White wins Albuquerque mayoral election by November 4, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Darren White is officially declared the winner of the 2025 Albuquerque mayoral election by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerAlbuquerque mayoral election@content_dividera municipal election to select the mayor of Albuquerque, New Mexico – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to certified final results published by the City of Albuquerque _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCity of Albuquerque@content_dividerthe municipal government of Albuquerque, New Mexico – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if the City of Albuquerque certifies Darren White as the official winner of the 2025 mayoral election by _$TIME_1, with verification from the official City of Albuquerque election website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerCity of Albuquerque election information@content_dividerhttps://www.cabq.gov/vote/election-information)_$ANNOTATION$_ or official publications and corroborated by at least one major local or state government source such as the New Mexico Secretary of State _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerNew Mexico Secretary of State@content_dividerthe state agency responsible for election certification – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if Darren White is not officially certified as winner by _$TIME_1, if the election is postponed or cancelled beyond _$TIME_1, or if no authoritative verification confirming his victory is available. In cases of conflicting information, official City of Albuquerque certification takes precedence. This market also resolves 'No' if the 2025 Albuquerque mayoral election does not take place or if Darren White does not run.

items.title: Red Star Belgrade wins 2025-26 UEFA Europa League by January 29?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Red Star Belgrade officially wins the 2025-26 UEFA Europa League according to final tournament results published by UEFA by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerUEFA Europa League@content_divideran annual European football club competition organized by the Union of European Football Associations – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if UEFA officially declares Red Star Belgrade as the tournament winner in its final published results or announcements by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial UEFA announcement@content_dividerstatement on the UEFA website or verified UEFA social media profiles https://www.uefa.com/uefaeuropaleague/)_$ANNOTATION$_. Backup verification includes major tier-1 sports media outlets with corroboration from at least two independent sources and archived UEFA records.

Resolves 'No' if no official UEFA declaration confirms Red Star Belgrade as winner by _$TIME_1, if the tournament is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if verification sources are unavailable or contradictory, or if the event never occurred as specified. Conflicts resolve by prioritizing official UEFA sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the competition format changes or the winner is a different team.

items.title: Romania wins UEFA Group H by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Romania finishes first in UEFA Group H during the 2026 FIFA World Cup qualification group stage according to official UEFA standings after all group matches conclude in November 2025 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerUEFA Group H@content_dividerthe group of national teams competing in UEFA's qualifying tournament for the 2026 FIFA World Cup – UEFA Official)_$ANNOTATION$_ .

Resolves 'Yes' if UEFA publishes official group standings _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial group standings@content_dividerfinal point table published by UEFA on its official website or in official reports – UEFA.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirming Romania as first place in Group H by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerDeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ . Verification requires corroboration through at least one major sports media outlet with explicit UEFA confirmation or UEFA playoff results published in March 2026 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerUEFA playoff results@content_dividerofficial UEFA playoff match outcomes that confirm final qualification status – UEFA.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ .

Resolves 'No' if Romania is not ranked first in Group H by _$TIME_1, if UEFA cancels or indefinitely postpones the group stage or playoff matches beyond this date, or if official UEFA sources or corroborated major media sources fail to confirm Romania's first-place finish. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing UEFA official publications. Also resolves 'No' if the event (UEFA Group H qualification) does not exist or is not conducted.

items.title: Adam Sandler Best Supporting Actor by March 1, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Adam Sandler officially wins the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBest Supporting Actor@content_divideran Academy Award category recognizing outstanding supporting acting performances – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ at the 98th Academy Awards ceremony held by _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerAcademy Awards@content_dividerannual American awards ceremony honoring cinematic achievements, presented by the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ with resolution by official announcement published by the Academy or verified sources by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2026-03-01T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ .

This market resolves 'Yes' if Adam Sandler is publicly confirmed as the winner of Best Supporting Actor at the 98th Academy Awards by official Academy sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOfficial Academy sources@content_dividerthe Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences website, official Oscars social media, or verified press releases – https://www.oscars.org)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Verification may also rely on major tier-1 media outlets with dual source confirmation or official ceremony footage _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerVerification methods@content_dividermajor media reports from sources like The Hollywood Reporter, Variety, or verified video of the ceremony)_$ANNOTATION$_ .

This market resolves 'No' if no official confirmation of Adam Sandler winning the Best Supporting Actor award is available by _$TIME_1, if the award is cancelled or postponed beyond that date, if the event does not occur, or if authoritative sources explicitly contradict the win. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official Academy announcements. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the 98th Academy Awards ceremony does not take place or if the Best Supporting Actor category is not awarded.

items.title: Go Ahead Eagles win match by October 2, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Go Ahead Eagles win the specified football match based on the final score at the end of regulation time as published by UEFA _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerUEFA@content_dividerUnion of European Football Associations, governing body of European football – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerDeadline@content_divider2025-10-02T16:45:00Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if UEFA officially confirms Go Ahead Eagles as the winner of the match held in Athens, Greece (GMT+1 timezone) by _$TIME_1, verified through UEFA's official website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerUEFA official website@content_dividerhttps://www.uefa.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or authoritative UEFA publications. Backup verification may include major verified sports media outlets reporting the final official score and match result.

Resolves 'No' if no official confirmation of a Go Ahead Eagles win is available by _$TIME_1, if the match is cancelled, postponed indefinitely, or if UEFA or authoritative sources confirm a different outcome. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing UEFA official data. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the match does not occur or the event is not held as scheduled.

items.title: AFC Bournemouth last place in Premier League by May 25, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether AFC Bournemouth finishes in last place in the 2025-26 English Premier League season as per the official final league table published after the last match day, resolved by authoritative Premier League sources by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerEnglish Premier League@content_dividerthe highest division of professional football in England consisting of 20 teams – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and official club name definition _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerAFC Bournemouth@content_divideran English professional football club competing in the Premier League – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the official Premier League final table published on the Premier League website or in official Premier League communications _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerPremier League official source@content_dividerhttps://www.premierleague.com/ official website and published league tables)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms AFC Bournemouth occupies the 20th (last) position in the final standings by _$TIME_1. Verification includes archived versions via the Internet Archive or corroboration by at least two major tier-1 sports media outlets reporting final league positions.

This market resolves 'No' if AFC Bournemouth does not finish last by _$TIME_1, if the season is cancelled, postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if authoritative official final league tables are unavailable or contradict last place placement. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing official Premier League publications over media sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event or league season does not take place or AFC Bournemouth is not a participant.

items.title: Lazio win Serie A match v Genoa by September 29?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Lazio wins the Italian Serie A football match against Genoa by the final official score at the end of regulation time on September 29, 2025, at 18:45 UTC _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerSerie A@content_dividerItaly's top professional football league – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerregulation time@content_dividerstandard 90 minutes plus stoppage time excluding extra time or penalties – Oxford Dictionary)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if the official Serie A match result published by Lega Serie A _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerLega Serie A@content_dividerorganizer and governing body of Serie A football league – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified major media sources such as ESPN or Soccerway confirms Lazio scored more goals than Genoa at the end of regulation by _$TIME_1. Official league websites and verified live score platforms like Sofascore _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerSofascore@content_dividerreal-time sports score and statistics provider – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ serve as primary and backup verification sources.

Resolves 'No' if Lazio does not win by the official final score at the end of regulation time, if the match is cancelled or postponed beyond _$TIME_1, if official results are not published by _$TIME_1, or if verification is unavailable or contradictory. Conflicts are resolved prioritizing Lega Serie A official publications. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the match does not occur or is never scheduled as specified.

items.title: AFC Bournemouth last place in Premier League by May 25, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether AFC Bournemouth finishes in 20th place in the final 2025-26 English Premier League standings as of May 24, 2026, according to official Premier League announcements _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerEnglish Premier League@content_dividerthe top professional football league in England consisting of 20 teams – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and official league tables _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerleague table@content_dividerthe ranking of teams based on points earned in matches – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if official Premier League sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerPremier League@content_dividerthe organization governing the top English professional football league – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm AFC Bournemouth's 20th position by May 25, 2026, with verification from the official Premier League website (https://www.premierleague.com/tables) or verified major media outlets reporting final standings by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'No' if AFC Bournemouth finishes any position other than 20th, if the 2025-26 Premier League season is cancelled or indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, if official standings are unavailable or unverifiable by _$TIME_1, or if AFC Bournemouth does not participate in the league that season. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official Premier League announcements. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never occurs.

items.title: Qarabag vs FC Copenhagen draw by October 1?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the official final score of the Qarabag vs FC Copenhagen match at regulation time end equals for both teams as confirmed by UEFA _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerUEFA@content_dividerUnion of European Football Associations, governing body of European football – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-10-01T15:45:00Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if UEFA officially confirms the match ended with equal goals for Qarabag and FC Copenhagen at regulation time by _$TIME_1 via official UEFA match reports or website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerUEFA official source@content_dividerhttps://www.uefa.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified major sports media with explicit UEFA confirmation. Backup verification includes archived official match statistics from UEFA databases or trusted sports data providers such as Soccerway or Sofascore.

Resolves 'No' if the match does not end in a draw by regulation time, if the match is cancelled, postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if UEFA confirmation and reliable verification are unavailable by deadline. In case of conflicting reports, UEFA official data takes precedence. Also resolves 'No' if the match never took place or was never scheduled.

items.title: New York Knicks advance to NBA Finals by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the New York Knicks basketball team _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerNew York Knicks@content_dividerprofessional NBA basketball team based in New York City – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ officially qualify for and participate in the NBA Finals _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerNBA Finals@content_dividerthe championship series of the National Basketball Association, decided annually – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ during the 2026 calendar year by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2026-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to official NBA announcements or schedule updates.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the NBA _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerNBA@content_dividethe National Basketball Association, a professional basketball league in North America – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ officially confirms through NBA.com or verified announcements that the Knicks advance to and play in the NBA Finals by _$TIME_1. Verification requires published playoff bracket updates, official team advancement confirmations, or NBA Finals game schedules listing the Knicks available at NBA.com or verified NBA social media accounts.

This market resolves 'No' if the Knicks do not qualify for the NBA Finals by _$TIME_1, if the NBA Finals are cancelled or postponed beyond _$TIME_1, if official NBA sources fail to confirm advancement, or if the event never occurs. Conflicting or missing data resolves to 'No' following authoritative source priority. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the Knicks do not exist as an NBA team or if the 2026 NBA season or Finals do not take place as scheduled.

items.title: VfB Stuttgart wins match against FC Basel 1893 by October 2, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether VfB Stuttgart wins the football match against FC Basel 1893 by the end of regulation time on October 2, 2025 according to the official final score published by UEFA _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerUEFA@content_dividerUnion of European Football Associations, the governing body of European football – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if UEFA officially confirms VfB Stuttgart as the winner of the match by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial confirmation@content_dividermatch result published on UEFA.com, official UEFA social media, or UEFA regulatory filings)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Verification includes backup confirmation from at least two major tier-1 sports media outlets (e.g., ESPN, GiveMeSport) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerTier-1 media@content_dividerleading global sports news organizations with verified reporting standards – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or official match statistics repositories.

Resolves 'No' if VfB Stuttgart is not confirmed the winner by the deadline, if the match is cancelled or indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, if official UEFA results are unavailable or contradictory, or if the event never took place as scheduled. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing UEFA official announcements. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the match never occurred or was never scheduled.

items.title: Crystal Palace finish 3rd place Premier League by May 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures Crystal Palace's final official league position in the 2025-26 Premier League season, determined by the official final standings published by the Premier League after all scheduled matches are completed by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerPremier League@content_dividerthe top-level English professional football league comprising 20 clubs – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and crystal palace _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCrystal Palace@content_divideran English professional football club competing in the Premier League – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ finishing in 3rd place _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_divider3rd place@content_dividerthe position ranked third in the final league table published by the Premier League – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Crystal Palace is officially listed in 3rd place in the final published Premier League standings for the 2025-26 season by the Premier League's official website or official Premier League communications by _$TIME_1. Verification includes backup confirmation from at least one major UK sports media source with explicit reference to the official standings and archived via the Internet Archive or similar permanent record repositories.

This market resolves 'No' if Crystal Palace is not listed in 3rd place in the final official Premier League standings by _$TIME_1, if the 2025-26 Premier League season is cancelled, postponed indefinitely beyond _$TIME_1, or if authoritative verification of final standings is unavailable. Conflicting data will be resolved by prioritizing official Premier League publications. The market also resolves 'No' if Crystal Palace does not exist as a Premier League team during that season or if the league format fundamentally changes such that the final standings differ from the standard league table format.

items.title: Jerome Powell removed as Fed Chair by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Jerome Powell ceases to hold the position of Chair of the Federal Reserve Board by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerFed Chair@content_dividerthe official head of the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to official Federal Reserve or U.S. government confirmation.

Resolves 'Yes' if official confirmation from the Federal Reserve Board, U.S. Department of the Treasury, or other U.S. government publications _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial confirmation@content_dividerstatements on Federal Reserve or government websites, verified press releases, or congressional records)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms Powell no longer holds the Chair position on or before _$TIME_1. Alternative verification includes major tier-1 media with explicit official source confirmation or publicly accessible Federal Reserve announcements.

Resolves 'No' if Powell remains Chair through _$TIME_1, if no authoritative removal confirmation is published, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if official data is unavailable. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing Federal Reserve official statements, then U.S. government sources. Also resolves 'No' if the Chair position itself is abolished or altered without Powell's removal. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never occurs or no credible confirmation exists by _$TIME_1.

items.title: Issa Tchiroma Bakary wins Cameroon Presidential Election by October 12, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Issa Tchiroma Bakary officially wins the Cameroon presidential election held on October 12, 2025, as determined by official results announced by Cameroon's election commission _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerCameroon presidential election@content_dividera nationwide vote to elect the President of Cameroon – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerElection commission@content_divideran official body responsible for overseeing elections and announcing results – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, with data sourced from government publications and authoritative media reports.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official election results published by the Cameroon election commission _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerCameroon election commission@content_dividerthe official national body administering elections in Cameroon – https://www.elecam.cm/)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 confirm Issa Tchiroma Bakary as the declared winner. Verification includes official government releases, reputable international media with dual tier-1 source confirmation, or official statements posted on verified government or election commission websites.

This market resolves 'No' if Issa Tchiroma Bakary is not declared the winner by official election commission results by _$TIME_1, if the election is postponed, cancelled, or indefinitely delayed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory. Resolution follows official government announcements as primary. Additionally, the market resolves 'No' if the election does not take place or if Issa Tchiroma Bakary does not exist as a candidate.

items.title: U.S. x Venezuela direct military engagement by October 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether active, kinetic conflict involving U.S. and Venezuelan troops occurs on land, sea, or air by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerDirect military engagement@content_divideractive, kinetic conflict involving armed forces on land, sea, or air – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ as confirmed by official government or credible news reports.

Resolves 'Yes' if direct military engagement between U.S. and Venezuelan troops is explicitly confirmed by official U.S. or Venezuelan government statements _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial government statements@content_dividerstatements published on official government websites or verified social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_ or by major media outlets with verification from at least two tier-1 sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerTier-1 sources@content_dividerleading global news organizations with editorial standards and fact-checking)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Verification may include credible visual evidence or official military reports.

Resolves 'No' if no such official or credible confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if only isolated incidents unrelated to direct conflict occur, or if verification is unavailable or contradictory. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official government sources. Also resolves 'No' if the event never occurred or never existed.

items.title: Egg price < $3.00 by September 30, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the average wholesale and retail price per dozen Grade A eggs _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerGrade A eggs@content_dividera quality classification for eggs based on USDA standards – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ in the US Midwest region _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUS Midwest region@content_dividerthe central northern United States states known for agricultural production – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ is below 3.00 USD during the entire month of September 2025 according to authoritative USDA _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerUSDA@content_dividerUnited States Department of Agriculture, a federal agency overseeing agriculture – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerFederal Reserve Bank of St. Louis@content_dividerregional Federal Reserve branch providing economic data – Federal Reserve)_$ANNOTATION$_ data.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official USDA or Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis price data show the average wholesale and retail price per dozen eggs in the Midwest region was below $3.00 USD at all reported times during September 2025 by _$TIME_1. Verification requires published monthly price reports or databases from USDA Economic Research Service or Federal Reserve Economic Data (FRED) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerUSDA ERS@content_dividerhttps://www.ers.usda.gov)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=6@counter_dividerFRED@content_dividerhttps://fred.stlouisfed.org)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1.

This market resolves 'No' if prices reached or exceeded $3.00 USD at any point during September 2025, if official data are unavailable or incomplete by _$TIME_1, if the underlying price data series is discontinued, or if the event of measuring egg prices in the Midwest region does not exist. Conflicting or delayed data will be resolved by prioritizing USDA publications, then Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis data, and finally archived data repositories. Additionally, resolves 'No' if authoritative sources explicitly state price data is not reported or if the event never took place.

items.title: New York Giants make NFL playoffs by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the New York Giants _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerNew York Giants@content_dividera professional American football team based in East Rutherford, New Jersey, competing in the National Football League – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ qualify for the NFL playoffs _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerNFL playoffs@content_dividerthe postseason tournament of the National Football League determining the league champion – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ based on official NFL standings _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerofficial NFL standings@content_dividerthe final ranking of teams determined by wins, losses, and tiebreakers at the end of the NFL regular season – NFL.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ as confirmed by NFL.com by _$TIME_1.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the New York Giants are officially listed as qualified for the 2025 NFL playoffs on the NFL.com standings page or equivalent official NFL publication by _$TIME_1. Verification requires the final regular season standings published by the National Football League _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerNational Football League@content_dividerthe professional American football league comprising 32 teams – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on NFL.com or via official NFL communications. Backup verification may include major sports media outlets with explicit NFL confirmation.

This market resolves 'No' if the New York Giants do not qualify for the playoffs by _$TIME_1, if the playoff event or qualification criteria are cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if no verifiable official confirmation exists. In case of conflicting data, official NFL.com standings take precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the NFL 2025 regular season or playoffs do not occur or if the Giants do not exist as a competing team.

If the NFL regular season is suspended, cancelled, or does not conclude by _$TIME_1, the market resolves 'No'. Verification includes official NFL announcements or credible regulatory filings. If official NFL sources are inaccessible, archived NFL.com standings or regulatory reports serve as fallback.

All timing references are converted to UTC; the deadline includes all games completed on or before December 31, 2025, Eastern Time (ET) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerEastern Time@content_dividerthe time zone for the eastern part of the United States, UTC-5 standard time, UTC-4 daylight saving time – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

items.title: Tarcísio de Freitas wins 2026 Brazil presidency by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Tarcísio de Freitas is officially declared president-elect of Brazil within the 2026 election cycle according to the Superior Electoral Court (TSE) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerSuperior Electoral Court (TSE)@content_dividerBrazilian federal agency responsible for organizing and validating elections – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'Yes' if Tarcísio de Freitas is confirmed as president-elect by official TSE publications or direct announcements on TSE’s website or verified social media before _$TIME_1; verification also accepted from major Brazilian and international media verified by at least two tier-1 sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividertier-1 sources@content_dividermajor global or national media outlets with rigorous editorial standards – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if no official declaration by TSE confirming Tarcísio de Freitas as president-elect occurs by _$TIME_1, if the 2026 Brazilian presidential election is cancelled or postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if reliable verification is unavailable. Conflicting data resolves by prioritizing official TSE sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the election does not take place or if Tarcísio de Freitas withdraws or is disqualified prior to official results.

items.title: Rainbow Wallet token launch and airdrop by December 31?
items.rules:

This market resolves 'Yes' if official Rainbow Wallet channels _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial Rainbow Wallet Channels@content_dividerRainbow Wallet’s verified website, official social media accounts, or press releases)_$ANNOTATION$_ publish an announcement of the $RNBW token launch and airdrop by _$TIME_1, and Ethereum blockchain explorers or verified third-party trackers document actual token transfers to qualifying wallets within Q4 2025. Backup verification includes major crypto news outlets confirming the event with two or more authoritative sources.

This market resolves 'No' if no official announcement or verified token distribution occurs by _$TIME_1, if the token launch or airdrop is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if verification data is unavailable or contradictory. Resolution prioritizes official Rainbow Wallet sources and Ethereum blockchain data. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the token launch or airdrop event never existed or was never planned.

items.title: Jay Kelly wins Best Picture by March 10, 2026?
items.rules:

This market resolves 'No' if Jay Kelly is not announced as Best Picture winner by _$TIME_1, if the Academy Awards ceremony is cancelled or postponed beyond _$TIME_1, if the Best Picture category does not exist at the 98th ceremony, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing official Academy announcements and accredited broadcasters. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never occurs or the category is not awarded.

items.title: Lille OSC vs Paris Saint-Germain FC draw by October 5, 2025?
items.rules:

The market resolves 'Yes' if official match results confirm both teams have equal goals at the end of regulation time by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerDraw@content_divideran outcome where both teams have the same number of goals at the end of the match – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, verified through official Ligue 1 or Paris Saint-Germain and Lille OSC websites _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial source@content_dividerhttps://www.ligue1.com and https://www.psg.fr, https://www.losc.fr)_$ANNOTATION$_, or major tier-1 sports media with corroboration such as Sofascore or Fscore.net _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerTier-1 media@content_dividertrusted sports data providers like Sofascore https://www.sofascore.com and Fscore.net https://www.fscore.net)_$ANNOTATION$_.

The market resolves 'No' if the match does not end in a draw by _$TIME_1, if the match is cancelled, postponed beyond the deadline, never scheduled, or if official verification data is unavailable or contradictory. In case of conflicting data, official Ligue 1 or club sources take precedence. If the event never existed, the market resolves 'No'.

This market resolves 'No' if Brentford FC finishes outside the top four or if official final standings are unavailable or unverified by _$TIME_1, if the season is cancelled, indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if Brentford FC does not participate in the 2025–26 Premier League season. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing the Premier League's official sources and archived records. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the Premier League season does not conclude or the event never exists.

items.title: Los Angeles Chargers winning record by December 31?
items.rules:

This market resolves 'No' if the Chargers do not have a winning record by _$TIME_1, if the NFL regular season is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if official sources fail to publish final results by deadline, or if verification data is unavailable or contradictory. Conflicting reports are resolved using ESPN.com as primary and Wikipedia as secondary sources. If the Chargers do not complete the 2025 season or the event never exists, the market resolves 'No'.

items.title: FC Metz vs Olympique de Marseille draw by October 4, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the FC Metz versus Olympique de Marseille match ends in a draw after regulation time as officially recorded by Ligue 1 authorities at the match conclusion on October 4, 2025 in UTC time _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerdraw@content_dividera sports match result where both teams have equal scores at the end of regulation time – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerLigue 1@content_dividertop professional football division in France organized by the Ligue de Football Professionnel – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Conflicts are resolved prioritizing official CFP or NCAA sources. The market also resolves 'No' if the championship event does not occur as specified.

items.title: Jonathan Greenard leads NFL sacks by December 31, 2025?

This market resolves to 'Yes' if Jonathan Greenard is the single player with the highest cumulative sack total at the end of the 2025 NFL regular season by _$TIME_1, as confirmed by official 2025 NFL statistics published on Pro-Football-Reference.com _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerPro-Football-Reference.com@content_divideran authoritative online database providing comprehensive NFL statistics – https://www.pro-football-reference.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or NFL official statistics pages _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerNFL official stats@content_dividerofficial statistics published by the National Football League – https://www.nfl.com/stats)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Conflicting data will be resolved by prioritizing NFL official statistics, then Pro-Football-Reference.com. Additionally, this market resolves 'No' if Jonathan Greenard does not participate in the 2025 NFL regular season or if the event never occurs.

items.title: Michael Wacha lowest ERA in MLB by December 31, 2025?

items.title: New York Giants start Jaxson Dart in ≥5 NFL games by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether New York Giants rookie quarterback Jaxson Dart officially starts at least 5 NFL regular season games by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerStart@content_dividerofficial designation as starting quarterback in a regular season National Football League game – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to official team or league announcements.

Resolves 'Yes' if credible confirmation from Giants Head Coach Brian Daboll or NFL Network _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial sources@content_dividerteam coach statements or verified NFL media reports – NFL Network website and verified social media)_$ANNOTATION$_ verifies Jaxson Dart started at least 5 regular season games by _$TIME_1, with verification records accessible on Giants and NFL official sites or archived media.

Resolves 'No' if Jaxson Dart starts fewer than 5 regular season games by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradicts the condition. Also resolves 'No' if the player does not exist on the Giants roster, the NFL season is cancelled, or official start announcements do not reach the threshold by the deadline.

items.title: Cynthia Erivo Best Actress Nomination by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Cynthia Erivo receives a nomination for Best Actress at the 98th Academy Awards as confirmed by official Academy announcements by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerAcademy Awards@content_dividerannual awards ceremony by the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences honoring cinematic achievements – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if Cynthia Erivo's nomination for Best Actress is explicitly confirmed by the official Academy Awards website or verified Academy social media accounts by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial Academy announcements@content_dividerstatements or publications on www.oscars.org or verified social media – Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences)_$ANNOTATION$_. Alternative verification includes major tier-1 media with dual independent confirmation.

Resolves 'No' if no official confirmation is available by _$TIME_1, if the nomination category is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative sources explicitly deny her nomination. Conflicting information is resolved prioritizing official Academy sources. Also resolves 'No' if the 98th Academy Awards do not occur or the nomination category does not exist.

items.title: Israel not strike Yemen by October 1, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Israel conducts any military strike _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMilitary strike@content_dividera planned attack by armed forces against a target – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on Yemen before or at _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerDeadline@content_divider2025-10-01T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_. Resolution relies on official Israeli military or government announcements with backup verification from major media and independent monitoring sources.

The market resolves 'Yes' if no official Israeli military or government source _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial Israeli sources@content_dividerIsraeli Defense Forces announcements, Ministry of Defense statements, or verified government publications)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms a strike on Yemen by _$TIME_1. Verification includes absence of confirmed strike reports on major tier-1 media outlets and credible international monitoring organizations by that time.

The market resolves 'No' if any official Israeli military or government source confirms a strike _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerStrike confirmation@content_dividerexplicit announcement or publication indicating Israeli strike activity in Yemen)_$ANNOTATION$_ on or before _$TIME_1, or if multiple authoritative media reports verify such strikes. It also resolves 'No' if the event is officially announced as occurring, or if verification is unavailable or contradictory by deadline. If the event never existed or is officially cancelled, the market resolves 'Yes'.

items.title: Stacey Abrams arrested in Georgia by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Stacey Abrams _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerStacey Abrams@content_dividerAmerican politician and former Georgia State Representative – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ is formally arrested _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerArrest@content_dividerthe act of law enforcement taking a person into custody based on legal authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ in Georgia state jurisdiction between February 19, 2025, and _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerGeorgia@content_dividerU.S. state in the southeastern region, with its own state law enforcement agencies – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if an official government or law enforcement agency announcement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividera formal statement by authorized government or law enforcement sources, including press releases or verified public records)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms Stacey Abrams' arrest in Georgia during the specified period by _$TIME_1. Alternative verification includes major media reports _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerMajor media reporting@content_dividernews coverage by tier-1 outlets with explicit source verification)_$ANNOTATION$_ or publicly accessible court filings _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=6@counter_dividerCourt filings@content_dividerofficial legal documents filed in judicial proceedings – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'No' if no verified arrest confirmation is available by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially denied or indefinitely postponed, or if official data sources are inaccessible or contradictory. Additionally, it resolves 'No' if Stacey Abrams is not arrested during the period or if the event never occurred or was fabricated. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official government or law enforcement sources.

items.title: U.S. House passes Epstein Files disclosure bill by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the U.S. House of Representatives formally passes legislation or a resolution mandating disclosure of unclassified Epstein-related files by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerU.S. House of Representatives@content_dividerthe lower chamber of the United States Congress, responsible for federal legislation – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, as recorded in official legislative records.

Resolves 'Yes' if official House legislative records on congress.gov _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividercongress.gov@content_dividerhttps://www.congress.gov)_$ANNOTATION$_ explicitly confirm passage of the Epstein Files disclosure bill or resolution by _$TIME_1, verified through congressional records or authoritative government publications. Backup verification includes major media reports with dual tier-1 source confirmation and archival retrieval from official repositories.

Resolves 'No' if no such passage is confirmed by _$TIME_1, if the bill or resolution is cancelled, indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing official congressional records. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the underlying legislative event does not exist or never occurred.

items.title: Houston Texans ≥3 wins next 6 NFL games by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Houston Texans football team _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerHouston Texans@content_dividera professional American football team based in Houston, Texas, competing in the National Football League – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ achieve at least 3 wins in their next 6 official National Football League (NFL) games scheduled between Weeks 4 and 9 of the 2025 season by _$TIME_1 according to official NFL final scores.

This market resolves 'Yes' if 3 or more wins by the Houston Texans in these 6 games are confirmed by official NFL game results published on the NFL’s official website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerNFL official website@content_dividerhttps://www.nfl.com/schedules/2025)_$ANNOTATION$_ or equivalent authoritative sources by _$TIME_1. Backup verification may include major tier-1 sports media with verified game reports or Pro-Football-Reference.com _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerPro-Football-Reference@content_dividerhttps://www.pro-football-reference.com/teams/htx/2025.htm)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'No' if fewer than 3 wins occur by _$TIME_1, if any of the 6 games are cancelled or indefinitely postponed past _$TIME_1, or if reliable official verification is unavailable. In case of conflicting data, NFL official sources take precedence. Additionally, this market resolves 'No' if the scheduled games do not exist or the market criteria are fundamentally unmet.

items.title: Russia x Ukraine ceasefire by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Russia and Ukraine formally agree to cease all hostilities in the conflict by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerCeasefire@content_divideran agreement to stop fighting temporarily or permanently – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and publicly announce it through authoritative sources.

Resolves 'Yes' if both the Russian and Ukrainian governments officially announce a mutual ceasefire agreement by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividerstatement published on government websites or verified social media)_$ANNOTATION$_ and confirmation is obtained from at least one major intergovernmental organization such as the United Nations _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerUnited Nations@content_dividerinternational organization promoting peace and security – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or neutral observers.

Resolves 'No' if no such official mutual ceasefire is confirmed by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if authoritative verification is unavailable, or if the agreement covers only one party or partial ceasefires. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing official government and United Nations sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the ceasefire event never existed or was never agreed upon.

items.title: Toshimitsu Motegi Prime Minister by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Toshimitsu Motegi officially becomes Prime Minister of Japan by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerToshimitsu Motegi@content_dividera Japanese politician and member of the Liberal Democratic Party who has held various cabinet positions – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to official nomination and acceptance by Japan’s National Diet _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerNational Diet@content_dividerthe bicameral legislature of Japan composed of the House of Representatives and House of Councillors – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and appointment by the Emperor _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerEmperor of Japan@content_dividerthe ceremonial sovereign of Japan with constitutional powers to appoint the Prime Minister as designated by the Diet – Oxford Dictionary)_$ANNOTATION$_ as reported by authoritative government publications or verified news sources.

This market resolves 'Yes' if an official nomination of Toshimitsu Motegi as Prime Minister by the National Diet and formal acceptance by the Emperor is confirmed in official government publications _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOfficial government publications@content_dividergovernment websites, parliamentary records, or official press releases)_$ANNOTATION$_ or major Japanese news outlets corroborated by at least two tier-1 media sources by _$TIME_1. Verification includes statements from the Prime Minister's Official Residence or the Cabinet Secretariat, and visual evidence published by verified government channels.

This market resolves 'No' if no verified nomination and acceptance occur by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if verification from authoritative sources is unavailable or contradictory, or if Toshimitsu Motegi does not hold the office of Prime Minister by the deadline. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the office of Prime Minister is occupied by another individual or if the event never existed.

If primary official sources become inaccessible, backup verification includes archived government records (e.g., National Diet Library archives), Internet Archive captures of official websites, and major international news agencies reporting with direct citations of Japanese government announcements. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing official Japanese government records and direct statements from the Emperor’s office.

The market’s settlement time is fixed at _$TIME_1 (2025-12-31T23:59:59Z), corresponding to the end of December 31, 2025 UTC, converted from Japan Standard Time (JST, UTC+9) where the event occurs.

items.title: Donald Trump wins 2028 US presidential election by November 7?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Donald Trump is officially declared the winner of the 2028 United States presidential election according to certified results valid as of November 7, 2028 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerUnited States presidential election@content_dividerthe quadrennial election to select the President and Vice President of the United States – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, excluding subsequent certification or contestation processes.

Resolves 'Yes' if official certified election results _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividercertified election results@content_dividerfinal, legally binding vote counts validated by state election authorities – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ explicitly name Donald Trump as the winner on or before _$TIME_1, as published by authoritative sources including the Federal Election Commission _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerFederal Election Commission@content_dividerUS independent regulatory agency overseeing federal elections – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or state election boards _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerstate election boards@content_dividerofficial state-level government bodies responsible for administering elections – USA.gov)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification may include official state government websites, certified public records, or major media outlets with dual tier-1 source confirmation.

Resolves 'No' if no official certified result names Donald Trump as winner by _$TIME_1, if the election is postponed or cancelled, if Donald Trump withdraws or is disqualified prior to the election, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory. In case of conflicting reports, resolution defers to official government declarations and Federal Election Commission data. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the election does not occur or results are never certified.

items.title: Aston Villa 2nd place finish by May 31, 2026?
items.rules:

Verification requires accessing the official table or an archived authoritative source confirming this position by the deadline.

This market resolves 'No' if Aston Villa does not finish 2nd by _$TIME_1, if the Premier League season is cancelled, indefinitely postponed, or if official final standings are unavailable or contradictory by the deadline. In case of conflicting data, official Premier League publications take precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the 2025-26 Premier League season does not occur or Aston Villa is not a participant.

items.title: Nottingham Forest relegated from Premier League by May 31, 2026?

This market resolves 'No' if Nottingham Forest is ranked above the relegation zone in the final Premier League table by _$TIME_1, if the 2025/26 Premier League season is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing official Premier League sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Nottingham Forest does not participate in the 2025/26 Premier League season or if the event never took place.

items.title: Pittsburgh Steelers ≥9 regular season wins by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Pittsburgh Steelers _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerPittsburgh Steelers@content_dividerprofessional American football team based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ win nine or more official National Football League (NFL) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerNFL@content_dividerthe professional American football league consisting of 32 teams – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ regular season games _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerregular season games@content_dividerscheduled matches excluding playoffs or preseason – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by 23:59:59 UTC on December 31, 2025, according to final official game scores verified through NFL official records.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the Steelers have nine or more wins in official NFL regular season games played on or before the last scheduled regular season game date of December 28, 2025, as confirmed by the NFL’s official website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerNFL official website@content_dividerhttps://www.nfl.com/teams/pittsburgh-steelers/statistics)_$ANNOTATION$_ or Pro Football Reference _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerPro Football Reference@content_dividerhttps://www.pro-football-reference.com/teams/pit/2025.htm)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes major sports media outlets (e.g., ESPN) with corroborated final game scores and archived official NFL statistics.

This market resolves 'No' if the Steelers have fewer than nine wins by _$TIME_1, if the NFL regular season is cancelled, postponed beyond that date, or if official win counts cannot be verified. Conflicting data is resolved prioritizing NFL official records. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the Steelers do not play the standard NFL regular season or if the event never occurs.

items.title: Taylor Swift The Life of a Showgirl #1 on Billboard 200 for 14+ weeks by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Taylor Swift's album The Life of a Showgirl holds the #1 position on the Billboard 200 chart for at least 14 consecutive weeks starting from its debut week according to Billboard’s official weekly chart cycle as confirmed by Billboard.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Billboard's official Billboard 200 chart data confirms The Life of a Showgirl remains at #1 for 14 or more consecutive weeks by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBillboard 200 chart@content_dividera weekly ranking of the top 200 albums in the United States based on sales, streaming, and airplay – Billboard)_$ANNOTATION$_, verified through Billboard’s official website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerBillboard official website@content_dividerhttps://www.billboard.com/charts/billboard-200/)_$ANNOTATION$_ or archived authoritative sources such as the Internet Archive _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerInternet Archive@content_divideran online archive of web pages and data https://archive.org)_$ANNOTATION$_. Backup confirmation may include corroboration by major tier-1 media outlets reporting Billboard chart standings.

This market resolves 'No' if The Life of a Showgirl does not achieve 14 or more consecutive weeks at #1 by _$TIME_1, if the album release is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if Billboard official data or equivalent authoritative verification is unavailable by that date, or if the charting data shows non-consecutive #1 weeks. In case of conflicting sources, Billboard’s official chart data takes precedence. Additionally, this market resolves 'No' if the album never debuts at #1 or if the Billboard 200 chart does not exist by the deadline.

This market resolves 'No' if Sahith Theegala is not officially confirmed as Masters champion by _$TIME_1, if the tournament is cancelled or indefinitely postponed beyond April 12, 2026, or if official verification is unavailable. In case of conflicting information, official Augusta National Golf Club sources take precedence. This market also resolves 'No' if the Masters Tournament does not occur or if the title is awarded to another golfer.

items.title: New York Jets last NFL team winless by October 7, 2025?

This market measures whether the New York Jets remain the only NFL team without an official regular-season win up to and including _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerNew York Jets@content_dividerprofessional American football team based in New York City playing in the National Football League – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ as recorded by official NFL game results _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerNFL game results@content_dividerofficial match outcomes published by the National Football League – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on NFL.com _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerNFL.com@content_dividerofficial website of the National Football League https://www.nfl.com)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Conflicts are resolved prioritizing NFL.com, NFL official publications, and established sports authorities. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the NFL 2025 season or Jets’ games never occur.

items.title: PAOK wins vs Celta Vigo by October 2, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether PAOK _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerPAOK@content_dividerPAOK FC, a Greek professional football club – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ wins the match against Celta Vigo _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCelta Vigo@content_dividerReal Club Celta de Vigo, a Spanish professional football club – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on October 2, 2025, based on the official final score _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerfinal score@content_dividerthe official result of a sports match at its conclusion – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ of the UEFA Europa League _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerUEFA Europa League@content_divideran annual European football club competition organized by the Union of European Football Associations – Oxford Dictionary)_$ANNOTATION$_ match held in Vigo, Spain, resolving by the end of regulation or extra time as declared by UEFA _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerUEFA@content_dividerUnion of European Football Associations, the governing body of European football – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if UEFA's official match report _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=6@counter_dividerofficial match report@content_dividerthe authoritative document published by UEFA listing final match results and statistics – UEFA.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms PAOK won by the end of regulation or extra time on or before _$TIME_1. Verification may use UEFA's official website (https://www.uefa.com/uefaeuropaleague/), reputable sports databases, or major tier-1 media outlets with direct UEFA confirmation.

This market resolves 'No' if PAOK does not win by regulation or extra time, if the match is cancelled, postponed indefinitely beyond _$TIME_1, if official UEFA results are unavailable or unverifiable by _$TIME_1, or if the event never occurs. In case of conflicting data, UEFA's official report has priority. Non-occurrence includes no scheduled match, match abandonment without result, or different competition stage.

If official UEFA sources are inaccessible at settlement, archived UEFA reports via the Internet Archive (https://web.archive.org) or UEFA's annual regulatory filings will be used as fallback verification.

The match time is set at 18:00 CEST (UTC+2) on October 2, 2025 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=7@counter_dividermatch time@content_dividerlocal time in Vigo, Spain, converted to UTC for settlement – UTC+2 in CEST daylight saving time)_$ANNOTATION$_. Settlement cutoff is at match end plus official result publication, no later than _$TIME_1.

Conflicts are resolved prioritizing official Conference USA publications, followed by NCAA sources, then major verified media. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the championship game does not occur or Sam Houston State is not a participant.

items.rules:

Verification may also be obtained via UEFA's official website, verified UEFA social media accounts, or archived UEFA publications.

This market resolves 'No' if the match result is not a draw at the end of regulation time, if the match is cancelled, postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or officially abandoned. It also resolves 'No' if no verifiable official UEFA confirmation of a draw exists by _$TIME_1. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing the official UEFA match report and UEFA communications. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the match does not occur or never existed.

items.title: Olympiacos advance to Round of 16 by January 28, 2026?

This market resolves 'Yes' if official UEFA standings _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerUEFA standings@content_dividerthe official ranking and match results published by UEFA – https://www.uefa.com)_$ANNOTATION$_, accessible via UEFA.com or its archived snapshots, confirm Olympiacos is ranked among the top eight teams advancing to the Round of 16 by _$TIME_1. In case of conflicting information, UEFA’s official publications take precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the 2025/26 UEFA Champions League season or Round of 16 stage does not occur.

If UEFA’s official data is inaccessible at resolution, verification will fallback on reputable tier-1 sports media reports with dual confirmation and archived UEFA data via Internet Archive. If no authoritative data is available by _$TIME_1, the market resolves 'No'.

The cutoff for all verifications and data is _$TIME_1, corresponding to January 28, 2026, 23:59:59 UTC _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerDeadline@content_dividerThe exact UTC deadline converted from CET context, as UEFA operates primarily in Central European Time – https://www.timeanddate.com/time/zone/europe/central-european-time)_$ANNOTATION$_.
