items.rules:
This market measures whether the Washington Commanders _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerWashington Commanders@content_dividerprofessional American football team in the National Football League – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ win their NFL _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerNFL@content_dividerNational Football League: professional American football league in the United States – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ game against the Los Angeles Chargers _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerLos Angeles Chargers@content_dividerprofessional American football team in the National Football League – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on October 5, 2025, as determined by the official final score reported by FOX and NFL official sources with the game played at SoFi Stadium in California (PDT timezone).

This market resolves 'Yes' if the Washington Commanders officially win the game by having a higher final score than the Los Angeles Chargers as published by the NFL _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerNFL official sources@content_dividerofficial NFL website, NFL game books, or verified NFL communications)_$ANNOTATION$_ or FOX _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerFOX Sports@content_dividermajor American sports broadcaster and NFL media partner – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Verification includes live game summaries, official NFL box scores, or archived official game reports.

This market resolves 'No' if the Washington Commanders do not win by _$TIME_1, if the game is cancelled, postponed indefinitely beyond _$TIME_1, or if official verification of the game outcome is unavailable. In case of conflicting data, official NFL sources take precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the game never occurs or is not scheduled as specified.

If official sources are inaccessible, resolution may use verified secondary media such as ESPN or archived NFL data repositories. Confirmation requires explicit final score documentation. Partial data or speculative reports do not qualify for 'Yes' resolution.

The timezone for the event and resolution is Pacific Daylight Time (PDT) as the game is held at SoFi Stadium, California, corresponding to 2025-10-05T20:25:00Z UTC.

items.title: UTEP wins Conference USA Championship by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the University of Texas at El Paso (UTEP) wins the 2025 Conference USA Championship Game _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerConference USA Championship Game@content_dividerthe official collegiate football championship contest for Conference USA members – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ held on December 5, 2025, with the official game result as published by authoritative sources determining the winner.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official final game result confirming UTEP as the winner is published by Conference USA or NCAA official websites _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerConference USA@content_divideran intercollegiate athletic conference affiliated with NCAA Division I – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, or by verified major sports media such as ESPN, by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes official box scores, verified live broadcasts, or NCAA statistical releases.

Resolves 'No' if UTEP does not win the Championship Game, if the game is cancelled, postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if no authoritative confirmation of a UTEP victory exists by _$TIME_1. Conflicting reports are resolved prioritizing official Conference USA and NCAA declarations. The market resolves 'No' if the Championship Game does not occur or if UTEP does not participate.

items.title: Nottingham Forest x FC Midtjylland draw by October 2, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the football match between Nottingham Forest and FC Midtjylland ends in a draw at full time (90 minutes plus stoppage) as officially reported by UEFA and Nottingham Forest _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerfootball@content_dividera sport played by two teams of eleven players who try to kick a ball into the other team's goal – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdraw@content_dividera game ending with both teams having equal goals scored – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_. Match time is the official final score after full match duration, excluding extra time or penalties.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official UEFA sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerUEFA@content_dividerUnion of European Football Associations, governing body for European football – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or Nottingham Forest's official communications _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerNottingham Forest@content_dividerprofessional football club based in Nottingham, England – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm the final score is a draw by _$TIME_1. Verification includes UEFA match reports at https://www.uefa.com and Nottingham Forest official website https://www.nottinghamforest.co.uk. Backup confirmation may come from major tier-1 sports media with dual source verification.

This market resolves 'No' if no official confirmation of a draw exists by _$TIME_1, if the match is cancelled or postponed beyond _$TIME_1, if authoritative sources confirm a non-draw result, or if verification data is unavailable. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing UEFA official reports. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the match does not occur or is not scheduled as per UEFA official fixture lists.

items.title: Viktoria Plzen wins vs Malmö FF by October 2, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Viktoria Plzen wins the UEFA Europa League match against Malmö FF based on the official final score after regulation time at Doosan Aréna by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerUEFA Europa League@content_dividerannual European football club competition organized by UEFA – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to UEFA rules _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUEFA rules@content_dividerofficial regulations governing match outcomes including regulation time results – UEFA.com)_$ANNOTATION$_. Match time zone is Central European Summer Time or Central European Time based on venue location in Plzen, Czech Republic _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerCEST/CET@content_dividerCentral European Summer Time (UTC+2) or Central European Time (UTC+1) depending on daylight saving – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Viktoria Plzen is officially recorded as the winner of the match after regulation time by UEFA or major sports broadcasters such as ESPN, LiveScore.com, or The Athletic by _$TIME_1, with verification from official UEFA match reports _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerUEFA official reports@content_dividerhttps://www.uefa.com/uefaeuropaleague/matches/) or multiple tier-1 sports media sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerTier-1 sports media@content_dividerrecognized major broadcasters like ESPN, The Athletic)_$ANNOTATION$_. Backup confirmation includes video highlights or official social media posts from verified accounts.

This market resolves 'No' if Viktoria Plzen does not win by _$TIME_1, if the match is cancelled or postponed indefinitely beyond _$TIME_1, if no official verification of a Viktoria Plzen win exists, or if the event never occurs. In case of conflicting information, UEFA official sources take precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the match never took place or the final result differs from the market specification.

items.title: Will Zalatoris win Masters Tournament by April 12, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Will Zalatoris officially wins the 2026 Masters Tournament according to the final official leaderboard published by Augusta National Golf Club by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMasters Tournament@content_divideran annual major golf championship held at Augusta National Golf Club in Augusta, Georgia – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial leaderboard@content_dividerthe final ranked list of players based on total strokes after tournament conclusion – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Will Zalatoris is declared the official winner on the final leaderboard by the Augusta National Golf Club or the official Masters Tournament website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerAugusta National Golf Club official site@content_dividerhttps://www.masters.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 with verification via at least one additional authoritative source such as major verified sports media or PGA Tour official announcements _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerPGA Tour@content_dividerthe main professional golf organization for male golfers in the United States – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'No' if Will Zalatoris is not the official winner by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled, postponed beyond _$TIME_1, if authoritative verification is unavailable, or if the tournament never occurred. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing Augusta National Golf Club official announcements. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never existed or if Zalatoris did not finish first according to the official final leaderboard.

items.title: NBA combined points > 207.5 in a game by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the total combined points scored by both teams in any NBA game exceeds 207.5 points by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerCombined points@content_dividerthe sum of points scored by both teams in a basketball game – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, using official NBA box scores provided by Sportradar _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerSportradar@content_dividerOfficial Data Provider of NBA statistics, including detailed game and seasonal metrics – https://sportradar.com)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if at least one NBA game occurring on or before _$TIME_1 has an official combined points total strictly greater than 207.5 confirmed by Sportradar’s official NBA box scores _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial NBA box scores@content_dividerdetailed statistical summary of an NBA game including team points – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ accessible via Sportradar’s primary data feeds or NBA official platforms. Backup verification includes archived box scores from Internet Archive or verified NBA statistical repositories.

Resolves 'No' if no NBA game by _$TIME_1 exceeds 207.5 combined points, if the NBA season is suspended or cancelled before such a game occurs, if verification data from Sportradar and backups are unavailable, or if the event never occurs as defined. Conflicts are resolved prioritizing Sportradar official data. Additionally, resolves 'No' if no NBA game is played before _$TIME_1 or if the market specification is not met.

items.title: Mason Foley wins Tennessee 7th District special election by December 2?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Mason Foley is officially certified as the winner of the Tennessee 7th Congressional District special election held on December 2, 2025, according to certified election results _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividercertified election results@content_dividerofficial vote counts validated and declared by the relevant election authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ published by the Tennessee Secretary of State _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerTennessee Secretary of State@content_dividerthe chief elections officer of Tennessee responsible for certifying election results – https://sos.tn.gov)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the Tennessee Secretary of State officially certifies and publicly announces Mason Foley as the winner of the special election by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerofficial certification announcement@content_dividera formal, verified declaration published on the Tennessee Secretary of State's official website or official government communications)_$ANNOTATION$_. Backup verification may include official Tennessee government publications, verified government social media accounts, or major media outlets with dual tier-1 source confirmation.

This market resolves 'No' if Mason Foley is not certified as the winner by _$TIME_1, if the election is cancelled or postponed beyond _$TIME_1, if no official certification occurs, or if reliable verification is unavailable. In case of conflicting reports, official Tennessee Secretary of State announcements take precedence. Additionally, this market resolves 'No' if the special election does not occur or Mason Foley never officially participated.

items.title: Monad mainnet launch by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Monad mainnet _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMonad mainnet@content_dividerthe fully operational blockchain network of Monad enabling live transactions and smart contracts – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ is officially launched and confirmed by Monad Labs or authoritative blockchain data sources by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ .

Resolves 'Yes' if Monad Labs publishes an official announcement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividera formal statement published on Monad Labs' official website or verified social media channels – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirming mainnet launch by _$TIME_1, or if independent blockchain explorers or authoritative third-party blockchain data providers verify live mainnet activity such as token transfers or block production by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'No' if no official confirmation or authoritative verification of mainnet launch exists by _$TIME_1, if the launch is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if Monad Labs announces a delay beyond _$TIME_1, or if the mainnet event never occurs or does not exist. Conflicting or absent data defaults to 'No'.

items.title: Superman top grossing movie by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the movie 'Superman' achieves the highest total worldwide theatrical box office gross revenue among all movies released in 2025 by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBox office gross@content_dividerthe total sum of ticket sales revenue from movie theater showings worldwide – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerTop grossing@content_dividerhaving the greatest total revenue in a defined category – Oxford Dictionary)_$ANNOTATION$_ .

Resolves 'Yes' if official box office tracking sources such as Box Office Mojo _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerBox Office Mojo@content_dividera website providing box office revenue data and analysis – Box Office Mojo Official Site https://www.boxofficemojo.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or Comscore _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerComscore@content_dividera media measurement and analytics company providing official box office data – Comscore Official Site https://www.comscore.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ report 'Superman' as having the highest total worldwide theatrical box office gross revenue for all 2025 movie releases by _$TIME_1, confirmed via their official websites or verified industry publications.

Resolves 'No' if by _$TIME_1 no authoritative source confirms 'Superman' as the top grossing movie of 2025, if the movie is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, if reliable box office data is unavailable or contradictory, or if no movie named 'Superman' was released in 2025. Conflicts in data are resolved by prioritizing official box office aggregators and industry-standard reporting. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event (release of 'Superman' movie in 2025) does not exist or never occurred.

items.title: Tim Cook Apple CEO by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Tim Cook holds the position of Chief Executive Officer (CEO) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerCEO@content_dividerthe highest-ranking executive in a company responsible for overall operations and decision-making – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ of Apple Inc. continuously through _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerApple Inc.@content_dividerApple Inc.: American multinational technology company headquartered in Cupertino, California – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to official Apple announcements or verified financial news outlets.

Resolves 'Yes' if official confirmation from Apple’s Newsroom website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerApple Newsroom@content_dividerhttps://www.apple.com/newsroom/)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified tier-1 financial news sources explicitly states Tim Cook is CEO on or before _$TIME_1 and no official announcement indicates his resignation, removal, or replacement by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'No' if no verified official confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if Apple officially announces Tim Cook’s resignation, removal, or replacement as CEO before _$TIME_1, or if credible verified reports confirm he ceases to hold the position by _$TIME_1. In cases of conflicting information, official Apple publications take precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the CEO role or Tim Cook’s occupancy does not exist or is discontinued before _$TIME_1.

items.title: Real Madrid wins 2025–26 La Liga by May 24, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Real Madrid Club de Fútbol _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerReal Madrid Club de Fútbol@content_dividera professional football club based in Madrid, Spain – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ finishes first in the official final standings of the 2025–26 La Liga season _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerLa Liga@content_dividerthe top professional football division in Spain – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on or before _$TIME_1 according to the final published league table after the last scheduled matchday.

Resolves 'Yes' if the official La Liga website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial La Liga website@content_dividerhttps://www.laliga.com/en-GB/laliga-easports/standing)_$ANNOTATION$_ or the Royal Spanish Football Federation _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerRoyal Spanish Football Federation@content_dividerthe governing body of football in Spain – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms Real Madrid as champions in the final standings published immediately after the last matchday on or before _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes major tier-1 sports media (e.g., ESPN, BBC Sport) reporting the confirmed champion by that time.

Resolves 'No' if Real Madrid is not listed as the champion in the official final standings published by _$TIME_1, if the 2025–26 La Liga season is cancelled, indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if no authoritative confirmation is available by _$TIME_1. In case of conflicting reports, official league data takes precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the season or championship does not occur or is voided.

items.title: Trump visit Epstein's Island by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether credible evidence of Donald Trump visiting Jeffrey Epstein's private island is made public by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerCredible evidence@content_dividerofficially released documents or verified government disclosures related to Trump's alleged visit – defined per market specification)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if at least one official government publication _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial government publication@content_dividerreports, regulatory filings, or authoritative agency reports)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified disclosure _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerVerified disclosure@content_dividerstatements or documents released by US Department of Justice, FBI, or equivalent)_$ANNOTATION$_ explicitly confirms and publishes evidence of Trump's visit by _$TIME_1. Confirmation from major media outlets _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerMajor media@content_dividertier-1 news organizations with explicit verification from two or more independent sources)_$ANNOTATION$_ or official statistics/data _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerOfficial statistics@content_dividergovernment-released data supporting the claim)_$ANNOTATION$_ also qualify. Backup verification includes archival retrievals from the Internet Archive or government repositories.

Resolves 'No' if no such credible evidence is confirmed by _$TIME_1, if the event of evidence release is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if verification sources are unavailable or contradictory, or if the event never existed (no visit or no official evidence). Conflicting reports resolve by prioritizing official government sources. Lack of explicit confirmation results in 'No'.

items.title: Teyana Taylor Best Supporting Actress win by March 1, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Teyana Taylor officially wins the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBest Supporting Actress@content_divideran Academy Award recognizing outstanding performance by an actress in a supporting role – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ at the 98th Academy Awards, as determined by the official announcement from the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences (AMPAS) by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerAcademy Awards@content_dividerannual film awards presented by AMPAS recognizing cinematic achievements – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the official winners list published by AMPAS _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerAMPAS official announcement@content_dividerhttps://www.oscars.org/)_$ANNOTATION$_ by or before _$TIME_1 explicitly lists Teyana Taylor as winner of Best Supporting Actress at the 98th Academy Awards. Verification includes official AMPAS press releases, verified social media from AMPAS, or major tier-1 media outlets confirming the win with cross-verification.

This market resolves 'No' if by _$TIME_1 there is no official confirmation of Teyana Taylor winning Best Supporting Actress, if the award ceremony is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if another winner is officially announced, or if authoritative sources are unavailable. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing AMPAS official sources. The market also resolves 'No' if the 98th Academy Awards do not take place or the category is not awarded.

items.title: Israel participation in Eurovision Song Contest 2026 by March 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Israel is officially permitted to participate in the Eurovision Song Contest 2026 according to the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) member vote held at the November 2025 General Assembly, verified through official EBU publications and major media reports by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerEurovision Song Contest@content_dividerannual international music competition organized by the European Broadcasting Union – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerEBU@content_dividerEuropean Broadcasting Union: alliance of public service media entities organizing Eurovision – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the EBU officially confirms Israel's participation in Eurovision 2026 by _$TIME_1 through direct announcements on the EBU website or verified social media accounts _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerEBU official sources@content_dividerhttps://eurovision.tv and official EBU social media)_$ANNOTATION$_, or if two or more tier-1 major media outlets report explicit confirmation citing the EBU vote results. Backup verification includes official Eurovision 2026 participant lists published by the EBU and host broadcaster ORF.

This market resolves 'No' if no official confirmation of Israel's participation is available by _$TIME_1, if the vote excludes Israel explicitly, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. In case of conflicting information, resolution prioritizes official EBU statements. The market also resolves 'No' if the vote or event never occurred or if Israel is excluded for reasons other than EBU member vote results.

items.title: Benfica wins UEFA Champions League match against Chelsea by September 30, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Benfica officially wins the UEFA Champions League match against Chelsea according to the final result at full time including extra time if played, as scheduled at 19:00 UTC on September 30, 2025, with verification by UEFA official match reports _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerUEFA Champions League@content_dividerUEFA Champions League: annual continental club football competition organized by the Union of European Football Associations – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and corroborated by reputable sports media or UEFA digital platforms.

Resolves 'Yes' if the official UEFA match report _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUEFA official match report@content_dividerdocumented final score from UEFA website or official UEFA social media accounts – UEFA.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms Benfica won the match by full time or after extra time by _$TIME_1, verified through UEFA.com or UEFA’s verified communications. Backup verification includes at least two independent tier-1 sports news sources reporting the official result.

Resolves 'No' if Benfica does not win by full time including extra time, if the match is cancelled, postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradicts a Benfica win. In case of conflicting data, UEFA’s official match report takes precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the match does not occur as scheduled or if the event never existed.

If official UEFA sources become unavailable, verification may be performed using archived UEFA match reports via Internet Archive _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerInternet Archive@content_dividernonprofit digital library archiving web content – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and cross-checked with major international sports news outlets.

Match kickoff time is defined as 19:00 UTC on September 30, 2025, aligning with UEFA’s published schedule _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerUTC@content_dividerCoordinated Universal Time, the primary time standard by which the world regulates clocks and time – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

items.title: Japan wins 2026 FIFA World Cup by July 19?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Japan's national football team officially wins the 2026 FIFA World Cup final match held by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerFIFA World Cup@content_dividerthe international men's association football championship organized by Fédération Internationale de Football Association – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to the official final result published by FIFA.

Resolves 'Yes' if FIFA officially announces Japan as the winner of the 2026 FIFA World Cup final match held on _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerFIFA official announcement@content_dividerstatement published on FIFA's official website or verified FIFA social media accounts – https://www.fifa.com/en/tournaments/mens/worldcup/canadamexicousa2026)_$ANNOTATION$_ by this deadline. Verification may include official FIFA match reports, verified major media outlets corroborated by at least two tier-1 sources, or official FIFA statistics.

Resolves 'No' if Japan is not declared the winner by _$TIME_1, if the final match is cancelled or postponed beyond _$TIME_1, if FIFA officially announces a different winner, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing FIFA official sources. Also resolves 'No' if the tournament or final did not occur or if Japan did not participate in the final.

items.title: Los Angeles Dodgers win 2025 World Series by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Los Angeles Dodgers officially win the 2025 World Series as declared by Major League Baseball (MLB) by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerWorld Series@content_dividerannual championship series of MLB between American and National League champions – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if MLB officially declares the Los Angeles Dodgers _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerLos Angeles Dodgers@content_dividerprofessional MLB team based in Los Angeles, California – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ as the 2025 World Series champion on or before _$TIME_1. Verification requires publication on the official MLB website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerMLB official site@content_dividerhttps://www.mlb.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or an official MLB press release, or confirmation by at least two major tier-1 sports media outlets (e.g., ESPN, MLB Network) with explicit verification. Backup verification includes official MLB social media accounts and archival sources such as the Internet Archive.

This market resolves 'No' if the Los Angeles Dodgers are not officially declared World Series champions by MLB by _$TIME_1, if the 2025 World Series is cancelled, postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing official MLB announcements. The market also resolves 'No' if the 2025 World Series does not occur or is fundamentally different than specified.

items.title: Stokes Twins next video 3-6M views day 1 by October 7?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the next YouTube video uploaded by the Stokes Twins _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerStokes Twins@content_dividerAlan and Alex Stokes, American twin YouTubers known for comedy and challenge videos – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ receives between 3 million and 6 million total views within the first 24 hours after upload according to official YouTube analytics _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerYouTube analytics@content_dividerthe official video performance measurement tool provided by YouTube – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official YouTube analytics data from the Stokes Twins’ verified YouTube channel _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerYouTube channel@content_dividerofficial channel managed by content creators on YouTube platform – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms total views between 3,000,000 and 6,000,000 inclusive within 24 hours after upload and this data is publicly accessible or archived by _$TIME_1. Verification includes primary data from https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCX6lvxH93IE-5QxTSc6uWeQ or official YouTube API endpoints _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerYouTube API@content_dividerapplication programming interface allowing access to YouTube data – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'No' if the video does not reach between 3 million and 6 million views in the first 24 hours by _$TIME_1, if the video is not uploaded by _$TIME_1, if official analytics data is unavailable or unverifiable by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if the event (video upload) never occurs. In case of conflicting data, priority is given to official YouTube analytics or direct data from the verified channel. This market also resolves 'No' if the Stokes Twins’ channel is removed or suspended prior to upload or if the video is retracted before 24 hours complete.

items.title: The Witcher Season 4 Rotten Tomatoes < 45% by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether The Witcher Season 4 receives a strictly below 45% score on the Rotten Tomatoes All Critics Tomatometer as published on December 31, 2025 at 10:00 AM ET _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerRotten Tomatoes Tomatometer@content_dividera percentage rating based on all professional critics' reviews aggregated by Rotten Tomatoes – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if the Tomatometer score for The Witcher Season 4 is explicitly reported below 45% on the official Rotten Tomatoes website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial Source@content_dividerhttps://www.rottentomatoes.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ at or before _$TIME_1 (2025-12-31T15:00:00Z). Verification may use archived snapshots via Internet Archive or secondary major media sources confirming the score as of that time.

Resolves 'No' if the score is 45% or higher, if the series is not released or has no Tomatometer score by _$TIME_1, if Rotten Tomatoes data is unavailable or unverifiable by that deadline, or if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed. Conflicting data resolution prioritizes official Rotten Tomatoes reporting. Additionally, resolves 'No' if The Witcher Season 4 does not exist or is not released by the deadline.

items.title: SMU wins College Football National Championship by January 19, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Southern Methodist University (SMU) officially wins the 2026 College Football National Championship game held at Hard Rock Stadium on January 19, 2026. The winner is determined by the College Football Playoff (CFP) authorities and verified by official CFP communications and major sports media reports _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerCollege Football Playoff@content_divideran annual postseason tournament determining the national champion of NCAA Division I Football Bowl Subdivision – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if SMU is officially declared the winner of the final CFP National Championship game held at Hard Rock Stadium, Miami Gardens, Florida, on January 19, 2026, as confirmed by an official announcement from the College Football Playoff organization _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCFP official announcement@content_dividerstatement published on the official CFP website or verified CFP social media accounts, https://collegefootballplayoff.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes corroborating reports from at least two major tier-1 sports media outlets (e.g., ESPN, AP) and official game statistics from NCAA or CFP records.

Resolves 'No' if SMU is not the declared winner by _$TIME_1, if the championship game is cancelled, postponed indefinitely beyond _$TIME_1, or if official CFP authoritative confirmation is unavailable or contradicts SMU's victory. In case of conflicting information, CFP official sources take precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the championship game does not occur at Hard Rock Stadium on January 19, 2026, or if SMU does not participate in the final. Also resolves 'No' if the event never existed or was never scheduled.

items.title: Zohran Mamdani wins The Bronx in 2025 NYC mayoral election by December 31?

This market resolves 'No' if Zohran Mamdani is not declared the winner of The Bronx borough by _$TIME_1, if the election is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if official certified results or race calls are unavailable or contradict a win, or if the event never occurred. Resolves 'No' if the Bengals are not declared AFC North winners by _$TIME_1, if the division title is vacated, the NFL cancels or suspends the 2025 season, or if official verification is unavailable or contradicts Bengals winning. items.title: Gold closing price between $3,900 and $4,000 by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the official gold closing price per troy ounce in USD on a major exchange _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerGold@content_dividera precious yellow metal used as a monetary standard and investment asset – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, specifically COMEX _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCOMEX@content_dividera primary U.S. futures and options market for metals including gold – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, falls within the range $3,900 to $4,000 at the market close on or before _$TIME_1 according to authoritative exchange data with verification through official price publications and archival sources.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the gold official closing price on COMEX or equivalent major exchange is reported at or above $3,900 and at or below $4,000 USD per troy ounce on any trading day on or before _$TIME_1; confirmation requires official exchange data published on COMEX's website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerCOMEX official data@content_dividerhttps://www.cmegroup.com/trading/metals/precious/gold.html)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified financial data aggregators with archival snapshots available (e.g., Internet Archive), or corroborated by major financial news outlets with dual tier-1 source confirmation.

This market resolves 'No' if no official closing price falls within the specified $3,900 to $4,000 range on or before _$TIME_1, if official trading is suspended or COMEX is closed indefinitely for gold contracts before _$TIME_1, if price data is unavailable or unverifiable by _$TIME_1, or if the event never occurs. Conflicting data will be resolved by prioritizing official COMEX data, then CME Group reports, followed by archival financial data repositories. Additionally, the market resolves 'No' if the gold market closes outside the specified range throughout the period or if the event is cancelled or does not exist.

Resolves 'No' if no official state certification or major media confirmation of Ramaswamy's victory exists by _$TIME_1, if the election is postponed or cancelled, or if authoritative data is unavailable or contradictory. Conflicts resolve with priority to official government sources. Also resolves 'No' if the election or candidacy never occurs or if Ramaswamy is not the certified winner.

items.title: Gold closing price between $3,000 and $3,100 by December 31, 2025?

This market measures whether the official closing price of gold _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerGold@content_dividera precious yellow metallic element used as a monetary standard and investment – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ falls inclusively between $3,000 and $3,100 USD per troy ounce _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerTroy ounce@content_dividera unit of measure for precious metals equal to approximately 31.1035 grams – Oxford Dictionary)_$ANNOTATION$_ at the close of trading on December 31, 2025 UTC, according to prices reported by leading global bullion exchanges _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerBullion exchanges@content_dividerregulated marketplaces for trading precious metals such as gold – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ with verification through primary market data providers and archived official records.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the official closing price published by at least one primary bullion exchange (e.g., London Bullion Market Association (LBMA) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerLBMA@content_dividerthe London-based trade association that represents the global market for precious metals – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or New York Mercantile Exchange (NYMEX) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerNYMEX@content_dividera commodity futures exchange based in New York specializing in energy and precious metals – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_) or an official aggregated price source such as the World Gold Council _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=6@counter_dividerWorld Gold Council@content_dividerindustry organization that promotes gold and provides market data – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ shows a closing price within the stated range at or before _$TIME_1. Verification requires publicly accessible official price records or data archives (e.g., LBMA daily price fix, COMEX settlement reports).

This market resolves 'No' if the closing price is outside the range at _$TIME_1, if official bullion markets are closed or suspended on that date, if official pricing data is not published or verifiable by _$TIME_1, or if the event never existed (e.g., no trading or market closure). Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing official exchange publications and authoritative aggregated sources. In all cases without explicit confirmation, the default resolution is 'No'.

items.title: St. Louis Blues Stanley Cup win by December 31, 2026?

If the NHL suspends or cancels the 2026 Stanley Cup playoffs or the event never takes place, the market resolves to 'No' after _$TIME_1. Verification includes official NHL statements, league schedules, and credible media reports confirming event cancellation or postponement.

If official NHL playoff results or championship announcements are inaccessible or unavailable by _$TIME_1, resolution follows secondary verification through archived NHL.com records via the Internet Archive, official NHL statistical databases, or major sports regulatory bodies' repositories.

items.title: OpenAI $1T valuation by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether OpenAI's valuation _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerValuation@content_dividerthe monetary worth or market capitalization of a company based on the latest funding round or public market capitalization – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches or exceeds $1 trillion USD _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUSD@content_dividerUnited States dollar, official currency of the United States – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 through either a private funding round valuation or public market capitalization confirmed by official company announcements or credible financial news sources.

Resolves 'Yes' if at any time on or before _$TIME_1, OpenAI publicly announces or credible tier-1 financial news sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerTier-1 financial news sources@content_dividerleading, reputable financial media outlets with rigorous verification standards such as Bloomberg, Reuters, or WSJ)_$ANNOTATION$_ report OpenAI’s valuation at or above $1 trillion USD based on latest private funding round terms or public market capitalization, with confirmation from official company statements or filings accessible via OpenAI’s website or major financial databases.

Resolves 'No' if OpenAI's valuation does not reach $1 trillion USD by _$TIME_1, if valuation data is unavailable or unverified by authoritative sources, or if the event is cancelled, indefinitely postponed, or the company ceases to exist. In case of conflicting data, resolution defers to official company disclosures, then tier-1 financial news consensus. Additionally, resolves 'No' if OpenAI never underwent a valuation event or public listing by the deadline.

items.title: Renate Reinsve Best Actress nomination by January 22, 2026?

Resolves 'No' if Renate Reinsve is not included in the official Best Actress nominee list published by _$TIME_1, if the nomination event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if no verifiable official nomination data is available by the deadline. In conflicting information cases, official Academy sources take precedence. The market also resolves 'No' if the 98th Academy Awards nominations do not occur or the Best Actress category is not awarded.

items.title: Rental Family Best Picture Oscar by March 1, 2026?
items.rules:

Backup verification includes major tier-1 media outlets reporting with dual confirmation and credible visual evidence from the ceremony.

Resolves 'No' if 'Rental Family' is not confirmed as Best Picture winner by _$TIME_1, if the ceremony is cancelled or indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, if official or authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory, or if the event never occurred. Conflicts in data are resolved prioritizing official AMPAS sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the Best Picture category or the 98th Academy Awards ceremony does not occur.

items.title: Kerby Joseph leads NFL interceptions by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:

Resolves 'Yes' if official NFL season statistics _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerNFL@content_dividerNational Football League, the professional American football league – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ from NFL.com _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerNFL.com@content_dividerhttps://www.nfl.com/stats/player-stats/interceptions)_$ANNOTATION$_ or ESPN.com _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerESPN.com@content_dividerhttps://www.espn.com/nfl/stats/player/_$ANNOTATION$_) confirm Kerby Joseph has the highest interception total in the NFL by _$TIME_1. Verification requires published season interception leaderboards or official league announcements.

Resolves 'No' if Kerby Joseph does not lead the NFL in interceptions by _$TIME_1, if the NFL season is cancelled or indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if official interception statistics are unavailable or unverifiable. Conflicting data resolves by prioritizing NFL.com official statistics. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the NFL season or player participation does not exist or is voided by _$TIME_1.

items.title: U.S. recession by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the National Bureau of Economic Research (NBER) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerNBER@content_dividerNational Bureau of Economic Research: private nonprofit research organization that officially dates U.S. business cycles – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ officially announces a U.S. recession _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerRecession@content_dividera significant decline in economic activity spread across the economy lasting more than a few months – NBER definition)_$ANNOTATION$_ beginning on or before _$TIME_1 based on its monthly business cycle dating committee announcements.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the NBER Business Cycle Dating Committee officially declares a recession start date on or before _$TIME_1 through a public announcement on its website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerNBER Website@content_dividerhttps://www.nber.org/research/business-cycle-dating)_$ANNOTATION$_ or in authoritative government publications by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes major media reports from two or more tier-1 sources corroborating the official announcement.

This market resolves 'No' if no official NBER recession announcement confirming a recession starting on or before _$TIME_1 is made, if the event is indefinitely postponed or cancelled, or if authoritative verification is unavailable by _$TIME_1. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing the NBER official declarations. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the recession event never existed or was never officially declared.

items.title: Eugenio Suárez leads MLB home runs by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Eugenio Suárez leads Major League Baseball in cumulative home runs, including regular season and postseason, as officially recorded by MLB statistics by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerHome run@content_dividera hit in baseball in which the batter successfully rounds all bases and scores a run, typically by hitting the ball out of the playing field – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerMLB@content_dividerMajor League Baseball, the professional baseball organization comprising the American and National Leagues – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if official MLB statistics published on the MLB website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerMLB official website@content_dividerhttps://www.mlb.com/stats/home-runs)_$ANNOTATION$_ or MLB’s verified official communications confirm Eugenio Suárez has the highest total home runs among all players by _$TIME_1, including any postseason totals if applicable. Backup verification may use Baseball-Reference.com _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerBaseball-Reference@content_dividerauthoritative baseball statistics database – https://www.baseball-reference.com/)_$ANNOTATION$_ and archived MLB statistical releases.

Resolves 'No' if Eugenio Suárez does not lead MLB in home runs by _$TIME_1, if the season or postseason is cancelled or indefinitely postponed before completion, if reliable official statistics are unavailable or contradictory, or if the event never existed (e.g., no games played). Conflicting data are resolved by prioritizing official MLB sources. This market defaults to 'No' if verification is unavailable by _$TIME_1.

items.title: SER holds most seats in Argentina Chamber of Deputies after October 26, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the SER political party _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerSER,an acronym for 'Solidaridad, Empleo y Riqueza', a political party in Argentina – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ holds the greatest number of seats _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerSeats,the allocated positions for representatives in a legislative body – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ in Argentina's Chamber of Deputies _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerChamber of Deputies,the lower house of the National Congress of Argentina – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ after the October 26, 2025 general election, based on official certified results from Argentina’s National Electoral Chamber and recognized news agencies.

Verification requires published data from the National Electoral Chamber of Argentina _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerNational Electoral Chamber of Argentina,Argentina's official electoral authority responsible for certifying legislative election outcomes – https://www.electoral.gob.ar)_$ANNOTATION$_ or equivalent official government sources, or corroboration from at least two tier-1 news agencies such as Reuters, Associated Press, or Bloomberg News.

This market resolves 'No' if SER does not hold the most seats by _$TIME_1, if the election is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if official data is unavailable or unverified by _$TIME_1, or if the event never occurs. Conflicting information is resolved prioritizing official government publications and certified election results. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the election does not take place or the Chamber of Deputies composition changes due to extraordinary circumstances invalidating the election.

In cases of conflicting reports, official FIFA declarations take precedence. Also resolves 'No' if the 2026 FIFA World Cup does not occur or New Zealand does not participate.

items.title: Elon Musk trillionaire status by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Elon Musk's net worth reaches or exceeds $1 trillion USD by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerTrillionaire@content_dividera person whose net worth is at least one trillion United States dollars – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ as calculated by combining Tesla stock value, SpaceX valuation estimates, and other holdings using Bloomberg Billionaires Index and verified financial news sources.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Bloomberg Billionaires Index or equivalent authoritative financial sources officially report Elon Musk’s net worth as $1 trillion USD or greater by _$TIME_1, verified by at least two tier-1 financial news outlets such as Bloomberg, Reuters, or Forbes _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerBloomberg Billionaires Index@content_dividera daily ranking of the world's richest people based on real-time market data and asset valuations – Bloomberg)_$ANNOTATION$_ .

This market resolves 'No' if Elon Musk’s net worth does not reach $1 trillion USD by _$TIME_1, if verified sources report his net worth below this threshold, if no authoritative confirmation is available, or if the event is cancelled or never occurred. In case of conflicting data, Bloomberg Billionaires Index takes precedence. This market also resolves 'No' if Elon Musk’s net worth can not be reliably verified by the deadline.

This market resolves 'No' if the score is below 80% or above 89% at _$TIME_1, if The Smashing Machine is not listed on Rotten Tomatoes by that time, if the film is officially withdrawn or delisted, or if authoritative verification sources are unavailable or contradictory. items.title: Trump declassifies UFO files by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether President Trump or the U.S. government officially publicly releases or announces the declassification of UFO files by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerUFO files@content_dividerdocuments or records related to unidentified flying objects or unidentified anomalous phenomena – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to official U.S. government or presidential sources.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official public release or announcement confirming declassification of UFO files is published by the U.S. government or President Trump by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial public release@content_dividerstatement or publication on government websites, presidential communications, or verified official channels)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification includes confirmed postings on U.S. government portals such as the National Archives _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerNational Archives@content_dividerU.S. agency responsible for preserving and providing access to federal records – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, All-domain Anomaly Resolution Office (AARO) websites, or official presidential communications. Secondary verification may include major media outlets with dual tier-1 source confirmation or official government press releases.

Resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation or release occurs by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if authoritative verification is unavailable, or if President Trump or the U.S. government explicitly denies declassification. This market also resolves 'No' if the event never existed or the files were not declassified by the specified deadline. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing official government and presidential sources. Data unavailability defaults to 'No' unless confirmed otherwise.

items.title: BTC > $108,000 by October 3?
items.rules:

This market resolves 'Yes' if verified official price data from at least two reputable sources such as Coinbase, Binance, or CoinDesk _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerCoinbase@content_dividercryptocurrency exchange and data provider – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerBinance@content_dividerleading global cryptocurrency exchange platform – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ shows Bitcoin price exceeds 108,000 USD at exactly 16:00 UTC on October 3, 2025, with confirmation published by _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial source@content_dividerexchange websites, FRED database, or verified financial news portals)_$ANNOTATION$_ by that time.

This market resolves 'No' if the Bitcoin price is at or below 108,000 USD at the specified time, if reliable price data is unavailable or unverifiable by the deadline, or if major exchanges are closed, halted, or delisted Bitcoin trading at that time. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing official exchange API data and government-regulated financial data repositories. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Bitcoin or price data does not exist or is permanently suspended before the deadline.

items.title: Gambling loss deduction cap repeal by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the U.S. federal legislative process enacts a law repealing or modifying the 90% cap on gambling loss deductions _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerGambling loss deduction cap@content_dividerthe statutory limit on deducting gambling losses against winnings under U.S. federal tax law – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 according to official legislative records and government publications.

Resolves 'Yes' if official U.S. government sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerU.S. government sources@content_dividerofficial U.S. Congress publications, government websites, or authenticated legislative databases)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm enactment of legislation repealing or materially modifying the 90% gambling loss deduction cap by _$TIME_1. Verification requires publication of the bill text and enactment date on Congress.gov or the Federal Register. This market resolves 'Yes' if John Harbaugh is explicitly confirmed as the 2025 NFL Coach of the Year in the official NFL Honors announcement published by the NFL or on the NFL’s verified website or social media channels by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerNFL Honors@content_divideran annual awards ceremony conducted by the National Football League recognizing top players and coaches – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.
