This market measures whether the price of Solana (SOL) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerSolana@content_dividera blockchain platform and cryptocurrency token – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches or exceeds $300 USD at any time before _$TIME_1 based on closing prices on major cryptocurrency exchanges published in USD.

Resolves 'Yes' if official price data from at least two major cryptocurrency exchanges _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividercryptocurrency exchanges@content_dividerdigital marketplaces for buying and selling cryptocurrencies – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ shows SOL closing at or above $300 USD any time before _$TIME_1, confirmed by official exchange APIs or publicly archived market data _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerExchange APIs@content_dividerapplication programming interfaces provided by exchanges for price data retrieval – Oxford Dictionary)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if SOL never closes at or above $300 USD on any major exchange before _$TIME_1, if trading halts, delisting, or official cancellations occur preventing price discovery, or if price data from authoritative sources is unavailable or contradictory by _$TIME_1. In case of conflicting data, resolution defers to primary exchange official APIs and CoinMarketCap _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerCoinMarketCap@content_dividera leading cryptocurrency market data aggregator – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_. Additionally, resolves 'No' if SOL token ceases to exist or trading never occurs by the deadline.

items.title: BTS concert tickets sell out within 1 hour after first public sale by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:

Resolves 'Yes' if official BTS platforms _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerBTS official platforms@content_dividerverified BTS websites, Weverse, Twitter, Instagram)_$ANNOTATION$_ or authorized ticket sellers publicly confirm the tickets sold out within 1 hour after the first sale start by _$TIME_1, with timestamped documentation or screenshots. Alternative confirmation includes major verified media reports citing BTS official announcements or visual evidence such as screenshots or videos timestamped within the sell-out window.

Resolves 'No' if no such confirmation occurs by _$TIME_1, if the concert or ticket sale is cancelled or postponed indefinitely, if official BTS or authorized ticket sources do not confirm sell-out within 1 hour, or if ticket sales do not exist. In cases of conflicting information, official BTS announcements take precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the BTS 2026 tour or ticket sales never occur.

items.title: Iowa State #1 overall seed in 2025-26 College Football Playoff by December 1?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Iowa State University is designated the #1 overall seed in the 2025-26 College Football Playoff _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerCollege Football Playoff@content_dividerpostseason tournament to determine NCAA Division I FBS football national champion – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ National Championship seeding by the official College Football Playoff Selection Committee announcement according to the 2025-26 seeding criteria.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the College Football Playoff Selection Committee officially publishes _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividerstatement on CFP website or verified CFP social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_ a ranking listing Iowa State as the #1 overall seed for the 2025-26 playoff on or before _$TIME_1. Verification requires the final seeding release accessible from the official CFP website or the NCAA's official channels. Backup verification includes major tier-1 sports media outlets with dual-source confirmation.

This market resolves 'No' if the official #1 overall seed is not Iowa State by _$TIME_1, if the seeding announcement is cancelled or indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if no authoritative verification is available. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing the CFP Selection Committee’s official publications. Additionally, this market resolves 'No' if the 2025-26 College Football Playoff or the #1 overall seed designation does not exist or is fundamentally altered such that Iowa State cannot hold that position.

items.title: Elon Musk posts 1,280-1,319 X tweets by October 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Elon Musk posts between 1,280 and 1,319 tweets inclusive on X during October 2025 according to counting main feed posts, quote posts, and reposts excluding replies. Post deletions count if captured within ~5 minutes. Resolution uses the official Post Counter on X.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the official Post Counter on X, accessible at https://x.com, confirms by _$TIME_1 that Elon Musk's total counted posts during October 2025 fall within 1,280 to 1,319 inclusive. Verification requires archived snapshots or official X data published at https://x.com/elonmusk or via X's authenticated API endpoints.

This market resolves 'No' if the tweet count is outside the specified range by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or Elon Musk ceases posting on X before October ends, or if authoritative data is unavailable. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing the official Post Counter and its archival records. The market also resolves 'No' if Elon Musk does not post on X during October 2025 or if the official Post Counter source is permanently inaccessible.

items.title: MegaETH Token Generation Event by October 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether MegaETH conducts its Token Generation Event (TGE) by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerToken Generation Event@content_divideran initial issuance or sale of cryptocurrency tokens by a project – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to official MegaETH announcements or verified blockchain news portals.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official MegaETH statement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial MegaETH announcement@content_dividera public declaration published on MegaETH’s official website or verified social media)_$ANNOTATION$_ or a report from at least two major verified blockchain news sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerVerified blockchain news portals@content_dividerwell-recognized cryptocurrency news websites with editorial standards and source verification)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms the TGE occurred on or before _$TIME_1. Confirmation must include explicit mention of token issuance or sale and timestamped publication.

Resolves 'No' if no such official or verified confirmation is available by _$TIME_1, if the TGE is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if MegaETH never planned or executed a TGE by the deadline. In case of conflicting information, official MegaETH sources take precedence. This market also resolves 'No' if the event never existed or if data sources become permanently inaccessible.

items.title: Monad airdrop checker release by October 7, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Monad airdrop checker, a software tool for verifying eligibility to receive Monad tokens _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMonad airdrop checker@content_dividera digital tool that allows users to check eligibility for receiving cryptocurrency tokens distributed as a free grant – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, is officially released on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-10-07T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to official Monad communication channels.

Resolves 'Yes' if explicit confirmation of the Monad airdrop checker release is published by Monad Labs _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerMonad Labs@content_dividerthe company developing the Monad blockchain platform – CoinMarketCap)_$ANNOTATION$_ on their official website or verified social media accounts _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerofficial Monad channels@content_dividerofficial website or verified social media accounts controlled by Monad Labs)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, or if verified visual evidence (e.g., screenshots, videos) is published by these official sources by this deadline.

Resolves 'No' if no verifiable confirmation or official announcement is made by _$TIME_1, if the release is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if the event never occurred or the checker does not exist. In cases of conflicting information, priority is given to official Monad sources. This market also resolves 'No' if official sources become unavailable and no archival verification is possible.

items.title: Davis Feminist Film Festival event in Davis by May 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Davis Feminist Film Festival, an annual grassroots event showcasing feminist-themed independent short films _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerDavis Feminist Film Festival@content_divideran annual grassroots film event focused on feminist social issues – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, holds its next annual in-person event in Davis, California, by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2026-05-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_, according to official festival or University of California Davis (UC Davis) campus communications _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerUC Davis@content_dividerUniversity of California, Davis: a public research university located in Davis, California – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if official announcements from the Davis Feminist Film Festival organization or UC Davis campus communications _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerofficial announcements@content_dividerstatements published on the festival website, verified social media accounts, or UC Davis official channels)_$ANNOTATION$_ explicitly confirm the event's occurrence in Davis by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes archived web captures, major local media reports with dual tier-1 source confirmation, or authoritative festival press releases.

Resolves 'No' if no authoritative confirmation of the event occurs by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially cancelled, postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if reliable verification is unavailable. Conflicting information is resolved prioritizing official festival or UC Davis sources. This market also resolves 'No' if the event does not exist, is not held in Davis, or never took place by the deadline.

items.title: Solana market cap > Binance Coin market cap by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Solana's market capitalization in USD surpasses Binance Coin's market capitalization in USD at 23:59:59 UTC on December 31, 2025, using authoritative exchange data for market capitalization calculation _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMarket capitalization@content_dividertotal market value of a company's outstanding shares or tokens calculated as price multiplied by circulating supply – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Solana's market cap is strictly greater than Binance Coin's market cap at 23:59:59 UTC on December 31, 2025, as confirmed by official data published on major cryptocurrency exchange platforms such as Binance _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerBinance@content_dividera major global cryptocurrency exchange platform providing trading data and market metrics – Binance official website https://www.binance.com/en)_$ANNOTATION$_ or CoinMarketCap _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerCoinMarketCap@content_dividera leading cryptocurrency market data provider aggregating prices and market caps – https://coinmarketcap.com/)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, with backup verification via archived snapshots from Internet Archive or regulatory filings where applicable.

This market resolves 'No' if by _$TIME_1 Solana's market cap does not exceed Binance Coin's market cap, if authoritative market cap data are unavailable, if the data are contradictory without resolution, or if the event is cancelled or invalid (e.g., Binance Coin or Solana tokens delisted or ceased trading). Conflicting data resolution prioritizes official exchange data from Binance, followed by CoinMarketCap and then archived third-party sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if either token ceases to exist or is officially delisted before _$TIME_1.

items.title: South Carolina wins 2025 SEC Championship Game by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the University of South Carolina football team wins the 2025 Southeastern Conference (SEC) Championship Game based on the official final score announced by SEC authorities at game completion._$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerSEC Championship Game@content_dividerthe annual college football championship contest for the Southeastern Conference – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_

This market resolves 'Yes' if the official SEC Championship Game final score confirms South Carolina as the winner, published by the SEC Office or its verified communications channels by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial SEC sources@content_dividerSEC official website, verified social media, or SEC press releases – https://www.secsports.com/)_$ANNOTATION$_. Alternative confirmation may include major sports media outlets with dual tier-1 source verification.

This market resolves 'No' if South Carolina is not officially declared the winner by _$TIME_1, if the game is cancelled, postponed indefinitely, or if no verifiable official result is available. In case of conflicting information, priority is given to SEC official announcements. This market also resolves 'No' if the SEC Championship Game does not occur or South Carolina does not participate.

items.title: Ashton Jeanty Offensive Rookie of the Year by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Ashton Jeanty officially wins the 2025 NFL Offensive Rookie of the Year award as confirmed by the National Football League by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerOffensive Rookie of the Year@content_divideran annual National Football League award given to the top offensive rookie player – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if the NFL officially announces Ashton Jeanty as the 2025 Offensive Rookie of the Year by _$TIME_1 through the NFL website or verified NFL social media accounts _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerNFL official announcement@content_dividerhttps://www.nfl.com/news/rookie-of-the-year-awards)_$ANNOTATION$_. Backup verification includes major sports media outlets reporting with confirmation from at least two tier-1 sources and archived official NFL communications.

Resolves 'No' if no official NFL announcement confirms Ashton Jeanty as the award winner by _$TIME_1, if the award is officially cancelled or postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicts in data are resolved by prioritizing official NFL sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the award event does not occur or Ashton Jeanty does not win.

items.title: Solana (SOL) > $300 by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the price of Solana (SOL) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerSolana (SOL)@content_dividera blockchain platform and its native cryptocurrency token – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches or exceeds $300 USD _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUSD@content_dividerUnited States Dollar, the official currency of the United States – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on major cryptocurrency exchanges by the end of December 31, 2025 UTC _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerUTC@content_dividerCoordinated Universal Time, the primary time standard by which the world regulates clocks and time – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_. Price is based on official closing prices reported by major exchanges including Kraken _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerKraken@content_dividera major cryptocurrency exchange platform – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, Binance _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerBinance@content_dividera leading global cryptocurrency exchange platform – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, and Coinbase _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=6@counter_dividerCoinbase@content_dividera major US-based cryptocurrency exchange platform – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_. The final settlement price is the highest verified closing price on any of these exchanges on or before _$TIME_1.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Solana's closing price equals or exceeds $300 USD on any of the specified major exchanges by _$TIME_1 as confirmed through official exchange price data or regulatory filings published on their websites _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=7@counter_dividerKraken prices@content_dividerhttps://www.kraken.com/prices/solana#)_$ANNOTATION$_, Binance official data portals, or Coinbase price listings. Backup verification includes archival data from CoinMarketCap, CoinGecko, or equivalent reputable aggregators _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=8@counter_dividerCoinMarketCap@content_dividercryptocurrency market data aggregator – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_. All price data must be denominated in USD and reflect spot market closing prices at end of day UTC.

This market resolves 'No' if Solana does not reach or exceed $300 USD on any major exchange by _$TIME_1, if the token is delisted or trading is halted indefinitely before the deadline, or if reliable price verification data is unavailable or contradictory by settlement. Conflicting data shall be resolved by prioritizing official exchange reports, followed by regulatory filings, and then reputable market data aggregators. Additionally, if Solana token ceases to exist or is permanently suspended prior to _$TIME_1, this market resolves 'No'.

items.title: GRASS Season 2 rewards shared by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether GRASS Season 2 officially distributes token rewards _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerGRASS Season 2@content_dividerthe second campaign phase of the GRASS token airdrop reward program – official Grass Network documentation)_$ANNOTATION$_ by transferring tokens to eligible wallets by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ as confirmed by official announcements or blockchain transaction evidence.

This market resolves 'Yes' if an official GRASS Network statement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerofficial statement@content_dividerannouncement published on Grass Network’s verified website or verified social media)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verifiable on-chain transaction data _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_divideron-chain data@content_dividerpublic blockchain records showing token transfers to eligible addresses)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms token rewards were distributed for Season 2 by _$TIME_1. Backup verification may include major crypto media reporting with dual tier-1 source confirmation.

This market resolves 'No' if no confirmed token transfer event occurs by _$TIME_1, if the reward distribution is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if no authoritative verification is available. In case of conflicting information, official Grass Network sources take precedence. The market also resolves 'No' if Season 2 rewards do not exist or the event never occurred.

items.title: Virtuals Protocol < $1 by October 15, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the price of Virtuals Protocol (a decentralized digital asset token _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerVirtuals Protocol@content_dividera blockchain-based cryptocurrency token representing the Virtuals Protocol project – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_) trades below USD 1.00 at any time during the UTC date October 15, 2025, using aggregated exchange data at the UTC close of that date.

Resolves 'Yes' if any verified trade price of Virtuals Protocol is below USD 1.00 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividertrade below $1@content_dividerany transaction price recorded under one US dollar – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on or before _$TIME_1, confirmed by official exchange data aggregators such as CoinMarketCap, CoinGecko, or major regulated cryptocurrency exchanges _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerofficial source@content_dividerverified exchange platforms or authoritative market data providers with publicly accessible, timestamped trade records)_$ANNOTATION$_. Backup verification may include archived exchange APIs or Internet Archive snapshots.

Resolves 'No' if no verified trade price below USD 1.00 occurs by _$TIME_1, if Virtuals Protocol is delisted, trading is halted indefinitely before that date, or if authoritative price data is unavailable or insufficient. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing official aggregated exchange data. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Virtuals Protocol ceases to exist or never traded on any public exchange by the deadline.

items.title: Monad airdrop to Monad Cards holders by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Monad distributes its official tokens _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMonad tokens@content_dividerdigital assets issued by Monad project for network participation and governance – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ to verified Monad Cards holders _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerMonad Cards holders@content_dividerindividuals holding NFTs called Monad Cards distributed by Monad project as tokens of appreciation – official Monad communications)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:00Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_, confirmed through official Monad communications or regulatory filings.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official Monad sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOfficial Monad sources@content_dividercompany website, verified social media accounts, or regulatory filings – primary source for confirmation)_$ANNOTATION$_ explicitly confirm token distribution to Monad Cards holders by _$TIME_1, including published transaction records, distribution announcements, or blockchain data verifying recipient addresses linked to Monad Cards holders.

This market resolves 'No' if no verifiable official confirmation of the airdrop exists by _$TIME_1, if the airdrop is cancelled or indefinitely postponed beyond that date, or if the event never occurred. In case of conflicting or insufficient data, resolution prioritizes official Monad sources and blockchain transaction data. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Monad Cards holders are not defined or verified by official Monad communications or if the token distribution differs materially from the stated criteria.

items.title: Monad mainnet launch with parallel execution > 10,000 TPS by April 30?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Monad _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMonad@content_dividera blockchain platform focused on high-performance decentralized applications – Monad official website https://www.monad.xyz/)_$ANNOTATION$_ launches its mainnet _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividermainnet@content_dividerthe first fully operational version of a blockchain network open to public participation – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ with parallel execution _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerParallel execution@content_dividera blockchain processing method where multiple transactions are executed simultaneously to increase throughput – technical blockchain literature)_$ANNOTATION$_ achieving at least 10,000 transactions per second (TPS) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerTransactions per second@content_dividerthe number of individual transactions a network processes each second – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, verified through on-chain metrics and official Monad performance reports.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Monad mainnet launch with parallel execution and sustained TPS ≥ 10,000 is explicitly confirmed by Monad's official announcement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividerpublished statements on Monad's official website https://www.monad.xyz/ or verified social media accounts like X.com/monad_xyz) and corroborated by on-chain data accessible via blockchain explorers or official performance reports published by April 30, 2026 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=6@counter_dividerVerification deadline@content_divider2026-04-30T23:59:59Z UTC). Backup confirmation includes reports from major crypto analytics firms or tier-1 media with dual verification.

This market resolves 'No' if Monad mainnet does not launch by September 30, 2025 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=7@counter_dividerScheduled launch date@content_dividerofficially announced mainnet launch date on https://www.monad.xyz/ and related channels) or if parallel execution or TPS ≥ 10,000 is not confirmed by official sources by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if performance benchmarks are unmet, or if verification data is unavailable or contradictory. Conflicts are resolved prioritizing official Monad statements and on-chain evidence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Monad mainnet never launches or the performance claim is fundamentally different from the market specification.

items.title: NASA Artemis II crewed Moon flyby launch by March 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether NASA launches the Artemis II mission _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerArtemis II mission@content_dividerthe second planned Artemis program mission, aiming to send four astronauts on a crewed lunar flyby using the Space Launch System and Orion spacecraft – NASA)_$ANNOTATION$_ with four astronauts on board from Kennedy Space Center _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerKennedy Space Center@content_dividerNASA's primary launch site in Florida for crewed space missions – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. The event is defined by the successful liftoff of the crewed Artemis II spacecraft, confirmed by official NASA announcements or verified visual evidence.

This market resolves 'Yes' if NASA confirms the successful liftoff of Artemis II carrying four astronauts from Kennedy Space Center by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerNASA official@content_dividerNASA official statements, press releases at https://www.nasa.gov/mission/artemis-ii/, or verified social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification may include NASA live launch webcasts, official video footage, or multiple tier-1 media reports corroborating the event.

This market resolves 'No' if Artemis II does not launch with four astronauts aboard by _$TIME_1, if the mission is officially postponed beyond this date, cancelled, or if no authoritative confirmation of liftoff is available. Conflicting or missing data resolves to 'No'. This market also resolves 'No' if the Artemis II mission never existed, was cancelled before launch, or the launch occurs without crew or from a different site.

items.title: Monad airdrop checker live by October 15, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Monad airdrop checker platform is officially live and operational by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMonad airdrop checker@content_dividera software tool or service enabling users to verify eligibility for cryptocurrency token distributions from the Monad project – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, with live status confirmed exclusively through official Monad communication channels.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official Monad source _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial Monad source@content_dividerverified Monad website, official social media accounts, or verified announcements – Monad official channels)_$ANNOTATION$_ explicitly confirms the checker is live by _$TIME_1 and this confirmation is documented publicly. Backup verification includes community updates from verified Monad representatives or trusted ecosystem partners.

Resolves 'No' if no official confirmation is available by _$TIME_1, if the checker is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if the event never existed, or if only unofficial or unverified sources claim the checker is live. Conflicting evidence is resolved by prioritizing official Monad sources. Also resolves 'No' if the checker fundamentally differs from the defined Monad airdrop checker or if verification data is unavailable.

items.title: BTC > $128,000 by October 30, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the average Bitcoin price in USD across major exchanges reaches or exceeds $128,000 at any point up to and including _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividera digital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, using aggregated and normalized data from authoritative cryptocurrency market data providers.

Resolves 'Yes' if any verified public data source, such as CoinAPI, CoinMarketCap, or official exchange APIs, shows Bitcoin’s weighted average price meeting or exceeding $128,000 USD by _$TIME_1. Verification requires archived snapshots or official API data accessible at settlement, or corroborating major media reports with explicit data confirmation _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCoinAPI@content_dividerprofessional market data API normalizing prices across 380+ exchanges – https://www.coinapi.io)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if Bitcoin does not reach $128,000 by _$TIME_1, if trading data is unavailable or insufficient for verification, if the event is rendered impossible due to market closure or delisting, or if no authoritative confirmation exists. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing primary official exchange data and CoinAPI archives. Market resolves 'No' if Bitcoin or the price event does not exist or is discontinued.

items.title: Buzzing Mainnet launch by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Buzzing blockchain project officially launches its Mainnet _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMainnet@content_dividerthe fully operational main network of a blockchain distinct from test networks – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 as confirmed by an official developer announcement.

Resolves 'Yes' if an explicit, verifiable announcement from Buzzing's official developer channels _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial developer announcement@content_dividerstatements published on the official Buzzing website or verified social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms the Mainnet launch by _$TIME_1. Verification includes user migration completion and KYC (know your customer) process deadlines as documented on these sources or via archival captures.

Resolves 'No' if no authoritative confirmation occurs by _$TIME_1, if the launch is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if credible sources indicate failure to launch. Conflicting reports will be resolved prioritizing official developer communications and major media with dual verification. Also resolves 'No' if the Mainnet launch event never existed or was never planned.

items.title: Solana (SOL) ≥ $300 by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Solana (SOL) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerSolana@content_dividera blockchain platform and cryptocurrency token – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ trades at or above $300 USD on any major US cryptocurrency exchange official closing price feed by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if at least one major US-based cryptocurrency exchange _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerCryptocurrency exchange@content_dividera platform to trade cryptocurrencies for fiat money or other cryptocurrencies – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reports an official closing price of SOL ≥ $300 USD on or before _$TIME_1, confirmed by exchange price feeds published on the exchange’s official website or verified API endpoints _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerofficial sources@content_dividere.g., Coinbase Pro, Kraken, Binance.US official price data)_$ANNOTATION$_. Backup confirmation may include aggregated price data from authoritative financial data providers such as CoinMarketCap or CoinGecko.

Resolves 'No' if no major US cryptocurrency exchange reports SOL ≥ $300 USD closing price by _$TIME_1, if the market or exchanges cease operation, if SOL is delisted or trading halted indefinitely before _$TIME_1, or if authoritative verification data is unavailable or contradictory by _$TIME_1. Conflicting information shall be resolved prioritizing official exchange data. Additionally, resolves 'No' if SOL or the specified trading pair does not exist or never traded on any qualifying exchange by _$TIME_1.

items.title: Liverpool wins Premier League match vs Manchester United by October 19, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Liverpool Football Club wins the Premier League football match against Manchester United Football Club scheduled for October 19, 2025 by official final score after regulation time as announced by the Premier League and LiverpoolFC.com _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerLiverpool Football Club@content_dividerEnglish professional football club based in Liverpool – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerManchester United Football Club@content_dividerEnglish professional football club based in Manchester – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerPremier League@content_dividertop level English professional football league – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Liverpool’s victory is confirmed by the official Premier League match report or LiverpoolFC.com publication by _$TIME_1. Verification includes direct official announcements, verified social media from the Premier League or LiverpoolFC.com, or authoritative major media outlets with corroboration from at least two tier-1 sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividertier-1 sources@content_dividerleading global media outlets with established verification standards – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'No' if Liverpool does not win by the deadline, if the match is cancelled, postponed indefinitely beyond _$TIME_1, or if official verification is unavailable or contradictory. If the match never occurs or is rescheduled to a different date, this market resolves 'No'. In case of conflicting information, official Premier League sources take precedence. Backup verification includes archived official match reports or regulatory filings.

If official data sources become inaccessible by _$TIME_1, archived versions from the Internet Archive or recognized sports regulatory repositories must be used for verification.

Match time references are standardized to UTC from British Summer Time (BST, GMT+1) for consistent timing across sources.

items.title: BTC < $100000 by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin trades below $100,000 USD at any time before or on _$TIME_1 using Binance BTC/USDT high and low prices during continuous 24/7 trading _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividera digital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerBinance@content_dividera major cryptocurrency exchange platform founded in 2017 – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if Binance BTC/USDT trading data or official price records confirm any trade or closing price below $100,000 USD before or at _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerDeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification requires data from Binance official APIs or website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerBinance official data@content_dividerhttps://www.binance.com/en/market/BTC_USDT)_$ANNOTATION$_ or corroboration from at least two tier-1 financial media sources reporting Binance BTC price movements.

Resolves 'No' if no verified trade or closing price below $100,000 USD occurs by _$TIME_1, if Binance trading is suspended or unavailable continuously before the deadline, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if reliable verification data is not obtainable. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing Binance official data and major financial news agencies. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never occurred or the BTC/USDT pair did not trade.

items.title: Avatar: Fire and Ash > $2B box office by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures if the film Avatar: Fire and Ash _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerAvatar: Fire and Ash@content_dividertitle of a feature film produced by 20th Century Studios – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ achieves worldwide box office gross revenue _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerbox office gross revenue@content_dividertotal ticket sales revenue from worldwide theatrical screenings – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ equal to or exceeding $2,000,000,000 USD by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ as reported by official box office tracking entities.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the cumulative worldwide box office gross revenue reported by at least one of the following authoritative sources: Box Office Mojo _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerBox Office Mojo@content_dividerwidely recognized box office reporting website operated by IMDbPro, an Amazon company – https://www.boxofficemojo.com)_$ANNOTATION$_, The Numbers _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerThe Numbers@content_dividerbox office data and film industry analytics website operated by Nash Information Services – https://www.the-numbers.com)_$ANNOTATION$_, or official 20th Century Studios or Disney public disclosures _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=6@counter_divider20th Century Studios@content_dividerfilm production company owned by The Walt Disney Company – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, confirm by _$TIME_1 that the film’s worldwide theatrical gross revenue is ≥ $2,000,000,000 USD. Verification may be backed by major media coverage from two or more tier-1 global media outlets explicitly citing these sources.

This market resolves 'No' if the film’s worldwide box office gross revenue is below $2,000,000,000 USD by _$TIME_1, if the film is officially cancelled, indefinitely postponed, or never released theatrically, or if no verifiable confirmation from authoritative sources is available. If data conflicts arise, resolution prioritizes official studio disclosures, then Box Office Mojo, then The Numbers. Additionally, the market resolves 'No' if the film never existed or theatrical release did not occur.

items.title: Michael Berry Nobel Prize in Physics by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Michael Berry will be officially announced as a laureate of the 2025 Nobel Prize in Physics by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerNobel Prize in Physics@content_divideran international award recognizing outstanding contributions in physics established by Alfred Nobel's will – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to official declarations from the Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences or the Nobel Prize organization.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences or the Nobel Prize official website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerRoyal Swedish Academy of Sciences@content_dividerthe scientific academy responsible for awarding the Nobel Prize in Physics – NobelPrize.org)_$ANNOTATION$_ publishes an official announcement naming Michael Berry as a 2025 laureate in Physics by _$TIME_1. Verification includes official press releases, NobelPrize.org announcements _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerNobel Prize official announcements@content_dividerhttps://www.nobelprize.org/prizes/physics/2025/press-release/)_$ANNOTATION$_ or live streamed announcements from the Nobel Prize organization.

This market resolves 'No' if Michael Berry is not officially announced as a 2025 Nobel Laureate in Physics by _$TIME_1, if official sources explicitly deny or exclude him, if the Nobel Prize announcement is cancelled or postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official Nobel Prize announcements. Also resolves 'No' if the 2025 Nobel Prize in Physics is not awarded or does not exist.

items.title: DC Comics solo Plastic Man movie before October 1, 2026 and before solo Hawkman movie?
items.rules:
This market measures whether DC Comics releases a solo Plastic Man movie theatrically before _$TIME_1 and before any solo Hawkman movie theatrical release, according to official Warner Bros. or DC Studios announcements _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerDC Comics@content_dividerAmerican comic book publisher known for superheroes including Plastic Man and Hawkman – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerWarner Bros.@content_dividermajor American film and television production company distributing DC Studios films – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official announcement or theatrical release date for a solo Plastic Man movie is published by Warner Bros. or DC Studios on their official websites or verified social media accounts _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividerformal statement by authorized entity confirming movie release details – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, with the release occurring before _$TIME_1 and before any official announcement or release of a solo Hawkman movie, verified through at least one major tier-1 media source or official studio confirmation.

Resolves 'No' if no official announcement or theatrical release of a solo Plastic Man movie occurs before _$TIME_1, if the movie is cancelled, indefinitely postponed, or if the solo Hawkman movie releases first. If authoritative sources are unavailable or contradictory, resolution defaults to 'No'. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the Plastic Man movie event never existed or was never planned officially.

items.title: Kim Jong Un dead by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Kim Jong Un, the Supreme Leader of North Korea _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerKim Jong Un@content_dividerthe head of state and government of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, is confirmed deceased by an official announcement or credible government confirmation by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if an explicit official death announcement or credible confirmation is published by North Korean government sources, recognized international governmental agencies, or major international media outlets with verification from at least two tier-1 sources by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividerstatement published by government, verified social media, or authoritative international body)_$ANNOTATION$_. Alternative verification includes authoritative visual evidence or official death records accessible via public or governmental archives.

This market resolves 'No' if no such official or credible confirmation is available by _$TIME_1, if reports are explicitly denied by authoritative sources, or if the event is canceled (i.e., death never occurred). In event of conflicting information, official North Korean government statements take precedence, followed by internationally recognized government sources. Additionally, this market resolves 'No' if the event of death does not occur, is unverifiable, or if official data is unavailable by the deadline.

items.title: Donald Trump seeks 4th US presidential term by December 31, 2028?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Donald Trump files an official candidacy for a fourth term as President of the United States by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerDonald Trump@content_dividerDonald John Trump, 45th President of the United States from 2017 to 2021 – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUS President@content_dividerthe elected chief executive officer of the United States – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to Federal Election Commission official filings or formal public announcements.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Donald Trump files a formal candidacy statement with the Federal Election Commission _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerFederal Election Commission@content_dividerindependent regulatory agency that administers and enforces federal campaign finance law – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or makes a verified official public announcement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerofficial announcement@content_dividerstatement published on verified official channels such as Trump’s official website or verified social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_ declaring his intention to seek a fourth presidential term by _$TIME_1.

This market resolves 'No' if no such official filing or announcement occurs by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if authoritative verification is unavailable, if Trump publicly denies candidacy, or if constitutional or legal barriers prevent eligibility. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing Federal Election Commission filings and official announcements. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the candidacy event never existed.

items.title: Monad mainnet launch before October 20, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Monad Labs _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMonad Labs@content_dividerthe development company behind the Monad blockchain platform - CoinMarketCap)_$ANNOTATION$_ officially announces or releases the Monad mainnet _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividermainnet@content_dividera fully operational blockchain network distinct from testnet, enabling live transactions and token activity - Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 via verified channels.

Resolves 'Yes' if Monad Labs publishes an official announcement or mainnet release statement via their verified website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerMonad official website@content_dividerhttps://www.monad.xyz/)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified social media accounts _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerMonad verified social media@content_dividere.g., Monad's verified X/Twitter account https://x.com/monad_xyz)_$ANNOTATION$_ on or before _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes major blockchain news outlets reporting with explicit confirmation and/or visual evidence such as screenshots or blockchain explorer data showing mainnet activation.

Resolves 'No' if no official announcement or release confirmation is published by Monad Labs by _$TIME_1, if the mainnet launch is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicting reports resolve in favor of official Monad Labs sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the mainnet event never occurs or is redefined (e.g., only testnet upgrades).

items.title: PunkStrategy (PNKSTR) > $500M market cap by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether PunkStrategy (PNKSTR) achieves a market capitalization exceeding $500,000,000 USD by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMarket capitalization@content_dividerthe total market value of a company's outstanding shares, calculated as circulating supply multiplied by price – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to the product of circulating supply and the global volume-weighted average price aggregated across multiple cryptocurrency exchanges.

Resolves 'Yes' if official aggregate market capitalization data from PunkStrategy’s primary official sources, such as the token’s website or major crypto data aggregators _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCrypto data aggregators@content_dividerwebsites providing real-time cryptocurrency prices and market metrics from multiple exchanges, e.g., CoinMarketCap, CoinGecko – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, confirm a market cap strictly greater than $500,000,000 USD at any point on or before _$TIME_1. Verification requires data derived from at least six exchanges and 28 markets using volume-weighted average pricing and circulating supply figures, accessible via official APIs or archived snapshots.

Resolves 'No' if market capitalization does not exceed $500,000,000 USD by _$TIME_1, if the data is unavailable or unverifiable through authoritative sources, if the token is delisted, suspended, or officially discontinued before _$TIME_1, or if the underlying token ceases to exist or was never issued. Conflicting data resolves by prioritizing official token sources, then major crypto data aggregators, and finally archived exchange data. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never existed or PunkStrategy (PNKSTR) has no circulating supply.

items.title: DeepSeek R3 release by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether DeepSeek AI officially releases the DeepSeek R3 version by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerDeepSeek R3 version@content_dividera new iteration of the DeepSeek AI model released as a product update – inferred from DeepSeek AI official channels)_$ANNOTATION$_ through an official announcement or public availability.

Resolves 'Yes' if DeepSeek AI publishes an official release announcement or makes DeepSeek R3 publicly accessible via its official website, verified social media, or reputable hosting platforms by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerDeepSeek AI official channels@content_dividerofficial DeepSeek AI website, verified social media accounts, or GitHub repositories)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification includes timestamped posts or releases from these sources or major media reports citing such confirmation.

Resolves 'No' if no official release or public availability is confirmed by _$TIME_1, if the release is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicting or ambiguous reports are resolved by prioritizing official DeepSeek AI statements and primary source confirmations. Additionally, resolves 'No' if DeepSeek R3 release never existed or was abandoned.

items.title: Coordinated protests against Trump in 10+ US states by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether coordinated protests _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerCoordinated protests@content_dividersimultaneous or near-simultaneous demonstrations occurring in multiple locations – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ against Donald Trump _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerDonald Trump@content_divider45th President of the United States, businessman and political figure – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ occur simultaneously or near-simultaneously in at least 10 U.S. states by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerDeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_, confirmed by multiple reliable reports from authoritative sources.

This market resolves 'Yes' if explicit confirmation exists by _$TIME_1 of coordinated protests in 10 or more states from official government statements, verified major media outlets with dual tier-1 source confirmation, or verified visual evidence such as videos or photographs with credible source attribution _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerAuthoritative sources@content_dividerofficial government publications, major media verified reports, or visual evidence from trustworthy platforms)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'No' if the condition is not met by _$TIME_1, if protests are confirmed in fewer than 10 states, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if reliable verification is unavailable. Conflicting information resolves by prioritizing official government and verified media sources. It also resolves 'No' if coordinated protests do not exist or never occur.

items.title: OpenAI GPT o5-thinking release by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether OpenAI officially releases the GPT o5-thinking model _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerGPT o5-thinking model@content_divideran advanced AI language model variant developed by OpenAI – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_. Release confirmation must appear in official OpenAI communications or product web pages with verification through archived, governmental, or major media sources.

Resolves 'Yes' if explicit confirmation of GPT o5-thinking release is published by OpenAI on its official website https://openai.com or official OpenAI social media accounts by _$TIME_1. Verification includes official product pages, press releases, or regulatory filings accessible via Internet Archive or industry-standard media reporting with dual tier-1 source confirmation.

Resolves 'No' if no verified official release confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if OpenAI publicly cancels or indefinitely postpones the release, or if reliable verification data is unavailable. In case of conflicting information, resolution follows official OpenAI announcements as primary. This market also resolves 'No' if the GPT o5-thinking model release never occurs or is fundamentally different from the specified model.

items.title: Twitch acquisition of Pump.fun by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Twitch completes the acquisition of Pump.fun before or on _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerAcquisition@content_dividerthe act of obtaining control or ownership of a company, usually by purchase – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to official press releases from Twitch or Pump.fun _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerTwitch@content_dividera live streaming platform primarily for gaming owned by Amazon.com, Inc. – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerPump.fun@content_dividera Solana-based memecoin launchpad and live-streaming platform with token-based features – Brave New Coin)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if an official press release or statement confirming the completion of the acquisition is published by Twitch or Pump.fun by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOfficial press release@content_dividera formal public statement issued by a company confirming material events – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification includes direct company websites, verified corporate social media accounts, or regulatory filings. Backup confirmation may come from major news outlets citing explicit official statements.

This market resolves 'No' if no official confirmation is published by _$TIME_1, if the acquisition is cancelled or postponed beyond that date, or if authoritative sources are unavailable or contradictory. In case of conflicting information, official company statements take precedence. This market also resolves 'No' if the acquisition never existed or was never planned.

items.title: Tim Cook Apple CEO by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Tim Cook formally holds the position of Chief Executive Officer _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerChief Executive Officer@content_dividerthe highest-ranking executive in a company responsible for overall management – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ of Apple Inc. _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerApple Inc.@content_dividerAmerican multinational technology company headquartered in Cupertino, California – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on or before _$TIME_1 according to official disclosures.

Resolves 'Yes' if Tim Cook’s CEO status is explicitly confirmed by official Apple Inc. disclosures or United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) filings _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerSEC filings@content_dividerpublic regulatory documents filed with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ published on or before _$TIME_1. Backup verification may include official Apple press releases, verified corporate websites, or major tier-1 media reports with dual-source confirmation.

Resolves 'No' if Tim Cook is not CEO by _$TIME_1, if official sources confirm his resignation, removal, or replacement by that time, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory. Conflicting reports will be resolved prioritizing official Apple disclosures and SEC filings. Also resolves 'No' if the CEO position is vacant or occupied by another individual by _$TIME_1.

items.title: Fluent Labs Fluent token airdrop by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Fluent Labs distributes a Fluent token airdrop to eligible participants by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerAirdrop@content_dividera distribution of cryptocurrency tokens to multiple wallet addresses, often used for promotion or rewards – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, with eligibility defined as completion of network tasks, quizzes, and active community roles per project engagement mechanisms.

Resolves 'Yes' if Fluent Labs officially announces the Fluent token airdrop distribution on verified communication channels _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividerstatements published on Fluent Labs' official website, verified social media accounts, or governance forums)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, confirming that eligible participants have received or are entitled to receive the airdrop. Backup verification includes archival captures of announcements or corroboration by major crypto news outlets with dual tier-1 source confirmation.

Resolves 'No' if no official announcement or credible confirmation of the airdrop exists by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if verification sources are unavailable or contradictory. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the airdrop never occurred or Fluent Labs never initiated such a distribution by the deadline. Conflicts are resolved by prioritizing official Fluent Labs sources and authoritative crypto media.

items.title: Cardi B x Nicki Minaj physical fight by October 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Cardi B _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerCardi B@content_dividerBelcalis Marlenis Almánzar, American rapper and songwriter – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and Nicki Minaj _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerNicki Minaj@content_dividerOnika Tanya Maraj-Petty, Trinidadian-American rapper and songwriter – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ engage in a publicly confirmed physical fight _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerphysical fight@content_dividera publicly acknowledged physical altercation involving bodily contact – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ before _$TIME_1, confirmed by credible major media or official statements.

This market resolves 'Yes' if at least two independent tier-1 media outlets _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividertier-1 media@content_dividermajor globally recognized news organizations with strict editorial standards – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or official representatives of either artist publish explicit, verifiable confirmation of a physical fight involving both parties by _$TIME_1. Verification may include official press releases, verified social media statements, or visual evidence from authenticated sources.

This market resolves 'No' if no such confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if the event is explicitly denied, cancelled, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing official statements and multiple major media confirmations. Additionally, resolves 'No' if no physical fight involving both artists occurs or if the altercation is non-physical or unconfirmed.

items.title: Fluent airdrop by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Fluent airdrop, defined as the distribution of tokens _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividertoken@content_dividera unit of value issued by a blockchain project representing assets or rights – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ to eligible holders, occurs by _$TIME_1 as confirmed by an official announcement from Fluent Labs _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerFluent Labs@content_dividerthe development team and organization behind Fluent cryptocurrency project – Fluent Labs official website)_$ANNOTATION$_ and verified token distribution on project platforms.

Resolves 'Yes' if Fluent Labs publicly announces the airdrop and confirms token distribution on official channels _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerofficial channels@content_dividerFluent Labs’ verified website, official social media accounts, or blockchain explorer records)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, with blockchain transaction evidence or wallet balance updates confirming receipt.

Resolves 'No' if no official announcement or token distribution confirmation is made by _$TIME_1, if the airdrop is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory. This market also resolves 'No' if the Fluent airdrop event never existed or was never planned.

If official sources become unavailable, resolution uses archived announcements via the Internet Archive _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerInternet Archive@content_dividera digital archive of the World Wide Web – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, blockchain explorer data, or major verified crypto news outlets with dual source confirmation.

Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official Fluent Labs publications, followed by major crypto news portals and blockchain data. Verification cutoff is strictly by _$TIME_1.

items.title: Bitcoin new all-time high by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin's price exceeds its highest recorded price before 2025-10-08 as per aggregated data from major cryptocurrency exchanges by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividera digital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCryptocurrency exchange@content_dividera platform for buying and selling cryptocurrencies – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if authoritative sources, including official exchange data aggregators or major financial media with explicit verification _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial exchange data aggregators@content_dividerwebsites or APIs aggregating price data from multiple major cryptocurrency exchanges)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm Bitcoin’s price exceeded the prior all-time high by _$TIME_1. Verification requires published price data snapshots or official statements accessible at settlement.

Resolves 'No' if Bitcoin does not exceed the prior all-time high by _$TIME_1, if trading data is unavailable, if the event is effectively cancelled (exchange closures or delistings), or if authoritative verification fails. Conflicting data resolution prioritizes official exchange aggregators and major verified financial media. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Bitcoin trading never resumed or the price data does not exist as specified.

items.title: Nigeria tax law fuel surcharge effective by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Nigeria's new tax law including a 5% fuel surcharge on petrol and diesel sales is legally implemented and enforced by official government gazette publication or Federal Inland Revenue Service announcements by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerFuel surcharge@content_divideran additional charge added to the price of fuel – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerTax law@content_dividera law imposing or relating to taxes – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official gazette publication _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerGovernment gazette@content_dividera public journal published by a government to announce new legislation or official notices – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or Federal Inland Revenue Service (FIRS) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerFederal Inland Revenue Service@content_dividerNigeria's federal agency responsible for tax administration – Official FIRS website https://www.firs.gov.ng)_$ANNOTATION$_ announcements confirm enactment and enforcement of the 5% fuel surcharge by _$TIME_1. Verification requires published documentation or public notices accessible via FIRS official website or Nigeria's Federal Government Gazette archives. Backup confirmation can be obtained from major Nigerian government media releases or verified social media accounts of FIRS.

This market resolves 'No' if no official confirmation of enactment and enforcement is received by _$TIME_1, if the law or surcharge is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if enforcement is not in effect on or before _$TIME_1, or if authoritative sources are unavailable or conflict. In cases of data disputes, official gazette and FIRS sources take precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the tax law or surcharge does not exist or never took effect.

items.title: ZORA new ATH by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Zora's native token (ZORA) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerZora@content_dividera decentralized platform enabling NFT minting and trading – DigitalCoinPrice)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches a new all-time high (ATH) price in USD across major global exchanges by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerATH@content_dividerthe highest historical trading price recorded for an asset – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ using aggregated trading data from authoritative crypto market aggregators.

This market resolves 'Yes' if any official or authoritative source _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerauthoritative source@content_dividercryptocurrency data aggregators such as CoinMarketCap, CoinGecko, or verified exchange APIs)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms a ZORA token price exceeding its previous ATH by _$TIME_1. Confirmation must be documented via official exchange data, verified aggregator reports, or primary source announcements published online by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes archived snapshots from Internet Archive or equivalent repositories.

This market resolves 'No' if no verified new ATH occurs by _$TIME_1, if ZORA is delisted, trading halted, or the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed. In case of conflicting data, resolution prioritizes official exchange and aggregator data. It also resolves 'No' if ZORA token ceases trading, never existed in markets, or relevant data is unavailable or unverifiable by _$TIME_1.

items.title: Mark Zuckerberg net worth surpass Elon Musk by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Mark Zuckerberg’s total net worth in USD surpasses Elon Musk’s total net worth in USD at any point on or before _$TIME_1 according to Bloomberg Billionaires Index and Forbes estimates based on official valuations and publicly disclosed holdings.

This market resolves 'Yes' if at any date on or before _$TIME_1 authoritative sources including Bloomberg Billionaires Index _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBloomberg Billionaires Index@content_dividera regularly updated ranking of global billionaires' net worth based on market data – Bloomberg)_$ANNOTATION$_ or Forbes _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerForbes@content_dividera global media company publishing annual billionaire net worth lists – Forbes)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm Zuckerberg’s net worth exceeds Musk’s. Verification requires data snapshots or reports published by these sources or official company disclosures _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividercompany disclosures@content_dividestate filings, SEC forms, or investor relations releases)_$ANNOTATION$_ available at or before _$TIME_1.

This market resolves 'No' if no authoritative confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled, data is unavailable, or net worth never surpasses. Conflicting data resolves by prioritizing Bloomberg and Forbes official publications. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the net worth comparison event never existed or relevant data is unverifiable by deadline.

items.title: Cobie partners with prediction market by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether @cobie formally announces a partnership with a prediction market firm enabling event contract offerings by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerCobie@content_dividera prominent crypto influencer and entrepreneur – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerPrediction market@content_dividera market where participants trade contracts based on the outcome of future events – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ .

Resolves 'Yes' if a formal partnership agreement is publicly announced or confirmed by official company channels or credible financial news outlets by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividerstatement published on company websites, verified social media, or major financial news media with dual tier-1 source verification)_$ANNOTATION$_ . Verification requires evidence of collaboration with a futures commission merchant (FCM) or similar entity enabling prediction market contract offerings.

Resolves 'No' if no verified partnership is confirmed by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled, indefinitely postponed, or if reliable confirmation is unavailable. Conflicting reports resolve by prioritizing official announcements and major media. Also resolves 'No' if the partnership event never existed or was never planned.

items.title: Pudgy Penguins (PENGU) ≥ $0.05 by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the price of Pudgy Penguins (PENGU) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerPudgy Penguins@content_dividera cryptocurrency token native to the Pudgy Penguins project on the Solana blockchain – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches or exceeds $0.05 USD _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUSD@content_dividerUnited States Dollar, official currency of the United States – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ at any daily close time on or before _$TIME_1 according to a volume-weighted average price aggregated across multiple cryptocurrency exchanges.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official price data from aggregators or exchange APIs _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerexchange APIs@content_dividerapplication programming interfaces providing real-time trading data from cryptocurrency exchanges – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms PENGU's daily closing price equals or exceeds $0.05 USD at least once by _$TIME_1. Verification requires data from primary sources such as CoinGecko, CoinMarketCap, or direct exchange feeds, accessible at https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/pudgy-penguins or equivalent, with backup via archive.org snapshots or major exchange historical data.

This market resolves 'No' if PENGU never reaches $0.05 USD at daily close by _$TIME_1, if trading is suspended or the token is delisted before _$TIME_1, or if verifiable price data is unavailable. Conflicting or incomplete data defaults to 'No'. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the PENGU token ceases to exist or is fundamentally altered (e.g., token rebranded, forked with different economics) before _$TIME_1.

items.title: Nigerian Naira > ₦1500 per USD by October 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the official Nigerian Naira (₦) exchange rate to United States Dollar (USD) exceeds ₦1500 per USD according to the Nigerian Foreign Exchange Market (NFEM) closing rate or parallel market average rate on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerNigerian Naira@content_dividerthe official currency of Nigeria, abbreviated NGN – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUSD@content_dividerUnited States Dollar, official currency of the United States – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the official NFEM closing exchange rate or the verified parallel market average rate for NGN/USD is strictly above ₦1500 per USD at any time during the entire day of October 31, 2025, confirmed by the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) or a major Nigerian financial regulatory authority _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerCentral Bank of Nigeria@content_dividerthe principal monetary authority of Nigeria – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ via their official published rates or credible financial market data providers by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes archival data from reputable financial data aggregators and Nigerian government publications.

This market resolves 'No' if the exchange rate does not exceed ₦1500 per USD by _$TIME_1, if the NFEM or parallel market is suspended or closed on that date, if the official exchange data is unavailable or unverifiable by _$TIME_1, or if the event is cancelled (e.g., market closure). Conflicting data will be resolved by prioritizing CBN official data. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event or market never existed or data sources are permanently inaccessible.

items.title: BNB MEME SZN listed on top 5 crypto exchange by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the cryptocurrency token 'BNB MEME SZN' _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBNB MEME SZN@content_dividera digital cryptocurrency token associated with Binance Smart Chain meme coins – CoinMarketCap)_$ANNOTATION$_ is officially listed for trading on any top 5 global cryptocurrency exchange _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividertop 5 global cryptocurrency exchanges@content_dividerthe five largest cryptocurrency trading platforms by global trading volume as per latest rankings – CoinMarketCap)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, verified through official exchange websites or verified communication channels.

This market resolves 'Yes' if any of the top 5 global exchanges as of the current date (e.g., Binance, Coinbase, Kraken, Huobi, FTX) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividertop 5 exchanges@content_dividerBinance: largest crypto exchange by volume; Coinbase: US-regulated exchange; Kraken: major US exchange; Huobi: large Asia-based exchange; FTX: formerly top 5 before collapse, included here only if operational)_$ANNOTATION$_ officially announce listing of BNB MEME SZN on their platform by _$TIME_1 via website listing pages or verified social media accounts. Confirmation may be backed by major media reports citing the exchange or archival snapshots.

This market resolves 'No' if no verified announcement or listing appears on any top 5 exchange by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if exchanges cease operation, or if reliable verification sources are unavailable or contradictory. If data conflicts occur, priority is given to official exchange sources in descending order of trading volume. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the token never existed or listing never took place.

items.title: Bitcoin price fall before December 1, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Bitcoin (digital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividerdigital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_) price in USD falls below its spot price at market creation by the daily UTC close price aggregated from major exchanges by _$TIME_1.

This market resolves 'Yes' if on any day before _$TIME_1 (i.e., up to and including November 30, 2025, 23:59:59 UTC) the aggregated Bitcoin USD price at daily UTC close is strictly less than the reference price established at market creation, verified by official exchange data published on authoritative financial websites such as Yahoo Finance _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerYahoo Finance@content_dividerhttps://finance.yahoo.com/quote/BTC-USD/)_$ANNOTATION$_ or CoinMarketCap _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerCoinMarketCap@content_dividerhttps://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/bitcoin/)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'No' if the Bitcoin price never falls below the creation price by _$TIME_1, if reliable price data is unavailable or disputed beyond resolution, or if Bitcoin trading is halted or delisted on all major exchanges before the deadline. In case of conflicting data, resolution will prioritize official exchange aggregated data followed by major financial data aggregators. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Bitcoin or the trading markets cease to exist before _$TIME_1.

items.title: Solana price < $200 by October 15, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Solana (SOL) cryptocurrency price falls below $200 USD at any time by _$TIME_1 according to spot price data from major cryptocurrency exchanges.

Resolves 'Yes' if any verified major exchange reports a closing SOL/USD spot price under $200 USD before or at _$TIME_1. Authoritative sources include official exchange websites such as Kraken _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerKraken@content_dividera major cryptocurrency exchange platform – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and Coinbase _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCoinbase@content_dividera leading US-based cryptocurrency exchange – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_. Confirmation requires documented price history accessible via official APIs or archived webpages.

Resolves 'No' if no major exchange reports SOL/USD spot price below $200 USD by _$TIME_1, if exchanges cease trading SOL by deadline, or if price data is unavailable or unverifiable by _$TIME_1. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing official exchange data and CoinMarketCap _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerCoinMarketCap@content_dividercryptocurrency price aggregator providing verified exchange data – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Solana cryptocurrency or SOL/USD trading pairs do not exist or are delisted before _$TIME_1.

items.title: Monad airdrop by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Monad native token airdrop or official token launch occurs by _$TIME_1 according to official Monad announcements or verified token listings on major cryptocurrency platforms _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMonad@content_dividerMonad: an EVM-based Layer 1 blockchain ecosystem focused on decentralized finance and apps – Boxmining/Monad official sources)_$ANNOTATION$_ and cryptocurrency exchange disclosures.

Resolves 'Yes' if Monad or its official representatives publish an explicit announcement of the airdrop or native token launch on the official Monad website, verified social media accounts, or major cryptocurrency exchanges such as Binance or Bybit by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividerstatement published on official Monad channels or verified exchange listings – https://monad.xyz, Binance, Bybit)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification includes public token distribution events, smart contract deployments verified on blockchain explorers, or official press releases.

Resolves 'No' if no verified official announcements or token launches occur by _$TIME_1, if the airdrop event is officially cancelled, postponed indefinitely, or if reliable verification is unavailable by the deadline. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing Monad official channels and tier-1 cryptocurrency exchange disclosures. Also resolves 'No' if the Monad airdrop or token launch never occurred or was never planned.
