items.title: Monad mainnet launch by October 14, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Monad Labs _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMonad Labs@content_dividerthe development company behind Monad blockchain technology – CoinMarketCap)_$ANNOTATION$_ officially launches Monad mainnet _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerMainnet@content_dividerthe fully operational blockchain network distinct from testnets – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on or before _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'Yes' if Monad Labs publicly confirms mainnet launch via official website, verified social media, or recognized blockchain news outlets _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial confirmation@content_divideran explicit announcement from Monad Labs or major blockchain news platforms)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation is published by _$TIME_1, if the launch is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if authoritative sources explicitly deny the launch, or if verification data is unavailable. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing Monad Labs’ direct statements. Also resolves 'No' if mainnet launch never occurred or was abandoned.

items.title: Gold > $4,500 per ounce by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the spot price of gold _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerGold@content_dividera dense yellow precious metal used as a standard for monetary systems and valued in commodities markets – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches or exceeds $4,500 USD per troy ounce _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerTroy ounce@content_dividera unit of measure for precious metals equal to approximately 31.1035 grams – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ at any time on major commodities exchanges (COMEX _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerCOMEX@content_dividera primary commodity futures exchange in New York – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, LBMA _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerLBMA@content_dividerLondon Bullion Market Association; a key global precious metals market – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_) by _$TIME_1. The spot price is verified using official exchange data and authoritative financial reporting.

This market resolves 'Yes' if at any moment before or at _$TIME_1 the official spot price on COMEX or LBMA is at least $4,500 USD per troy ounce, verified by at least one primary source _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerPrimary source@content_dividerofficial commodities exchange websites, regulatory filings, or direct exchange data feeds)_$ANNOTATION$_ or two independent tier-1 financial news sources (e.g., Bloomberg, Reuters) confirming the price level. Backup confirmation may include archived official price charts or government commodity statistics.

This market resolves 'No' if no official spot price reaches $4,500 USD per troy ounce on COMEX or LBMA by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or the gold market is closed or suspended indefinitely before _$TIME_1, or if authoritative price data is unavailable or unverified. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing official exchange data and regulatory filings. Additionally, this market resolves 'No' if the gold spot price market ceases to exist or is fundamentally altered such that the price cannot be measured as specified.

items.title: Crypto market cap > $5T by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the total cryptocurrency market capitalization exceeds $5 trillion USD according to aggregation of all crypto assets' market values globally excluding Bitcoin and Ethereum by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerCryptocurrency market capitalization@content_dividerthe total market value of all cryptocurrencies calculated by multiplying the circulating supply by current price – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if CoinMarketCap _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_divinereliable data source@content_dividerleading cryptocurrency data aggregator providing comprehensive market cap data – https://coinmarketcap.com/)_$ANNOTATION$_ or CoinGecko _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_divinereliable data source@content_dividerwidely used cryptocurrency data aggregator and analytics platform – https://coingecko.com/)_$ANNOTATION$_ reports total market capitalization exceeding $5 trillion USD at any point on or before _$TIME_1, excluding BTC and ETH for altcoin-specific calculation, with confirmation by official website data or API records.

This market resolves 'No' if the $5 trillion threshold is not met by _$TIME_1, if reliable data sources fail to confirm the event, if the event is cancelled or market data is indefinitely unavailable, or if the underlying metric does not exist or cannot be verified. Conflicting or incomplete data will be resolved by prioritizing CoinMarketCap official data, then CoinGecko, then Internet Archive snapshots. If no authoritative confirmation is available, the market resolves 'No'.

items.title: BNB > $1,500 by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the price of Binance Coin (BNB) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBinance Coin@content_dividera cryptocurrency issued by Binance exchange used to pay fees and trade on Binance platform – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ exceeds $1,500 USD _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUSD@content_dividerUnited States Dollar, the official currency of the United States – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on any major cryptocurrency exchange by _$TIME_1 according to verified market price data in USD.

This market resolves 'Yes' if at any moment on or before _$TIME_1 the last traded price of BNB on at least two major cryptocurrency exchanges _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerMajor exchanges@content_dividercryptocurrency trading platforms with high liquidity such as Binance, Coinbase Pro, Kraken, or Binance.US – Oxford Dictionary)_$ANNOTATION$_ exceeds $1,500 USD, confirmed by official exchange APIs or reputable market data aggregators _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerMarket data aggregators@content_dividerplatforms like CoinMarketCap, CoinGecko providing consolidated cryptocurrency price data – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ .

This market resolves 'No' if the price never exceeds $1,500 USD by _$TIME_1, if major exchanges permanently delist BNB before the deadline, if official price data is unavailable or unverifiable by _$TIME_1, or if trading is halted indefinitely. Conflicting data will be resolved by prioritizing official exchange APIs and archived price records. Additionally, resolves 'No' if BNB ceases to exist or is permanently delisted by _$TIME_1.

items.title: HeyElsa airdrop fail by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the HeyElsa project fails to successfully distribute its native token or achieve meaningful project adoption by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerHeyElsa airdrop@content_dividerdistribution of free tokens to eligible users to encourage adoption – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, based on official announcements and verified token distribution data.

This market resolves 'Yes' if no official HeyElsa announcement confirms successful token distribution or project adoption by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividerstatement published on HeyElsa’s official website or verified social media)_$ANNOTATION$_, and if no token distribution records or market data from recognized crypto analytics platforms confirm such events by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes blockchain explorer data and reputable crypto market tracking sites.

This market resolves 'No' if verifiable evidence from HeyElsa’s official channels or recognized crypto analytics platforms confirms completed token distribution or meaningful project adoption by _$TIME_1. It resolves 'No' if token distribution occurred partially but meets adoption criteria defined by official sources. If no authoritative verification is available by _$TIME_1, or if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, this market resolves 'Yes'. Additionally, resolves 'Yes' if the HeyElsa project or airdrop never existed or was aborted prior to _$TIME_1.

items.title: Monad airdrop checker live by October 10, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Monad airdrop checker tool is publicly available and operational according to verified official or trusted community sources by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMonad airdrop checker@content_dividera software tool that allows users to verify eligibility for a Monad token airdrop event – defined by community usage and official channels)_$ANNOTATION$_ .

Resolves 'Yes' if a public, accessible Monad airdrop checker is confirmed live by an official Monad Labs announcement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerMonad Labs official announcement@content_dividerstatement from Monad Labs via their official website or verified social media)_$ANNOTATION$_ or a credible community source with dual tier-1 media confirmation _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerdual tier-1 media confirmation@content_dividerconfirmation by two or more major media outlets recognized as tier-1 sources)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 . Verification also accepts persistent visual evidence (screenshots or videos) from verified accounts or archive records.

Resolves 'No' if no verified confirmation of a live airdrop checker exists by _$TIME_1, or if the event is officially cancelled, indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative sources are lacking or contradictory. This includes non-existence of the tool or failure to launch by the deadline. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official Monad Labs sources, followed by major media and archival verification.

items.title: BTC > $150,000 by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividera digital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches a price of at least USD 150,000 according to aggregated data from major global cryptocurrency exchanges by market close on _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if verified price data from at least two major cryptocurrency exchange aggregators such as CoinDesk _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerCoinDesk@content_dividera major digital media, events, and information services company specializing in cryptocurrency – CoinDesk official site)_$ANNOTATION$_ and CryptoCompare _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerCryptoCompare@content_dividera cryptocurrency market data provider aggregating prices from multiple exchanges – CryptoCompare official site)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm Bitcoin’s closing price equals or exceeds USD 150,000 at or before _$TIME_1. Verification includes archived snapshots and official exchange APIs _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerVerification methods@content_dividerarchived data from Internet Archive, exchange API endpoints, and official price indices)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if Bitcoin’s price does not reach USD 150,000 by _$TIME_1, if reliable price data is unavailable or disputed beyond resolution, if major exchanges halt trading or delist Bitcoin prior to _$TIME_1, or if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed. Conflicting price reports will be resolved by prioritizing aggregated exchange data and authoritative market data providers. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Bitcoin ceases to exist as a tradeable asset before _$TIME_1.

items.title: BTC > $150,000 by November 1, 2025?
items.rules:

This market resolves 'No' if Bitcoin’s closing price does not exceed $150,000 USD by _$TIME_1, if all major exchanges cease trading Bitcoin before that time, if reliable price data is unavailable or contradicted, or if the market is officially suspended or delisted. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Bitcoin or the specified price metric ceases to exist or is fundamentally altered before _$TIME_1.

items.title: Changpeng Zhao mentions DeSci on X by October 15, 2025?
items.rules:

items.title: Fluent 100,000 mainnet smart contracts by June 30, 2026?

This market resolves 'Yes' if official Fluent Labs data or recognized blockchain explorers _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerBlockchain explorers; online tools that allow users to view blockchain transactions and smart contract deployments – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm 100,000 distinct smart contracts verified on Fluent mainnet by _$TIME_1, with published verification records accessible on https://fluentlabs.com or verified blockchain explorer URLs by that date.

items.title: BTC < $100,000 10 days after December 20, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin's closing price falls below $100,000 USD for at least 10 consecutive calendar days after December 20, 2025, using daily closing prices from major cryptocurrency exchanges and official price aggregators.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official or authoritative sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividerdigital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm a continuous period of at least 10 days with daily closing prices below $100,000 USD by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2026-01-01T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification requires data from at least two major exchanges (e.g., Coinbase, Binance, Kraken) or price aggregators (e.g., CoinGecko, CoinMarketCap) with timestamps aligned to UTC daily closes. Backup verification may include archived exchange data or reputable financial data providers.

This market resolves 'No' if no such 10-day continuous price drop below $100,000 USD occurs by _$TIME_1, if the event is effectively cancelled (e.g., Bitcoin ceases trading or is delisted), or if authoritative verification data is unavailable or contradicts the condition. Disputes are resolved by prioritizing official exchange data and major aggregator consensus. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Bitcoin trading or pricing data does not exist or is discontinued before _$TIME_1.

items.title: Solana ≥ $225 by October 31, 2025?
items.rules:

The measurement uses official closing prices aggregated from authoritative exchange data sources with verification through backup market data aggregators.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official closing price data from at least two major cryptocurrency exchanges _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerCryptocurrency exchange@content_dividera digital marketplace for buying and selling cryptocurrencies – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms that Solana’s closing price is $225.00 USD or higher on October 31, 2025 UTC by _$TIME_1. Verification requires published price data on CoinMarketCap _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerCoinMarketCap@content_dividerleading cryptocurrency market data provider https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/solana/)_$ANNOTATION$_ or CoinGecko and corroboration by at least one additional tier-1 data aggregator or exchange official price feed.

This market resolves 'No' if Solana’s closing price does not reach or exceed $225.00 USD on any major exchange by _$TIME_1, if the market or exchanges are officially closed, if trading is halted or suspended indefinitely before the deadline, or if authoritative verification data is unavailable or contradictory. In cases of conflicting price data, resolution prioritizes official exchange closing prices and CoinMarketCap data. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Solana or its trading markets do not exist or are delisted prior to _$TIME_1.

items.title: MicroStrategy first ETH purchase by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether MicroStrategy completes its first purchase of Ethereum (ETH) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerEthereum@content_dividera decentralized, open-source blockchain featuring smart contract functionality – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 based on official disclosures or verified press releases.

Resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation or disclosure occurs by _$TIME_1, if the purchase is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Also resolves 'No' if MicroStrategy never announces any ETH purchase or the event never occurs.

items.title: Solana Foundation delegates 50+ new validators by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Solana Foundation officially delegates network validation responsibilities to at least 50 new validators meeting performance criteria by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerSolana Foundation@content_dividera nonprofit organization supporting the Solana blockchain ecosystem – official website https://solana.org/solana-foundation)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to onboarding notifications and performance verification published by the Foundation or its authorized communications channels.

Resolves 'Yes' if official Solana Foundation confirmation _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial Confirmation@content_divideremail notifications, announcements on https://solana.org, or verified social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_ verifies that at least 50 new validators have been onboarded and approved by _$TIME_1, with publicly verifiable performance data meeting stated delegation criteria as outlined in the Solana Foundation Delegation Program documentation _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerDelegation Program Criteria@content_dividerhttps://solana.org/delegation-criteria)_$ANNOTATION$_ . Backup confirmation may include major blockchain analytics platforms or independent validator tracking services with validated data.

Resolves 'No' if fewer than 50 new validators are delegated by _$TIME_1, if the program is officially cancelled or postponed beyond that date, if no verifiable official confirmation exists by the deadline, or if data is unavailable or contradictory. Conflicting reports resolve by prioritizing Solana Foundation official sources and regulatory filings. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the delegation program never existed or no new validator onboarding occurred.

items.title: Jerome Powell cuts interest rates by October 29, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Jerome Powell, Chair of the Federal Reserve Board _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerFederal Reserve Board@content_dividercentral banking system of the United States responsible for monetary policy – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, announces a reduction in the target federal funds rate _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerFederal funds rate@content_dividerinterest rate at which depository institutions lend reserve balances overnight to other depository institutions – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ at the Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) meeting concluding on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerFOMC meeting@content_dividerscheduled monetary policy meeting of the Federal Reserve System to set interest rates – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to official Federal Reserve communications.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the Federal Reserve issues an official statement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOfficial statement@content_dividerformal announcement published on federalreserve.gov or via verified Federal Reserve press release)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 explicitly confirming a downward adjustment in the target federal funds rate during the October 29, 2025 FOMC meeting. Verification includes press releases _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerFederal Reserve press releases@content_dividerhttps://www.federalreserve.gov/newsevents/pressreleases.htm)_$ANNOTATION$_ and updates on the Federal Reserve's official website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=6@counter_dividerFederal Reserve official website@content_dividerhttps://www.federalreserve.gov/monetarypolicy/fomccalendars.htm)_$ANNOTATION$_ .

This market resolves 'No' if no official confirmation of a rate cut is published by _$TIME_1, if the meeting is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if the Federal Reserve announces no change or an increase in the target rate. In cases of conflicting information, official Federal Reserve sources take precedence. This market also resolves 'No' if the FOMC meeting does not occur or if Jerome Powell does not participate in the decision.

items.title: Sentient presale on Kaito Capital Launchpad by October 15, 2025?
items.rules:

This market resolves 'No' if no official announcement or verified transaction records exist by _$TIME_1, or if the presale is cancelled, postponed indefinitely, or the event never existed. Conflicting information resolves by prioritizing official Kaito Capital Launchpad sources. Also resolves 'No' if the presale differs from the specified platform or project.

items.title: Donald Trump death by January 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Donald Trump, former President of the United States _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerDonald Trump@content_dividerDonald John Trump, 45th president of the United States (2017–2021) – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, dies during the period from 2026-01-01T00:00:00 to 2026-01-31T23:59:59 EST/EDT _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerEST/EDT@content_dividerEastern Standard Time/Eastern Daylight Time, US time zones for Washington, D.C. area – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ (converted to UTC for settlement). This market resolves 'Yes' if explicit confirmation of Donald Trump's death during January 2026 is published by official US government sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerUS government sources@content_dividerofficial announcements including death certificates, vital records departments, or federal agencies)_$ANNOTATION$_ or reputable medical authorities _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerMedical authorities@content_dividerlicensed medical institutions, hospitals, or official medical examiner statements)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Verification includes corroboration from major media outlets with dual tier-1 source confirmation or official family statements.

This market resolves 'No' if no verified death confirmation occurs by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially denied, postponed, or unverifiable due to lack of authoritative data. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing official US government records and medical sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Donald Trump remains alive throughout January 2026 or if the event does not exist.

items.title: Buzzing App > 10,000 testnet addresses on Fluent by November 1, 2025?

The market also resolves 'No' if the Buzzing App or Fluent testnet does not exist or never launched.

items.title: Bitcoin price > $123,000 by October 15, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the spot price of Bitcoin _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividera digital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ exceeds $123,000 USD at any time on or before _$TIME_1 according to spot prices from major cryptocurrency exchanges such as Coinbase _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCoinbase@content_dividera leading cryptocurrency exchange platform – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and Binance _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerBinance@content_dividera major global cryptocurrency exchange – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Verification requires price data snapshots or official statements published by Coinbase or Binance websites _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOfficial source@content_dividerhttps://www.coinbase.com and https://www.binance.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or major financial news outlets corroborated by at least two tier-1 media sources.

Resolves 'No' if Bitcoin’s spot price does not exceed $123,000 USD at any time on or before _$TIME_1, if price data is unavailable or unverifiable, if all official sources deny such pricing, or if trading on major exchanges is halted or the market is suspended. Also resolves 'No' if Bitcoin trading or exchanges cease to exist, or if relevant price data is not published by authoritative sources by the deadline.

items.title: Apple Mac mini with M5 or M5 Pro Apple Silicon release by April 30, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Apple officially releases or announces a Mac mini desktop computer featuring either the M5 or M5 Pro Apple Silicon chip by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerApple Mac mini@content_dividerApple Inc.'s compact desktop computer model – Apple Inc. official site https://www.apple.com/mac-mini/)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerM5 chip@content_dividerApple Silicon generation of ARM-based processors succeeding M4 – Apple Inc. announcements https://www.apple.com/newsroom/)_$ANNOTATION$_ or _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerM5 Pro chip@content_dividerHigher-performance variant of the M5 Apple Silicon processor – Apple Inc. official sources)_$ANNOTATION$_ . Resolution relies on official Apple announcements or verified Federal Communications Commission (FCC) filings.

This market resolves 'Yes' if by _$TIME_1 official Apple Inc. sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerApple official sources@content_dividerapple.com product pages, press releases, or verified social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_ or FCC database records _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerFCC filings@content_dividerhttps://fccid.io database of authorized device filings – US Federal Communications Commission)_$ANNOTATION$_ explicitly confirm the availability or formal announcement of any Mac mini model incorporating the M5 or M5 Pro chip. Backup verification includes major technology media outlets with dual tier-1 source confirmation.

This market resolves 'No' if no official Apple confirmation or verified FCC listing exists by _$TIME_1, if the product is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if announcements refer only to other products, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory. Conflicts are resolved prioritizing Apple’s official communications, then FCC filings, then major media. Also resolves 'No' if no Mac mini with M5 or M5 Pro chip exists or the event never took place.

items.title: Base network token issuance by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Base will issue its own network token as confirmed by an official public announcement or on-chain deployment transaction timestamped by Base or Coinbase official channels by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBase@content_dividera Layer-2 blockchain built on Optimism’s OP Stack, developed by Coinbase – CoinGape)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividernetwork token@content_dividera native digital asset issued by a blockchain network representing governance or utility – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

The market resolves 'Yes' if Base or Coinbase officially announces the token issuance or if the network token deployment transaction is verifiably recorded on Base’s blockchain on or before _$TIME_1, with confirmation from official Base or Coinbase websites, verified social media accounts, or Basescan block explorer _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerBasescan@content_dividera blockchain explorer dedicated to Base network, providing transaction and contract verification – official Basescan site)_$ANNOTATION$_.

The market resolves 'No' if no such official announcement or verifiable on-chain token deployment occurs by _$TIME_1, if the token issuance is explicitly cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory. In case of conflicts, official Base or Coinbase sources take precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the token issuance event never existed or was never planned.

items.title: ASTER ≥ $4 before October 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the price of Aster (ASTER) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerAster(ASTER)@content_dividera cryptocurrency token traded on multiple exchanges – StealthEX blog)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches or exceeds $4.00 USD on any major cryptocurrency exchange trading market before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-10-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_. The price is based on official USD-denominated trading prices from reputable cryptocurrency exchanges, verified by primary exchange data feeds and backup sources.

This market resolves 'Yes' if at least one officially published, verified closing or spot price of ASTER on a major exchange equals or exceeds $4.00 USD before _$TIME_1. Verification requires price data from at least one top-tier exchange such as Binance or Bitget _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerBinance@content_dividera leading global cryptocurrency exchange – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ backed by archived exchange records or blockchain explorer data. Alternative confirmation may include official exchange APIs, major crypto data aggregators, or verified price snapshots stored in permanent archives.

This market resolves 'No' if ASTER does not reach $4.00 USD on any major exchange before _$TIME_1, if ASTER is delisted or trading halted indefinitely before that time, or if no verifiable price data is available. If conflicting data arises, official exchange announcements and archived price records take precedence. This market also resolves 'No' if ASTER never existed or was never traded on any major exchange prior to _$TIME_1.

items.title: Solana (SOL) ≥ $300 by April 30, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Solana (SOL) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerSolana (SOL)@content_dividera blockchain-based cryptocurrency and token native to the Solana blockchain platform – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches a price of $300 USD or higher on any day up to and including _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2026-04-30T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ based on closing prices from reliable cryptocurrency exchanges reported in USD.

Resolves 'Yes' if any authoritative crypto exchange _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividercrypto exchange@content_dividera digital marketplace for trading cryptocurrencies – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ officially lists SOL and publishes a closing price at or above $300 USD by _$TIME_1. Verification requires data from at least two major exchanges such as Coinbase, Binance, Kraken, or CoinMarketCap _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerofficial sources@content_dividerhttps://www.coinbase.com, https://www.binance.com, https://www.kraken.com, https://coinmarketcap.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or equivalent reputable price aggregators by the deadline.

Resolves 'No' if SOL does not reach or exceed $300 USD on any official closing price on any day through _$TIME_1, if trading of SOL is suspended or delisted prior to _$TIME_1, if the market for SOL ceases to exist, or if authoritative price data is unavailable or insufficient. Conflicting data resolves in favor of primary official exchange sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never exists, such as if SOL is discontinued or permanently delisted before _$TIME_1.

items.title: Zama film release by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the film Zama _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerZama (film)@content_dividera 2017 Argentine historical drama movie directed by Lucrecia Martel – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ is officially released in any theatrical, digital, or physical distribution channel by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_. Resolution relies on official theatrical release announcements or verified distribution confirmations from producers, distributors, or recognized cinema authorities.

This market resolves 'Yes' if by _$TIME_1 there is explicit official confirmation of Zama's release from the film’s production company, authorized distributor websites, major verified film industry publications _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerofficial sources@content_dividerfilm production or distribution company statements, verified streaming platforms, or major industry trade publications like Variety or The Hollywood Reporter)_$ANNOTATION$_, or government film classification board records. Backup verification includes major international cinema databases and verified media reports with cross-source confirmation.

This market resolves 'No' if no such official release confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if the film’s release is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if verifiable distribution does not occur by the deadline. Conflicting or ambiguous reports resolve to 'No' unless resolved by official producer or distributor declarations. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the film does not exist, was never completed, or never planned for release.

items.title: US military strike on Iran before June 30, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the United States conducts a direct armed attack involving air, missile, or ground forces targeting Iran up to and including _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMilitary strike@content_dividera planned attack by armed forces against a target – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ as confirmed by official US government statements or verified intelligence reports.

This market resolves 'Yes' if an official US government source _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial US government source@content_dividerUS Department of Defense, White House, or authorized US intelligence agencies official announcements or publications)_$ANNOTATION$_ or at least two major tier-1 media outlets with independent confirmation report a US military strike on Iran by _$TIME_1. Verification may include verified visual evidence or intelligence report disclosures accessible via official or archival records.

This market resolves 'No' if no such verified strike occurs by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially denied, cancelled, or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicting information resolves in favor of official US government sources or consensus among major verified media. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never occurred or no strike was planned or executed.

items.title: US Dollar Index > 100 by October 15, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the US Dollar Index (DXY) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerUS Dollar Index@content_divideran index measuring the value of the United States dollar relative to a basket of foreign currencies – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ is strictly greater than 100 index points at exactly 12:00 UTC on October 15, 2025, using official market trading platform data.

Resolves 'Yes' if the official US Dollar Index value from recognized financial data providers such as OANDA _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOANDA@content_dividera major online forex broker and data provider – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or XE, or equivalent authoritative financial market platforms, reports a DXY value above 100 at 12:00 UTC on October 15, 2025. Verification requires published rates or archived data accessible from official websites or APIs by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'No' if the DXY value is 100 or below at the specified time, if trading platforms are closed or data unavailable, if the event is cancelled or postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if authoritative verification is absent or contradictory. In case of conflicting data, resolution prioritizes official market platform data and regulatory filings. Also resolves 'No' if the US Dollar Index or the measurement event does not exist at the settlement time.

items.title: Liverpool wins Premier League by May 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Liverpool Football Club officially wins the 2025–2026 English Premier League championship as determined by the final league standings after the last scheduled matchday according to official Premier League records by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerEnglish Premier League@content_dividerthe top tier professional football league in England contested annually by 20 clubs – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and Liverpool Football Club _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerLiverpool Football Club@content_dividerprofessional football club based in Liverpool, England competing in the Premier League – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ .

This market resolves 'Yes' if Liverpool is ranked 1st in the official final Premier League standings published by the Premier League organization _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerPremier League organization@content_dividerthe governing body and organizer of the English Premier League – https://www.premierleague.com/standings)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Verification requires publication of the final points tally and official confirmation from the Premier League website or equivalent authoritative sources. Backup verification includes reputable sports media outlets with dual tier-1 source confirmation or official Football Association releases.

This market resolves 'No' if Liverpool does not finish first in the official final Premier League standings by _$TIME_1, if the 2025–2026 Premier League season is cancelled, postponed beyond the deadline, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official Premier League announcements. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the league season does not occur or Liverpool does not participate.

If the Premier League season is officially cancelled, indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or Liverpool is disqualified from the competition, the market resolves 'No'.

If official final standings or authoritative data are unavailable by _$TIME_1, resolution will use archived official releases or verified secondary sources following a documented escalation procedure prioritizing institutional permanence.

items.title: Momentum Finance MMT Token Generation Event by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Momentum Finance (MMT) Token Generation Event (TGE) completes by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerToken Generation Event@content_divideran event where a blockchain project issues and makes its native tokens publicly available – Merriam-Webster, Oxford Dictionary)_$ANNOTATION$_ as evidenced by public availability of MMT tokens and an official announcement on Momentum Finance channels.

Resolves 'Yes' if Momentum Finance officially announces the completion of the MMT TGE by _$TIME_1 via their verified website or verified social media accounts _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial source@content_dividerhttps://momentumfinance.io or verified @MMTFinance on X/Twitter)_$ANNOTATION$_, and the MMT token is made publicly accessible on recognized blockchain explorers or exchanges by that time.

Resolves 'No' if no official announcement and public token availability occur by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if authoritative verification sources are unavailable or contradictory, or if the event never existed or was never scheduled. Conflicts are resolved prioritizing official Momentum Finance communications and major media with dual verified sources.

items.title: Netflix One Piece Season 2 release by February 28, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Netflix officially releases Season 2 of its live-action One Piece series for streaming globally by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerRelease@content_divideravailability of a product or content to the public, specifically streaming availability on Netflix's platform worldwide – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to Netflix's official communication or verified sources.

Resolves 'Yes' if Netflix publicly confirms and makes Season 2 of live-action One Piece available for streaming globally by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial confirmation@content_dividerstatement or listing on Netflix's official website, verified Netflix social media accounts, or major-tier-1 media outlets with explicit verification)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification includes official Netflix press releases, platform availability notices, or authoritative media reports corroborated by at least two tier-1 sources.

Resolves 'No' if Season 2 is not available globally on Netflix by _$TIME_1, if official sources announce cancellation or indefinite postponement, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory. In case of conflicting information, priority is given to Netflix's official sources and major verified media. Also resolves 'No' if the event never existed or if the series is released in a different format or platform other than Netflix.

items.title: Avalanche (AVAX) ≥ $40 by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the price of Avalanche (AVAX) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerAvalanche (AVAX)@content_dividera blockchain platform and its native cryptocurrency token – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches or exceeds $40 USD on any major cryptocurrency exchange trading AVAX/USD by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2026-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ . Price data must be obtained from recognized exchanges providing USD pairing and aggregated or individually verified for accuracy.

Resolves 'Yes' if AVAX price equals or exceeds $40 USD on a verified major exchange at any moment on or before _$TIME_1, confirmed by official exchange data _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerMajor exchanges@content_dividercryptocurrency trading platforms with high liquidity and regulatory recognition, e.g., Coinbase, Kraken, Binance US)_$ANNOTATION$_ or authoritative market data aggregators such as CoinMarketCap or CoinGecko. Backup verification includes archived price snapshots from Internet Archive or regulatory filings if necessary.

Resolves 'No' if AVAX price does not reach $40 USD by _$TIME_1, if trading is halted, AVAX is delisted, or if authoritative price data is unavailable or contradictory. Conflicting data is resolved prioritizing direct exchange feeds and regulators. Also resolves 'No' if AVAX or USD pairing never existed or was discontinued before the deadline.

items.title: Shiba Inu (SHIB) price > $0.00004 by November 30, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the closing price of Shiba Inu (SHIB) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerShiba Inu@content_dividera decentralized meme-based cryptocurrency token issued on the Ethereum blockchain – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches or exceeds $0.00004 USD on any recognized cryptocurrency exchange by or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-11-30T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_. Price data must come from official exchange closing prices in USD or converted to USD using the exchange’s official rate at close.

This market resolves 'Yes' if any recognized cryptocurrency exchange _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividercryptocurrency exchange@content_dividera platform for buying and selling cryptocurrencies – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ with publicly accessible price data reports a closing SHIB price ≥ $0.00004 USD by or before _$TIME_1. Confirmation requires official exchange data published on their website or verified APIs _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerofficial exchange data@content_dividerhistorical price data from exchanges such as Binance, Coinbase, HTX, Bitget)_$ANNOTATION$_. Backup verification can use at least one additional major exchange with consistent price reporting.

This market resolves 'No' if the SHIB price never reaches or exceeds $0.00004 USD on any recognized exchange by _$TIME_1, if all exchanges suspend SHIB trading indefinitely before that date, or if price data is unavailable or unverifiable by the deadline. Conflicting or missing data is resolved by prioritizing official exchange sources; if primary sources become inaccessible, archived data from the Internet Archive or regulatory filings will be used. Additionally, resolves 'No' if SHIB token ceases to exist or is delisted before _$TIME_1.

items.title: Kalshi raises $1 billion by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Kalshi Inc. _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerKalshi Inc.@content_dividera US-based federally regulated prediction market platform – Reuters)_$ANNOTATION$_ publicly announces or files with the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) funding totaling at least $1,000,000,000 USD by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2026-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official public announcements on Kalshi's company website, verified social media accounts, or SEC filings _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerSEC filings@content_dividerofficial regulatory documents filed with the US Securities and Exchange Commission – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm cumulative capital raised equals or exceeds $1 billion USD by _$TIME_1, with backup confirmation from major tier-1 financial media reports (e.g., Reuters, Bloomberg) or regulatory databases.

This market resolves 'No' if $1 billion USD funding is not confirmed by _$TIME_1, if funding announcements are officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if Kalshi ceases fundraising efforts, or if authoritative sources are unavailable or contradictory. Conflicts resolve in favor of official SEC filings and government publications. Additionally, this market resolves 'No' if Kalshi never initiated or announced such funding by the deadline.

items.title: Fluent.xyz Token Generation Event by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Fluent.xyz conducts a Token Generation Event _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerToken Generation Event@content_dividera process creating and distributing new tokens, often part of a blockchain project's initial funding – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_, based on official project announcements or verified exchange listings.

Resolves 'Yes' if Fluent.xyz publicly confirms completion of a Token Generation Event by _$TIME_1 via official sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial source@content_dividerFluent.xyz website, verified social media, or major crypto exchanges with dual tier-1 media verification)_$ANNOTATION$_, or if the token is listed on a verified exchange before the deadline, with documentation published at the official project website or trusted crypto news outlets.

Resolves 'No' if no official confirmation or verified exchange listing occurs by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if authoritative verification is unavailable, or if the event never existed. Conflicting reports resolve by prioritizing official Fluent.xyz sources and verified exchange announcements. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event differs from the defined Token Generation Event or is not conducted by the deadline.

items.title: Base native token launch by January 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Base _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBase@content_divideran Ethereum layer-2 blockchain developed by Coinbase – CoinDesk)_$ANNOTATION$_ officially launches a publicly tradable native token by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2026-01-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_, defined as the token being actively transferable and tradable on recognized cryptocurrency exchanges or trading platforms.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Base or Coinbase officially announces the launch of a native token and the token is confirmed as publicly available for active trading on at least one major regulated or widely recognized exchange (e.g., Coinbase, Binance, Kraken) by _$TIME_1, verified using official company statements _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerCoinbase official@content_dividerhttps://www.coinbase.com/ and https://base.org/)_$ANNOTATION$_, major tier-1 media reports with multiple independent confirmations, or blockchain explorer data showing active token transfers.

This market resolves 'No' if no such official announcement or verifiable evidence of public tradability exists by _$TIME_1, if the launch is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if the token launch occurs after _$TIME_1. Conflicting reports are resolved prioritizing official Coinbase and Base communications, regulatory filings, or major verified media. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Base never initiated a native token issuance or the token is not publicly tradable by the deadline.

items.title: BNB price ≥ $1,500 by October 16, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Binance Coin (BNB) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBinance Coin (BNB)@content_dividera cryptocurrency issued by Binance exchange used for transaction fees and ecosystem participation – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches or exceeds a price of $1,500 USD based on aggregated market prices from major cryptocurrency exchanges by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-10-16T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if at any time on or before _$TIME_1, verified aggregated USD prices from authoritative providers (e.g., CoinMarketCap, CoinGecko) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerauthoritative data providers@content_dividertrusted platforms aggregating cryptocurrency prices from multiple exchanges – CoinMarketCap, CoinGecko)_$ANNOTATION$_ show BNB trading at or above $1,500 USD. Confirmation requires published data snapshots or official exchange APIs accessible at settlement.

Resolves 'No' if BNB never reaches $1,500 USD or higher by _$TIME_1, if trading is halted or the coin is delisted before that time, or if reliable price data is unavailable or unverifiable. Conflicting data will be resolved by prioritizing official exchange and aggregator sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if BNB ceases to exist or the market for BNB USD pricing never exists by _$TIME_1.

items.title: Fluent fully decentralized mainnet launch by October 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Fluent launches its fully decentralized mainnet _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMainnet@content_dividerthe primary public blockchain network where transactions are validated and recorded – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ featuring cross-chain liquidity aggregation _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCross-chain liquidity aggregation@content_dividertechnology that enables pooling and routing of liquidity across multiple blockchain networks – Oxford Dictionary)_$ANNOTATION$_, on-chain governance _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOn-chain governance@content_dividera decentralized process where blockchain protocol changes are decided and executed via smart contracts and token holder voting – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, and a native reward token _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerNative reward token@content_dividera blockchain-issued cryptocurrency used within the protocol to incentivize user participation and governance – Oxford Dictionary)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 according to official Fluent communications and verifiable blockchain data.

This market resolves 'Yes' if by _$TIME_1 official Fluent sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerOfficial Fluent sources@content_dividerFluent's verified website, official blog posts, or verified social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm the mainnet is fully decentralized and operational with all specified features active, and independent blockchain explorers or audits verify cross-chain liquidity aggregation and on-chain governance functionality.

This market resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if the launch is cancelled, indefinitely postponed, or if the mainnet lacks any specified feature by deadline. If data sources conflict, resolution prioritizes official Fluent announcements, followed by corroborated third-party blockchain analytics. Also resolves 'No' if the Fluent mainnet or the specified launch event does not exist or never occurs.

items.title: Taylor Swift pregnancy announcement by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Taylor Swift publicly announces her pregnancy by official statement from herself or her authorized representatives by _$TIME_1, according to verified social media or reputable news outlets.

Resolves 'Yes' if an explicit pregnancy announcement by Taylor Swift or her official representatives is confirmed via verified social media accounts _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerVerified social media accounts@content_dividerofficial social media profiles authenticated by platform verification badges – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or reputable news outlets _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerReputable news outlets@content_dividerwidely recognized mainstream media organizations with editorial standards – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Backup confirmation may include official press releases or statements posted on Taylor Swift's official website.

Resolves 'No' if no such official announcement is made by _$TIME_1, or if the event is cancelled, denied, or indefinitely postponed. Also resolves 'No' if only unofficial rumors, AI-generated images, or unverified social media posts exist. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing official statements and major media sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the pregnancy announcement event does not exist or never takes place.

If primary verification sources become unavailable, resolution uses archived official social media posts via the Internet Archive _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerInternet Archive@content_dividerhttps://archive.org)_$ANNOTATION$_, official statements in regulatory filings if applicable, or documented media reports with dual tier-1 source confirmation.

Settlement time is strictly by _$TIME_1 UTC. Any announcements after _$TIME_1 are disregarded for resolution.

items.title: Institute for the Study of War report on Ukraine by April 30, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Institute for the Study of War publishes a new comprehensive report on the Ukraine conflict by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerInstitute for the Study of War@content_dividera U.S.-based nonprofit research organization specializing in military conflict analysis – ISW official website https://understandingwar.org/)_$ANNOTATION$_ on their official website or verified social media accounts.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official ISW report on the Ukraine conflict is released and publicly accessible on the ISW website or through verified ISW social media by _$TIME_1. Verification requires direct confirmation from ISW’s official publication channels _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial ISW source@content_dividerhttps://understandingwar.org/research/ukraine)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn accounts.

Resolves 'No' if no such official report is published by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if reliable verification is unavailable. In case of conflicting information, resolution prioritizes ISW official channels. Additionally, resolves 'No' if ISW does not produce any new comprehensive Ukraine conflict report within the timeframe.

items.title: Iran uranium enrichment at pre-June 2025 levels by April 30, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Iran resumes uranium enrichment output at the Natanz, Fordow, and Esfahan nuclear facilities at or above levels recorded before June 2025 according to International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) public reports and monitoring data by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerIran@content_dividerIslamic Republic of Iran, a country in the Middle East – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUranium enrichment@content_dividerthe process of increasing the percentage of uranium-235 isotope in uranium samples – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerIAEA@content_dividerInternational Atomic Energy Agency, the UN nuclear watchdog monitoring nuclear activities – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if the IAEA publicly confirms, in official reports or statements available at https://www.iaea.org/ and related trusted archives, that Iran has achieved uranium enrichment output at or exceeding pre-June 2025 levels at Natanz, Fordow, and Esfahan by _$TIME_1. Verification includes corroboration from at least one major independent expert analysis such as the Institute for Science and International Security (ISIS) https://isis-online.org/ or equivalent authoritative sources.

Resolves 'No' if Iran does not reach these enrichment levels by _$TIME_1, if official IAEA reports or authoritative sources confirm continued lower enrichment, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if no reliable verification is available by _$TIME_1. Conflicting data resolves by prioritizing IAEA official reports. This market also resolves 'No' if the enrichment activity never resumed or the facilities ceased operation as defined.

items.title: Israel x Iran renewed military conflict by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Israel and Iran engage in renewed active military conflict, defined as direct, sustained military engagements or hostilities beyond current ceasefires, confirmed by official government statements or recognized geopolitical institutions by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerRenewed active military conflict@content_dividerdirect, sustained military engagements or hostilities beyond current ceasefires involving Israel and Iran – defined for this market)_$ANNOTATION$_ .

Resolves 'Yes' if verified reports from official Israeli or Iranian government sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial government sources@content_dividerstatements published on government websites, official press releases, or verified social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_, credible intelligence analyses, or recognized geopolitical institutions _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerGeopolitical institutions@content_dividerestablished think tanks or intelligence agencies with public reporting, e.g., RAND Corporation)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm active military conflict by _$TIME_1, supported by multiple independent confirmations or visual evidence with source attribution.

Resolves 'No' if no such verified active military conflict is confirmed by _$TIME_1, if the conflict is officially declared ceased or indefinitely postponed, if authoritative verification is unavailable, or if engagements are limited to proxy or indirect hostilities. Conflicting reports defer to official government declarations. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never existed or did not occur as defined.

items.title: BTC > $150,000 by October 21, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin price in USD on any major cryptocurrency exchange _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividerdigital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches or exceeds $150,000 at any time on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-10-21T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_. Price data is based on official closing prices and intra-day high prices from major exchanges such as Coinbase, Binance, Kraken, and Bitstamp.

This market resolves 'Yes' if verifiable data from at least two major cryptocurrency exchanges or an official aggregated price index _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_divideraggregated price index@content_dividera compiled metric of cryptocurrency prices from multiple exchanges – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms Bitcoin reached or exceeded $150,000 USD at any point on or before _$TIME_1. Verification sources include exchange APIs, official exchange websites, or trusted financial data providers such as CoinMarketCap or CoinGecko.

This market resolves 'No' if Bitcoin price does not reach $150,000 USD by _$TIME_1, or if official sources confirm market suspension, trading halts, or data unavailability. In case of conflicting data, priority is given to official exchange data and aggregated price indices. If the event never occurs or data is insufficient for verification by _$TIME_1, the market resolves 'No'.

items.title: HYPE price ≥ $55 by November 15?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the closing price of $HYPE _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerHYPE symbol@content_dividerticker symbol representing the specific security or cryptocurrency being evaluated – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ remains at or above 55.00 USD _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUSD@content_dividerUnited States dollar, official currency of the United States – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on every major exchange closing session from market open up to and including _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'Yes' if no official closing price of $HYPE on any major exchange _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividermajor exchange@content_dividera recognized and regulated trading platform where $HYPE is listed and traded publicly – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ falls below 55.00 USD by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-11-15T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification requires official closing price data published by primary exchanges such as NYSE, NASDAQ, or authorized cryptocurrency exchanges, accessible at their official websites _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerofficial exchange sites@content_dividere.g. https://www.nyse.com, https://www.nasdaq.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or via trusted financial data providers.

Resolves 'No' if any verified closing price falls below 55.00 USD at any time before or on _$TIME_1, if trading of $HYPE is halted or delisted before _$TIME_1, if official price data is unavailable or unverified by deadline, or if the event never occurred (e.g., $HYPE not traded). In case of conflicting data, priority is given to official exchange publications, regulatory filings, and verified third-party aggregators. Absence of verifiable confirmation by _$TIME_1 results in 'No'.

items.title: Cristiano Ronaldo retires by November 20, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Cristiano Ronaldo makes an official public announcement of retirement from his professional playing career before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerRetirement@content_dividerthe act of formally ending one's professional sports career by public declaration – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if an explicit retirement statement from Cristiano Ronaldo or his authorized representatives is published by an official source _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial source@content_dividerCristiano Ronaldo's verified website, official social media accounts, or recognized sports governing bodies' announcements)_$ANNOTATION$_ on or before _$TIME_1. Verification may be supported by major verified media outlets reporting with corroboration from at least two tier-1 sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerTier-1 sources@content_dividerleading global news organizations with established fact-checking and editorial standards – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if no official retirement announcement is made by _$TIME_1, if the event is explicitly denied or postponed, or if no authoritative verification is available. In case of conflicting information, official statements from Ronaldo or his team prevail. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the retirement event never occurs or if Ronaldo continues professional play past the deadline.

items.title: Kim Jong Un death by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Kim Jong Un dies _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerdeath@content_dividerthe permanent cessation of all vital functions of a human being – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ during December 1 through December 31, 2025, as confirmed by official North Korean state media announcements or credible government intelligence sources.

This market resolves 'Yes' if an explicit official declaration or credible government intelligence confirmation _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerofficial declaration@content_dividera formal announcement published by North Korean state media or recognized intelligence agencies)_$ANNOTATION$_ of Kim Jong Un’s death is published by _$TIME_1. Verification includes official North Korean broadcasts, statements from recognized intelligence agencies such as the US Central Intelligence Agency _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerCentral Intelligence Agency@content_dividerU.S. government agency responsible for foreign intelligence gathering – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, or corroborated reporting by at least two major tier-1 news organizations.

This market resolves 'No' if no verified official or credible intelligence confirmation of death occurs by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially denied or postponed indefinitely, or if authoritative verification data is unavailable. Conflicting information will be resolved prioritizing official North Korean state media, followed by credible intelligence agencies and major verified media. Additionally, this market resolves 'No' if the death event does not occur or if Kim Jong Un remains alive through the entire specified period.

items.title: OpenAI GPT-6 release before June 1, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether OpenAI officially releases GPT-6, a version of its generative pretrained transformer model _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerGPT-6@content_dividerGPT-6: the sixth generation of OpenAI's Generative Pretrained Transformer language model series – Merriam-Webster, OpenAI)_$ANNOTATION$_, before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerDeadline@content_divider2026-06-01T06:59:59Z UTC, corresponding to May 31, 2026 23:59:59 PDT)_$ANNOTATION$_. Resolution is based on official OpenAI announcements or credible media reports with verification through multiple authoritative sources.

This market resolves 'Yes' if OpenAI confirms the public release of GPT-6 by _$TIME_1 via official statements on its website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOpenAI official website@content_dividerhttps://openai.com)_$ANNOTATION$_, verified social media accounts _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOpenAI verified social media@content_dividerOfficial OpenAI Twitter or other verified accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_, or if at least two major tier-1 media outlets with explicit confirmation _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerTier-1 media@content_dividerMajor global news organizations with independent verification)_$ANNOTATION$_ report the release by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes official press releases archived via Internet Archive _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=6@counter_dividerInternet Archive@content_dividerhttps://archive.org)_$ANNOTATION$_ and regulatory filings if applicable.

This market resolves 'No' if no official release confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if OpenAI officially cancels or indefinitely postpones GPT-6 release, or if verifiable confirmation is unavailable. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing direct OpenAI sources and major media. Additionally, resolves 'No' if GPT-6 release never occurs or is fundamentally different (e.g., internal test only).

items.title: OpenAI GPT-6 release before June 1, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether OpenAI officially releases GPT-6, a version of its generative pretrained transformer model _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerGPT-6@content_dividerGPT-6: the sixth generation of OpenAI's Generative Pretrained Transformer language model series – Merriam-Webster, OpenAI)_$ANNOTATION$_, before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerDeadline@content_divider2026-06-01T06:59:59Z UTC, corresponding to May 31, 2026 23:59:59 PDT)_$ANNOTATION$_. Resolution is based on official OpenAI announcements or credible media reports with verification through multiple authoritative sources.

This market resolves 'Yes' if OpenAI confirms the public release of GPT-6 by _$TIME_1 via official statements on its website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOpenAI official website@content_dividerhttps://openai.com)_$ANNOTATION$_, verified social media accounts _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOpenAI verified social media@content_dividerOfficial OpenAI Twitter or other verified accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_, or if at least two major tier-1 media outlets with explicit confirmation _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerTier-1 media@content_dividerMajor global news organizations with independent verification)_$ANNOTATION$_ report the release by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes official press releases archived via Internet Archive _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=6@counter_dividerInternet Archive@content_dividerhttps://archive.org)_$ANNOTATION$_ and regulatory filings if applicable.

This market resolves 'No' if no official release confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if OpenAI officially cancels or indefinitely postpones GPT-6 release, or if verifiable confirmation is unavailable. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing direct OpenAI sources and major media. Additionally, resolves 'No' if GPT-6 release never occurs or is fundamentally different (e.g., internal test only).

items.title: S&P 500 new all-time high before October 28, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the S&P 500 index _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerS&P 500@content_dividera stock market index measuring the stock performance of 500 large companies listed on US stock exchanges – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches a new official all-time closing high before the Federal Reserve meeting on October 28, 2025, based on official closing values from S&P Dow Jones Indices and Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis data _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerS&P Dow Jones Indices@content_dividerprovider of financial market indices including the S&P 500 – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerFederal Reserve Bank of St. Louis@content_dividerregional Federal Reserve bank providing economic data and analysis – Federal Reserve)_$ANNOTATION$_ with Federal Reserve meeting dates from the official Federal Reserve calendar _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerFederal Reserve calendar@content_dividerofficial schedule of Federal Open Market Committee meetings – Federal Reserve)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the official closing value of the S&P 500 exceeds all previous official closing highs recorded before October 28, 2025 UTC, confirmed by data published by S&P Dow Jones Indices or the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis at https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/SP500 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerFRED S&P 500 series@content_dividerFederal Reserve Economic Data series for S&P 500 – Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis)_$ANNOTATION$_ and the Federal Reserve meeting date is verified from the official calendar at https://www.federalreserve.gov/monetarypolicy/fomccalendars.htm _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=6@counter_dividerFederal Reserve meeting calendar@content_dividerofficial Federal Open Market Committee meeting schedule – Federal Reserve)_$ANNOTATION$_. Backup verification may include major financial news outlets reporting the new all-time high before the Federal Reserve meeting date.

This market resolves 'No' if no new official closing high is recorded before the Federal Reserve meeting on October 28, 2025 UTC, if the Federal Reserve meeting is cancelled or postponed beyond that date, or if authoritative verification of either the S&P 500 closing values or the Federal Reserve meeting date is unavailable by the deadline. Conflicting information will be resolved by prioritizing official S&P Dow Jones Indices and Federal Reserve data. Additionally, the market resolves 'No' if the event never occurs or relevant data is absent.

items.title: French government dissolution by October 15, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether French President Emmanuel Macron officially dissolves the government by making a formal announcement or through verified government channels by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerDissolution@content_dividerthe formal termination of the sitting government before the end of its term – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official statement from the French President's office or verified government sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial source@content_dividerFrench Presidency website, official government press releases, or verified government social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms the government's dissolution by _$TIME_1, with backup verification from major French or international news agencies reporting with explicit official confirmation.

Resolves 'No' if no official dissolution announcement is made by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if the government continues without formal dissolution, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradicts dissolution. Conflicting reports resolve by prioritizing official presidential or government declarations. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the dissolution event does not exist or never occurs.

items.title: Spider-Man: Brand New Day $1B box office by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Spider-Man: Brand New Day attains $1,000,000,000 USD in worldwide box office gross revenue _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerWorldwide box office gross revenue@content_dividertotal ticket sales revenue from all global theatrical screenings of a film – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ as reported by authoritative industry databases by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerDeadline@content_divider2026-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_. The measurement includes all theatrical releases up to the deadline with data sourced primarily from Box Office Mojo and IMDbPro.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official cumulative worldwide box office revenue reaches or exceeds $1 billion USD for Spider-Man: Brand New Day as published by Box Office Mojo _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerBox Office Mojo@content_dividera reputable box office revenue tracking website owned by IMDb.com – https://www.boxofficemojo.com/)_$ANNOTATION$_ or IMDbPro _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerIMDbPro@content_dividerindustry database providing verified box office and film performance data – https://pro.imdb.com/)_$ANNOTATION$_ no later than _$TIME_1. Verification may be supplemented by official Sony Pictures Releasing announcements or major tier-1 media reports confirming the milestone.

This market resolves 'No' if the cumulative worldwide box office gross is below $1 billion USD by _$TIME_1, if the film is officially cancelled, indefinitely postponed, or withdrawn from theatrical release, or if no authoritative verification of the milestone exists by _$TIME_1. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing Box Office Mojo and IMDbPro figures. Additionally, this market resolves 'No' if Spider-Man: Brand New Day never received a theatrical release or ceased distribution before reaching the threshold.

items.title: BTC ≤ $90,000 by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin (BTC) price in USD falls to $90,000 or below at any time on or before _$TIME_1 based on closing prices from major cryptocurrency exchanges _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividerdigital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividercryptocurrency exchange@content_dividermarketplace for buying and selling cryptocurrencies – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if at least one major exchange _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividermajor cryptocurrency exchanges@content_dividerBinance, Coinbase Pro, Kraken, Bitstamp, Gemini – publicly recognized high-volume exchanges)_$ANNOTATION$_ records a closing price at or below $90,000 USD by _$TIME_1. Verification requires official exchange data published on exchange websites or through trusted market data aggregators like CoinMarketCap _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerCoinMarketCap@content_dividercryptocurrency market data aggregator – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Backup sources include archived exchange snapshots (Internet Archive) or regulatory filings.

Resolves 'No' if no verified closing price at or below $90,000 USD is recorded by _$TIME_1, if exchanges cease operation before _$TIME_1 without valid price data, or if authoritative price data is unavailable or unverifiable. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing official exchange APIs and major data aggregators. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Bitcoin trading is suspended or BTC ceases to exist before _$TIME_1.

items.title: Buffalo Bills win Super Bowl LX by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Buffalo Bills _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBuffalo Bills@content_divideran American professional football team based in Buffalo, New York – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ win the Super Bowl LX _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerSuper Bowl LX@content_dividerthe 60th annual championship game of the National Football League held on February 8, 2026 – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ held at Levi's Stadium, Santa Clara, CA, as officially announced by the National Football League (NFL) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerNFL@content_dividerNational Football League, the professional American football league in the United States – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'Yes' if the NFL publicly confirms the Buffalo Bills as winners of Super Bowl LX through official NFL sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOfficial NFL sources@content_dividerNFL official website, NFL verified social media accounts, or official NFL press releases at https://www.nfl.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Verification includes major tier-1 media outlets reporting with explicit NFL confirmation or official NFL statistics and documented game results from the event held February 8, 2026.

Resolves 'No' if the Buffalo Bills are not declared winners by _$TIME_1, if the Super Bowl LX event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if no verifiable official confirmation exists. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing NFL official announcements. Also resolves 'No' if the event does not occur or never existed as specified.

items.title: FOMC rate hike triggers crypto sell-off by October 16, 2025?
items.rules:
