This market measures whether the Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerFOMC@content_dividerprincipal monetary policymaking body of the Federal Reserve System – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ announces an interest rate increase by _$TIME_1 and if a cryptocurrency market sell-off _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividercrypto sell-off@content_dividera significant sustained decline in cryptocurrency prices across major exchanges – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ occurs within three trading days following the announcement, confirmed by official FOMC releases and market data from major cryptocurrency exchanges.

The market resolves 'Yes' if the FOMC officially announces a rate hike _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerofficial announcement@content_dividerstatement published on Federal Reserve's website or verified communication channels – https://www.federalreserve.gov/monetarypolicy.htm)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, and a cryptocurrency sell-off is verified by a decline of at least 5% in the aggregated market capitalization or price indices of top cryptocurrencies (e.g., Bitcoin, Ethereum) over the three subsequent trading days, using data from at least two major exchanges such as Coinbase and Binance.

The market resolves 'No' if no official FOMC rate hike announcement occurs by _$TIME_1, if the rate hike is officially postponed or cancelled, if no verified cryptocurrency sell-off meeting the 5% decline threshold occurs within three trading days after the hike, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing Federal Reserve communications and aggregated exchange data. The market also resolves 'No' if the FOMC meeting does not occur or the crypto market data is inaccessible or unreliable.

items.title: Bitcoin hits $100,000 or $130,000 first before December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin's price in USD reaches or exceeds $100,000 before it reaches or exceeds $130,000 by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividerdigital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, using closing prices reported by major exchanges Binance, Coinbase, or Kraken.

Resolves 'Yes' if official price data from Binance, Coinbase, or Kraken confirm Bitcoin's price first hits or exceeds $100,000 at any time before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial source confirmation@content_dividerprice data published on exchange websites or verified APIs)_$ANNOTATION$_, and prior to any price equal or above $130,000. Verification includes archived API data or official exchange announcements.

Resolves 'No' if Bitcoin price fails to reach $100,000 before _$TIME_1, if $130,000 or higher is reached first, if exchanges cease trading Bitcoin before _$TIME_1, or if authoritative price data is unavailable or contradicts the events. If data sources conflict, resolution prioritizes Binance, then Coinbase, then Kraken. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Bitcoin trading does not exist or is suspended before _$TIME_1.

items.title: Binance, Coinbase, or OKX integrate Fluent token by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Fluent token _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerFluent token@content_dividera specific cryptocurrency token issued on a blockchain network – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ is officially integrated _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerIntegration@content_dividerthe process of adding a token to an exchange's trading or listing platform – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by Binance _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerBinance@content_dividera global cryptocurrency exchange platform founded in 2017 – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, Coinbase _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerCoinbase@content_dividera major US-based cryptocurrency exchange platform founded in 2012 – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, or OKX _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerOKX@content_dividera cryptocurrency exchange platform offering spot and derivatives trading – Oxford Dictionary)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 according to official exchange announcements or listing confirmations.

This market resolves 'Yes' if any of the three exchanges publish an official announcement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=6@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividera formal statement published on an exchange's verified website or social media channel – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or confirm listing of Fluent token on their platform by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=7@counter_dividerDeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification requires direct evidence from the exchange’s official website, verified social media accounts, or regulatory filings. Backup verification includes major tier-1 media reports that cite official sources.

This market resolves 'No' if no official confirmation or listing occurs by _$TIME_1, if integration is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative sources for confirmation are unavailable. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing primary source announcements. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the Fluent token is never integrated on any of the three exchanges by the deadline.

items.title: Fluent supports simultaneous EVM, SVM, and Wasm apps by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Fluent enables simultaneous operation of applications on Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerEVM@content_dividerEthereum Virtual Machine: a runtime environment for smart contracts on the Ethereum blockchain – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, Solana Virtual Machine (SVM) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerSVM@content_dividerSolana Virtual Machine: the runtime environment executing smart contracts on the Solana blockchain – Oxford Dictionary)_$ANNOTATION$_, and WebAssembly (Wasm) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerWasm@content_dividerWebAssembly: a binary instruction format for a stack-based virtual machine enabling high-performance web applications – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ within a unified environment by _$TIME_1 as confirmed by official Fluent technical documentation and verified developer communications.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official Fluent technical documentation _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerFluent technical documentation@content_dividerauthoritative product documentation published on fluentlabs.xyz or equivalent official domain)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified developer communications _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerverified developer communications@content_dividerstatements from Fluent developers via authenticated social media or official developer forums)_$ANNOTATION$_ explicitly confirm support for simultaneous execution of EVM, SVM, and Wasm applications in a unified runtime by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes archived web captures via Internet Archive _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=6@counter_dividerInternet Archive@content_dividera digital archive preserving web pages for future verification – https://archive.org)_$ANNOTATION$_ and major technology media reports with dual tier-1 source confirmation.

This market resolves 'No' if no authoritative confirmation of simultaneous support exists by _$TIME_1, if Fluent officially cancels or indefinitely postpones this feature, if the event fundamentally differs from the specification, or if verification sources are unavailable or contradictory by the deadline. In case of conflicting data, official Fluent communications take precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the underlying event never existed or was never planned.

items.title: Manchester City wins UEFA Champions League by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Manchester City officially wins the 2025 UEFA Champions League _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerUEFA Champions League@content_dividerannual European men's club football tournament organised by Union of European Football Associations – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ as confirmed by an official UEFA announcement by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUEFA@content_dividerUnion of European Football Associations, governing body of European football – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ .

This market resolves 'Yes' if UEFA publishes an official statement or announcement confirming Manchester City as the 2025 UEFA Champions League winner by _$TIME_1. Verification includes UEFA's official website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerUEFA official website@content_dividerhttps://www.uefa.com/uefachampionsleague/)_$ANNOTATION$_, verified UEFA social media accounts, or published regulatory filings. Secondary confirmation may be obtained from major tier-1 sports media outlets reporting UEFA's official declaration.

This market resolves 'No' if no official UEFA confirmation of Manchester City winning the 2025 UEFA Champions League is available by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or postponed beyond that date, or if authoritative sources deny Manchester City's victory. In case of conflicting reports, priority is given to official UEFA sources. This market also resolves 'No' if the 2025 UEFA Champions League final does not occur or if Manchester City does not participate or win.

items.title: Hyperliquid 24h perpetual volume > $15B by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Hyperliquid's 24-hour perpetual trading volume, defined as the total USD value of perpetual futures contracts traded within any single 24-hour period, exceeds $15 billion on or before _$TIME_1, according to aggregated on-chain and exchange data reported by DefiLlama and The Block _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerDefiLlama@content_dividera decentralized finance data aggregator providing analytics on DeFi protocols – The Block)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerThe Block@content_dividera leading blockchain and cryptocurrency research and data provider – The Block)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if verified data from DefiLlama or The Block shows Hyperliquid's 24-hour perpetual trading volume exceeding $15 billion USD at any time on or before _$TIME_1. Verification requires publicly accessible official reports, website data, or API endpoints from these sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial source URLs@content_dividerhttps://defillama.com/protocol/hyperliquid and https://www.theblockcrypto.com/data/perpetual-futures-volume)_$ANNOTATION$_. Backup verification may include major tier-1 crypto analytics media corroborating these figures.

This market resolves 'No' if no authoritative source confirms the 24-hour perpetual volume exceeds $15 billion by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if relevant data is unavailable. Conflicting data defaults to official source precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Hyperliquid ceases perpetual futures trading or the volume metric is not reported. Data unavailability or failure to meet threshold by _$TIME_1 results in 'No'.

items.title: Monad mainnet launch by October 30, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Monad's mainnet _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMainnet@content_dividerthe primary public blockchain network of a cryptocurrency project enabling transactions and smart contracts – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ is officially launched and live by _$TIME_1 according to direct confirmation from Monad Labs or authoritative crypto data sources.

Resolves 'Yes' if official Monad Labs communication _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerMonad Labs@content_dividerthe company or team developing the Monad blockchain platform – Search Context)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified CoinMarketCap listing _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerCoinMarketCap@content_dividera major cryptocurrency market data provider and listing platform – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ explicitly confirms mainnet launch by _$TIME_1. Confirmation must be from Monad's verified social media accounts or official website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOfficial source@content_dividercompany websites or verified social media channels)_$ANNOTATION$_. Backup confirmation may include major crypto news outlets with corroboration.

Resolves 'No' if no such confirmation is published by _$TIME_1, if the mainnet launch is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if verification sources are unavailable or contradictory by _$TIME_1. Also resolves 'No' if Monad mainnet never launches or the event is fundamentally different (e.g., testnet launch only). Conflicts are resolved by prioritizing Monad Labs official channels, then CoinMarketCap, followed by major media. Non-existence or cancellation announcements finalize 'No' resolution.

items.title: Monad mainnet launch by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Monad blockchain mainnet _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMonad mainnet@content_dividerthe primary live network of the Monad blockchain where real transactions occur – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ officially launches by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_, as confirmed by official Monad announcements or verified exchange listings.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official Monad communication _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial Monad communication@content_dividerstatements published on the Monad project’s official website or verified social media accounts – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified cryptocurrency exchange listing _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerVerified exchange listing@content_dividerlisting of Monad mainnet token on reputable exchanges with official confirmation – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms the mainnet launch by _$TIME_1. Verification requires direct access to Monad’s official channels or recognized exchanges by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'No' if no official confirmation is published by _$TIME_1, if the mainnet launch is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory. This includes cases where the mainnet never existed or the event deviates from the defined mainnet launch. Conflicting evidence is resolved by prioritizing official Monad sources. Absence of verifiable confirmation by the deadline also results in a 'No' resolution.

items.title: Oklahoma City Thunder NBA Championship by June 30, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Oklahoma City Thunder officially win the National Basketball Association (NBA) Championship by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerNBA Championship@content_dividerthe final playoff series of the NBA season determining the league champion – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to the official NBA Finals outcome.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the Oklahoma City Thunder are officially declared NBA champions by the NBA via publication on the NBA website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerNBA official website@content_dividerhttps://www.nba.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified NBA social media accounts by _$TIME_1. Verification also accepts confirmation from at least two major tier-1 sports media sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividertier-1 sports media@content_dividermajor sports news outlets such as ESPN, CBS Sports, or The Athletic)_$ANNOTATION$_ or official NBA statistics repositories. Visual evidence such as authenticated NBA Finals trophy presentation videos or photographs with source attribution is a valid secondary confirmation.

This market resolves 'No' if the Oklahoma City Thunder are not declared NBA champions by _$TIME_1, if the NBA Finals are cancelled or postponed indefinitely past _$TIME_1, or if authoritative and verifiable confirmation is unavailable. Conflicts in data are resolved by prioritizing NBA official declarations. Additionally, this market resolves 'No' if the event (2026 NBA Finals) does not occur or if Oklahoma City Thunder do not participate in the Finals. Absence of the event or lack of championship determination by the deadline also results in 'No'.

items.title: Pawtato Estates and Provinces trading launch by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Pawtato Finance _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerPawtato Finance@content_dividerthe official entity operating the Pawtato trading platform – Pawtato official communications)_$ANNOTATION$_ officially launches Estates and Provinces trading features on its platform by _$TIME_1 according to official Pawtato Finance announcements or verified platform updates.

This market resolves 'Yes' if explicit confirmation from Pawtato Finance official channels _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial channels@content_dividerPawtato Finance verified website, @PawtatoFinance official social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified platform updates show Estates and Provinces trading features fully available and operational on or before _$TIME_1. Confirmation requires documented release notes, public announcements, or platform functionality evidence accessible at official Pawtato sites.

This market resolves 'No' if no official confirmation or verified platform update occurs by _$TIME_1, if the launch is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if the trading features are unavailable or differ materially from the defined Estates and Provinces trading. In absence of verifiable data or in case of conflicting reports, resolution defaults to 'No'. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never existed or the product was not planned.

items.title: BTC > $130000 by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividera digital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ price in USD surpasses $130,000 at any time on or before _$TIME_1 (2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC), based on aggregated closing prices from multiple reputable cryptocurrency exchanges analyzed by authoritative data providers.

The market resolves 'Yes' if verifiable evidence from at least one primary authoritative cryptocurrency market data provider such as CoinAPI, Blockchain.com, Amberdata, or Messari _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerPrimary authoritative data providers@content_dividerestablished platforms providing aggregated real-time and historical Bitcoin pricing data via APIs and official publications)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms Bitcoin’s price exceeded $130,000 USD at any moment on or before _$TIME_1. Verification requires timestamped exchange price data or official aggregate index data published on or before _$TIME_1.

The market resolves 'No' if Bitcoin price does not exceed $130,000 USD by _$TIME_1, if the price data is unavailable or unverifiable by authoritative sources by the deadline, or if the event is cancelled or market data providers cease operation. Conflicting data are resolved by prioritizing official aggregate indices and multiple independent data sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Bitcoin or the trading markets do not exist or operate by _$TIME_1.

items.title: Arsenal lead Premier League by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Arsenal Football Club _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerArsenal Football Club@content_dividerprofessional football club based in London competing in the English Premier League – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ is officially ranked first in the English Premier League standings _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerEnglish Premier League@content_dividertop tier professional football league in England, with final positions based on total points after scheduled matches – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by the close of December 31, 2025 UTC.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official English Premier League standings published by the Premier League or verified major media sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerPremier League@content_dividerthe governing body and organizer of the English Premier League football competition – https://www.premierleague.com/standings)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm Arsenal is ranked first at any point up to and including _$TIME_1. Verification includes archival snapshots from premierleague.com, ESPN, or Fox Sports standings pages.

This market resolves 'No' if Arsenal is not ranked first by _$TIME_1, if the league is suspended or canceled before that date, or if official standings are unavailable. Conflicting data will be resolved by prioritizing official Premier League publications and corroborated tier-1 media. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the Premier League season is not active or if Arsenal does not exist as a participant by _$TIME_1.

items.title: LeBron James retires after 2025-26 NBA season by April 30?
items.rules:
This market measures whether LeBron James officially announces retirement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerRetirement@content_dividerthe act of leaving one's job or ceasing professional activity permanently – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ as a player in the National Basketball Association (NBA) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerNBA@content_dividerthe major professional men's basketball league in the United States – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ after the conclusion of the 2025-26 NBA season by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerDeadline@content_divider2026-04-30T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_. Resolution relies on official announcements from LeBron James or the Los Angeles Lakers _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerLos Angeles Lakers@content_dividerprofessional NBA basketball team based in Los Angeles, California – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and corroborated by major verified media sources.

This market resolves 'Yes' if an explicit retirement announcement from LeBron James or an official Los Angeles Lakers statement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividerstatement published on official team website, verified social media accounts, or press releases)_$ANNOTATION$_ is made by _$TIME_1. Verification includes official Los Angeles Lakers channels (website, verified social media), LeBron James' verified personal accounts, or major media outlets with confirmation from at least two tier-1 sources.

This market resolves 'No' if no verified retirement announcement is made by _$TIME_1, if the retirement is officially postponed beyond this date, if the event never occurs, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. If conflicting information arises, official Los Angeles Lakers sources take precedence. The market also resolves 'No' if LeBron James continues playing in the NBA after the 2025-26 season or if the retirement announcement pertains only to non-NBA activities.

items.title: Another app launch on Fluent testnet by November 1, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether a new application is officially deployed and made available on the Fluent testnet _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerFluent testnet@content_dividera developer-focused blockchain test network (Chain ID 20994) enabling safe, low-cost decentralized application testing before mainnet launch – Fluent Labs)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 according to official Fluent Labs or verified developer communications.

The market resolves 'Yes' if an official announcement or confirmation from Fluent Labs or verified developer channels _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerFluent Labs@content_dividerthe organization developing the Fluent hybrid execution network and testnet – Fluent Labs official website https://fluent.xyz)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms the deployment and availability of a new app on the Fluent testnet by _$TIME_1. Verification may include official blog posts, developer portal updates, or verified social media statements.

The market resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation is available by _$TIME_1, if the app launch is cancelled, indefinitely postponed, or if reliable verification is unavailable. Conflicting or ambiguous reports are resolved by prioritizing Fluent Labs official communications. Additionally, the market resolves 'No' if the event never existed or no app was launched on the Fluent testnet by the deadline.

items.title: Ethereum price goes short on or after October 16, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether net short positions on Ethereum (a decentralized blockchain platform and cryptocurrency _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerEthereum@content_dividera decentralized, open-source blockchain system with smart contract functionality – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_) are initiated or held on or after October 16, 2025 UTC, as evidenced by price declines documented by reputable cryptocurrency exchanges and market data providers.

Resolves 'Yes' if confirmed by official statements or market data from at least two major cryptocurrency exchanges or authoritative market data aggregators _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCryptocurrency exchange@content_dividera digital marketplace where cryptocurrencies are bought, sold, or traded – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ that net short positions on Ethereum exist and coincide with a price decline starting October 16, 2025 UTC or later, verified by data published by October 23, 2025 UTC _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerDeadline@content_divider2025-10-23T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification includes official exchange reports, regulatory filings, or publicly accessible blockchain analytics.

Resolves 'No' if no verifiable evidence of net short positions or price declines on or after October 16, 2025 UTC is available by October 23, 2025 UTC, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative sources fail to provide sufficient confirmation. Conflicting data resolves to 'No' unless a clear majority of primary authoritative sources confirm the event. Also resolves 'No' if Ethereum trading is halted, delisted, or the market does not exist by the deadline.

items.title: @sproutfi_xyz TVL > $20M by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the total value locked (TVL) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerTotal Value Locked@content_dividerthe aggregate value of cryptoassets deposited in decentralized finance protocols – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ in the @sproutfi_xyz decentralized finance protocol reaches or exceeds $20 million USD before or at _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'Yes' if official TVL metrics from recognized decentralized finance analytics platforms _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerDeFi analytics platforms@content_dividerauthoritative online services tracking DeFi metrics such as DeFi Llama, DappRadar, or similar)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm $20 million or more total value locked in @sproutfi_xyz protocols by _$TIME_1. Verification requires published reports, dashboards, or datasets accessible from these platforms, with backup confirmation from archived snapshots or official @sproutfi_xyz disclosures _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial disclosures@content_dividerstatements or data published on the official @sproutfi_xyz website or verified social media)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if TVL does not reach $20 million by _$TIME_1, if the protocol is officially discontinued or indefinitely suspended before _$TIME_1, if reliable verification data is unavailable by _$TIME_1, or if the event never existed. Conflicting data will be resolved by prioritizing official @sproutfi_xyz disclosures, followed by multiple independent DeFi analytics platforms. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the @sproutfi_xyz protocol ceases to exist or never launched.

items.title: BTC price consolidate or rise by October 16, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the closing price of Bitcoin _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividera digital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on major USD-denominated cryptocurrency exchanges _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCryptocurrency exchange@content_dividera platform for trading digital currencies – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ remains within a defined consolidation range or exceeds the current reference price at 23:59:59 UTC on October 16, 2025 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-10-16T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the official closing price of Bitcoin at or before _$TIME_1 is equal to or greater than the current reference price as verified by at least two major cryptocurrency price aggregation platforms such as CoinMarketCap _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerCoinMarketCap@content_dividera leading cryptocurrency price tracking website – https://coinmarketcap.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ and CoinGecko _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerCoinGecko@content_dividera major cryptocurrency price data provider – https://coingecko.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Verification may also include TradingView charts _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=6@counter_dividerTradingView@content_dividera platform for financial market charts and analysis – https://tradingview.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ showing closing prices at the specified time.

This market resolves 'No' if Bitcoin's closing price on major exchanges is below the current reference price at _$TIME_1, if price data is unavailable or unverifiable by _$TIME_1, or if trading on major exchanges is suspended or Bitcoin is delisted before _$TIME_1. In case of conflicting data, resolution follows the majority consensus of CoinMarketCap and CoinGecko official published data. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Bitcoin trading or pricing data does not exist for the specified deadline.

items.title: Putin Trump in-person meeting by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Vladimir Putin _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerVladimir Putin@content_dividerthe President of Russia as of 2025 – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and Donald Trump _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerDonald Trump@content_dividerthe former President of the United States – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ hold a face-to-face meeting by _$TIME_1 with confirmation from official government sources or direct statements from their official offices.

Resolves 'Yes' if an in-person meeting is explicitly confirmed by official announcements published on the Kremlin website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerKremlin website@content_dividerhttps://en.kremlin.ru/events/president/news)_$ANNOTATION$_, the Office of Donald Trump, or equivalent official channels by _$TIME_1. Verification may include official press releases, government event records, or verified statements on official social media accounts.

Resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation is available by _$TIME_1, if the meeting is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if only virtual meetings occur, or if authoritative sources explicitly deny the event. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official government sources and direct office statements. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the meeting never took place or was never scheduled.

items.title: Walrus (WAL) > $1 by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the price of Walrus (WAL) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerWalrus (WAL)@content_dividera specific cryptocurrency token – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches or exceeds $1 USD according to aggregated global exchange data by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_. The price is calculated using volume-weighted average price (VWAP) across all major exchanges listing WAL, verified by official cryptocurrency market data providers.

This market resolves 'Yes' if WAL’s price is confirmed at or above $1.00 USD by any authoritative cryptocurrency price aggregator (e.g., CoinGecko, CoinMarketCap) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerCoinGecko@content_dividerhttps://www.coingecko.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, supported by at least one additional independent source or direct exchange data confirming the price. Verification requires snapshot data or archived price charts published at or before the deadline.

This market resolves 'No' if WAL’s price does not reach $1.00 USD by _$TIME_1, if the token is delisted, trading is halted indefinitely, or if authoritative price data is unavailable or contradictory at deadline. If sources conflict, official exchange data takes precedence, followed by CoinGecko and CoinMarketCap. The market also resolves 'No' if WAL token ceases existence or never traded by _$TIME_1.

items.title: BTC < $100,000 during October 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin's _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividera digital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ price in US dollars falls below $100,000 at any time from 2025-10-01T00:00:00Z to 2025-10-31T23:59:59Z inclusive, based on aggregated prices from major USD trading exchanges.

Resolves 'Yes' if any authoritative price source _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerauthoritative price source@content_dividermajor cryptocurrency exchanges such as Coinbase, Binance, Kraken, Bitstamp, or aggregated market data providers)_$ANNOTATION$_ reports Bitcoin's price below $100,000 USD at any point within October 2025 by 2025-10-31T23:59:59Z. Verification requires published historical price data or official exchange records accessible at settlement.

Resolves 'No' if no verified price dip below $100,000 occurs during October 2025, if trading halts or market closure prevent price discovery, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification data is unavailable or contradictory by 2025-10-31T23:59:59Z. In case of conflicting data, resolution prioritizes official exchange records and major aggregator archives. Also resolves 'No' if Bitcoin trading or price data does not exist for October 2025.

items.title: Taylor Swift attendance at Kansas City Chiefs game after October 9, 2025 by October 16?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Taylor Swift attends any official Kansas City Chiefs NFL game occurring after October 9, 2025, with attendance confirmation via credible reports from official NFL, Kansas City Chiefs, or Taylor Swift verified channels by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerTaylor Swift attendance@content_dividerpresence of the celebrity singer at the game venue during the event – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if confirmed attendance is explicitly reported by the official NFL website or social media _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerNFL official source@content_dividerhttps://www.nfl.com or verified NFL social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_, the official Kansas City Chiefs website or verified social media _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerKansas City Chiefs official source@content_dividerhttps://www.chiefs.com or verified Chiefs social media)_$ANNOTATION$_, or Taylor Swift’s verified social media accounts _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerTaylor Swift verified social media@content_dividerofficial accounts verified by platform such as Twitter blue check, Instagram verified)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Alternative confirmation methods include major media reports citing these official sources or verified visual evidence (photographs or videos with attribution) showing Swift at the game.

Resolves 'No' if no such official or verified confirmation is published by _$TIME_1, if the game after October 9, 2025 does not occur, is cancelled, or postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if all verification sources are unavailable or inconclusive. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing official NFL and Chiefs sources, then Taylor Swift’s verified channels, then major media with dual tier-1 source confirmation. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the game never occurs or Taylor Swift does not attend as defined.

items.title: Monad mainnet launch by October 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Monad officially launches its mainnet _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMonad mainnet launch@content_dividerthe event where Monad blockchain network becomes live and publicly accessible for transactions and smart contracts on the main blockchain – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, based on confirmation from official Monad channels or verified blockchain news outlets, using published announcements or verified visual evidence.

Resolves 'Yes' if explicit confirmation of Monad mainnet launch is published by Monad’s official platforms _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerMonad official platforms@content_dividermonad.foundation website, Monad’s verified social media accounts, or official press releases)_$ANNOTATION$_ or by at least two tier-1 blockchain news outlets _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividertier-1 blockchain news outlets@content_dividermajor, credible blockchain industry news organizations with established verification standards)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, including documented live network availability or token activation announcements.

Resolves 'No' if no verified mainnet launch confirmation occurs by _$TIME_1, or if Monad mainnet launch is officially cancelled, indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, if the event never existed, or if authoritative verification is absent or contradictory. In case of conflicting data, official Monad sources take precedence. The market also resolves 'No' if the mainnet is not live or operational by _$TIME_1.

items.title: Bitcoin < $100,000 by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin's trading price in USD falls below $100,000 at any time on or before _$TIME_1 based on closing prices from major cryptocurrency exchanges _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividerdigital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividercryptocurrency exchange@content_dividera platform for buying and selling cryptocurrencies – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if verified price data from at least two major exchanges such as Coinbase, Binance, Kraken, or Bitstamp shows Bitcoin trading below $100,000 USD at any moment on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerofficial source@content_dividerexchange websites, APIs, or verified market data aggregators)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification requires publicly accessible, archived price records or official exchange announcements by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'No' if Bitcoin never trades below $100,000 USD by _$TIME_1, if trading is suspended or markets are closed before event occurrence, or if authoritative price data is unavailable or contradictory. Conflicts are resolved by prioritizing official exchange data and major market aggregators. Also resolves 'No' if Bitcoin trading never existed or was halted indefinitely before _$TIME_1.

items.title: Monad airdrop share to Monad card holders by October 14, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Monad officially distributes a share of its token airdrop to Monad card holders by enabling claim access through the official Monad airdrop claim portal on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerAirdrop@content_dividera distribution of cryptocurrency tokens to holders, often free or as rewards – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and verified by Monad's official communications.

Resolves 'Yes' if Monad publicly confirms, via official Monad team announcements _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerMonad official announcements@content_dividerstatements on Monad’s official website or verified social media channels)_$ANNOTATION$_, that Monad card holders are eligible and receive a share of the airdrop by _$TIME_1, with claim portal access verified at https://monad.io/airdrop or equivalent official source. Backup verification includes at least one tier-1 crypto news outlet with explicit confirmation.

Resolves 'No' if no official confirmation of share distribution to Monad card holders by _$TIME_1 is available, if the airdrop claim portal does not open by the deadline, if official sources cancel or indefinitely postpone the distribution, or if the event fundamentally differs (e.g., card holders excluded). Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing Monad’s official channels and verified announcements. Also resolves 'No' if the airdrop or claim event never occurred.

items.title: India x Pakistan war ends by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the India-Pakistan war officially ends with a formal cessation of hostilities announced by the governments of India and Pakistan or an authoritative international body by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerCessation of hostilities@content_dividera formal stopping of all military conflict activities between parties – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official government source from India or Pakistan _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerGovernment source@content_dividerofficial statements published on government websites or verified social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_ or an international organization such as the United Nations _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerUnited Nations@content_dividerintergovernmental organization promoting peace and security – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ publicly confirms cessation of hostilities by _$TIME_1. Verification requires explicit, unambiguous announcements or declarations accessible via official government portals or recognized international bodies. Secondary confirmation may include major tier-1 media outlets with corroborated reporting or verified visual evidence.

Resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation is published by _$TIME_1, if the war continues beyond this date, if the event is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official government declarations followed by international organizations. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the war does not exist, never started, or if cessation announcements only apply to limited skirmishes rather than full conflict termination.

items.title: Psy Protocol mainnet launch by June 30, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Psy Protocol publicly launches its mainnet _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMainnet launch@content_dividerthe public availability of the blockchain network beyond the testnet phase – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerDeadline@content_divider2026-06-30T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification requires official Psy Protocol announcements or confirmed statements from verified partners.

Resolves 'Yes' if official Psy Protocol sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial Psy Protocol announcements@content_dividerstatements published on Psy Protocol’s official website or verified social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified partners publicly confirm mainnet availability by _$TIME_1. Confirmation includes documentation or release notes evidencing public mainnet status beyond beta or testnet phases.

Resolves 'No' if no authoritative confirmation occurs by _$TIME_1, if the mainnet launch is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if reliable verification data is unavailable. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing Psy Protocol’s official channels and verified partners. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the mainnet launch event does not exist or never takes place.

items.title: Monad mainnet launch by October 14, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Monad, a high-performance, Proof-of-Stake Layer 1 blockchain fully compatible with the Ethereum Virtual Machine _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMonad@content_dividerMonad is a high-performance, Proof-of-Stake (PoS) Layer 1 blockchain fully compatible with the Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) – Backpack Exchange, 2025)_$ANNOTATION$_, officially launches its mainnet by the deadline _$TIME_1 according to publicly verifiable official announcements.

Resolves 'Yes' if Monad’s verified official Twitter account _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerMonad Twitter@content_dividerhttps://twitter.com/MonadOfficial verified account)_$ANNOTATION$_ or the official Monad project website publish an explicit announcement confirming mainnet launch by _$TIME_1, specifically linked to the opening of Monad’s airdrop claim portal on October 14, 2025. Backup verification includes corroboration by major crypto media or the Internet Archive snapshot of the announcement.

Resolves 'No' if no official confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if the mainnet launch or airdrop claim portal opening is cancelled, indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if authoritative sources explicitly deny the launch. Also resolves 'No' if Monad’s mainnet launch event does not exist or never took place. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official Monad sources and major media confirmations.

items.title: Monad confirmed as crypto scam by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Monad is officially declared a crypto scam _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividercrypto scam@content_dividera fraudulent or deceptive scheme involving cryptocurrency – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by authoritative regulatory bodies, security audit firms, or credible crypto investigation agencies by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ using confirmed public announcements and official reports.

Resolves 'Yes' if a credible regulatory announcement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerregulatory announcement@content_dividerofficial statement from government regulatory agency – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, a formal security audit report _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividersecurity audit report@content_dividerdetailed evaluation of security vulnerabilities by a recognized auditor – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, or an authoritative investigation outcome _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerauthoritative investigation@content_dividerofficial inquiry results by recognized crypto oversight or law enforcement entities – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms Monad as a scam by _$TIME_1. Verification requires publication on official agency websites, verified company communications, or major media verified by at least two tier-1 sources.

Resolves 'No' if no such credible confirmation is published by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially denied, cancelled, or indefinitely postponed, if Monad ceases to exist without scam confirmation, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official regulatory announcements and court filings. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Monad never existed as a crypto entity or scam event.

items.title: Real Madrid win UEFA Champions League by May 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Real Madrid wins the UEFA Champions League final match by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerUEFA Champions League@content_dividerannual European football competition organized by the Union of European Football Associations – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to the official final match result announced by UEFA _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUEFA@content_dividerUnion of European Football Associations, governing body of European football – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification uses official UEFA publications and website.

Resolves 'Yes' if Real Madrid is officially declared the winner of the UEFA Champions League final held on or before _$TIME_1, confirmed by UEFA through published official results at https://www.uefa.com/ and/or UEFA's verified official social media channels. Backup verification includes major sports media outlets with dual tier-1 source confirmation and archival records.

Resolves 'No' if Real Madrid does not win the UEFA Champions League final by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled, postponed indefinitely beyond _$TIME_1, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicting information resolves by prioritizing UEFA official sources. Also resolves 'No' if the UEFA Champions League final does not occur or Real Madrid does not participate in the final by the deadline.

items.title: MegaETH mainnet launch by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the MegaETH mainnet _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMegaETH mainnet@content_dividerthe publicly accessible full network of MegaETH blockchain enabling real-time Ethereum Layer 2 functionality – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ launches with public availability by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to official roadmap statements and community announcements.

Resolves 'Yes' if authoritative confirmation from official MegaETH sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial MegaETH sources@content_dividerofficial MegaETH website, verified social media accounts, or official press releases)_$ANNOTATION$_ or major media with verified dual tier-1 confirmation announces launch and mainnet is publicly accessible enabling real-time Ethereum Layer 2 transactions by _$TIME_1. Verification includes network explorer data or documented token issuance evidencing mainnet operation.

Resolves 'No' if no verifiable mainnet launch confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if the launch is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if authoritative sources deny the event. Conflicting information resolves via official MegaETH announcements as primary. Also resolves 'No' if MegaETH mainnet never launched or the event fundamentally differs from defined mainnet launch.

items.title: Solana (SOL) < $200 by November 1, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the closing price of Solana (SOL) cryptocurrency is below $200 USD on or before _$TIME_1 according to aggregated exchange rates from major cryptocurrency exchanges _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerSolana (SOL)@content_dividera high-performance blockchain platform and its native cryptocurrency token – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerClosing price@content_dividerthe final price at which an asset trades during a trading day – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerAggregated exchange rates@content_dividercombined price data from multiple authorized cryptocurrency exchanges weighted for volume and reliability – industry standard)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the closing price of SOL is confirmed below $200 USD by official exchange data published or archived by _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerCoinMarketCap@content_dividera leading cryptocurrency data aggregator – https://coinmarketcap.com)_$ANNOTATION$_, _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerCoinGecko@content_dividercryptocurrency market data provider – https://coingecko.com)_$ANNOTATION$_, or other major exchanges such as Binance _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=6@counter_dividerBinance@content_dividerlargest global cryptocurrency exchange platform – https://binance.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, with backups including Internet Archive snapshots _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=7@counter_dividerInternet Archive@content_dividerdigital library preserving historical web data – https://archive.org)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'No' if SOL’s closing price does not fall below $200 USD on or before _$TIME_1, if price data is unavailable or unverifiable by the deadline, if the cryptocurrency is delisted or trading is halted indefinitely before _$TIME_1, or if the market event does not exist. Conflicting data resolves by prioritizing official exchange and aggregator data. The default outcome is 'No' absent positive confirmation.

items.title: Sora downloads > 5 million by November 30, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Sora application _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerSora app@content_dividera digital application developed by OpenAI for AI video generation and content creation – OpenAI Help Center 2025)_$ANNOTATION$_ achieves at least five million total downloads worldwide by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-11-30T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_, as recorded by official app store analytics and verified app intelligence platforms.

Resolves 'Yes' if official cumulative download counts reported by primary app stores (Apple App Store, Google Play Store) or authoritative third-party app analytics providers like Appfigures _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerAppfigures@content_dividera recognized app intelligence provider offering mobile app download and usage data – Appfigures.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm five million or more downloads by _$TIME_1. Verification requires published reports, official dashboards, or direct statements from OpenAI or app store platforms accessible at settlement.

Resolves 'No' if the five million download milestone is not met by _$TIME_1, if the app is officially discontinued or removed from stores before the deadline, if reliable data from official or backup sources is unavailable, or if authoritative sources explicitly contradict the milestone achievement. Conflicting data resolves by prioritizing official app store records and OpenAI's official disclosures. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the Sora app does not exist or was never available for download.

If primary sources like app stores or Appfigures data are inaccessible at settlement, resolution will use archived snapshots from the Internet Archive _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerInternet Archive@content_dividera digital library providing archived web pages and datasets – archive.org)_$ANNOTATION$_ or regulatory filings referencing download metrics. Conflicts between sources will be resolved by source authority hierarchy: official stores and OpenAI announcements > major app analytics > archived data.

Settlement timing requires data as of or before _$TIME_1 to ensure global coverage of the full calendar day in UTC.

items.title: Bored Ape Yacht Club NFTs price increase > 15% by October 25?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the aggregated floor price of Bored Ape Yacht Club NFTs _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBored Ape Yacht Club NFTs@content_dividera collection of 10,000 unique digital collectibles on the Ethereum blockchain created by Yuga Labs – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ increases by at least 15% in USD within 24 hours immediately following ApeFest ending at midnight Hong Kong Time on October 24, 2025, resolved by reliable aggregated marketplace data and official BAYC channels.

Resolves 'Yes' if verified aggregated floor price data from primary NFT marketplaces aggregated by CryptoSlam _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCryptoSlam@content_dividera leading NFT marketplace data aggregator – https://www.cryptoslam.io)_$ANNOTATION$_ or official BAYC _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial BAYC channels@content_dividerofficial Yuga Labs websites or verified social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms a ≥15% USD price increase by _$TIME_1. Verification requires published reports or direct data snapshots accessible at settlement.

Resolves 'No' if the price increase threshold is not met by _$TIME_1, if ApeFest is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if official or aggregated data is unavailable by deadline, or if the event (ApeFest or NFT trading) does not occur. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing CryptoSlam and official BAYC sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the NFT collection is delisted or the floor price is unmeasurable.

items.title: Zora streaming feature launch by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Zora officially launches a streaming feature for creators available to users at any time on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerStreaming feature@content_dividera software function that enables live or recorded video/audio content delivery to users over the internet – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, with confirmation sourced from official Zora or OpenAI communications.

Resolves 'Yes' if an explicit announcement or confirmation of the streaming feature launch is published by Zora or OpenAI via official websites or verified social media accounts _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividerstatement published on official company websites or verified social media channels – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, and the feature is demonstrably available to creators or users by that date.

Resolves 'No' if no such official announcement or verifiable evidence exists by _$TIME_1, if the feature launch is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed beyond that date, or if authoritative data sources are unavailable or contradictory. In cases of data disputes, official Zora or OpenAI communications take precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the streaming feature never existed or was never planned.

items.title: Aztec mainnet launch by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Aztec Network _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerAztec Network@content_dividera blockchain protocol focusing on privacy for Ethereum-based decentralized finance applications – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ officially launches its mainnet _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividermainnet@content_dividerthe main operational blockchain network distinct from testnets or development environments – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ as confirmed by an official announcement from the Aztec Network team.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the Aztec Network team publishes an official mainnet launch announcement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerofficial announcement@content_dividerstatement formally issued by Aztec Network via their verified website, verified social media channels, or official press releases)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, with verification permissible through archived official sources or major tier-1 media outlets corroborating the launch by the deadline.

This market resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation is published by _$TIME_1, if the launch is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory. Resolution follows prioritizing official Aztec Network sources, then major verified media, then archived web records. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the mainnet launch event never existed or was never scheduled.

items.title: Polymarket native $POLY token launch by October 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Polymarket _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerPolymarket@content_dividera decentralized prediction market platform – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ officially launches a native $POLY token _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_divider$POLY token@content_dividera blockchain-based digital asset issued by Polymarket – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 according to verified official announcements or regulatory filings.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Polymarket or its operating entity Blockratize Inc. _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerBlockratize Inc.@content_dividerthe corporate entity operating Polymarket – official filings)_$ANNOTATION$_ publicly confirms a native $POLY token launch via an official Token Generation Event (TGE), Initial Coin Offering (ICO), or equivalent token issuance event by _$TIME_1 on Polymarket’s verified social media accounts _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerVerified social media@content_dividerofficial Polymarket accounts on platforms such as X (formerly Twitter) or company website)_$ANNOTATION$_ or regulatory filings such as SEC Form D submissions _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerSEC Form D@content_dividera notice of exempt offering of securities filed with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_. Alternative verification can include major media reports with at least two tier-1 source confirmations.

This market resolves 'No' if no explicit official confirmation of the $POLY token launch is made by _$TIME_1, if the launch is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing regulatory filings and official company announcements. Additionally, this market resolves 'No' if no token launch event exists or takes place by the deadline.

items.title: Meta, Amazon, Microsoft, Google, Tesla AI spend > $560B by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Meta Platforms, Inc., Amazon.com, Inc., Microsoft Corporation, Alphabet Inc. (Google), and Tesla, Inc. collectively spend over USD 560 billion on AI-related capital expenditures by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerCapital expenditures@content_dividerfunds used by a company to acquire or upgrade physical assets such as property, industrial buildings, or equipment – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, defined as investments in AI infrastructure, data centers, and related technology during fiscal year 2025 as reported in official company filings and verified analyst reports.

This market resolves 'Yes' if cumulative AI-related capital expenditures exceeding USD 560 billion are explicitly confirmed by official 2025 fiscal year financial disclosures on company investor relations websites _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCompany filings@content_dividerannual or quarterly SEC filings such as 10-K or 10-Q reports – SEC.gov)_$ANNOTATION$_ or audited financial statements by _$TIME_1, or via multiple Tier-1 financial analyst reports _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerAnalyst reports@content_dividerindependent financial analyses from major investment banks or research firms)_$ANNOTATION$_ corroborating the total spend. Backup verification includes SEC EDGAR database and archived investor presentations.

This market resolves 'No' if cumulative AI-related capital expenditures by the five companies do not exceed USD 560 billion by _$TIME_1, if any company officially cancels or indefinitely postpones AI capital projects, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or insufficient. In case of data conflicts, official SEC filings take precedence. Also resolves 'No' if any company fails to exist or publicly report 2025 AI-related capital expenditures.

items.title: Demon Slayer Infinity Castle Part 2 release by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the movie 'Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Infinity Castle Part 2' is officially released by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerDemon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Infinity Castle Part 2@content_dividerthe second part of the Infinity Castle movie trilogy adapting the Demon Slayer manga series – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to official announcements by Ufotable or Crunchyroll.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Ufotable _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUfotable@content_dividerJapanese animation studio producing the Demon Slayer anime series – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or Crunchyroll _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerCrunchyroll@content_dividerstreaming service specializing in anime content – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ publicly confirm the release of the movie by _$TIME_1 via official websites or verified social media channels. Verification may include press releases or streaming availability notices.

This market resolves 'No' if no official release confirmation appears by _$TIME_1, if the movie release is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if verification from Ufotable and Crunchyroll is unavailable or contradictory. If the movie is never produced or announced, the market resolves 'No'. In case of conflicting information, official statements by Ufotable take precedence. Archive sources such as the Internet Archive may be used for verification.

items.title: BTC > $150,000 by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin (digital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividerdigital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_) reaches or exceeds a price of USD 150,000 based on a consolidated major exchange price index at or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if at any point on or before _$TIME_1 an official USD price of Bitcoin equal to or greater than 150,000 is confirmed by primary sources such as Amberdata _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerAmberdata@content_dividercryptocurrency market data provider offering institutional-grade real-time price tracking – search context)_$ANNOTATION$_, Messari _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerMessari@content_dividercryptocurrency data and analytics platform providing real-time market data – search context)_$ANNOTATION$_, Coinbase, or CoinDesk price indices, verified via official exchange APIs or published reports. Backup verification may include Internet Archive snapshots of these official sources or corroboration by at least two tier-1 financial media outlets.

Resolves 'No' if Bitcoin does not reach USD 150,000 at any time by _$TIME_1, if major exchanges cease trading or delist Bitcoin before _$TIME_1, or if reliable verification data is unavailable by _$TIME_1. Resolution is also 'No' if the event never occurs or if all authoritative sources deny such price occurrence. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing official exchange data and institutional-grade sources. If primary sources become inaccessible, archived data and multiple independent sources are used for final determination.

items.title: Solana Firedancer launch on mainnet by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Firedancer validator client _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerFiredancer validator client@content_divideran independent blockchain validator software client for the Solana network developed by Jump Crypto to improve speed and resilience – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ launches on the Solana mainnet _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividermainnet@content_dividerthe fully operational main public blockchain network, distinct from test networks – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ at any time on or before _$TIME_1.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the Solana Foundation _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerSolana Foundation@content_dividera nonprofit organization supporting the Solana blockchain ecosystem – Official Solana website https://solana.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or Jump Crypto _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerJump Crypto@content_dividera blockchain technology firm that developed the Firedancer client – Official Jump Crypto website https://jumpcrypto.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ publish an official announcement confirming Firedancer's deployment on mainnet by _$TIME_1. Verification includes official website posts, press releases, or verified social media statements. Secondary confirmation may include major blockchain news outlets with dual tier-1 source corroboration.

This market resolves 'No' if no official confirmation is published by _$TIME_1, if the launch is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if the Firedancer client only runs on test networks or devnet but not mainnet, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. In case of conflicting reports, official Solana Foundation and Jump Crypto statements take precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the Firedancer client never launches on mainnet by _$TIME_1.

items.title: Universal Influenza Immunization Program distributes additional vaccines by October 27, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Universal Influenza Immunization Program (UIIP) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerUniversal Influenza Immunization Program@content_dividera government-led vaccination initiative to provide influenza vaccines to eligible populations – Ontario Ministry of Health)_$ANNOTATION$_ distributes additional influenza vaccines beyond initial allocations up to and including _$TIME_1 according to official provincial health ministry announcements and UIIP program schedules.

Resolves 'Yes' if official statements or bulletins from the Ontario Ministry of Health _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOntario Ministry of Health@content_dividerthe provincial government agency responsible for public health and healthcare policy in Ontario, Canada – https://www.health.gov.on.ca)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm additional influenza vaccine shipments or distributions by UIIP by _$TIME_1. Verification includes official press releases, program schedules published on government websites, or documented vaccine delivery records accessible at https://www.ontario.ca/page/flu-season or verified provincial public health unit communications.

Resolves 'No' if no official confirmation of additional vaccine distribution is available by _$TIME_1, if the distribution is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if UIIP does not exist or ceases operation before the deadline. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing Ontario Ministry of Health announcements and related provincial public health units. This market also resolves 'No' if vaccine distribution occurs after _$TIME_1 or if verifiable data is unavailable.

items.title: BNB Smart Chain gas price > 0.1 Gwei by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures the average daily gas price on the BNB Smart Chain Mainnet during December 2025 as the simple arithmetic mean of daily averages reported in Gwei. Resolution uses data from BscScan, an authoritative blockchain explorer _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBscScan@content_dividerA blockchain explorer and analytics platform for BNB Smart Chain – https://bscscan.com)_$ANNOTATION$_, with timestamps converted to UTC and aggregated for accuracy.

Resolves 'Yes' if the calculated average daily gas price for December 2025 is strictly greater than 0.1 Gwei, as confirmed by BscScan's official published statistics or API data by _$TIME_1. Verification requires public archival or direct access to BscScan’s daily average gas price records _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial data source@content_dividerhttps://bscscan.com/chart/gasprice)_$ANNOTATION$_ or equivalent official documentation. Secondary verification may include archived snapshots or third-party blockchain analytics platforms corroborating the data.

Resolves 'No' if the average daily gas price does not exceed 0.1 Gwei by _$TIME_1, if the BNB Smart Chain Mainnet is unavailable, suspended, or if BscScan data is unavailable, cancelled, or indefinitely postponed. Conflicting data will be resolved by prioritizing BscScan’s official records and archival sources. This market also resolves 'No' if the event never existed or was never measurable due to network inactivity or data absence.

items.title: XPL price bounce back > $1 by October 10, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the cryptocurrency XPL _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerXPL@content_dividera digital cryptocurrency token traded on public crypto exchanges – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ price reaches or exceeds $1.00 USD _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUSD@content_dividerUnited States Dollar, official currency of the United States – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and sustains that price for at least 7 consecutive calendar days before or by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerTIME_1@content_divider2026-10-10T12:36:28Z UTC deadline)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to major crypto market data sources.

This market resolves 'Yes' if authoritative crypto price aggregators (e.g., CoinMarketCap _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerCoinMarketCap@content_dividera major cryptocurrency market data provider – https://coinmarketcap.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or CoinGecko _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerCoinGecko@content_dividera leading crypto market data platform – https://coingecko.com)_$ANNOTATION$_) confirm that XPL's USD price closed at or above $1.00 for 7 consecutive days by _$TIME_1. Verification requires archived price data or official API records accessible at settlement. Backup verification includes exchange trading data from major exchanges listing XPL with public historical price records.

This market resolves 'No' if XPL does not sustain a $1.00 USD price for 7 consecutive days by _$TIME_1, if the token is delisted, trading is suspended, or the event is otherwise cancelled or indefinitely postponed. If official data sources become unavailable or contradictory, resolution follows a hierarchy prioritizing CoinMarketCap, then CoinGecko, then major exchange data. The market also resolves 'No' if the token ceases to exist or never trades at $1.00 USD for 7 consecutive days within the timeframe.

items.title: XPL price > 57% ATH by April 10, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the spot price of Plasma (XPL) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerPlasma (XPL)@content_dividera cryptocurrency token traded on public exchanges – Crypto News US Crypto News)_$ANNOTATION$_ rises to or above 57% of its all-time high price (~$0.73 USD) sustained for a meaningful period within six months, as reported by exchange spot prices converted to USD by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2026-04-10T12:43:09Z)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official exchange-reported spot price data _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerexchange-reported spot price@content_dividerprice of a security or cryptocurrency reported by regulated exchanges – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ from at least two independent, reputable crypto exchanges or aggregators such as CoinMarketCap or CoinGecko confirm that XPL price reaches or exceeds $0.73 USD and remains at or above this level for a continuous period of no less than seven calendar days by _$TIME_1. Verification includes archived exchange data, official price tickers, or major crypto analytics platforms _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerverification sources@content_dividerhttps://coinmarketcap.com, https://coingecko.com)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'No' if XPL price fails to meet the above threshold by _$TIME_1, if the price data is unavailable or unreliable, if the market for XPL is suspended, delisted, or otherwise non-tradable before _$TIME_1, or if the event never occurs. Conflicting or ambiguous data will be resolved by prioritizing official exchange publications and archival records. Additionally, the market resolves 'No' if XPL as a tradable cryptocurrency ceases to exist or is officially discontinued before _$TIME_1.

items.title: Paris Saint-Germain wins UEFA Champions League by May 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Paris Saint-Germain _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerParis Saint-Germain@content_dividera professional football club based in Paris, France – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ wins the men's UEFA Champions League _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUEFA Champions League@content_dividerannual continental club football tournament organized by the Union of European Football Associations – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ in the 2025/26 season by official UEFA confirmation by _$TIME_1.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the official UEFA announcement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerUEFA announcement@content_dividerstatement published on the Union of European Football Associations official website or verified UEFA social media)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms Paris Saint-Germain as the Champions League winner on or before _$TIME_1. Verification includes UEFA's official website, UEFA press releases, or corroborated major media reports with dual tier-1 source confirmation.

This market resolves 'No' if no official UEFA confirmation of Paris Saint-Germain winning the 2025/26 Champions League is available by _$TIME_1, if the tournament is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative sources deny PSG’s victory. Conflicts in reports are resolved by prioritizing UEFA official communications. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the tournament or match never occurred.

items.title: Bitcoin dominance < 38% with altcoin rise by April 30, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin dominance, defined as the percentage of total cryptocurrency market capitalization represented by Bitcoin, falls below 38% by _$TIME_1 and whether a measurable altcoin price rise relative to Bitcoin occurs within 7 days after this drop, using data from authoritative crypto market data platforms.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Bitcoin dominance falls below 38% by _$TIME_1 as confirmed by official cryptocurrency data aggregators such as CoinGecko or CoinMarketCap _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin dominance@content_dividerpercentage of total crypto market cap represented by Bitcoin – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and if an altcoin market capitalization increase relative to Bitcoin is observed within 7 days following the dominance drop, verified by published historical data or official platform archives available at URLs: https://www.coingecko.com/en/charts/bitcoin-dominance and https://coinmarketcap.com/charts/ by _$TIME_1.

This market resolves 'No' if Bitcoin dominance does not fall below 38% by _$TIME_1, if no measurable altcoin price rise relative to Bitcoin occurs within 7 days after such a drop, if the event is cancelled or data is unavailable, or if authoritative verification is absent or contradictory. Conflicting data will be resolved by prioritizing official platform data and archived snapshots via Internet Archive. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event or measurement methodology does not exist or is not applicable.

items.title: Warden Protocol Token Generation Event by November 30, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Warden Protocol _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerWarden Protocol@content_divideran AI-native Layer 1 blockchain enabling intelligent decentralized applications – source:https://wardenprotocol.io/)_$ANNOTATION$_ conducts its Token Generation Event (TGE) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerToken Generation Event@content_dividerthe initial issuance or launch of blockchain tokens to the public or investors – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 as confirmed by official public announcements or a token launch on the Warden mainnet, verified through authoritative sources and backup methods.
