This market resolves 'Yes' if at any point on or before _$TIME_1 an official ranking from CoinMarketCap _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerCoinMarketCap@content_dividera leading cryptocurrency market data provider – https://coinmarketcap.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or Kraken _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerKraken@content_dividera major cryptocurrency exchange and market data provider – https://www.kraken.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ shows SUI positioned in the top 10 by market capitalization. Verification requires screenshots, archived pages, or official API data snapshots published by these platforms. Backup confirmation through at least one other major crypto market data aggregator (e.g., CoinGecko) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerCoinGecko@content_dividercryptocurrency price, market cap, and volume data platform – https://www.coingecko.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ is acceptable.

This market resolves 'No' if SUI is not ranked in the top 10 by market capitalization on or before _$TIME_1, if the ranking event is cancelled, or if reliable verification data from authoritative sources is unavailable. In case of conflicting data, official CoinMarketCap rankings take precedence, followed by Kraken and then CoinGecko. Additionally, resolves 'No' if SUI ceases to exist as a tradable cryptocurrency or if the market data platforms officially remove or delist SUI before _$TIME_1.

items.title: Sui launches suiUSDe and USDi stablecoins by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Sui officially launches the suiUSDe and USDi stablecoins on its network by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerSui@content_dividera blockchain platform and ecosystem for decentralized applications and assets – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to announcements from Sui Group or Ethena Labs, with suiUSDe defined as a yield-bearing synthetic dollar stablecoin and USDi as a backed stablecoin.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official announcements confirming the launch of both suiUSDe and USDi stablecoins are published by Sui Group or Ethena Labs by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividerformal statements released on company websites or verified social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification includes direct publication on official websites https://suigroup.com, https://ethenalabs.io or verified social media and may be supplemented by major media reports citing these sources.

This market resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation occurs by _$TIME_1, if the launch is explicitly cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if only one stablecoin launches, or if verification data is unavailable or contradictory. In case of conflict, official Sui Group or Ethena Labs sources prevail. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the stablecoins do not exist, are rebranded, or launched on different networks.

items.title: RISE Chain mainnet launch by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether RISE Chain _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerRISE Chain@content_divideran Ethereum Layer 2 blockchain platform designed to deliver high-performance and scalability – sourced from official RISE Chain documentation)_$ANNOTATION$_ launches its mainnet _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividermainnet launch@content_dividerthe official deployment of a blockchain network enabling live transactions and decentralised operations – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on or before _$TIME_1 according to official announcements from RISE Chain or verified investor communications.

Resolves 'Yes' if an explicit mainnet launch confirmation is published by RISE Chain's official channels _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerofficial channels@content_dividercompany website, verified social media accounts such as RISE Chain's official X account)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified investor announcements by _$TIME_1. Confirmation requires a public statement or documentation clearly indicating mainnet activation accessible at official URLs or archived sources.

Resolves 'No' if no verifiable mainnet launch confirmation is available by _$TIME_1, if the launch is cancelled, indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative sources explicitly deny occurrence. In case of conflicting information, priority is given to direct official statements. This market also resolves 'No' if RISE Chain never intended or never existed as a mainnet project by the deadline.

items.title: Prediction markets top onchain trading volume by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether prediction markets _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerPrediction markets@content_dividermarkets where participants trade contracts based on event outcomes – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ become the highest onchain trading volume category _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOnchain trading volume@content_dividertotal value of trades executed and recorded on a blockchain network, measured in stablecoin equivalents – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on all blockchain platforms by _$TIME_1, based on cumulative USDC or equivalent stablecoin volumes recorded onchain.

Resolves 'Yes' if authoritative onchain analytics providers or blockchain explorers _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOnchain analytics providers@content_dividerentities offering comprehensive blockchain transaction and volume data, e.g., Dune Analytics, Nansen, Chainalysis)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm prediction markets hold the highest cumulative onchain trading volume category by _$TIME_1, validated by primary data from multiple independent sources with publicly accessible dashboards or reports.

Resolves 'No' if no such confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if the data shows another category surpasses prediction markets in cumulative stablecoin trading volume, if prediction markets trading volume data is unavailable or unverifiable, or if the category is officially redefined or discontinued. Conflicts resolve by prioritizing primary source data and archival snapshots. Additionally, resolves 'No' if prediction markets never existed as a significant category onchain by _$TIME_1.

items.title: T1 wins 2025 League of Legends Worlds by November 9?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the esports team T1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerT1@content_dividerprofessional South Korean esports organization specializing in League of Legends – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ wins the 2025 League of Legends Season 15 World Championship _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerLeague of Legends Season 15 World Championship@content_dividerthe final tournament of the 2025 professional League of Legends competitive season organized by Riot Games – official Riot Games)_$ANNOTATION$_ as officially announced at the event conclusion, with winner determined by Riot Games _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerRiot Games@content_dividerdeveloper and publisher of League of Legends responsible for organizing the World Championship – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, by _$TIME_1.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Riot Games officially declares T1 as the champion of the 2025 Worlds by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOfficial Riot Games announcement@content_dividerthe winner announcement made on Riot’s official website, Riot’s verified social media, or during the event broadcast)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification may be supplemented by major esports media outlets reporting with tier-1 source confirmation or verified video footage from the event concluding by _$TIME_1.

This market resolves 'No' if no official announcement confirming T1 as the winner is made by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, if Riot Games officially declares a different champion, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicting reports will be resolved prioritizing Riot Games’ official sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event does not occur or T1 does not participate.

items.title: BNB surpasses ETH market cap by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Binance Coin's (BNB) market capitalization exceeds Ethereum's (ETH) market capitalization at any time on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMarket capitalization@content_dividerthe total market value of a cryptocurrency's circulating supply calculated as price multiplied by circulating units – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, using aggregated exchange data converted to USD at end of day UTC.

Resolves 'Yes' if verified official data from at least two reputable cryptocurrency data aggregators such as CoinMarketCap _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCoinMarketCap@content_dividera leading cryptocurrency market data provider offering price and capitalization data – https://coinmarketcap.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or CoinGecko _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerCoinGecko@content_dividera cryptocurrency data aggregator providing price and market cap metrics – https://coingecko.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm BNB market cap exceeded ETH market cap at any point by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'No' if no such market cap surpass event is confirmed by _$TIME_1, if data is unavailable or insufficient, if exchanges cease reporting market cap data, or if the event never occurred. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing primary source aggregators. Additionally, resolves 'No' if either token is delisted or permanently suspended before _$TIME_1.

items.title: Pump.fun token > $6 by October 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Pump.fun token price exceeds $6 USD according to the closing price on major cryptocurrency exchanges by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerPump.fun token@content_dividera cryptocurrency token available on exchanges such as Kraken, Coinbase, and Bybit – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, using price data aggregated from Coinbase, Kraken, and Bybit.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the official closing price of Pump.fun token is strictly greater than $6 USD on any one of the major exchanges Coinbase, Kraken, or Bybit by _$TIME_1, as confirmed by official exchange data published on their websites or verified APIs _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial exchange data@content_dividerprice information directly from exchange websites or verified APIs – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_. Confirmation from at least two independent major exchanges or a single authoritative aggregated price feed with archival evidence is required.

This market resolves 'No' if the token price does not exceed $6 USD on any major exchange by _$TIME_1, if Pump.fun is delisted, trading is halted indefinitely, or if authoritative price data is unavailable or insufficient for verification. Conflicting data will be resolved prioritizing official exchange sources and archived snapshots. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the Pump.fun token ceases to exist, is permanently removed from all major exchanges, or never listed by the deadline.

items.title: Avalanche top 5 TVL blockchain by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Avalanche blockchain ranks among the top 5 Layer-1 blockchains by total value locked (TVL) in USD as reported by authoritative decentralized finance analytics sources by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerTotal value locked (TVL)@content_dividerthe total value of assets deposited in a blockchain ecosystem’s smart contracts, measured in USD – Tangem.com)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if at least two independent authoritative DeFi analytics platforms such as Token Terminal _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerToken Terminal@content_dividera provider of blockchain ecosystem metrics and analytics – tokenterminal.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ and Tangem.com _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerTangem.com@content_dividera blockchain analytics and wallet services platform reporting TVL data – https://tangem.com/en/blog/post/total-value-locked-tvl/)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm Avalanche is ranked within the top 5 Layer-1 blockchains by TVL in USD at the end of day UTC on _$TIME_1, with rankings based on ecosystem-wide TVL comparisons.

Resolves 'No' if Avalanche is not in the top 5 by TVL at end of day UTC on _$TIME_1, if authoritative sources explicitly report cancellation or indefinite suspension of Avalanche TVL tracking, if data is unavailable or unverified by the deadline, or if Avalanche blockchain ceases to exist or is delisted from major TVL rankings. Conflicts are resolved by prioritizing official data from Token Terminal and Tangem.com archives. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never existed or is fundamentally misdefined.

items.title: LCK outperform LPL at 2025 Worlds by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the LCK _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerLCK@content_dividerLeague of Legends Champions Korea: South Korea's premier professional League of Legends esports league – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ outperforms the LPL _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerLPL@content_dividerLeague of Legends Pro League: China's top professional League of Legends esports league – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ at the 2025 League of Legends World Championship according to official match outcomes and standings published by Riot Games _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerRiot Games@content_dividerRiot Games: developer and organizer of League of Legends esports tournaments – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ with performance measured by higher placement or more series wins at Worlds 2025, resolved by Riot Games official announcements by _$TIME_1.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the LCK achieves a strictly higher final placement or wins more series than the LPL at the 2025 World Championship, as confirmed by Riot Games official results published on their website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOfficial Riot Games results@content_dividerhttps://lolesports.com/ and official Riot social media)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Verification may be supplemented by major esports media outlets with dual tier-1 source confirmation or archived official match statistics.

This market resolves 'No' if the LCK does not outperform the LPL by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. In cases of conflicting data, Riot Games official results take precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the 2025 Worlds event does not occur or if either league does not participate.

items.title: BNB ≥ $2000 by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Binance Coin (BNB) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBinance Coin@content_dividera cryptocurrency issued by Binance exchange and used for transaction fees and other purposes – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ closes at or above $2,000 USD on any major exchange as aggregated by CoinGecko _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCoinGecko@content_dividercryptocurrency price aggregation platform providing market data – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or Nasdaq _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerNasdaq@content_divideran American stock exchange and market data provider – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ at or before _$TIME_1. Price is based on official closing prices in USD from these sources.

This market resolves 'Yes' if verified closing price data from CoinGecko or Nasdaq shows BNB closing at or above $2,000 USD on any date on or before _$TIME_1. Verification requires published historical price data available at https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/binancecoin/history and https://www.nasdaq.com/market-activity/cryptocurrency/bnb by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes archived data from Internet Archive and other reputable crypto market data aggregators.

This market resolves 'No' if no closing price at or above $2,000 USD is confirmed by _$TIME_1, if official price data sources are unavailable or contradict the condition, or if BNB trading is suspended or delisted before _$TIME_1. In case of conflicting data, priority is given to CoinGecko and Nasdaq official data. Additionally, resolves 'No' if BNB ceases to exist or is delisted prior to _$TIME_1 without reaching the price threshold.

items.title: Roddy Ricch The Navy Album release by December 5, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Roddy Ricch _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerRoddy Ricch@content_dividerAmerican rapper and singer – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ officially releases the album titled 'The Navy Album' _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerThe Navy Album@content_dividera music album by Roddy Ricch, planned as his third studio album – verified label announcements)_$ANNOTATION$_ on or before _$TIME_1 according to official label or artist communications.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official announcement or release confirmation from Atlantic Records _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerAtlantic Records@content_dividerAmerican record label headquartered in Los Angeles, California – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or Roddy Ricch's verified social media _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerverified social media@content_dividerofficial artist accounts with platform verification badges)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms the album release by _$TIME_1, or if the album becomes publicly available on recognized music platforms (e.g., Spotify, Apple Music) as verified by authoritative digital distributors.

Resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation or verified release occurs by _$TIME_1, if the album is officially postponed or cancelled beyond this date, or if verification sources are unavailable or contradictory. This market also resolves 'No' if the album does not exist, is rebranded under a different title, or is fundamentally different from the specified album. Conflicting information will be resolved prioritizing official label and artist communications. Non-existence or cancellation announcements by authoritative sources confirm 'No'.

items.title: Monad completes MON token airdrop claim by November 3, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Monad users complete the MON token airdrop claim process by verifying eligibility and claiming MON tokens through the official Monad claim portal by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMON token airdrop claim process@content_dividerusers verifying eligibility and claiming MON tokens via the official Monad claim portal – official Monad documentation)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to the official Monad Foundation announcements and verified official portal data.

Resolves 'Yes' if official Monad Foundation sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerMonad Foundation@content_dividerthe organization managing Monad blockchain development and token distribution – official Monad website)_$ANNOTATION$_ or the official Monad claim portal _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerofficial Monad claim portal@content_dividerthe designated web platform for MON token claims announced by Monad)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm by _$TIME_1 that the airdrop claim process is fully completed, defined as all eligible users having verified eligibility and claimed their MON tokens, with verification through archived announcements or blockchain transaction data related to airdrop claims.

Resolves 'No' if the claim process is not confirmed complete by _$TIME_1, if the airdrop is officially cancelled, indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if reliable verification from official Monad sources or the claim portal is unavailable by the deadline. Conflicting information is resolved prioritizing official Monad Foundation publications. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the airdrop or claim process never existed or was not initiated.

items.title: John Cena x Randy Orton final match in St Louis by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether John Cena and Randy Orton wrestle a final match together in St. Louis, Missouri before or on _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerFinal match@content_dividerthe last professional wrestling match between the two wrestlers – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to official WWE event announcements and match records.

Resolves 'Yes' if WWE officially confirms via its website or verified social media _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerWWE@content_dividerWorld Wrestling Entertainment, Inc.: a professional wrestling promotion company – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ that John Cena and Randy Orton wrestled a final match billed as their last encounter in St. Louis by _$TIME_1, including any matches up to and including Backlash 2025 and any additional official final matches thereafter, with verification from WWE event results or at least two major tier-1 media reports _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerTier-1 media@content_dividermajor established news organizations with editorial standards)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation or match record exists by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled, postponed indefinitely, if either wrestler is unavailable, if the match occurs outside St. Louis, or if WWE explicitly denies such a final match. Conflicting reports resolve by prioritizing official WWE sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never existed or no match occurred between the two wrestlers meeting these criteria.

items.title: Bruno Fernandes first goal vs Liverpool by May 2, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bruno Fernandes _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBruno Fernandes@content_dividerPortuguese professional footballer playing as a midfielder for Manchester United – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ scores the first goal _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerFirst goal@content_dividerthe first goal scored in the match by Bruno Fernandes – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ in the next scheduled Manchester United vs Liverpool match according to official Premier League _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerPremier League@content_dividertop professional football division in England – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ match reports and broadcast records by _$TIME_1.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official Premier League match reports _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOfficial Premier League match reports@content_dividermatch result and statistics published on premierleague.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified broadcast records confirm Bruno Fernandes scored the first goal by _$TIME_1. Verification includes alternative confirmation via archived video footage or multiple major verified sports media reports _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerBackup sources@content_dividerreputable sports broadcasters and websites with dual source confirmation)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'No' if Bruno Fernandes does not score the first goal, if the match is cancelled or postponed beyond _$TIME_1, if official verification is unavailable or contradictory, or if the match never occurs. Conflicting reports are resolved prioritizing official Premier League data. Also resolves 'No' if the scheduled match does not exist or is never played.

items.title: Rayan Cherki scores more goals than Florian Wirtz by May 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Rayan Cherki scores more official league goals than Florian Wirtz during the 2025/26 football season by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerRayan Cherki@content_dividerFrench professional footballer playing as an attacking midfielder or forward – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerFlorian Wirtz@content_dividerGerman professional footballer playing as an attacking midfielder – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, with goal counts based on official league statistics from FBref.com and Transfermarkt.com _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial league statistics@content_dividerverified player goal totals published by league authorities and aggregated by FBref.com and Transfermarkt.com)_$ANNOTATION$_. The season end is defined as the last match day on or before _$TIME_1 in European leagues operating under CET/CEST timezones.

This market resolves to 'Yes' if Rayan Cherki's official league goal tally exceeds Florian Wirtz's by _$TIME_1, confirmed by published statistics on FBref.com _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerFBref.com@content_dividera trusted football statistics website providing official league data – https://fbref.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or Transfermarkt.com _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerTransfermarkt.com@content_dividera reputable football database with verified player statistics – https://transfermarkt.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ by that date. Backup verification includes archived snapshots of these sites or official league publications.

This market resolves to 'No' if Rayan Cherki does not have more official league goals than Florian Wirtz by _$TIME_1, if the season is cancelled or indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, if official statistics are unavailable or unverifiable, or if either player does not participate in the 2025/26 season. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing official league sources and FBref.com. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event (2025/26 season) does not exist or never occurs.

items.title: Manchester United finish above 8th place in 2025/26 Premier League by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Manchester United finishes in a league position from 1st through 7th inclusive in the official 2025/26 Premier League final standings according to Premier League publications and credible sports authorities by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerPremier League@content_dividerthe top tier professional football league in England contested by 20 clubs annually – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the official final Premier League standings published on the Premier League website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerPremier League official site@content_dividerhttps://www.premierleague.com/stats/standings)_$ANNOTATION$_ or an equivalent authoritative sports body confirm Manchester United's position as 1st to 7th by _$TIME_1. Verification may also use archived standings via the Internet Archive or major sports media with dual tier-1 source confirmation.

This market resolves 'No' if Manchester United finishes 8th or lower in the final official standings, if the Premier League season is cancelled, indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if no authoritative verification confirming a top 7 finish is available by _$TIME_1. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing Premier League official publications. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the 2025/26 Premier League season does not take place or if Manchester United does not participate.

items.title: Ethereum > $5,000 by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the USD price of Ethereum _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerEthereum@content_dividera decentralized open-source blockchain featuring smart contract functionality – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches or exceeds $5,000 on any major global exchange by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ . Price data is based on closing or intraday trading prices converted to USD equivalent as reported by reputable price feed aggregators or recognized market platforms.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official price feeds _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerPrice feed@content_dividera data service providing aggregated asset prices from multiple exchanges – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified exchange data confirm Ethereum trades at or above $5,000 USD at any point on or before _$TIME_1, with confirmation from sources such as CoinMarketCap, CoinGecko, Binance, Coinbase, or other tier-1 exchanges _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerAuthoritative sources@content_dividerhttps://coinmarketcap.com, https://coingecko.com, https://binance.com, https://coinbase.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ . Backup verification includes archived snapshots from Internet Archive or official exchange historical data repositories.

This market resolves 'No' if Ethereum does not reach $5,000 USD on any major exchange by _$TIME_1, if trading is halted or exchanges delist Ethereum before the deadline, if price data is unavailable or unverifiable, or if the event never occurs. Conflicting data resolves following the highest-priority authoritative source hierarchy and fallback archival methods. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Ethereum ceases trading or the price metric is fundamentally unavailable.

items.title: Ethereum price ≥ $4,000 by October 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Ethereum (ETH) cryptocurrency price reaches or exceeds $4,000 USD at any time on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerEthereum@content_dividera decentralized open-source blockchain platform with smart contract functionality – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUSD@content_dividerUnited States Dollar, the official currency of the United States of America – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, based on aggregated closing price data from major cryptocurrency exchanges Binance and CoinCodex.

Resolves 'Yes' if official price data from Binance _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerBinance@content_dividera major global cryptocurrency exchange platform – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or CoinCodex _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerCoinCodex@content_dividera cryptocurrency market data aggregator and analytics platform – CoinCodex official website)_$ANNOTATION$_ shows ETH price reaching $4,000 USD or higher at any 1-minute candle close on or before _$TIME_1. Verification requires price charts or API data snapshots accessible at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/ETH_USDT and https://coincodex.com/coin/ethereum/ by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'No' if no verified price at or above $4,000 USD is recorded by _$TIME_1, if market data is unavailable or cancelled, or if official sources confirm non-occurrence. In case of conflicting data, Binance's official data takes precedence. This market also resolves 'No' if Ethereum trading or pricing data does not exist or is suspended before _$TIME_1.

items.title: BTC > $150,000 by October 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin's (BTC) closing price in USD reaches or exceeds $150,000 at any time during October 1 to October 31, 2025 inclusive, based on aggregated closing prices from major cryptocurrency exchanges _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividera digital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCryptocurrency exchange@content_dividera digital marketplace for buying and selling cryptocurrencies – Oxford Dictionary)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if at least one official major cryptocurrency exchange _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerMajor cryptocurrency exchange@content_dividera widely recognized and high-volume crypto trading platform such as Coinbase, Binance, Kraken, or Bitstamp – industry standard)_$ANNOTATION$_ reports a closing price for Bitcoin equal to or greater than $150,000 USD on any day between _$TIME_1 and _$TIME_2 inclusive, verified by official published exchange data or archival snapshots by _$TIME_3 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerExchange data verification@content_dividerprice data posted on official exchange websites or via reputable financial data providers)_$ANNOTATION$_. Backup verification includes Internet Archive captures and corroboration from at least two independent major exchanges.

This market resolves 'No' if no verified closing price reaches or exceeds $150,000 USD during the specified timeframe, if all relevant exchanges suspend trading or delist Bitcoin, or if data is unavailable or unverified by _$TIME_3. Conflicting data will be resolved by prioritizing official exchange publications followed by authoritative financial data aggregators. The market also resolves 'No' if Bitcoin or the specified exchanges cease to exist or trading is halted before or during the period.

items.title: Federal Reserve rate decision by October 29, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Federal Reserve officially announces its October 2025 federal funds target rate decision by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerFederal Reserve@content_dividerthe central banking system of the United States responsible for monetary policy – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerFederal Open Market Committee (FOMC)@content_dividerthe Federal Reserve System's principal monetary policymaking body – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, as confirmed through official Federal Reserve press releases and FOMC calendars.

This market resolves 'Yes' if an official Federal Reserve press release _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerPress release@content_divideran official public statement issued by an organization – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or the Federal Reserve's FOMC meeting calendar _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerFOMC calendar@content_dividerthe published schedule of Federal Open Market Committee meetings and announcements – Federal Reserve)_$ANNOTATION$_ explicitly confirms the October 2025 rate decision announcement by _$TIME_1. Verification includes checking the Federal Reserve website URLs https://www.federalreserve.gov/newsevents/pressreleases.htm and https://www.federalreserve.gov/monetarypolicy/fomccalendars.htm, or archived versions if unavailable.

This market resolves 'No' if no official announcement or confirmation occurs by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed beyond this deadline, or if authoritative verification sources are inaccessible or inconclusive. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing direct Federal Reserve sources. Additionally, this market resolves 'No' if the rate decision event does not exist or never took place as scheduled.

items.title: Solana price ≥ $245 by October 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Solana (SOL) cryptocurrency price reaches or closes at or above $245 USD on any major exchange by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerSolana@content_dividera high-performance blockchain platform and its native cryptocurrency token – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_; price is recorded in USD at market close per authoritative exchange data.

Resolves 'Yes' if Solana’s closing price equals or exceeds $245.00 USD on any recognized major cryptocurrency exchange _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerMajor exchanges@content_dividercryptocurrency trading platforms such as Coinbase, Binance, Kraken, or Binance.US with verified real-time price data)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Confirmation requires official exchange price records or aggregated data from CoinMarketCap _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerCoinMarketCap@content_dividera leading cryptocurrency market data aggregator – https://coinmarketcap.com/)_$ANNOTATION$_ or CoinGecko, accessible at settlement.

Resolves 'No' if Solana’s closing price never reaches $245.00 USD on any major exchange by _$TIME_1, if trading is halted or Solana is delisted before the deadline, if official data is unavailable or unverifiable by settlement, or if the event never occurs. Conflicting data resolves to 'No' absent authoritative verification. Market closes 'No' if Solana’s price is below $245.00 USD at all times before or on _$TIME_1.

items.title: Grok best AI model by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Grok _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerGrok@content_divideran AI language model developed by xAI, offering real-time data integration and conversational capabilities – Techpoint)_$ANNOTATION$_ achieves the highest arena score on the Chatbot Arena LLM Leaderboard _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerChatbot Arena LLM Leaderboard@content_divideran official ranking platform comparing large language model performance in interactive benchmarks – primary source)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'Yes' if Grok is ranked first with the highest arena score on the official Chatbot Arena LLM Leaderboard as published on the leaderboard website or official xAI communication _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial source@content_dividerhttps://chatbotarena.com or https://grok.x.ai)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, verified by archive snapshots or tier-1 media reporting with explicit leaderboard confirmation.

Resolves 'No' if Grok is not ranked first on the leaderboard by _$TIME_1, if the leaderboard data is unavailable, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is absent. Conflicting data resolves by prioritizing official leaderboard publication and xAI official statements. Also resolves 'No' if the Chatbot Arena or leaderboard does not exist or is discontinued before the deadline.

items.title: Hyperliquid daily fees > $8M by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Hyperliquid's daily fees _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerdaily fees@content_dividerthe total fee revenue accrued in a single day – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ exceed $8,000,000 USD on any day between July 15 and December 31, 2025 according to DefiLlama's 'Fees by protocol version' daily data visualization.

Resolves 'Yes' if any daily fee bar for Hyperliquid _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerHyperliquid@content_dividera decentralized finance (DeFi) platform with an on-chain order book and fee revenue metrics – DefiLlama)_$ANNOTATION$_ exceeds $8 million USD as shown on DefiLlama's official 'Fees by protocol version' daily bar chart and is finalized after January 1, 2026 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerDefiLlama URL@content_dividerhttps://defillama.com/protocols)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if no daily fee exceeds $8 million USD by _$TIME_1, if the event or data series is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if DefiLlama data is unavailable or unverifiable. Conflicting or missing data will be resolved by prioritizing archived DefiLlama data or secondary verified aggregators. Also resolves 'No' if Hyperliquid fees data does not exist or the protocol ceases operation before the deadline.

items.title: Donald Trump meets Xi Jinping by October 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether a formal in-person meeting between President Donald Trump _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerDonald Trump@content_divider45th President of the United States of America (2017–2021) – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and Chinese President Xi Jinping _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerXi Jinping@content_dividerGeneral Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party and President of the People's Republic of China – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ occurs on or before _$TIME_1 during the 2025 APEC summit in Seoul, South Korea _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerAPEC summit@content_dividerAnnual Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation meeting attended by heads of state – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, as confirmed by official statements and major verified media reports.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official US Treasury statements _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerUS Treasury statements@content_dividerPublic communications from the United States Department of the Treasury – https://home.treasury.gov)_$ANNOTATION$_ or Reuters news agency _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerReuters news agency@content_dividerInternational news organization with global editorial standards – https://www.reuters.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm the meeting occurred by _$TIME_1. Verification includes official government announcements, press releases, or Reuters verified reporting explicitly stating the meeting took place at APEC or in South Korea by the deadline.

This market resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if the meeting is cancelled, indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, if the event never existed or was never scheduled, or if verifiable authoritative sources are unavailable or contradictory. In case of conflicting reports, official US government sources have resolution priority. Additionally, this market resolves 'No' if the meeting does not occur as specified.

items.title: Satoshi Nakamoto Bitcoin movement by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether any Bitcoin _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividera digital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ held in wallets labeled as Satoshi Nakamoto _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerSatoshi Nakamoto@content_dividerthe pseudonymous creator of Bitcoin estimated to hold ~1.1 million BTC – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ is moved through outgoing or swap transactions as recorded on Arkham's Intel Explorer _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerArkham's Intel Explorer@content_dividera blockchain analytics platform labeling wallets and transactions – Arkham official site)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1.

This market resolves 'Yes' if any outgoing or swap transaction _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOutgoing transaction@content_dividera blockchain transfer sending coins out of a wallet – Merriam-Webster; Swap transaction: exchanging tokens on-chain)_$ANNOTATION$_ from wallets labeled as Satoshi Nakamoto on Arkham's Intel Explorer is verified by _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerVerification sources@content_dividerthe Arkham's Intel Explorer website https://arkhamintelligence.com/explorer and blockchain transaction records)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Backup confirmation may include major blockchain analytics firms or multiple tier-1 cryptocurrency news outlets reporting verified wallet activity.

This market resolves 'No' if no such transaction is confirmed by _$TIME_1, if wallet movements are officially refuted or unverifiable, or if Arkham's Intel Explorer data is unavailable or insufficient for verification. If conflicting data arises, priority is given to Arkham's official records and corroborated blockchain data. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event of wallet movement does not occur or if the wallets do not exist as labeled.

items.title: US government Bitcoin reserves by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the United States government holds any Bitcoin _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividera digital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ in its official reserves during the period from January 1 to December 31, 2025, as confirmed by official disclosures of the US Treasury or White House and custodial wallet documentation.

This market resolves 'Yes' if any official US Treasury or White House publication _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial US Treasury or White House publication@content_dividerstatements, reports, or filings published on official government websites https://home.treasury.gov or https://www.whitehouse.gov)_$ANNOTATION$_ or custodial wallet records publicly documented and verifiable confirm the US government held Bitcoin at any time during 2025 by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes major tier-1 media reports with dual source confirmation or publicly accessible custodial wallet snapshots authenticated by government agencies.

This market resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation appears by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially denied, cancelled, or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory. Conflicts are resolved by prioritizing direct official government sources. This market also resolves 'No' if the US government never held Bitcoin in reserves during 2025 or if custodial wallets lack verifiable government association.

items.title: US government Bitcoin reserves by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the United States government holds any Bitcoin _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividera digital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ in its official reserves during the period from January 1 to December 31, 2025, as confirmed by official disclosures of the US Treasury or White House and custodial wallet documentation.

Backup verification includes major tier-1 media reports with dual source confirmation or publicly accessible custodial wallet snapshots authenticated by government agencies.

This market resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation appears by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially denied, cancelled, or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory. Conflicts are resolved by prioritizing direct official government sources. This market also resolves 'No' if the US government never held Bitcoin in reserves during 2025 or if custodial wallets lack verifiable government association.

items.title: U.S. 100% tariffs on all BRICS by April 30, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the U.S. government formally imposes a 100% tariff _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividertariff@content_dividera tax or duty to be paid on a particular class of imports or exports – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on imports from all BRICS countries _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerBRICS countries@content_dividerBrazil, Russia, India, China, and South Africa – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 according to official U.S. government trade or Treasury Department announcements.

This market resolves 'Yes' if an official announcement or regulatory filing from the U.S. Trade Representative or U.S. Department of the Treasury _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerU.S. Department of Treasury@content_dividerthe executive agency responsible for promoting economic prosperity and ensuring the financial security of the United States – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms the imposition of a 100% tariff on all imports from all BRICS countries by _$TIME_1. Verification includes official federal registers, government press releases, or direct statements on official government websites, with backup confirmation from major tier-1 media reporting with at least two independent confirmations.

This market resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if the tariff imposition is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if the tariff rate is below 100% for any BRICS country, or if authoritative sources are unavailable or contradict the claim. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official government publications and regulatory filings. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the tariff imposition event never existed or was never planned.

items.title: DOGE federal spending reduction > $60B by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerDepartment of Government Efficiency@content_dividera US federal agency focused on reducing government spending – doge.gov)_$ANNOTATION$_ reduces federal government spending by at least $60 billion USD through verified contract terminations and grant cancellations by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official government records from FPDS.gov _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerFederal Procurement Data System@content_dividerofficial US federal contract data repository – fpds.gov)_$ANNOTATION$_ and DOGE.gov _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerdoge.gov@content_dividerofficial DOGE website reporting savings data)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm cumulative spending reductions of $60 billion USD or more from terminated contracts and grants by _$TIME_1. Verification requires published termination records or grant cancellation data with verifiable dollar amounts accessible at these official sources or credible archival repositories.

This market resolves 'No' if the $60 billion USD threshold is not met by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if authoritative data sources are unavailable or incomplete by deadline, or if the event never existed. Conflicting or incomplete data defaults to 'No'. Additionally, if DOGE’s spending reduction claims cannot be substantiated by FPDS.gov or DOGE.gov records by _$TIME_1, the market resolves 'No'.

items.title: Fluent 4.0 addon release compatible with Blender 4.4 by April 30, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Fluent releases version 4.0 addon _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerFluent 4.0 addon@content_dividera software extension module named Fluent version 4.0 designed to integrate with Blender 4.4 – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ fully compatible with Blender 4.4 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerBlender 4.4@content_dividerBlender version 4.4, a 3D computer graphics software suite – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 according to official Fluent developer announcements or Blender.org addon compatibility lists.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official Fluent developer communications _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial Fluent developer announcements@content_dividerstatements on Fluent’s official website or verified social media)_$ANNOTATION$_ or Blender.org addon compatibility listings _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerBlender.org addon compatibility lists@content_dividerofficial Blender Foundation published addon compatibility documents)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm release of Fluent 4.0 addon with full functional support of Blender 4.4 by _$TIME_1. Verification includes published release notes or addon repository entries explicitly stating compatibility.

This market resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation is available by _$TIME_1, if the release is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if Fluent 4.0 addon is incompatible or partially compatible with Blender 4.4, or if authoritative verification sources are unavailable or conflicting. In data disputes, official Fluent developer sources take precedence. The market also resolves 'No' if the event never existed or the addon version 4.0 is never released.

items.title: BTC > $200,000 by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin (BTC) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividera digital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ surpasses a price of $200,000 USD _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUSD@content_dividerUnited States Dollar, official currency of the United States – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on any major cryptocurrency exchange closing price in USD on or before _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'Yes' if any major cryptocurrency exchange _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividercryptocurrency exchange@content_divideran online platform for buying, selling, and trading cryptocurrencies – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reports Bitcoin closing price above $200,000 USD by _$TIME_1, confirmed by official exchange data published on exchange websites or verified financial data aggregators such as CoinMarketCap or Coinbase Pro, with backup confirmation from at least one additional independent major exchange.

Resolves 'No' if Bitcoin does not reach or exceed $200,000 USD on any major exchange closing price by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or trading is indefinitely halted, or if authoritative price data is unavailable or unverifiable. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing official exchange API data and major financial data aggregators. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Bitcoin trading or price measurement does not exist or is discontinued prior to _$TIME_1.

items.title: BNB > $1500 by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Binance Coin (BNB) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBinance Coin (BNB)@content_dividera cryptocurrency token issued by Binance exchange – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches or exceeds a price of $1,500 USD _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUSD@content_dividerUnited States dollar, official currency of the United States – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ based on real-time spot market price data on Binance Exchange _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerBinance Exchange@content_dividerleading global cryptocurrency exchange platform – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1.

This market resolves 'Yes' if any recorded spot trade price or official candlestick data _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerspot market price@content_dividerprice for immediate settlement and delivery – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ for BNB on Binance Exchange reaches or exceeds $1,500 USD at any time on or before _$TIME_1, as verified from Binance’s official API endpoints _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerBinance API@content_dividerapplication programming interface providing real-time and historical market data from Binance exchange – Binance Developer Documentation https://binance-docs.github.io/apidocs/spot/en/)_$ANNOTATION$_ or Binance’s official website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=6@counter_dividerBinance official website@content_dividerhttps://www.binance.com/en)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'No' if BNB price never reaches $1,500 USD on Binance spot market by _$TIME_1, if Binance Exchange suspends BNB trading permanently or indefinitely before _$TIME_1, if Binance Coin is delisted, or if official price data is unavailable or unverifiable by _$TIME_1. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing Binance official API and website data. Additionally, resolves 'No' if BNB or Binance Exchange ceases to exist or never traded by the deadline.

items.title: BTC > $200,000 by March 16, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividera decentralized digital currency without a central bank or single administrator, used as a medium of exchange – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches or exceeds a USD price level of $200,000 according to credible Bitcoin spot price indices by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'Yes' if any credible Bitcoin spot price index such as the CF Bitcoin Real-Time Index _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCF Bitcoin Real-Time Index@content_dividera widely recognized real-time Bitcoin price benchmark by Crypto Facilities – official company site https://www.cryptocommodityexchange.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ reports a Bitcoin price ≥ $200,000 USD at any time on or before _$TIME_1. Verification requires archived or live data from the primary index provider or at least one major alternative index with official methodology disclosed.

Resolves 'No' if Bitcoin does not reach $200,000 by _$TIME_1, if all authoritative price sources fail to confirm such a level, if the event is cancelled (Bitcoin ceases trading or is delisted), or if verifiable data is unavailable. Conflicts are resolved prioritizing primary index providers and official exchange data. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Bitcoin or the referenced price index never existed or is discontinued before _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'No' if Bitcoin does not reach $200,000 by _$TIME_1, if all authoritative price sources fail to confirm such a level, if the event is cancelled (Bitcoin ceases trading or is delisted), or if verifiable data is unavailable. Conflicts are resolved prioritizing primary index providers and official exchange data. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Bitcoin or the referenced price index never existed or is discontinued before _$TIME_1.
