items.title: 索拉纳 official Chinese name by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether '索拉纳' _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_divider索拉纳@content_dividerthe Chinese name proposed for the Solana blockchain project – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ will be officially confirmed as the Chinese name for Solana _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerSolana@content_dividera high-performance blockchain platform founded by Anatoly Yakovenko – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by the Solana founder or official Solana social media accounts by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'Yes' if an explicit official announcement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerofficial announcement@content_dividera formal statement or declaration published by an authorized party – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirming '索拉纳' as Solana's Chinese name is published by the Solana founder Anatoly Yakovenko or Solana's verified social media accounts, including the official Solana X (formerly Twitter) account, by _$TIME_1. Verification requires archival access to official Solana channels or major media reports referencing these official sources.

Resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation is available by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if the Solana founder or official accounts explicitly deny the adoption of '索拉纳', or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicting evidence is resolved by prioritizing direct official statements from the founder or Solana's verified social media. Also resolves 'No' if the naming event never occurs or the Chinese name differs from '索拉纳'.

items.title: 2 trading firms bankruptcy by December 31 due to October 10 liquidation?
items.rules:
This market measures whether at least two trading firms _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerTrading firms@content_dividerbusiness entities engaged in buying and selling financial instruments for profit – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ formally announce bankruptcy filings related to the October 10, 2025 liquidation cascade by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerLiquidation cascade@content_dividera rapid series of forced asset sales causing market disruptions on October 10, 2025 – contextual definition)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if at least two distinct trading firms file Chapter 11 bankruptcy petitions _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerChapter 11@content_dividera chapter of the U.S. Bankruptcy Code allowing reorganization under court supervision – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ in U.S. bankruptcy courts by _$TIME_1, with filings explicitly attributing bankruptcy to impacts from the October 10 cascade, verified via the U.S. Bankruptcy Court records and Administrative Office of the U.S. Courts official databases _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerUS Bankruptcy Court filings@content_dividerhttps://pacer.uscourts.gov/ and https://www.uscourts.gov/about-federal-courts/administration-office)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if fewer than two trading firms file Chapter 11 bankruptcy by _$TIME_1, if filings are unrelated to the October 10 event, if filings are officially withdrawn or dismissed before _$TIME_1, or if no verifiable official bankruptcy filings exist by that date. If official sources are inaccessible or conflicting, resolution uses official U.S. bankruptcy court announcements as primary arbiters. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the liquidation cascade event or related bankruptcy filings do not exist.

items.title: Crypto Treasury Companies Delisted by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether any crypto treasury company’s stock is officially removed from Nasdaq or NYSE by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerDelisting@content_dividerthe official removal of a security from a stock exchange – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ as confirmed by exchange announcements or SEC filings according to the official trading calendar end-of-day EST _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerEST@content_dividerEastern Standard Time, UTC-5 hours – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if at least one crypto treasury company is formally delisted from Nasdaq or NYSE by _$TIME_1, verified by official exchange announcements _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerExchange announcements@content_dividerofficial statements published by Nasdaq or New York Stock Exchange – Nasdaq.com, NYSE.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) filings _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerSEC filings@content_dividerpublicly filed documents by companies with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission – SEC.gov)_$ANNOTATION$_. Backup verification includes major financial media reports with corroboration from at least two tier-1 sources or official regulatory disclosures.

Resolves 'No' if no verified delisting occurs by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled, postponed indefinitely, or if authoritative verification is unavailable by the deadline. In cases of conflicting information, priority is given to official exchange and SEC sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if no crypto treasury company is listed or the event never existed.

items.title: EigenLayer (EIGEN) > $4 by November 30, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the closing price of the EigenLayer cryptocurrency token (EIGEN) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerEigenLayer@content_dividera decentralized crypto staking protocol and token – Crypto industry standard)_$ANNOTATION$_ in USD exceeds $4 on November 30, 2025, using official exchange closing prices or authoritative daily price snapshots from major cryptocurrency data aggregators.

Resolves 'Yes' if the official closing price or daily price snapshot of EIGEN in USD is strictly greater than $4 on November 30, 2025, as published by primary sources such as the official EigenLayer website, CoinMarketCap _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCoinMarketCap@content_dividera leading cryptocurrency price tracking website – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, CoinGecko, or major regulated crypto exchanges by _$TIME_1. Alternative confirmation may be obtained through archived exchange data or major financial news outlets with corroborating tier-1 source verification.

Resolves 'No' if the closing price is $4 or below on _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled, the token is delisted, trading is halted indefinitely, or if authoritative price data is unavailable or contradictory by _$TIME_1. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official exchange data and CoinMarketCap/CoinGecko records. This market also resolves 'No' if the EIGEN token does not exist, is discontinued, or if trading never occurred on that day.

items.title: MegaETH mainnet live by November 30, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the MegaETH mainnet _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMegaETH mainnet@content_dividerthe operational, public blockchain network of MegaETH allowing user transactions and smart contract execution – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ is fully launched and publicly accessible by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-11-30T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to official announcements or live deployment status verified via authoritative sources.

Resolves 'Yes' if MegaLabs _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerMegaLabs@content_dividerthe company developing MegaETH blockchain technology – search context)_$ANNOTATION$_ or its official channels _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerofficial channels@content_dividercompany website, verified social media, or official press releases)_$ANNOTATION$_ publish a clear statement or demonstration confirming mainnet launch by _$TIME_1, or if independent blockchain explorers or trusted third parties verify public mainnet operation by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'No' if no authoritative confirmation of mainnet launch is available by _$TIME_1, if official sources announce cancellation, indefinite postponement, or rebranding before _$TIME_1, or if the mainnet is not accessible to public users by _$TIME_1. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official MegaLabs announcements and blockchain data. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the MegaETH mainnet event never existed or was never planned.

items.title: Changpeng Zhao blocks CJ on X by October 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Changpeng Zhao _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerChangpeng Zhao@content_dividerfounder and CEO of Binance cryptocurrency exchange – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ publicly announces blocking user CJ on X _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerX@content_dividersocial media platform formerly known as Twitter – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 according to explicit statements on X by Changpeng Zhao’s verified account.

Resolves 'Yes' if a clear public statement or declaration by Changpeng Zhao from his verified X account _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerverified X account@content_dividerX account officially confirmed by platform verification badges or Binance official site)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms blocking CJ by _$TIME_1. Verification includes direct posts, replies, or pinned tweets explicitly stating the block, accessible via X platform or archived sources such as Internet Archive _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerInternet Archive@content_dividera persistent web archive service – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if no such explicit announcement exists by _$TIME_1, if the event is denied or contradicted by Changpeng Zhao or Binance’s official communication channels, if verification data is unavailable, or if the event never occurred. Conflicting information is resolved prioritizing direct verification from Changpeng Zhao’s official X account and Binance’s official website. This market also resolves 'No' if the blocking event never existed or no public declaration was made.

items.title: Bitcoin new all-time high by October 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin's USD price surpasses $123,352.5, the prior peak recorded on October 9, 2025, using closing prices from major cryptocurrency exchanges by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividerdigital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUSD@content_dividerUnited States Dollar, official currency of the United States – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ .

Resolves 'Yes' if at least one major exchange _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerMajor exchange@content_dividercryptocurrency trading platform with high volume and regulatory recognition, e.g., Coinbase, Binance, Kraken – industry standard)_$ANNOTATION$_ reports a closing price strictly above $123,352.5 USD on or before _$TIME_1, verified by official exchange data published on their websites or trusted financial data aggregators such as CoinMarketCap _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerCoinMarketCap@content_dividercryptocurrency market data provider and price aggregator – CoinMarketCap.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or TradingView _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerTradingView@content_dividerfinancial charting platform providing market data and price charts – TradingView.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ .

Resolves 'No' if Bitcoin does not surpass $123,352.5 USD closing price on any major exchange by _$TIME_1, if major exchanges cease operations or fail to provide verifiable data by that date, or if the market is cancelled or indefinitely postponed. Conflicting price data is resolved by prioritizing exchange official disclosures and CoinMarketCap data. Also resolves 'No' if Bitcoin trading ceases or the cryptocurrency market collapses before _$TIME_1. If verification sources are unavailable or insufficient, resolves 'No'.

items.title: Binance Life price > 2x by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Binance Life (币安人生) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBinance Life@content_dividera cryptocurrency token listed on multiple exchanges – CryptoCompare)_$ANNOTATION$_ doubles in price by _$TIME_1, defined as reaching at least twice its current average market price of approximately $0.38 USD, determined by the volume-weighted average price (VWAP) aggregated from major cryptocurrency exchanges using USD prices.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Binance Life's VWAP equals or exceeds $0.76 USD (2 × $0.38) on any trading day on or before _$TIME_1, as confirmed by official exchange data from at least two major reputable cryptocurrency exchanges _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerMajor cryptocurrency exchanges@content_dividerBinance, Coinbase, Kraken, Bitget, or other top-tier exchanges providing public historical price data – CoinGecko)_$ANNOTATION$_ or Binance Life’s official website or verified social media announcements _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial source confirmation@content_dividerBinance Life or Binance official website or verified Twitter account)_$ANNOTATION$_. Backup verification includes archived API data or snapshots from the Internet Archive or crypto market data aggregators.

This market resolves 'No' if Binance Life does not reach at least $0.76 USD VWAP on or before _$TIME_1, if Binance Life trading is halted, delisted, or the token is canceled or permanently suspended prior to _$TIME_1, or if no authoritative price data is available by _$TIME_1. In case of conflicting data, official exchange-provided data takes precedence, with resolution supported by CoinGecko or CoinMarketCap data. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Binance Life never existed or was never publicly traded.

items.title: Monad mainnet launch by November 3, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Monad mainnet _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMonad mainnet@content_dividerthe primary operational blockchain network of Monad, distinct from testnets and development environments – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ is publicly launched and accessible by users by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-11-03T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to official Monad Foundation announcements or verified authoritative sources.

Resolves 'Yes' if Monad Foundation _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerMonad Foundation@content_dividerthe official organization responsible for Monad blockchain development and announcements – official website)_$ANNOTATION$_ publicly confirms the mainnet launch by _$TIME_1 through an official statement on their website https://monad.xyz, verified social media accounts, or regulatory filings. Backup verification includes major tier-1 crypto news outlets corroborating the launch with explicit official confirmation.

Resolves 'No' if no official confirmation of mainnet launch is published by _$TIME_1, if the launch is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative sources provide contradictory information. In cases of data unavailability or conflicts, resolution defaults to 'No' unless positive evidence meets verification criteria. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the mainnet launch event does not occur or if Monad Foundation ceases operations before the deadline.

items.title: CZ posts meme statements on Twitter by October 22?
items.rules:
This market measures whether CZ _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerCZ@content_dividerChangpeng Zhao, founder and CEO of Binance cryptocurrency exchange – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ posts any explicit statements referencing memes or meme-related content on Twitter _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerTwitter@content_dividera social media platform for posting short messages known as tweets – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-10-22T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_, measured by official UTC timestamps or verified Binance communications.

Resolves 'Yes' if at least one explicit tweet or official Binance communication from CZ containing direct references to memes or meme-related content is confirmed by _$TIME_1 on Twitter or Binance's verified official channels _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOfficial source@content_dividerverified Twitter account of CZ or official Binance website and social media channels)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification requires publicly accessible timestamps and source attribution.

Resolves 'No' if no such statement is posted by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled, indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory. In cases of conflicting reports, official CZ Twitter account and Binance communications take precedence. Also resolves 'No' if CZ does not exist, the Twitter account is inactive, or meme statements never occur.

items.title: He Yi replies to meme posts on X by October 22, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether He Yi _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerHe Yi@content_dividera public figure and crypto influencer associated with Binance – Search context)_$ANNOTATION$_ replies directly to any meme-related post on X _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerX@content_dividersocial media platform formerly known as Twitter – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on or before _$TIME_1, based on UTC timestamps of posts and replies.

Resolves 'Yes' if at least one reply from He Yi to a meme-related post on X is explicitly identifiable via official or verified X accounts or statements by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial source@content_dividerHe Yi's verified X account or official announcements on Binance or related channels)_$ANNOTATION$_. Backup verification includes third-party major media reports with tier-1 source confirmation or archived visual evidence showing such reply posted on or before _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'No' if no verified reply by He Yi to meme-related posts on X occurs by _$TIME_1, or if the event is officially denied, cancelled, or indefinitely postponed. Conflicting or ambiguous data will be resolved by prioritizing primary official sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if He Yi's X account is inactive, suspended, or the meme-related posts do not exist. Verification failure or absence of verifiable data by deadline also results in 'No'.

items.title: Fluent Ecosystem app highest user feedback by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Fluent Ecosystem app receives the highest user feedback during its testnet phase by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerUser feedback@content_divideraggregated scores and interaction metrics collected via Fluent Ecosystem’s official SDK/API during testnet phase – internal definition)_$ANNOTATION$_ compared to all other comparable testnet apps, based on cumulative user engagement and satisfaction metrics collected according to Fluent's official SDK/API data protocols.

Resolves 'Yes' if official Fluent Ecosystem publications or authoritative third-party reports _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerAuthoritative sources@content_dividerofficial company websites, verified social media accounts, or major media with dual tier-1 verification)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm by _$TIME_1 that the Fluent Ecosystem app has strictly surpassed all other comparable testnet applications in cumulative user feedback metrics. Verification requires published aggregate SDK/API data or official leaderboard/statistics reports accessible at resolution date, or alternative confirmation through major industry analytics platforms with public archival.

Resolves 'No' if no verified confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled, indefinitely postponed, or if the Fluent Ecosystem app does not exist or did not enter testnet phase. Also resolves 'No' if comparative data shows another app leads in user feedback, or if official data is unavailable or contradictory. Conflicting evidence is resolved by prioritizing primary official Fluent sources and verified third-party analytics. The market defaults to 'No' absent positive authoritative verification.

items.title: Monad ≥ 5,000 users by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Monad has at least 5,000 active users confirmed through official eligibility verification by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMonad@content_dividerMonad: a layer-1 blockchain network and platform for decentralized applications – Official Monad portal)_$ANNOTATION$_ using its official claim portal and eligibility checker numbers.

Resolves 'Yes' if Monad’s official claim portal _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial Monad claim portal@content_dividerhttps://claim.monad.xyz or equivalent official source)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms 5,000 or more active wallets verified as eligible users by _$TIME_1, validated by data published or certified by Monad’s official communication channels or verified social media accounts.

Resolves 'No' if the active user count is below 5,000 by _$TIME_1, if Monad publicly cancels or indefinitely postpones the eligibility verification or user claim process, if the event never existed, or if no reliable verification data is available by the deadline. Conflicting data resolves by prioritizing official Monad sources and archival records. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Monad or the event does not exist or if the eligibility verification process is never activated.

items.title: BTC < $100,000 by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Bitcoin (BTC) price in USD falls below 100,000 at the close of trading on major global cryptocurrency exchanges by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividera digital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and price denotes the last traded price or official closing price recorded at or nearest to 23:59:59 UTC on December 31, 2025.

Resolves 'Yes' if the aggregated or median BTC price from authoritative cryptocurrency exchanges such as Coinbase, Binance, Kraken, or CoinMarketCap shows BTC < 100,000 USD at market close on _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial source@content_dividermajor global cryptocurrency exchange websites, CoinMarketCap https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/bitcoin/)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification requires publicly accessible historical price data or official exchange statements confirming closing price below the threshold.

Resolves 'No' if BTC price is equal to or exceeds 100,000 USD at close on _$TIME_1, if the market data is unavailable or unverifiable by _$TIME_1, or if BTC trading is suspended, delisted, or the cryptocurrency ceases to exist before _$TIME_1. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing official exchange data and CoinMarketCap archives. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Bitcoin or its trading never existed by _$TIME_1.

items.title: Ripple approval for global payment network in 10 new countries by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Ripple Labs Inc. _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerRipple Labs@content_dividera technology company specializing in blockchain-based payment solutions – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ obtains regulatory approval _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerRegulatory approval@content_dividerofficial authorization from national competent authorities or financial regulators – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ for its global payment network in at least 10 distinct new countries by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'Yes' if by _$TIME_1 verified official statements _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial statements@content_dividerpublished announcements on government or regulatory websites, company releases, or verified social media)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm regulatory approval from 10 or more different national competent authorities (NCAs) or financial regulators for Ripple's payment network. Backup verification includes multiple tier-1 media reports _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerTier-1 media@content_dividermajor reputable news organizations with editorial standards – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or legal filings confirming approvals.

Resolves 'No' if fewer than 10 new countries grant such approval by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory. Conflicts resolve by prioritizing official regulatory sources. Also resolves 'No' if Ripple’s global payment network does not receive regulatory approval in new jurisdictions or if the event never existed.

items.title: Bitcoin Fear and Greed Index > 60 by April 15, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the daily Bitcoin Fear and Greed Index _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin Fear and Greed Index@content_divideran aggregated sentiment metric for Bitcoin market combining volatility, social media, momentum, and surveys on a 0-100 scale with higher values indicating greed – alternative.me)_$ANNOTATION$_ exceeds 60 at any time on or before _$TIME_1 according to official data published on alternative.me _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_divideralternative.me@content_dividerhttps://alternative.me/crypto/fear-and-greed-index/)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if a verifiable daily index value strictly greater than 60 is recorded and publicly published by alternative.me by _$TIME_1. Verification requires archival confirmation from alternative.me website or Internet Archive snapshots _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerInternet Archive@content_dividerhttps://archive.org/)_$ANNOTATION$_ and, if needed, backup confirmation from major crypto data aggregators referencing the index.

Resolves 'No' if no index value exceeds 60 by _$TIME_1, if alternative.me ceases publication before the deadline, or if reliable verification data is unavailable. In case of conflicting reports, alternative.me official data takes precedence. Also resolves 'No' if the index or data source never existed or was discontinued before the event period.

items.title: Binance lists $HYPE by October 20, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the cryptocurrency token $HYPE _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_divider$HYPE@content_dividera specific cryptocurrency token symbol)_$ANNOTATION$_ is officially listed for trading on Binance or Binance US platforms by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-10-20T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to official announcements.

Resolves 'Yes' if Binance or Binance US publishes an official listing announcement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_divinerOfficial announcement@content_dividerverified statement on Binance.com, Binance.US, or Binance verified social media channels)_$ANNOTATION$_ for $HYPE by _$TIME_1. Verification requires confirmation via Binance Verify tool _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerBinance Verify@content_dividerofficial Binance verification service for source authentication - https://verify.binance.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or archived official webpages. Backup confirmation may include major Tier-1 crypto media with dual source verification.

Resolves 'No' if no official announcement is made by _$TIME_1, if the listing is cancelled, indefinitely postponed, or if official verification is unavailable. Conflicting information resolves by prioritizing official Binance sources and Binance Verify data. Additionally, resolves 'No' if $HYPE never existed or was never intended for Binance listing.

items.title: Binance sues CJ before November 30, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Binance formally initiates legal action against CJ Hetherington by filing a lawsuit according to official government or regulatory announcements verified through public court records or authoritative agency disclosures by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerLawsuit@content_dividera formal legal claim filed in a court of law – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if credible confirmation of Binance filing a lawsuit against CJ Hetherington is published by an official government, court, or regulatory source _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial source@content_dividerU.S. court filings, government press releases, or verified regulatory agency announcements)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Verification includes direct access to court records, official government or regulatory websites, or major tier-1 media outlets with explicit dual-source confirmation.

Resolves 'No' if no verified lawsuit filing against CJ by Binance is confirmed by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if authoritative verification is unavailable, or if the lawsuit does not exist as specified. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing official court filings and government sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never existed or no lawsuit was filed by the deadline.

items.title: Monad (MON) < $0.1 by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Monad (MON) cryptocurrency trades exclusively below $0.1 USD spot price on any exchange reporting USD spot prices by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMonad (MON)@content_dividera cryptocurrency token traded on digital asset exchanges – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUSD spot price@content_dividerthe current market price for immediate settlement in United States dollars – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Monad (MON) price never reaches or exceeds $0.1 USD at any time on any verified major cryptocurrency exchange (such as Bitget or Bybit) reporting USD spot prices by _$TIME_1. Verification requires official exchange price data published on websites or APIs _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerBitget@content_dividera cryptocurrency exchange platform providing real-time trading data – Bitget official site)_$ANNOTATION$_ or _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerBybit@content_dividera cryptocurrency derivatives and spot exchange platform with verified market data – Bybit official site)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'No' if Monad (MON) price equals or exceeds $0.1 USD at any time on any verified major exchange by _$TIME_1, or if price data is unavailable or insufficient for verification. It also resolves 'No' if Monad (MON) ceases trading, is delisted, or the event never existed. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing official exchange APIs and archived data sources. Absence of verifiable confirmation results in 'No'.

items.title: HYPE > $59.29 by November 30, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the price of the HYPE token _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerHYPE token@content_dividercryptocurrency token issued by Hyperliquid – derived from search context)_$ANNOTATION$_ exceeds its previous all-time high of $59.29 at official market closing prices on major exchanges by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'Yes' if official closing price data from at least one major cryptocurrency exchange _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividercryptocurrency exchange@content_dividera digital marketplace for buying and selling cryptocurrencies – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or a verified aggregated source confirms a closing price above $59.29 before or at _$TIME_1. Verification requires publicly accessible exchange data such as Bitget or CoinMarketCap with URL archival procedures _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerBitget URL@content_dividerhttps://www.bitget.com)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if no verified closing price above $59.29 is recorded by _$TIME_1, if trading of HYPE is halted, delisted, or if authoritative price data is unavailable or disputed. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing official exchange APIs and market data aggregators. Also resolves 'No' if the HYPE token ceases trading or never reaches the specified price by the deadline.

items.title: Andrey Rublev wins UTS Grand Final in London by December 7?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Andrey Rublev wins the Ultimate Tennis Showdown (UTS) Grand Final tennis tournament held in London between December 5-7, 2025 based on the official final match result _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerUltimate Tennis Showdown (UTS)@content_dividera professional tennis league featuring innovative scoring and format – UTS official website https://www.ultimatetennisshowdown.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ announced at event conclusion.

Resolves 'Yes' if official UTS sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial UTS sources@content_dividerofficial UTS website, verified social media accounts, or press releases)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm Andrey Rublev as tournament winner by _$TIME_1, with verification obtainable through major sports media reporting or broadcast coverage _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerMajor sports media@content_dividerBBC Sport, ESPN, or Tennis Channel coverage)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if no official confirmation of Rublev's victory occurs by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled, postponed indefinitely beyond _$TIME_1, if Rublev does not participate, or if official results name a different winner. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official UTS announcements. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never occurs or the final match is not held.

items.title: Gold > $5,000 before Ethereum by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the spot price of Gold in USD per ounce _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerGold@content_dividera precious yellow metal used as a standard for monetary value – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches $5,000 before the spot price of Ethereum in USD per ETH _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerEthereum@content_dividera decentralized blockchain platform with its native cryptocurrency ETH – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by the official market close price on or before _$TIME_1, using global trading day data in USD.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Gold's spot price officially closes above $5,000 USD per ounce on a global trading day before Ethereum's spot price closes above $5,000 USD per ETH by _$TIME_1, as confirmed by primary market data from Kitco for Gold _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerKitco@content_dividera precious metals market data provider – https://www.kitco.com/charts/gold)_$ANNOTATION$_ and Bitget or CoinMarketCap for Ethereum prices _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerBitget@content_dividera cryptocurrency exchange providing spot price data – https://www.bitget.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerCoinMarketCap@content_dividera cryptocurrency market data aggregator – https://coinmarketcap.com)_$ANNOTATION$_, with backup verification via archived data and major financial media reporting by _$TIME_1.

This market resolves 'No' if Gold does not reach $5,000 USD per ounce before Ethereum reaches $5,000 USD per ETH by _$TIME_1, if either asset fails to reach the milestone by that date, if official price data is unavailable, if trading is halted or markets are closed indefinitely, or if authoritative verification cannot confirm milestone prices. Conflicts in data are resolved prioritizing Kitco for Gold and CoinMarketCap for Ethereum. Additionally, resolves 'No' if either Gold or Ethereum spot markets do not exist or cease to exist before _$TIME_1.

items.title: Coinbase list BNB by November 10, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Coinbase officially lists the Binance Coin (BNB) token for trading on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerListing@content_dividerthe act of making a cryptocurrency available to trade on an exchange – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to official Coinbase announcements or verified Coinbase blog posts.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Coinbase publishes an explicit official announcement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividerstatement published on Coinbase’s official website or verified Coinbase blog)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirming BNB listing by _$TIME_1. Verification includes Coinbase’s blog, Coinbase Assets official X (Twitter) account, or equivalent official Coinbase channels _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerCoinbase official channels@content_dividerhttps://blog.coinbase.com, https://x.com/coinbaseassets)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'No' if no such official announcement or listing occurs by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if authoritative verification is unavailable, or if Coinbase confirms that BNB will not be listed. Conflicting information resolves by prioritizing Coinbase’s official statements. This market also resolves 'No' if BNB listing never existed or was not planned by Coinbase.

items.title: Coinbase lists BNB by November 10, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Coinbase, a US-based cryptocurrency exchange _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerCoinbase@content_dividera digital currency exchange platform headquartered in the United States – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, officially lists Binance Coin (BNB) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerBinance Coin@content_dividerBNB, the native cryptocurrency token of the Binance blockchain platform – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ for trading on or before _$TIME_1 as confirmed by Coinbase announcements or verified exchange updates.

Resolves 'Yes' if Coinbase publishes an official listing confirmation _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial listing confirmation@content_divideran explicit announcement on Coinbase’s official website, verified social media, or regulatory filings)_$ANNOTATION$_ for BNB by _$TIME_1. Confirmation includes direct Coinbase blog posts or verified exchange communications accessible via https://www.coinbase.com/ or Coinbase’s verified social media accounts. Backup verification includes major media reports with dual tier-1 source confirmation.

Resolves 'No' if no official Coinbase confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if Coinbase cancels or indefinitely postpones the listing, if BNB is never listed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing direct Coinbase sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the listing event never existed or was not planned.

items.title: Ethereum price higher by October 17, 2025 1:00 AM ET?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the USD price of Ethereum _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerEthereum@content_dividera decentralized blockchain platform with smart contract functionality – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ is strictly higher at 2025-10-17T05:00:00Z (1:00 AM Eastern Daylight Time) than its USD price at the market creation timestamp according to aggregated real-time exchange data from authoritative crypto price tracking platforms such as CoinMarketCap or Binance.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the Ethereum price at 2025-10-17T05:00:00Z is verified higher than the reference price by one or more official sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial source@content_dividercompany websites, verified exchange APIs, or major crypto price aggregators – CoinMarketCap https://coinmarketcap.com, Binance https://binance.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Verification requires documented historical price snapshots or API data logs accessible through persistent archives or exchange records.

This market resolves 'No' if the Ethereum price is not higher at the specified time, if price data is unavailable or unverifiable by _$TIME_1, if the market or exchanges are closed, trading is halted, or data sources fail. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing official exchange APIs and CoinMarketCap archives. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the Ethereum price or trading data does not exist or the event never takes place.

items.title: Nigeria qualify for 2026 FIFA World Cup by June 30, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Nigeria's national football team secures qualification for the 2026 FIFA World Cup by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerFIFA World Cup qualification@content_dividerthe process by which national teams earn the right to participate in the FIFA World Cup tournament – FIFA Official Regulations)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to official FIFA and CAF announcements and published qualification standings.

Resolves 'Yes' if Nigeria is officially confirmed as qualified for the 2026 FIFA World Cup through direct qualification or CAF playoff victory by _$TIME_1, as announced on FIFA's official website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerFIFA official website@content_dividerhttps://www.fifa.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or CAF's official website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerCAF official website@content_dividerhttps://www.cafonline.com)_$ANNOTATION$_, or verified major media outlets with dual tier-1 source confirmation. Verification requires official published standings or announcements clearly naming Nigeria as qualified.

Resolves 'No' if Nigeria is not officially confirmed qualified by _$TIME_1, if the qualification event is cancelled or postponed indefinitely beyond this date, if authoritative verification is unavailable, or if Nigeria fails to qualify through CAF qualification process. In cases of conflicting information, FIFA and CAF official announcements take precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the qualification event never occurred or Nigeria withdrew.

items.title: Dave album > 31M streams first week by October 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Dave's upcoming album, released on October 24, 2025, achieves over 31 million total streams globally during its first seven days, as aggregated from official streaming platforms _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerStreaming platforms@content_dividerdigital services like Spotify, Apple Music, and UK Official Charts providing authorized music stream data – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ starting from the official release date until the end of October 30, 2025, inclusive.

Resolves 'Yes' if combined verified first-week streams exceed 31 million, confirmed by official platform statistics from Spotify _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerSpotify@content_dividera leading global digital music streaming service – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, Apple Music _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerApple Music@content_dividera subscription-based music streaming service operated by Apple Inc. – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, and the UK Official Charts _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerUK Official Charts@content_dividerthe UK's official music sales and streaming charts compiled by the Official Charts Company – Oxford Dictionary)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Verification requires official published reports or direct platform data accessible at resolution, with backup confirmation via the Official Charts Company website and major music industry media.

Resolves 'No' if the aggregate streams do not exceed 31 million by _$TIME_1, if the album release is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if official streaming data is unavailable or unverifiable by the deadline. Conflicting or absent data defaults to 'No'. This market also resolves 'No' if the album is never released or the event does not exist as specified.

items.title: BTC > $150,000 by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin price in USD on major cryptocurrency exchanges _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividera digital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches or exceeds $150,000 at any time on or before _$TIME_1 according to aggregated price data.

Resolves 'Yes' if verified price data from at least two major exchanges (such as Coinbase, Binance, Kraken) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerMajor exchanges@content_dividerleading cryptocurrency trading platforms with high liquidity and regulatory compliance – CoinMarketCap)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm BTC price ≥ $150,000 at any timestamp before or at _$TIME_1. Official price records must be accessible via exchange websites, APIs, or archived regulatory filings.

Resolves 'No' if BTC price never reaches or exceeds $150,000 by _$TIME_1, or if price data is unavailable, exchanges are suspended, or if the event is invalidated. Conflicting data resolves by prioritizing official exchange data and CoinMarketCap aggregated pricing. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Bitcoin or the specified price measurement does not exist or is not verifiable at deadline.

items.title: KUMPUL impact program launch by April 30, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether KUMPUL officially launches a new impact program to connect startups, corporates, government, and investors in Indonesia by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerKUMPUL@content_dividerKUMPUL: Indonesian startup community and ecosystem builder supporting innovation and entrepreneurship – company website)_$ANNOTATION$_ as confirmed by official announcements or verified entrepreneurial ecosystem sources.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official announcement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividerstatement published by KUMPUL on its official website or verified social media channels)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified Indonesian entrepreneurship ecosystem sources confirm the program launch by _$TIME_1. Alternative verification includes credible media reports corroborated by two or more tier-1 local or international sources and official press releases.

Resolves 'No' if no verified launch confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if the launch is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed past _$TIME_1, or if authoritative sources are unavailable or contradictory. Also resolves 'No' if the program does not exist or was never planned. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing direct official KUMPUL communications and government or major media confirmations.

items.title: Solana TVL > $10B by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the total value locked (TVL) in Solana smart contracts exceeds $10 billion USD by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerTotal Value Locked (TVL)@content_dividerthe sum of all assets deposited in smart contracts on a blockchain, representing locked liquidity – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ as reported by authoritative blockchain data aggregators using on-chain data querying and valuation methodologies.

Resolves 'Yes' if any authoritative blockchain data aggregator (e.g., DeFiLlama, The Block) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerDeFiLlama@content_dividera blockchain analytics platform providing TVL data via on-chain queries – https://defillama.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ officially reports Solana’s TVL exceeding $10 billion USD at any time before or on _$TIME_1, with confirmation from at least one major secondary source or backup aggregator. Verification requires published data snapshots, official API data, or archived web pages accessible at settlement.

Resolves 'No' if no authoritative source confirms Solana’s TVL surpasses $10 billion USD by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or data is unavailable, or if verification data is insufficient. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing primary on-chain data aggregators and corroborating via secondary sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Solana smart contracts do not exist or TVL measurement is not possible by the deadline.

items.title: BTC > $150000 by November 7?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividera digital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ surpasses a price of $150,000 USD at any time on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerDeadline@content_divider2025-11-07T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ based on the highest traded price recorded in USD on major cryptocurrency exchanges. The measurement uses aggregated closing price data verified by authoritative financial data providers and exchange APIs.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official closing price data from at least two major cryptocurrency exchanges _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerMajor cryptocurrency exchanges@content_dividercryptocurrency trading platforms with high liquidity and regulatory recognition, e.g., Coinbase, Binance, Kraken – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ show Bitcoin’s price exceeded $150,000 USD at any time on or before _$TIME_1. Verification requires data published or archived on exchange websites, official APIs, or trusted aggregator platforms such as CoinMarketCap or CoinGecko. Backup confirmation may include major financial news outlets reporting verified price spikes.

This market resolves 'No' if Bitcoin’s price does not exceed $150,000 USD at any time on or before _$TIME_1, if trading is suspended or exchanges delist Bitcoin before the deadline, or if reliable price data is unavailable or unverified by _$TIME_1. If conflicting information arises, resolution prioritizes official exchange data and regulatory filings. Additionally, this market resolves 'No' if Bitcoin ceases to exist, is permanently delisted, or if the price metric fails to meet defined criteria.

items.title: Ben Pasternak posts >5 times on X about Launchcoin upgrade to Believe by October 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Ben Pasternak posts more than 5 public messages on X _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerX@content_dividerX, formerly Twitter, is a social media platform for public microblogging – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ from the official verified account mentioning both 'Launchcoin' and 'Believe' up to and including _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'Yes' if official X account post count exceeds 5 for posts referencing both 'Launchcoin' and 'Believe' by _$TIME_1, verified by direct inspection of the official X profile, supplemented by archival snapshots _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerInternet Archive@content_dividerhttps://archive.org)_$ANNOTATION$_ or third-party X analytics tools with verified data integrity.

Resolves 'No' if 5 or fewer qualifying posts exist by _$TIME_1, if the event or upgrade never occurred, if Ben Pasternak’s official X account is inactive or unavailable, or if authoritative data is insufficient or absent. Conflicting data resolves to 'No' unless verified by official X sources. Also resolves 'No' if posts are private, deleted, or do not reference both terms explicitly.

items.title: Pharos Network Token Generation Event by November 30, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Pharos Network Token Generation Event (TGE) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerToken Generation Event@content_divideran official token sale or distribution event marking the issuance of tokens – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ occurs by _$TIME_1 according to official confirmation from Pharos Network or equivalent authoritative sources.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Pharos Network publishes an official announcement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividerstatement on the Pharos Network website or verified social media channels)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirming completion of the TGE by _$TIME_1. Verification may also be obtained via regulatory filings, major tier-1 media reports with corroboration, or authoritative blockchain data evidencing token distribution.

This market resolves 'No' if no verified official confirmation of the TGE exists by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing primary official sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the TGE event never existed or was never scheduled.

items.title: BTC > $130,000 before < $105,000 by October 23, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin's USD closing price on major global exchanges first reaches $130,000 before it first reaches $105,000 at any time up to and including _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividerdigital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, using verified closing prices aggregated from multiple authoritative cryptocurrency price aggregators and exchanges.

Resolves 'Yes' if official closing price data from at least two major cryptocurrency exchanges _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerMajor cryptocurrency exchanges@content_dividercryptocurrency trading platforms with high liquidity such as Coinbase, Binance, Kraken – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified price aggregators _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerPrice aggregators@content_dividerwebsites or services aggregating prices from multiple exchanges, e.g., CoinMarketCap, CoinGecko – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm that Bitcoin's closing price first hits $130,000 before hitting $105,000 by or before _$TIME_1, with timestamps in UTC. Confirmation requires official exchange data snapshots or archival records accessible at settlement.

Resolves 'No' if Bitcoin's price does not reach $130,000 before $105,000 by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed (e.g., market closure), if no reliable price data is available, or if authoritative price sources contradict the condition. Conflicting data resolves in favor of primary exchange data; absence of verifiable confirmation by deadline results in 'No'. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Bitcoin trading or price data does not exist or is suspended through the deadline.

items.title: SUI price ≥ $10 by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the SUI cryptocurrency price in USD _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerSUI cryptocurrency@content_dividerSUI: a blockchain-based digital currency token – CoinMarketCap)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches or exceeds $10 on or before _$TIME_1, based on aggregated USD exchange rates from major crypto exchanges _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerMajor crypto exchanges@content_dividertop verified cryptocurrency exchanges such as Binance, Coinbase, Kraken, and others – CoinGecko)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if official price data from at least two major crypto exchanges or aggregated price indices _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerCrypto price indices@content_dividerwebsites like CoinMarketCap or CoinGecko aggregating exchange prices – CoinGecko)_$ANNOTATION$_ show SUI price ≥ $10 at any time on or before _$TIME_1. Verification must include archived or persistent records from official exchange APIs, websites, or trusted third-party aggregators _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerVerification sources@content_dividerCoinMarketCap: https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/sui/; CoinGecko: https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/sui)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if no verified price data confirms SUI price ≥ $10 by _$TIME_1, if trading of SUI is halted, delisted, or the token ceases to exist before that date, or if authoritative price sources are unavailable or conflicting beyond resolution. Conflicting data resolves in favor of official exchange and aggregator sources. Also resolves 'No' if the SUI token never existed or was never actively traded.

items.title: BNB > $1500 by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Binance Coin (BNB) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBinance Coin (BNB)@content_dividera cryptocurrency token native to the Binance exchange platform – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ trades at or above $1500 USD _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUSD@content_dividerUnited States Dollar, official currency of the United States – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on any major cryptocurrency exchange by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_, based on live trading price data aggregated from authoritative exchange sources.

This market resolves 'Yes' if verified trade price data from official exchange APIs or reputable market data aggregators _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOfficial exchange APIs@content_dividerapplication programming interfaces provided by regulated or widely recognized cryptocurrency exchanges)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm BNB price reaches or exceeds $1500 USD at any time before or at _$TIME_1. Verification requires published historical price records from Binance.com _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerBinance@content_dividerleading global cryptocurrency exchange platform – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or CoinMarketCap _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=6@counter_dividerCoinMarketCap@content_dividercryptocurrency market data aggregator and analytics platform – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by the settlement date. Backup confirmation includes archived price snapshots from Internet Archive or official exchange filings.

This market resolves 'No' if BNB price does not reach $1500 USD by _$TIME_1, if trading on all major exchanges ceases or BNB is delisted before that time, if price data is unavailable or unverifiable, or if the event never existed (i.e., BNB ceases trading). In cases of conflicting data, official Binance.com API data takes precedence. Lack of authoritative confirmation by _$TIME_1 results in 'No'.

items.title: Bitcoin hash rate > 1.14 ZH/s by October 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin’s total network hash rate _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin hash rate@content_dividerthe aggregate computational power of all miners validating Bitcoin transactions – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ exceeds 1.14 ZH/s _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerZH/s@content_dividerzettahashes per second, a unit measuring one sextillion (10^21) hashes per second – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, based on aggregated global mining performance reported by leading Bitcoin data aggregators.

Resolves 'Yes' if authoritative sources such as Hashrate Index _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerHashrate Index@content_dividera Bitcoin mining data aggregator providing real-time network hashrate and mining pool metrics – https://hashrateindex.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or BitInfoCharts _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerBitInfoCharts@content_dividera cryptocurrency data platform tracking Bitcoin network statistics including hashrate – https://bitinfocharts.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ explicitly report a new all-time high exceeding 1.14 ZH/s by _$TIME_1. Confirmation requires official published statistics, verified website data, or publicly archived datasets.

Resolves 'No' if no verified increase above 1.14 ZH/s is confirmed by _$TIME_1, if authoritative data is unavailable or contradictory, or if the network hash rate remains at or below the current maximum. In case of data conflicts, resolution prioritizes official aggregator reports and archived data. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Bitcoin network or mining activity ceases or data does not exist.

items.title: BTC < $105,000 by October 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin price in USD falls below 105,000 at any time before or at _$TIME_1 according to aggregated closing prices from major cryptocurrency exchanges _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividera digital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and price data protocols standardized by CoinMarketCap and CoinGecko _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCryptocurrency exchanges@content_dividerplatforms for buying, selling, and trading cryptocurrencies – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if authoritative price data from at least two major exchanges _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerMajor exchanges@content_dividerleading cryptocurrency trading platforms such as Binance, Coinbase, Kraken – industry standard)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm Bitcoin’s price in USD fell below 105,000 at any time on or before _$TIME_1. Verification requires official exchange API records or publicly archived OHLC (open-high-low-close) price data posted on recognized financial data aggregators _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOHLC@content_dividera chart data format showing opening, highest, lowest, and closing prices for a given time period – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'No' if Bitcoin price never falls below 105,000 by _$TIME_1, if major exchanges are permanently closed or delisted before _$TIME_1, or if reliable price data is unavailable or unverifiable by the deadline. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing official exchange API records, followed by CoinMarketCap and CoinGecko archives. This market also resolves 'No' if Bitcoin ceases to exist or trading halts indefinitely before _$TIME_1.

items.title: Team Liquid wins CS Asia Championships 2025 by October 19?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Team Liquid officially wins the Counter-Strike Asia Championships 2025 held in Shanghai, China, by the end of the event at _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerCounter-Strike Asia Championships 2025@content_divideran official international esports tournament for the game Counter-Strike hosted by Perfect World Esports in Shanghai from October 14-19, 2025 – Official Tournament Announcement)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to final results announced by Perfect World Esports and verified tournament organizers.

Resolves 'Yes' if Team Liquid is confirmed as the official champion of the CS Asia Championships 2025 by _$TIME_1 through an official announcement on Perfect World Esports' website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerPerfect World Esports@content_divideresports event organizer and publisher responsible for the CS Asia Championships – Merriam-Webster; https://www.perfectworld.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified tournament organizer channels, or through corroborated reports by two or more tier-1 esports media outlets, or verified video evidence showing final trophy presentation.

Resolves 'No' if Team Liquid is not the champion by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled, postponed indefinitely beyond _$TIME_1, if no official results are published, or if verification sources are unavailable. Conflicting outcomes are resolved by prioritizing official tournament announcements. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the CS Asia Championships 2025 do not occur or are fundamentally different from the specified event.

items.title: Hanwha Life Esports win League of Legends Worlds by October 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Hanwha Life Esports officially wins the League of Legends Season 15 World Championship final match by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerLeague of Legends Season 15 World Championship@content_dividerthe concluding tournament of Riot Games' 15th competitive season for League of Legends – Riot Games official)_$ANNOTATION$_ with resolution based on Riot Games' official published results and verified announcements.

Resolves 'Yes' if Riot Games _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerRiot Games@content_dividerdeveloper and publisher of League of Legends and organizer of its official esports competitions – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ officially declares Hanwha Life Esports as the winner of the Season 15 World Championship final match on or before _$TIME_1, confirmed via Riot Games' official website, verified social media, or trusted esports news outlets with multiple tier-1 source corroboration. Backup verification includes archived official match records or verified video evidence with source attribution.

Resolves 'No' if no official declaration by Riot Games confirms Hanwha Life Esports winning the championship final by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled, postponed indefinitely beyond _$TIME_1, if reliable verification is unavailable, or if the event never occurred as specified. In case of conflicting information, Riot Games' official final standings take precedence. Also resolves 'No' if Hanwha Life Esports does not participate, or the championship final differs from the defined event.

items.title: CZ discloses buying first Chinese-named meme coin by October 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Changpeng Zhao (CZ) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerChangpeng Zhao@content_dividerfounder and CEO of Binance, a leading cryptocurrency exchange – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ publicly discloses purchasing the first Chinese-named meme coin _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividermeme coin@content_dividera cryptocurrency token created primarily as a joke or to generate viral social media attention – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 through an explicit statement or social media announcement on verified CZ or Binance official channels.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official, explicit disclosure from CZ or Binance’s verified platforms _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerverified platforms@content_dividerofficial company websites or verified social media accounts such as Twitter or Binance blog)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms CZ’s purchase of the first Chinese-named meme coin by _$TIME_1. Confirmation includes public statements, verified social media posts, or official press releases. Backup verification includes major media reports with dual tier-1 source confirmation or archived official communications _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividertier-1 sources@content_dividerleading global news organizations with direct access to primary information – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if no verified disclosure occurs by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially denied, cancelled, or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicting reports are resolved prioritizing official CZ or Binance sources. Also resolves 'No' if the event never existed or CZ never purchased such a coin.

items.title: BTC > $999,999 by November 1, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the price of Bitcoin _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividera digital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches or exceeds USD 999,999 based on aggregated data from major cryptocurrency exchanges at the UTC close of November 1, 2025 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-11-01T23:59:59Z)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if the aggregated Bitcoin price from authoritative sources such as CoinMarketCap, CoinGecko, or major exchange APIs _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerAuthoritative sources@content_dividerleading cryptocurrency market data providers and exchange platforms)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms Bitcoin trades at or above $999,999 USD at or before _$TIME_1. Verification requires at least two independent data sources or official exchange reports published by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'No' if Bitcoin does not reach $999,999 USD by _$TIME_1, if reliable price data is unavailable or contradictory at the deadline, or if the market for Bitcoin ceases to exist, is suspended, or delisted by _$TIME_1. In case of conflicting data, resolution follows majority consensus among primary data providers. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Bitcoin ceases trading or the event never exists.

items.title: BTC > $200,000 by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividerdigital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches or exceeds a price of $200,000 USD at any time up to and including _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerDeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_. The price is determined by the highest reported closing price in USD on major cryptocurrency exchanges _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerMajor exchanges@content_dividerleading global cryptocurrency trading platforms such as Coinbase, Binance, Kraken – industry standard)_$ANNOTATION$_. Price data must be verified through official exchange APIs or publicly archived records.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Bitcoin’s price equals or exceeds $200,000 USD at any moment on or before _$TIME_1, confirmed by at least two independent major exchanges or official aggregate pricing services such as CoinMarketCap or CoinGecko _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOfficial sources@content_dividerhttps://coinmarketcap.com, https://coingecko.com)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification requires archived price snapshots, official exchange announcements, or widely recognized data aggregators. Alternative confirmation includes verified screenshots or video evidence from official exchange platforms.

This market resolves 'No' if Bitcoin’s price does not reach or exceed $200,000 USD by _$TIME_1, if trading on major exchanges is suspended or delisted before the deadline, or if authoritative price data is unavailable or contradictory. Conflicting data will be resolved by prioritizing official exchange API data and reputable aggregators. Additionally, this market resolves 'No' if Bitcoin or the price metric does not exist, or if the event is canceled or indefinitely postponed.

items.title: BTC > $130,000 by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin's daily closing price on Binance exceeds USD 130,000 at any time from October 16, 2025 through _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerPrice closing@content_dividerthe final price recorded at the daily candle close in UTC – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ as reported by Binance official data feeds.

Resolves 'Yes' if any daily candle closing price for BTC/USD on Binance is strictly greater than 130,000 USD by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerBinance@content_dividerBinance: a major global cryptocurrency exchange platform – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ verified via Binance's official historical price API or website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial source@content_dividerhttps://www.binance.com/en/price/bitcoin)_$ANNOTATION$_ or archived snapshots such as Internet Archive _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerInternet Archive@content_dividera digital archive of web pages ensuring persistence of online data – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ . Backup confirmation may include major tier-1 financial data providers with direct Binance price feeds.

Resolves 'No' if no daily close above 130,000 USD occurs by _$TIME_1, if Binance suspends BTC/USD trading, or if authoritative price data is unavailable or inconclusive. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing Binance official direct sources. The market also resolves 'No' if Binance never supported BTC/USD trading in this period or if price data is permanently inaccessible.

items.title: Altcoin Season by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether an Altcoin Season _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerAltcoin Season@content_dividera period during which 75% or more of the top 50 alternative cryptocurrencies outperform Bitcoin over a 90-day rolling period – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ occurs on or before _$TIME_1 using the Altcoin Season Index and Bitcoin dominance metrics from authoritative crypto analytics sources.

This market resolves 'Yes' if by _$TIME_1 the Altcoin Season Index confirms that at least 75% of the top 50 altcoins have outperformed Bitcoin over any rolling 90-day window, and Bitcoin dominance is below 59%, as verified by official data published on platforms such as CoinGecko _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCoinGecko@content_dividercryptocurrency data aggregator and analytics platform – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or Glassnode _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerGlassnode@content_dividerblockchain data analytics firm providing on-chain metrics – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, or equivalent primary authoritative sources.

This market resolves 'No' if the specified conditions are not met by _$TIME_1, if the Altcoin Season is officially declared cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if authoritative data sources fail to confirm the event, or if data is unavailable or unverifiable. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing official analytics providers and corroborated major crypto media reports. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Altcoin Season never occurs or the event definition is materially different.

items.title: Monad mainnet flop by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Monad mainnet launch is considered a flop based on community reception, adoption metrics, and technical performance as reported by Monad Foundation or major cryptocurrency exchange listings by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMonad mainnet@content_dividerMonad mainnet: the official launch of Monad's Layer 1 blockchain network enabling live transactions and dApps deployment – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if official Monad Foundation updates _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerMonad Foundation@content_dividerMonad Foundation: the nonprofit organization responsible for developing and maintaining Monad blockchain – official website)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified announcements from major exchanges listing Monad's native token _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerMajor exchange@content_dividerMajor cryptocurrency exchange: a leading digital asset trading platform with global recognition, e.g., Binance, Coinbase – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 report clear evidence of poor community engagement, low adoption metrics (e.g., low active user count, transaction volume below industry benchmarks), or unresolved critical technical issues causing mainnet instability or failure.

Resolves 'No' if the above conditions are not met by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially postponed or cancelled, if authoritative verification is unavailable, or if community reception, adoption, and technical performance meet or exceed reasonable benchmarks reported by Monad Foundation or major exchanges. Resolution defaults to 'No' if the mainnet launch does not occur or cannot be verified through official sources by _$TIME_1.

items.title: Liam Delap return to Chelsea official match by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Liam Delap appears in an official Chelsea matchday squad for any competitive match by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerOfficial matchday squad appearance@content_dividerinclusion of a player in the team list eligible to participate in a competitive football match – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirmed by official Chelsea or Premier League match reports _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerPremier League@content_dividerthe top professional football division in England – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or equivalent authoritative sources.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official match report or lineup published by Chelsea FC official website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerChelsea FC official website@content_dividerhttps://www.chelseafc.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or Premier League official site _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerPremier League official website@content_dividerhttps://www.premierleague.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms Liam Delap’s inclusion in the matchday squad by _$TIME_1, with backup confirmation from verified sports data providers such as SofaScore or ESPN.

Resolves 'No' if no official matchday squad appearance is confirmed by _$TIME_1, if Chelsea cancels or indefinitely postpones matches involving Delap, or if reliable verification is unavailable. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official Chelsea and Premier League sources. The market also resolves 'No' if Chelsea never schedules a match including Delap or if the player retires, transfers away, or is unavailable for the entire period.

items.title: Sleep Theory new music release by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
