Resolves 'Yes' if an official release of a music video or single from 'Afterglow' by Sleep Theory is confirmed by the band's official website or verified social media accounts _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial source@content_dividerhttps://sleeptheoryband.com or verified social media handles)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Alternative verification includes major music platforms such as Spotify, Apple Music, Pandora, or major media outlets with explicit confirmation by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'No' if no verifiable official release occurs by _$TIME_1, if the release is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if verification data is unavailable. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official band sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the album 'Afterglow' or the release event does not exist or never took place.

items.title: 索拉纳 official Solana Chinese name by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether '索拉纳' (_$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_divider索拉纳@content_dividerChinese transliteration used as a proper noun for 'Solana' – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_) becomes the officially confirmed Chinese name for Solana, as formally announced or endorsed by Solana's official channels or founder by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'Yes' if Solana's official communication platforms (including the official website or verified social media accounts such as the official X/Twitter account) or public statements by the founder Anatoly Yakovenko explicitly confirm or endorse '索拉纳' as the official Chinese name by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial confirmation@content_dividera formal announcement or endorsement published on Solana's verified channels or by the founder Anatoly Yakovenko – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_. Backup verification may include corroborated reports by major tier-1 media outlets or archived official announcements.

Resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation or endorsement is found by _$TIME_1, if the naming contest is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if the event never existed, or if authoritative sources contradict the official adoption of '索拉纳'. In case of conflicting information, priority is given to direct official Solana channels and founder statements. Also resolves 'No' if the event or naming confirmation never occurs or cannot be verified through persistent authoritative sources.

items.title: Ben Pasternak posts >5 times on X about Launchcoin upgrade by October 31?
items.rules:
This market measures the count of posts by Ben Pasternak on X _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerX@content_dividerX (formerly Twitter): a social media platform for public posts and microblogging – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ referencing the Launchcoin upgrade to Believe _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerLaunchcoin upgrade@content_dividerthe upgrade of Launchcoin, a cryptocurrency token associated with Believe platform – see context)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Post count is verified from Ben Pasternak's official X account using direct platform data and archival methods.

Resolves 'Yes' if at least 6 distinct posts by Ben Pasternak explicitly mention the Launchcoin upgrade on X are published by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial source@content_dividerBen Pasternak's verified X account data accessed via X API or official web interface https://x.com/benpasternak)_$ANNOTATION$_. Backup verification includes Internet Archive snapshots _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerInternet Archive@content_dividerhttps://archive.org) and major media reports citing official posts.

Resolves 'No' if fewer than 6 such posts exist by _$TIME_1, if the event or upgrade is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if Ben Pasternak's account does not exist or is inaccessible, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. In case of conflicting data, official X platform data and Ben Pasternak’s verified account take precedence. Also resolves 'No' if the Launchcoin upgrade event does not exist or was never announced.

items.title: Binance Global lists Hyperliquid (HYPE) spot market by December 31?

This market measures whether Binance Global officially lists the Hyperliquid (HYPE) cryptocurrency spot trading market by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerSpot market@content_dividera cryptocurrency market allowing immediate buying and selling of assets at current prices – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, verified by official Binance Global announcements.

Resolves 'Yes' if Binance Global issues a listing confirmation for HYPE spot market by _$TIME_1 via its official website (binance.com) or verified Binance social media accounts _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_divineresolved source@content_dividerBinance official website or Binance verified Twitter, Telegram, or Weibo accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_. Resolves 'No' if no such official listing confirmation is published by _$TIME_1, if Binance Global cancels or indefinitely postpones the listing, if only Binance.US lists HYPE spot market, or if only futures or derivatives markets are listed. Resolution also follows 'No' if the event never existed or cannot be verified through authoritative sources.

items.title: XAU/USD > $5000 by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the spot price of gold (XAU/USD) reaches or exceeds $5,000.00 USD per troy ounce by or before _$TIME_1 according to London Bullion Market Association (LBMA) or COMEX spot price benchmarks _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerGold spot price@content_dividerthe current price for immediate delivery of gold, quoted in US dollars per troy ounce – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and official exchange data.

Resolves 'Yes' if any authoritative source _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerAuthoritative source@content_dividerofficial LBMA or COMEX published spot price data, or major financial regulators)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms the gold spot price reached or exceeded $5,000.00 USD per troy ounce at any time on or before _$TIME_1. Verification requires published price records from LBMA or CME Group official websites _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerLBMA@content_dividerLondon Bullion Market Association, the primary global benchmark for gold prices – https://www.lbma.org.uk)_$ANNOTATION$_ or CME Group for COMEX prices _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerCOMEX@content_dividerCommodity Exchange Inc., a division of CME Group providing gold futures and spot prices – https://www.cmegroup.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ . Backup confirmation may include multiple tier-1 financial news sources reporting with direct reference to official data.

Resolves 'No' if the gold price does not reach or exceed $5,000.00 USD per troy ounce by _$TIME_1, if official spot markets close or halt trading indefinitely before the deadline, or if authoritative price data is unavailable or insufficient for verification. In cases of conflicting information, official LBMA and CME Group data take precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the gold spot price market never exists or if trading in gold spot prices is suspended indefinitely before the deadline.

items.title: New app launch on Fluent testnet by November 30, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether a new decentralized application (app) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerDecentralized application@content_dividersoftware application running on a blockchain network without central control – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ launches on the Fluent testnet _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerFluent testnet@content_dividera public blockchain test network for Fluent, enabling app testing before mainnet launch – Fluent official)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 according to official Fluent channels or verifiable on-chain evidence.

Resolves 'Yes' if official Fluent sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial Fluent sources@content_dividerFluent’s verified website https://www.fluent.xyz/, official Twitter account https://x.com/fluentxyz, or Discord https://discord.com/invite/fluentxyz)_$ANNOTATION$_ or blockchain explorers _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerBlockchain explorers@content_dividerwebsites allowing viewing of blockchain transactions and smart contract deployments – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm a new app launch on the Fluent testnet by _$TIME_1. Verification includes announcements, documented deployment transactions, or on-chain activity linked to the app.

Resolves 'No' if no verifiable app launch is confirmed by _$TIME_1, if the launch is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative sources fail to provide confirmation. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official Fluent channels and on-chain evidence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the app launch event does not exist or never occurred.

items.title: Roddy Ricch THE NAVY ALBUM release by December 5, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Roddy Ricch's album titled THE NAVY ALBUM _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerTHE NAVY ALBUM@content_dividera musical album by Roddy Ricch, an American rapper and singer – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ is officially released and available on major music platforms or via artist announcements by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-12-05T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification relies primarily on official music platforms and artist communications.

This market resolves 'Yes' if THE NAVY ALBUM is confirmed released on or before _$TIME_1 by Roddy Ricch or his record label through official channels such as verified artist social media accounts, official website announcements, or availability on major digital music platforms (e.g., Spotify, Apple Music) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial music platforms@content_dividerdigital streaming services recognized for music distribution – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_. Backup verification includes major music industry media reports with explicit confirmation.

This market resolves 'No' if the album is not released by _$TIME_1, if official sources announce cancellation or indefinite postponement, or if no verifiable confirmation exists by the deadline. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing direct official announcements and platform availability. Additionally, resolves 'No' if THE NAVY ALBUM was never officially announced or does not exist as a release by Roddy Ricch.

items.title: Russia defeats Ukraine by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Russia achieves a decisive military and political victory over Ukraine by _$TIME_1, as confirmed by official statements and broad international consensus according to established definitions of 'defeat' _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerDefeat@content_dividera decisive military and political victory confirmed by official announcements or broad international consensus – custom definition)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if by _$TIME_1, official government announcements from both Russia and Ukraine, or at least two independent major international media outlets or credible research organizations _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerAuthoritative sources@content_dividerofficial government statements, major media with dual verification, or recognized research institutions)_$ANNOTATION$_ explicitly confirm Russia’s decisive victory over Ukraine, supported by corroborating data such as territorial control, cessation of Ukrainian resistance, or political capitulation documented in public records.

Resolves 'No' if no such confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if authoritative sources deny or contradict Russia’s decisive victory, if the conflict continues without resolution, or if the event is cancelled, indefinitely postponed, or never occurred as defined. In cases of conflicting reports, resolution prioritizes official government declarations, followed by major verified media and recognized research. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never existed or is unverifiable using persistent sources.

items.title: Bitcoin flips gold market cap by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin's market capitalization in USD surpasses gold's market capitalization in USD by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividerdigital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerGold@content_dividerprecious yellow metallic element used as a standard of value and investment – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, using aggregated data from major cryptocurrency exchanges and financial institutions.

Resolves 'Yes' if authoritative sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerAuthoritative sources@content_dividerofficial statistics published by recognized financial institutions, major exchange data aggregators, or government publications)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm Bitcoin's USD market cap exceeds gold's USD market cap at any data point on or before _$TIME_1. Verification requires published market capitalization figures from at least two independent major data providers, such as CoinMarketCap, Bloomberg, or World Gold Council, accessible via official websites or archived repositories.

Resolves 'No' if Bitcoin's market cap does not surpass gold's by _$TIME_1, if official data confirms gold maintains higher market cap, if the event is cancelled (e.g., Bitcoin market ceases to exist), or if authoritative verification data is unavailable or contradictory by _$TIME_1. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing official financial institution reports and government publications. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never occurs or if the market cap definitions differ from rules.

items.title: Manchester United top four finish by May 24, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Manchester United Football Club officially finishes in 1st, 2nd, 3rd, or 4th place in the final Premier League standings for the 2025–26 season as published by the Premier League authority by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerPremier League@content_dividerthe top professional football league in England contested annually by 20 clubs – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and Manchester United Football Club _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerManchester United@content_dividera professional football club based in Manchester, England competing in the Premier League – ManchesterUnited.com)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the official 2025–26 Premier League final table published on the Premier League’s official website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerPremier League official website@content_dividerhttps://www.premierleague.com/standings)_$ANNOTATION$_ or official Premier League publications confirm Manchester United’s final rank is 1st, 2nd, 3rd, or 4th by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes archived league tables from reputable sports data providers or major verified media outlets with dual-tier 1 confirmation.

This market resolves 'No' if Manchester United finishes 5th or lower in the official 2025–26 Premier League final table or if the official final table is not published by _$TIME_1, if the Premier League season is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if reliable verification is unavailable by the deadline. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing the Premier League’s official publications. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the 2025–26 Premier League season does not occur or if Manchester United does not participate.

items.title: Liverpool Premier League champion by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Liverpool Football Club finishes as the 2025/26 English Premier League champion according to the official final standings published by premierleague.com by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerEnglish Premier League@content_dividerthe top professional football league in England contested by 20 clubs, with the champion determined by highest points at season end – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Liverpool is officially listed as the 2025/26 Premier League champion on premierleague.com or through official Premier League announcements by _$TIME_1. Verification includes archived versions of official standings and corroboration by at least two major sports news sources such as BBC Sport or Sky Sports _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial source verification@content_dividerpremierleague.com official website and major verified media outlets with historical archives)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'No' if Liverpool is not listed as the champion by _$TIME_1, if the season is cancelled or postponed beyond that date, if official verification is unavailable, or if the league does not conclude normally. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing official Premier League sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the Premier League 2025/26 season does not occur or the championship is awarded to a different team.

items.title: BSC MEME token DEX volume > 50% of Solana by October 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Binance Smart Chain (BSC) blockchain's MEME token decentralized exchange (DEX) 24-hour trading volume reaches at least 50% of Solana blockchain's MEME token DEX 24-hour trading volume by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBinance Smart Chain (BSC)@content_dividera blockchain platform developed by Binance for smart contracts and decentralized applications – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerMEME token@content_dividera cryptocurrency token typically associated with meme culture, traded on blockchains – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerDecentralized Exchange (DEX)@content_dividera peer-to-peer marketplace on blockchain for cryptocurrency trading without centralized intermediaries – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_. Trading volume is measured by reputable blockchain analytics platforms such as DefiLlama _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerDefiLlama@content_dividera leading decentralized finance analytics platform providing blockchain data and metrics – DefiLlama official site)_$ANNOTATION$_ and corroborated by platforms like Bitquery.

This market resolves 'Yes' if BSC MEME token DEX 24-hour trading volume is at least 50% of Solana MEME token DEX 24-hour trading volume on or before _$TIME_1, confirmed by official published statistics from DefiLlama or equivalent reputable blockchain analytics APIs _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerOfficial source@content_dividerhttps://defillama.com and https://bitquery.io)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification requires release of timestamped volume data for MEME tokens on both blockchains, accessible via DefiLlama dashboards or Bitquery APIs by _$TIME_1. Secondary confirmation may include major blockchain research reports or verified data snapshots archived on Internet Archive or similar permanent repositories.

This market resolves 'No' if the specified volume ratio is not met by _$TIME_1, if BSC MEME token DEX trading activity is officially discontinued or indefinitely suspended before _$TIME_1, or if verifiable trading volume data from authoritative sources is unavailable or insufficient by _$TIME_1. In event of conflicting data, resolution prioritizes DefiLlama official statistics, then Bitquery, and finally archived data. Additionally, this market resolves 'No' if MEME token trading or relevant DEX activity on either BSC or Solana does not exist or is terminated before _$TIME_1.

items.title: Palu $PALU listing on Binance CEX by November 30, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Palu cryptocurrency token ($PALU) is officially listed for trading on the Binance centralized exchange (CEX) by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerPalu $PALU@content_dividercryptocurrency token named Palu, ticker $PALU)_$ANNOTATION$_ _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerBinance CEX@content_dividerBinance: world's largest centralized cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to official Binance announcements or the Binance Announcement page.

Resolves 'Yes' if Binance publicly confirms $PALU listing on its centralized exchange platform by _$TIME_1, verified via official Binance communication channels such as their announcement page https://www.binance.com/en/support/announcement or verified Binance social media accounts. Backup verification may include major media reports with dual Tier-1 source confirmation or archived official announcements.

Resolves 'No' if no official Binance listing announcement or confirmation for $PALU on Binance CEX is available by _$TIME_1, if the listing is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if $PALU is only available via Binance Web3 Wallet or decentralized exchanges (DEX), or if authoritative data sources are inaccessible or contradictory. This market also resolves 'No' if the listing event never occurred or Binance never planned to list $PALU on CEX.

items.title: $GIGGLE holders ≥ 150,000 by November 30, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether $GIGGLE token holders reach or exceed 150,000 unique wallet addresses by _$TIME_1 according to blockchain or official $GIGGLE token data verified by trusted cryptocurrency analytics _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_divider$GIGGLE token holders@content_dividerunique blockchain wallet addresses holding $GIGGLE tokens – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and official token data sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerblockchain@content_dividera decentralized digital ledger recording transactions across many computers – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official or trusted analytics sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividertrusted cryptocurrency analytics@content_dividerverified platforms providing blockchain wallet and token holder analytics – e.g., Etherscan, CoinGecko)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm 150,000 or more unique holders of $GIGGLE tokens by _$TIME_1. Verification requires published blockchain explorer snapshots, official token issuer disclosures, or data from reputable analytics platforms available at https://etherscan.io or https://coingecko.com by _$TIME_1.

This market resolves 'No' if 150,000 holders are not confirmed by _$TIME_1, if the token or holder data is unavailable, if the $GIGGLE token is delisted, cancelled, or if official or trusted data sources do not verify the threshold. In case of conflicting data, priority is given to official blockchain explorer data and issuer disclosures. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the $GIGGLE token does not exist or never issued by the deadline.

items.title: Limitless $LMNT trading volume > Polymarket by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether cumulative USD-equivalent trading volume of Limitless ($LMNT) prediction market surpasses cumulative USD-equivalent trading volume of Polymarket on all prediction markets by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerTrading volume@content_dividerthe total value of executed trades measured in US dollars on prediction market platforms – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, following Limitless's token generation event (TGE) in October 2025, with data verified from official platform sources and corroborated by major financial data aggregators.

Resolves 'Yes' if Limitless’s cumulative trading volume exceeds Polymarket’s total trading volume by _$TIME_1 as confirmed by official Limitless and Polymarket statements or filings _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial confirmation@content_dividerdirect published data from company websites, regulatory filings, or verified social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_, or verified reports from at least two tier-1 financial news sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerTier-1 sources@content_dividermajor established financial media outlets with rigorous fact-checking)_$ANNOTATION$_. Backup verification includes archive records from Internet Archive, cryptocurrency market data aggregators, and official blockchain explorer summaries.

Resolves 'No' if Limitless’s volume does not exceed Polymarket’s by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or postponed indefinitely, if Limitless never launched its prediction market or TGE by October 2025, or if reliable verification data is unavailable by the deadline. Conflicting data resolves by prioritizing official company disclosures and regulatory documents. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the trading volume metric is not reported or cannot be conclusively measured as specified.

items.title: CZ posts meme content on Twitter by October 24, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Changpeng Zhao (CZ) posts any meme-related content on his official Twitter account by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerChangpeng Zhao (CZ)@content_dividerfounder and CEO of Binance, a major cryptocurrency exchange – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ where 'meme-related content' includes tweets explicitly or implicitly referencing meme coins or meme culture _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividermeme coin@content_dividera cryptocurrency primarily driven by internet memes and social media hype – Oxford Dictionary; @subject=3@counter_dividermeme culture@content_dividera set of ideas, behaviors, or styles spread via internet memes – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if any tweet from CZ’s verified Twitter account _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerverified Twitter account@content_dividerthe official Twitter account verified with a blue checkmark confirming authenticity – Twitter Help Center)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 contains meme-related content as defined and is confirmed by authoritative sources such as CZ’s official website, Twitter API data, or major media with dual tier-1 source verification _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividertier-1 source@content_dividerleading global news organizations with editorial standards – Merriam-Webster; @subject=6@counter_dividerofficial website@content_dividercompany or personal websites maintained by CZ or Binance)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if no meme-related tweet is posted by _$TIME_1, or if CZ explicitly denies posting such content in official statements by _$TIME_1, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory. The market also resolves 'No' if CZ’s Twitter account is inactive, suspended, or deleted before _$TIME_1. Conflicts in verification are resolved prioritizing direct official Twitter data and CZ’s official communications. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event (posting meme content) does not occur by the deadline or never existed.

items.title: MegaETH third ICO valuation > $1B by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether MegaETH's fully diluted valuation _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerFully diluted valuation@content_dividerthe total valuation of a company including all outstanding shares and all convertible securities – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ after its third initial coin offering (ICO) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerICO@content_dividerinitial coin offering, a public blockchain-based fundraising event where tokens are sold to investors – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ exceeds USD 1 billion as confirmed by official funding announcements and credible crypto financial data sources by _$TIME_1.

This market resolves 'Yes' if authoritative sources, including MegaETH's official statements or verified website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerMegaETH official website@content_dividerhttps://megaeth.com)_$ANNOTATION$_, and major crypto financial data providers (e.g., CoinMarketCap, Messari) publish explicit confirmation of a third ICO round valuation above USD 1 billion by _$TIME_1. Verification includes official press releases, regulatory filings, or multiple tier-1 media reports confirming valuation figures.

This market resolves 'No' if the valuation threshold is not met by _$TIME_1, if the third ICO is cancelled, indefinitely postponed, or if no verifiable official confirmation exists by the deadline. Conflicting or insufficient data defaults to 'No'. Additionally, resolves 'No' if MegaETH never conducts a third ICO or if the event fundamentally differs from the specified ICO valuation criteria.

items.title: Philadelphia Eagles or Kansas City Chiefs win Super Bowl 60 by February 9, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether either the Philadelphia Eagles or Kansas City Chiefs officially wins Super Bowl 60 according to the National Football League (NFL) final game result by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerSuper Bowl@content_dividerannual NFL championship game determining the league champion – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the official NFL announcement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerNFL official announcement@content_dividerstatement published on the NFL's official website or verified social media accounts – https://www.nfl.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 confirms that the Philadelphia Eagles or Kansas City Chiefs won Super Bowl 60 held in the US Eastern Time zone context. Verification includes official NFL game reports, press releases, or verified tier-1 media sources with dual confirmation.

This market resolves 'No' if neither team wins by _$TIME_1, if the Super Bowl 60 is cancelled, indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if authoritative verification is unavailable by _$TIME_1. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official NFL sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Super Bowl 60 does not occur or differs from the defined event.

items.title: Erling Haaland scores 3+ goals vs Everton by October 18, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Erling Haaland scores three or more goals _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerhat-trick@content_dividerthe achievement of scoring three goals in a single match – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ for Manchester City in the Premier League match against Everton scheduled on October 18, 2025 by _$TIME_1 according to official Premier League match reports and statistics.

Resolves 'Yes' if official Premier League sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial Premier League sources@content_dividerthe Premier League's official website or published match reports – https://www.premierleague.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm Haaland scored at least three goals in that match by _$TIME_1. Verification includes match reports, official statistics, or verified video evidence published by the Premier League. Backup verification includes major media outlets with dual tier-1 source confirmation.

Resolves 'No' if Haaland scores fewer than three goals, if the match is cancelled, postponed beyond _$TIME_1, if Haaland does not play, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory by _$TIME_1. Conflicting data are resolved by prioritizing official Premier League sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the match never took place or Haaland was not on the field.

items.title: Sunderland scores ≥2 goals with a midfielder goal by October 18?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Sunderland Football Club _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerSunderland Football Club@content_dividerprofessional football team based in Sunderland, England – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ scores at least two goals in the official Premier League match against Wolverhampton Wanderers _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerWolverhampton Wanderers@content_dividerEnglish professional football club based in Wolverhampton – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on October 18, 2025, with at least one goal scored by a Sunderland midfielder _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividermidfielder@content_dividera player positioned centrally between the defenders and forwards in football (soccer) – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to the official Premier League match report and official team lineups.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the official Premier League match report _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerPremier League match report@content_dividerthe official post-match document published by the Premier League detailing goals and scorers – https://www.premierleague.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms Sunderland scored two or more goals, and official lineup data confirms at least one goal was scored by a player listed as a midfielder by _$TIME_1. Verification may include the Premier League website, Sunderland AFC official site, or other verified authoritative football data providers such as Opta or Sofascore _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerauthoritative football data providers@content_dividerverified sources providing official match statistics)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'No' if the conditions are not met by _$TIME_1, if the match is cancelled, postponed indefinitely beyond _$TIME_1, or if official verification data is unavailable or contradictory. In case of conflicting information, official Premier League sources take precedence. Additionally, the market resolves 'No' if the match does not occur or Sunderland does not score at least two goals or no midfielder scores. Verification includes official announcements of cancellation or postponement.

items.title: BTC ≤ $60000 by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin's price falls to or below USD 60,000 at any time before or at _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividerdigital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to the last price recorded in any 1-minute candlestick on CoinMarketCap or an equivalent major cryptocurrency exchange price feed _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCoinMarketCap@content_dividera leading cryptocurrency market data aggregator – CoinMarketCap.com)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if any 1-minute candlestick's last price on CoinMarketCap or a major exchange price feed is USD 60,000 or lower at any moment on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerDeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification requires archived price data accessible at settlement from CoinMarketCap APIs _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerCoinMarketCap API@content_dividerhttps://coinmarketcap.com/api/)_$ANNOTATION$_ or major exchanges such as Binance, Coinbase Pro, Kraken, or Bitstamp with public historical candlestick data. Alternative confirmation includes trusted third-party price aggregators with archival records.

Resolves 'No' if no verified 1-minute candlestick on any such price feed records a last price at or below USD 60,000 by _$TIME_1, if the market data sources are unavailable or unreliable, or if the event is officially contradicted. In case of conflicting data, priority is given to CoinMarketCap and then to major exchanges' official data. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Bitcoin trading is suspended, delisted, or the price feed ceases to exist before _$TIME_1. The market defaults to 'No' if authoritative data is insufficient or the event never occurs.

items.title: AS Roma wins Serie A match vs Inter Milan by October 18?
items.rules:
This market measures whether AS Roma officially wins the Serie A football match against Inter Milan played on October 18, 2025, based on the final score at the end of regulation time as declared by Serie A authorities _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerSerie A@content_dividerthe top professional football league in Italy – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and match officials _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerMatch outcome@content_dividerfinal result determined by the official score at the end of normal playing time excluding extra time or penalties – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if AS Roma is confirmed as the winner by official Serie A sources, including the Lega Serie A website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerLega Serie A@content_dividerthe organizing body for Serie A professional football matches in Italy – https://www.legaseriea.it/)_$ANNOTATION$_ or Genius Sports data feeds _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerGenius Sports@content_dividera sports data technology company providing official match data – https://www.geniussports.com/)_$ANNOTATION$_, by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes authoritative sports statistics websites such as Flashscore.com and Checklive with archived snapshots if needed.

This market resolves 'No' if AS Roma does not win by _$TIME_1, if the match is cancelled or postponed beyond _$TIME_1, if official final score data is unavailable or unverifiable, or if the event never happened. Conflicting or missing data defaults to 'No' with resolution priority given to official Lega Serie A announcements and verified data providers. Additionally, 'No' applies if the match is played under conditions materially different from the market specification.

items.title: Haust Network $HAUST airdrop by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Haust Network distributes $HAUST tokens via an official airdrop event by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerHaust Network@content_dividera Layer 2 blockchain platform compatible with Ethereum Virtual Machine using zk-rollups for scalability – Official Haust Network documentation)_$ANNOTATION$_ as announced through its official communication channels. The measurement requires verification of token distribution records or official announcements.

Resolves 'Yes' if Haust Network publicly confirms and executes an airdrop of $HAUST tokens by _$TIME_1 via official sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial sources@content_dividerHaust Network’s official website, verified social media accounts, or official press releases – https://haust.network)_$ANNOTATION$_ or through major media outlets with verified dual-tier-1 source confirmation. Verification includes documented token transfers or claim events linked to public testnet participation and community engagement.

Resolves 'No' if no authoritative confirmation or evidence of the $HAUST airdrop exists by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially cancelled, postponed indefinitely, or if token distribution does not occur as specified. In case of conflicting information, resolution defers to official Haust Network communications or regulatory filings. The market also resolves 'No' if Haust Network never initiates or announces such an airdrop.

items.title: multiplifi > 500,000 crystal holders by November 10, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether multiplifi _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividermultiplifi@content_dividera blockchain-based platform for digital asset issuance and management – official multiplifi website https://multiplifi.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ exceeds 500,000 unique crystal holders _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividercrystal holders@content_dividerindividual blockchain addresses or accounts holding the "crystal" token, a digital asset issued by multiplifi – multiplifi official token documentation)_$ANNOTATION$_ before _$TIME_1, verified by multiplifi blockchain data or official multiplifi sources.

Resolves 'Yes' if multiplifi official data sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerofficial data sources@content_dividerverified multiplifi blockchain explorer or multiplifi's official published holder statistics at https://multiplifi.com/data)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm the total number of unique crystal holders exceeds 500,000 at any time before _$TIME_1. Verification requires published official reports or real-time blockchain explorer snapshots archived on or before _$TIME_1. Backup confirmation may be obtained from major media reports citing multiplifi or verified multiplifi social media announcements.

Resolves 'No' if the holder count does not exceed 500,000 before _$TIME_1, if official multiplifi data or blockchain verification is unavailable by _$TIME_1, if multiplifi officially cancels or indefinitely postpones the crystal token issuance or holder tracking, or if authoritative sources explicitly deny achievement. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing multiplifi's official blockchain data and direct multiplifi statements. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the multiplifi project or crystal token never existed or was never issued.

items.title: Gen.G beat T1 in Worlds 2025 Group Stage by October 18?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Gen.G wins the best-of-1 (Bo1) League of Legends Worlds 2025 Group Stage match against T1 on October 18, 2025 according to the official final match result as published by Riot Games and official tournament platforms _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerLeague of Legends Worlds 2025 Group Stage@content_dividerinternational esports tournament group phase for the game League of Legends organized by Riot Games – Riot Games Official)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if Gen.G is officially recorded as the winner of the specified Bo1 match by Riot Games _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerRiot Games@content_dividerdeveloper and publisher of League of Legends and organizer of Worlds esports events – Riot Games Official Website https://www.riotgames.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 and the result is verifiable via Riot’s official Worlds 2025 website, Riot’s verified social media channels, or major esports media outlets with direct Riot confirmation.

Resolves 'No' if Gen.G does not win the specified Bo1 match by _$TIME_1, if the match is cancelled, postponed indefinitely, or if official verification is unavailable or contradictory. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing Riot Games’ official match records. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the match does not occur on the specified date or is replaced by a different event.

items.title: Bitcoin price < $70,000 by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the trading price of Bitcoin falls to or below $70,000 USD at any time on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividera digital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ as determined by CF Benchmarks and major cryptocurrency exchange data.

Resolves 'Yes' if verified price data from CF Benchmarks _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCF Benchmarks@content_divideran independent provider of cryptocurrency price indices – https://cfbenchmarks.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or at least two major cryptocurrency exchanges _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerCryptocurrency exchange@content_dividera platform for buying, selling, and trading cryptocurrencies – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm Bitcoin’s price was at or below $70,000 USD at any moment before or at _$TIME_1. Verification requires official published data or archived market snapshots from these sources.

Resolves 'No' if Bitcoin’s price never falls to or below $70,000 USD on or before _$TIME_1, if reliable price data is unavailable or contradictory, or if the cryptocurrency markets cease operation before the deadline. In case of data conflicts, resolution prioritizes CF Benchmarks followed by majority consensus among major exchanges. Also resolves 'No' if Bitcoin trading does not exist by _$TIME_1 or if official data sources cannot confirm any price ≤ $70,000.

items.title: Umbra privacy token launch on Solana by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Umbra officially launches its privacy-focused token and protocol on the Solana blockchain network with auditable privacy features by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerUmbra@content_dividerUmbra: a privacy protocol designed to enable confidential, unlinkable, and auditable transfers on the Solana blockchain – official project website)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerSolana@content_dividerSolana: a high-performance public blockchain platform supporting decentralized applications – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ respectively.

Resolves 'Yes' if Umbra or MetaDAO publishes an official announcement confirming launch completion and token issuance on their verified websites or verified social media by _$TIME_1, explicitly describing auditable privacy features defined as voluntary opt-in viewing keys enabling compliance. Verification includes direct confirmation from official Umbra or MetaDAO channels _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividerauthenticated statements or press releases on Umbra or MetaDAO verified domains or verified social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if the launch is not confirmed by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or postponed beyond _$TIME_1, if no official or verifiable confirmation exists, or if the launched protocol lacks the defined auditable privacy features. Conflicting information is resolved prioritizing official Umbra or MetaDAO sources. Also resolves 'No' if the protocol or token launch never occurred or was abandoned.

items.title: Xi Jinping calls Donald Trump by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Chinese President Xi Jinping _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerXi Jinping@content_dividergeneral secretary of the Chinese Communist Party and President of the People's Republic of China – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ makes a direct phone call or official communication to former U.S. President Donald Trump _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerDonald Trump@content_divider45th President of the United States (2017–2021) – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 according to official government or trusted news sources. The call’s date is considered in Beijing timezone (CST, UTC+8) and converted to UTC for settlement.

Resolves 'Yes' if official confirmation or a public announcement from either the Chinese government, U.S. government, or major verified media sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerVerified media sources@content_dividermajor news organizations with explicit verification from two or more tier-1 sources)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms the occurrence of any phone call or direct communication by Xi Jinping to Donald Trump by _$TIME_1. Verification includes official government releases, statements on government websites, verified social media accounts, or official press releases _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOfficial sources URLs@content_dividerhttps://www.fmprc.gov.cn/ for Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs, https://www.whitehouse.gov/ archived content, Reuters https://www.reuters.com/)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if no verifiable official confirmation or public announcement exists by _$TIME_1, if the communication is officially denied or cancelled, or if the event never occurred. In case of conflicting reports, resolution prioritizes official government statements first, then verified tier-1 media. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never existed or was indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1. Verification failures or source unavailability by _$TIME_1 also result in 'No'.

items.title: TikTok AI video generation tool launch by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether TikTok, a social media platform _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerTikTok@content_dividera social media app for creating and sharing short videos – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, officially launches its own AI _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerAI@content_dividerartificial intelligence: the capability of a machine to imitate intelligent human behavior – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ video generation tool _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividervideo generation tool@content_dividera software product that creates video content using AI technologies – Oxford Dictionary)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, verified via official TikTok announcements or publicly accessible product availability notices.

Resolves 'Yes' if by _$TIME_1 an official statement or product launch notice _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividerstatement published on TikTok’s official website or verified corporate social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms TikTok’s release of an AI video generation tool under TikTok branding, verified by at least one major tier-1 media source _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividertier-1 media@content_dividerleading global news organizations with editorial verification standards – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or visual evidence from TikTok’s official channels.

Resolves 'No' if no authoritative confirmation occurs by _$TIME_1, if the product launch is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if credible verification is unavailable. Conflicting information is resolved favoring official TikTok sources. Also resolves 'No' if TikTok never planned or released such a tool by the deadline.

items.title: Monad Community Last tier earns > $50,000 by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the total USD equivalent value of Monad Foundation’s 'Community Last' tier airdrop earnings _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerCommunity Last tier@content_dividerthe highest allocated airdrop category defined by Monad Foundation – official Monad Foundation publications)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches or exceeds $50,000 by _$TIME_1 according to official or verified sources.

Resolves 'Yes' if the aggregate USD value of all 'Community Last' tier airdrop distributions is confirmed at or above $50,000 by official Monad Foundation announcements, verified blockchain explorer data, or major tier-1 media reports _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial Monad Foundation announcements@content_dividerstatements published on Monad official site or verified social media accounts https://monad.foundation)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes blockchain transaction records and independent analytics platforms.

Resolves 'No' if the $50,000 threshold is not met by _$TIME_1, if the airdrop is officially cancelled, postponed indefinitely beyond _$TIME_1, if no authoritative confirmation is available, or if the event never existed. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official Monad Foundation sources and blockchain data. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the 'Community Last' tier airdrop never occurred.

items.title: Ripple payment network adopted by a G20 central bank by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether at least one central bank of a G20 country officially confirms or implements RippleNet _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerRippleNet@content_dividerRippleNet: Ripple Labs’ payment network platform for cross-border transactions – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or XRP-based payment solutions by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerDeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to official government or central bank publications.

Resolves 'Yes' if an explicit official confirmation or implementation statement is published by at least one G20 central bank _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerG20 central bank@content_dividercentral banks of the Group of Twenty major economies – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on their official websites or regulatory filings by _$TIME_1, or verified by at least two tier-1 media sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividertier-1 media@content_dividertop global media organizations with established fact-checking protocols – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, or through official statistics or legal documents.

Resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation or implementation is verifiably published by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if verification sources are unavailable or contradictory, or if the event never existed or occurred differently than specified. Conflicts are resolved prioritizing official central bank publications, government releases, and regulatory filings.

items.title: Solana surpasses Ethereum daily active users by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Solana's daily active users (DAU), defined as unique addresses initiating at least one transaction per day, consistently exceed Ethereum's DAU by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerDaily Active Users (DAU)@content_dividerthe count of unique blockchain addresses that initiate at least one transaction within a day – adapted from The Block and Token Terminal)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to authoritative blockchain analytics sources.

This market resolves 'Yes' if by _$TIME_1, multiple authoritative sources such as The Block data platform _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerThe Block@content_dividerhttps://www.theblock.co/data)_$ANNOTATION$_ or Token Terminal _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerToken Terminal@content_dividerhttps://tokenterminal.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ publish and confirm that Solana's DAU remains consistently above Ethereum's DAU, supported by official on-chain metrics or verified blockchain explorer data.

This market resolves 'No' if Solana's DAU does not consistently exceed Ethereum's DAU by _$TIME_1, if reliable verification data is unavailable, if the event is effectively cancelled (e.g., Ethereum or Solana networks cease operations), or if authoritative sources contradict the claim. In case of data conflicts, official blockchain explorer statistics and multiple tier-1 analytics platforms will be prioritized. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never occurred or relevant data is irretrievable by the deadline.

items.title: Ethereum most used blockchain for stablecoins by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Ethereum _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerEthereum@content_dividera decentralized blockchain platform featuring smart contracts – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ becomes the blockchain with the highest stablecoin transaction volume and market share by _$TIME_1, as reported by institutional financial analyses _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerInstitutional financial analyses@content_dividerprofessional research and reporting by regulated financial institutions and major analytics firms – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_. Data is collected from authoritative sources including blockchain analytics firms, major crypto exchanges, and financial research publications.

This market resolves 'Yes' if by _$TIME_1, Ethereum is confirmed as the blockchain with the largest cumulative stablecoin transaction volume and market share via official reports published by at least two independent institutional financial analysts or blockchain data providers such as Chainalysis, Messari, or Coin Metrics _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial report sources@content_dividerhttps://chainalysis.com, https://messari.io, https://coinmetrics.io)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification requires publicly accessible final reports or datasets explicitly stating Ethereum’s stablecoin dominance. Backup confirmation can be obtained through corroborated major financial media reports citing these sources.

This market resolves 'No' if by _$TIME_1, Ethereum is not the blockchain with the highest stablecoin transaction volume and market share, if official data shows another blockchain leads, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. In case of conflicting data, resolution follows the majority consensus of primary institutional reports. Additionally, resolves 'No' if stablecoin transaction volume data is absent, or if the stablecoin market does not exist or is fundamentally different than specified.

items.title: Elon Musk ≥100 tweets by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Elon Musk’s verified Twitter account _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerElon Musk@content_dividerElon Musk: CEO of Tesla, SpaceX, and owner of Twitter/X – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ posts at least 100 tweets _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerTweet@content_dividerTweet: a short message posted on the Twitter/X social media platform – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 according to Twitter/X’s official account metrics _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerTwitter/X account metrics@content_dividerOfficial count of tweets displayed on verified profiles of Twitter, now rebranded as X – Twitter Official)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if Elon Musk’s verified account shows a cumulative tweet count of 100 or more by _$TIME_1 as confirmed by direct Twitter/X interface or official Twitter/X API endpoints _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOfficial Twitter/X sources@content_dividerhttps://twitter.com/elonmusk or verified API data)_$ANNOTATION$_. Backup verification includes reputable archive services such as the Internet Archive’s Wayback Machine _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerInternet Archive@content_dividerhttps://archive.org/web/)_$ANNOTATION$_ capturing snapshots of the account before or at _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'No' if the verified Elon Musk account tweet count is below 100 by _$TIME_1, if the account is suspended, deleted, or otherwise inaccessible, or if no reliable verification exists by _$TIME_1. If conflicting data sources arise, official Twitter/X data takes priority. Also resolves 'No' if Elon Musk’s Twitter account never existed, was permanently deactivated, or if the tweet count metric is unavailable or unverified at resolution time.

items.title: TikTok AI video generation launch by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether TikTok, a social media platform _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerTikTok@content_dividera video-sharing social networking service owned by ByteDance – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, officially launches an AI (artificial intelligence _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerArtificial intelligence@content_dividerthe simulation of human intelligence processes by machines – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_) video generation tool by _$TIME_1 according to official TikTok or ByteDance announcements.

Resolves 'Yes' if by _$TIME_1 TikTok or its parent company ByteDance _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerByteDance@content_dividerChinese multinational internet technology company owning TikTok – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ publicly confirm the launch of a dedicated AI video generation product or service through official press releases _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOfficial press releases@content_dividerformal statements distributed by the company or verified media outlets – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ accessible on their official website or verified social media accounts.

Resolves 'No' if no official confirmation is published by _$TIME_1, if the project is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if the product is rebranded to exclude AI video generation capability, or if reliable verification is unavailable. Conflicting information is resolved prioritizing direct official TikTok or ByteDance sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event does not exist or never occurred.

items.title: BTC > $50,000 by April 18, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the price of Bitcoin _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividera digital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ exceeds $50,000 USD _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUSD@content_dividerUnited States Dollar, official currency of the United States – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ at any point on or before _$TIME_1, based on the average closing price reported by major cryptocurrency exchanges aggregated by authoritative sources.

This market resolves 'Yes' if at least one major exchange average price of Bitcoin in USD is confirmed above $50,000 by an official data provider such as Blockchain.com, CoinGecko, Nomics, or BitcoinAverage by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial data providers@content_dividerBlockchain.com, CoinGecko, Nomics, BitcoinAverage APIs providing real-time and historical Bitcoin price data)_$ANNOTATION$_, verified by published closing price data or official API historical datasets. Backup verification may include archived snapshots from Internet Archive or corroborated reports from multiple tier-1 financial news sources.

This market resolves 'No' if Bitcoin does not reach above $50,000 USD by _$TIME_1, if authoritative price data shows no such occurrence, if major exchanges cease reporting or delist Bitcoin by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if reliable verification data is unavailable. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official exchange data and major API providers. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Bitcoin or its major trading markets cease to exist or if the market price fundamentally differs from USD average price specification.

items.title: BNB Chain prediction market launch by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether a prediction market project _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerPrediction market@content_dividera platform allowing users to bet on outcomes of future events – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ launches its mainnet _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerMainnet@content_dividera blockchain network fully deployed and operational – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on BNB Chain _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerBNB Chain@content_dividera public blockchain platform developed by Binance focused on speed and low fees – Binance official)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, confirmed by official announcements or code deployment on-chain.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official confirmation _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOfficial confirmation@content_dividerstatements from project or BNB Chain websites, verified social media, or blockchain explorer data)_$ANNOTATION$_ shows the prediction market's mainnet is live on BNB Chain by _$TIME_1, verified through project websites, Binance announcements, or on-chain transaction evidence.

This market resolves 'No' if no verified mainnet launch or official announcement occurs by _$TIME_1, if the project is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory. Conflicts are resolved prioritizing official BNB Chain or project sources. Also resolves 'No' if the project never existed or mainnet launch does not match market definition.

items.title: China stops rare earth exports to USA by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether China officially ceases all exports of rare earth elements to the United States by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerRare earth elements@content_dividera group of 17 chemical elements used in advanced technologies and defense industries – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerStop exporting@content_dividerofficial lifting of all exports, meaning zero shipments authorized by Chinese government or regulators – defined by market)_$ANNOTATION$_, verified by official government or regulatory announcements.

This market resolves 'Yes' if an explicit official announcement from the Chinese government or its regulatory agencies _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerChinese government@content_dividerthe central government of the People's Republic of China – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms a full ban on all rare earth exports to the USA by _$TIME_1, published on official government websites, regulatory filings, or authoritative media citing direct official sources. Backup verification includes major international media with dual tier-1 source confirmation or official trade statistics indicating zero exports.

This market resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation occurs by _$TIME_1, if partial or selective export restrictions exist without a complete stop, if exports continue beyond the deadline, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing official Chinese government declarations and verified trade data. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event of stopping exports never existed or is demonstrably false.

items.title: Karak Network tokenizes nation public equities with 24/7 trading by October 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether a sovereign nation-state fully tokenizes 100% of its publicly listed equities on the Karak Network blockchain enabling continuous 24/7 trading with settlement times under one minute by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerTokenization@content_dividerthe process of converting assets into digital tokens on a blockchain – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerKarak Network@content_dividera Layer 1 blockchain optimized for internet capital markets integrating tokenization, trading, and payment infrastructure with full EVM compatibility – BlockBeats news, 2024)_$ANNOTATION$_, and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerSettlement time@content_dividerthe time required to finalize a transaction on the blockchain, here under one minute – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official confirmation from the nation-state government or its authorized financial regulator evidences full tokenization of all public equities on Karak Network, and publicly accessible trading operates 24/7 with blockchain settlement times under one minute by _$TIME_1 as documented on official websites or major tier-1 financial media with at least two independent verified sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOfficial confirmation@content_dividerstatements published on government or regulatory websites, or major financial news outlets – examples include Bloomberg, Reuters)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification includes blockchain explorer data, regulatory filings, and live market data from Karak Network or affiliated trading platforms.

This market resolves 'No' if full tokenization, continuous 24/7 trading, or sub-one-minute settlement is not achieved or verified by _$TIME_1, if the project or event is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if reliable verification data is unavailable or contradictory. In cases of conflicting evidence, official government or regulatory declarations take precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never existed or was never initiated.

items.title: Aster multi-chain platform launch by April 30, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Aster launches a multi-chain trading platform supporting BNB Chain, Arbitrum, and Solana networks by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerAster multi-chain platform@content_dividerA decentralized trading platform operating simultaneously on multiple blockchain networks – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, with the launch confirmed by official or verified announcements.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official announcement from Aster or verified sources confirms platform launch with explicit support for BNB Chain _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerBNB Chain@content_dividera blockchain platform developed by Binance, supporting smart contracts and decentralized applications – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, Arbitrum _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerArbitrum@content_dividera Layer 2 scaling solution for Ethereum using optimistic rollup technology – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, and Solana _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerSolana@content_dividera high-performance blockchain platform known for fast transaction speeds and low fees – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, verified via Aster’s official website or verified social media _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividerstatement published by the company on official channels, including website or verified social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_ or corroborated by two or more tier-1 media sources.

Resolves 'No' if no verifiable confirmation occurs by _$TIME_1, if the launch is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory, or if the launched platform omits support for any of the three specified networks. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never existed or no launch was planned.

items.title: Hyperliquid ≥ 70% decentralized perpetual futures share by April 30, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Hyperliquid maintains or increases its market share at or above 70% in decentralized perpetual futures trading volume _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMarket share@content_dividerthe percentage of total trading volume captured by Hyperliquid in decentralized perpetual futures markets – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on any day on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerDeadline@content_divider2026-04-30T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_. Market share data is sourced from authoritative cryptocurrency data providers such as CoinGecko, CoinMarketCap, or equivalent blockchain analytics firms _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerAuthoritative crypto data sources@content_dividerreliable, widely recognized providers of decentralized exchange trading volume data – industry standard)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official daily trading volume reports confirm Hyperliquid’s decentralized perpetual futures market share is at least 70% on any date on or before _$TIME_1, verified by primary source data published on Hyperliquid’s official website or verified social media accounts _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerHyperliquid official sources@content_dividerHyperliquid’s verified website or social media accounts confirming trading volumes)_$ANNOTATION$_ and corroborated by at least two independent major crypto data aggregators such as CoinGecko or CoinMarketCap. Alternative verification may include blockchain transaction data audits or reports from reputable crypto analytics firms archived in publicly accessible repositories.

This market resolves 'No' if Hyperliquid’s market share does not reach or exceed 70% on any date by _$TIME_1, or if the event (Hyperliquid holding ≥70% market share) is officially contradicted, cancelled, or indefinitely postponed. It also resolves 'No' if no verifiable volume data is available by _$TIME_1. In cases of conflicting data, resolution prioritizes official Hyperliquid data, followed by consensus from multiple major crypto analytics sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Hyperliquid or decentralized perpetual futures trading markets cease to exist or are fundamentally altered before _$TIME_1.

items.title: Changpeng Zhao Chinese-language tweet by October 25, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Changpeng Zhao _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerChangpeng Zhao@content_dividerfounder and CEO of Binance cryptocurrency exchange – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ posts any tweet in Chinese language _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerChinese language@content_dividera group of related language varieties spoken in China, including Standard Mandarin – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on any verified official Binance or CZ social media account by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-10-25T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification uses direct observation of posts on verified social media accounts or credible news reports.

Resolves 'Yes' if at least one tweet in Chinese language is published by Changpeng Zhao or official Binance accounts verified by Twitter or other major social media platforms by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerVerified social media@content_divideraccounts confirmed with verification badges or official Binance website references)_$ANNOTATION$_. Confirmation requires screenshots, archive records, or official statements posted by Binance or CZ verified channels at https://twitter.com/binance or https://twitter.com/cz_binance _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerOfficial source URLs@content_dividerhttps://twitter.com/binance, https://twitter.com/cz_binance)_$ANNOTATION$_. Backup confirmation may include major credible news outlets with explicit verification.

Resolves 'No' if no verified Chinese-language tweet is posted by _$TIME_1, or if the event is cancelled, indefinitely postponed, or if verification data is unavailable or contradictory by deadline. Conflicting information defaults to prioritizing Binance official sources and verified CZ accounts. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Changpeng Zhao or Binance official accounts do not exist or cease posting by deadline.

items.title: Binance requires BNB DAT custody and audits by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Binance officially mandates all BNB-affiliated _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBNB,binance coin@content_dividercryptocurrency issued by Binance used for transaction fees and governance – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ Digital Asset Treasury (DAT) companies to employ institutional-grade third-party crypto custodians and undergo periodic investor audits by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'Yes' if by _$TIME_1 Binance publicly enforces a policy requiring all BNB-affiliated DAT companies to use third-party custodians meeting traditional financial standards and submit to investor audits verifiable by regulators, with official announcements published on Binance's website or verified social media _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerBinance official sources@content_dividerhttps://www.binance.com/en/support/announcement)_$ANNOTATION$_ or regulatory filings _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerRegulatory filings@content_dividerofficial documents filed with financial regulators such as SEC, AUSTRAC, or equivalent)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if no official policy or mandate is confirmed by Binance or regulators by _$TIME_1, if the policy is explicitly cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if Binance publicly denies such requirements, if verification sources are unavailable or contradictory, or if the event of mandated custody and audits never occurs or is not enforced as specified.

items.title: BTC ≥ $100,000 by April 18, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin (digital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividerdigital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_) closes at or above $100,000 USD on any major cryptocurrency exchange by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2026-04-18T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_. Closing price refers to the official end-of-day price in UTC on the exchange.

This market resolves 'Yes' if at least one major cryptocurrency exchange (e.g., Coinbase, Binance, Kraken, Bitstamp _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerMajor cryptocurrency exchanges@content_dividerleading digital asset trading platforms with high liquidity and USD price quotes – CoinDesk)_$ANNOTATION$_) publishes a closing Bitcoin price at or above $100,000 USD on or before _$TIME_1, verified through official exchange websites or trusted market data aggregators (e.g., CoinMarketCap, CoinGecko). Alternative confirmation includes authoritative financial news sources reporting verified exchange data.

This market resolves 'No' if the Bitcoin closing price fails to reach or exceed $100,000 USD on any major exchange by _$TIME_1, if all exchanges cease trading Bitcoin before that date, if the market is suspended indefinitely, or if no reliable price data is available. In case of conflicting data, priority is given to official exchange data. Also resolves 'No' if Bitcoin or the specified price level event never existed or is not measurable as specified.

items.title: Monad scam confirmed by October 25, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Monad is publicly and credibly confirmed as a scam by trusted security analysts or official crypto watchdogs by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerScam confirmation@content_dividera public, credible verification or official warning indicating fraudulent or deceptive practices – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official warning or detailed report from a recognized cryptocurrency regulatory body or cybersecurity firm _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerrecognized watchdog@content_divideran established authority monitoring crypto security, such as FINRA, SEC, or CryptoCompare)_$ANNOTATION$_ is published by _$TIME_1, or if at least two independent tier-1 media outlets confirm the scam status citing authoritative sources. Verification includes official agency websites, regulatory filings, or archived official notices _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerverification sources@content_dividerofficial government publications, regulatory filings, major media reports, and Internet Archive records)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if no such credible confirmation is published by _$TIME_1, if official sources explicitly deny scam allegations, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if verifiable evidence is unavailable. In case of conflicting reports, priority is given to official regulatory or cybersecurity agency announcements. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Monad never existed as a scam or if scam allegations are unsubstantiated.

items.title: Italy qualifies for 2026 FIFA World Cup by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Italy's national football team officially qualifies for the 2026 FIFA World Cup by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerItaly national football team@content_dividerthe men's senior national association football team representing Italy – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to the official UEFA _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUEFA@content_dividerUnion of European Football Associations: governing body of European football – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and FIFA _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerFIFA@content_dividerFédération Internationale de Football Association: international governing body of association football – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ qualification procedures.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Italy's qualification is explicitly confirmed by an official announcement from UEFA or FIFA published on their official websites or verified social media by _$TIME_1, following the completion of playoff matches and official draw for the 2026 World Cup qualification phase _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividera public statement released by UEFA or FIFA on their verified channels confirming Italy's qualification)_$ANNOTATION$_. Alternative verification may include major tier-1 media outlets confirming with dual-source verification and/or official UEFA/FIFA published statistics.

This market resolves 'No' if Italy's qualification is not confirmed by _$TIME_1, if UEFA or FIFA officially announce Italy's failure to qualify, if the event is cancelled or postponed indefinitely beyond _$TIME_1, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. In case of conflicting reports, official UEFA/FIFA sources take precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Italy does not participate in qualification or playoffs, or if playoff matches or draws do not occur by _$TIME_1.

items.title: OKX JavaScript Signing SDK release by April 30, 2026?
items.rules:
