Verification may also include authoritative major media outlets with dual tier-1 source confirmation.

Resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation is published by _$TIME_1, if the acquisition or launch is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if Binance explicitly denies the event, or if verifiable official sources remain unavailable by _$TIME_1. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing direct Binance official sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if echodotxyz does not exist or if Binance does not launch/acquire a true competitor as defined.

If official Binance sources become inaccessible, backup verification includes Internet Archive captures _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerInternet Archive@content_dividera digital archive of the World Wide Web and other information sources – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or regulatory filings repositories where applicable, checked by _$TIME_1.

Non-existence of the event includes no scheduled acquisition deal or product launch plans for echodotxyz or any competitor product by Binance by _$TIME_1, confirmed by official Binance statements or absence of credible announcements.

items.title: Ukraine missile or drone attack on Russia by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Ukraine conducts a missile or drone attack _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMissile or drone attack@content_dividera deliberate strike using guided missiles or unmanned aerial vehicles against a target – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on Russian territory up to and including _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerDeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirmed by official Ukrainian or Russian military intelligence, government statements, or major verified media reports.

This market resolves 'Yes' if credible official confirmation from Ukrainian or Russian armed forces or government sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial confirmation@content_dividerpublic statements, verified social media accounts, or government publications)_$ANNOTATION$_ report a missile or drone strike attributed to Ukraine on Russian territory by _$TIME_1, corroborated by at least one major international media outlet or verified imagery with source attribution.

This market resolves 'No' if no such verified attack occurs by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially denied, cancelled, or postponed indefinitely, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory. In case of conflicting evidence, priority is given to official government and military intelligence sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never occurred or never existed.

items.title: Bitcoin > $130,000 by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the price of Bitcoin _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividerdigital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches or exceeds $130,000 USD on any major cryptocurrency exchange by _$TIME_1 using aggregated USD prices from multiple major exchanges _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerAggregated price@content_dividera combined price derived from multiple market sources weighted or averaged to reflect overall market value – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if at any point on or before _$TIME_1 official price data from at least two major, accessible cryptocurrency exchanges such as Coinbase _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerCoinbase@content_dividera major US-based cryptocurrency exchange platform – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or Binance _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerBinance@content_dividerlargest global cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, confirmed by authoritative price aggregators like CoinDesk _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerCoinDesk@content_dividermajor cryptocurrency news and data provider – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or CoinMarketCap _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=6@counter_dividerCoinMarketCap@content_dividercryptocurrency price tracking website offering market data – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, report Bitcoin trading at or above $130,000 USD, verified by archived data if needed.

This market resolves 'No' if Bitcoin does not reach or exceed $130,000 USD on any major exchange by _$TIME_1, if relevant exchanges cease trading or data is unavailable, or if official price data cannot be verified by multiple authoritative sources. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official exchange data and major aggregator consensus. Additionally, this market resolves 'No' if Bitcoin trading or the price event never occurred or was discontinued before _$TIME_1.

items.title: Athletic Club win vs Qarabağ FK by October 22?
items.rules:

Resolves 'Yes' if the official UEFA full-time match result confirms Athletic Club scored more goals than Qarabağ FK by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerUEFA Champions League@content_divideran annual continental club football tournament organized by the Union of European Football Associations – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerofficial full-time result@content_dividerthe final score at the end of regulation time excluding extra time or penalties – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification requires UEFA's published match report at https://www.uefa.com/ and backup confirmation from at least one major sports media outlet with dual tier-1 source verification.

Resolves 'No' if Athletic Club does not win by _$TIME_1, if the match is cancelled, postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if no authoritative confirmation of Athletic Club's victory is available. In cases of conflicting data, UEFA's official report takes precedence. Also resolves 'No' if the match never occurred as scheduled or was replaced by a different event.

Confirmation requires official match reports, UEFA website publications, or licensed sports data providers such as Sofascore _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerSofascore@content_dividera verified sports live score and statistics platform – https://www.sofascore.com)_$ANNOTATION$_. Resolves 'No' if Galatasaray does not win by _$TIME_1, if the match is cancelled, postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if reliable official verification is unavailable. In case of conflicting data, UEFA official sources take precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the match does not occur, is never scheduled, or if the event fundamentally differs from the specified match.

items.rules:

items.rules:

Resolves 'No' if the gold price does not fall below 4,000 USD by _$TIME_1, if official price data is unavailable or unverifiable by the deadline, if the market for gold prices is suspended or closed, or if authoritative sources explicitly deny a price drop below this threshold. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing LBMA and ICE Benchmark Administration data. Also resolves 'No' if gold price measurement standards or the event itself do not exist.

Additionally, resolves 'No' if either company does not exist, ceases EV deliveries, or if Q4 2025 deliveries are not reported by deadline.

items.title: Arsenal wins Premier League title by May 31, 2026?

Resolution uses the official Premier League website with backup from major verified media and archived league tables by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerEnglish Premier League@content_dividerthe top professional football division in England, organized by the Premier League Limited – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerArsenal Football Club@content_dividerprofessional football club based in London competing in the English Premier League – Oxford Dictionary)_$ANNOTATION$_ .

This market resolves 'Yes' if the official Premier League final table published on the Premier League's official website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerPremier League official website@content_dividerhttps://www.premierleague.com/standings)_$ANNOTATION$_ or equivalently authoritative source confirms Arsenal as the first-place team by _$TIME_1. Confirmation requires official published final standings after all scheduled league matches for the 2025-26 season have been completed. Alternative verification includes archived snapshots from Internet Archive and corroboration from at least two major tier-1 sports media outlets such as ESPN _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerESPN Soccer@content_dividerhttps://www.espn.com/soccer/league/_/name/eng.1)_$ANNOTATION$_ or TNT Sports _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerTNT Sports Premier League@content_dividerhttps://www.tntsports.co.uk/football/premier-league/standings.shtml)_$ANNOTATION$_ .

This market resolves 'No' if Arsenal is not confirmed as the first-place team by _$TIME_1, if the season is officially cancelled, indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if official data is unavailable or contradictory. In cases of conflicting information, official Premier League declarations take precedence. This market also resolves 'No' if the Premier League season does not occur, is suspended, or the title is awarded differently. Non-existence of the event or failure to confirm by the deadline results in 'No'.

Resolves 'Yes' if official public release of new music, endorsements, or announcements by Cai Xukun or Versace are verifiably published on Cai Xukun’s verified social media or Versace’s official accounts _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOfficial verification@content_dividerverified social media includes Weibo, Instagram, or official websites)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 . Resolves 'No' if no verifiable official confirmation occurs by _$TIME_1, if the comeback is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative sources are unavailable or contradictory. If data sources are unavailable or insufficient by _$TIME_1, the market resolves 'No'.

Resolves 'No' if no authoritative death confirmation is published by _$TIME_1, if official sources explicitly deny death, or if verification data is unavailable or contradictory. In case of conflicting information, resolution prioritizes official US government records and White House statements. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event of Donald Trump's death does not occur or no official record exists by the deadline.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official cancellation _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCancellation@content_dividerthe act of officially postponing or abandoning a scheduled event – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or postponement of a Premier League match scheduled within the specified week is confirmed by the Premier League's official website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerPremier League official website@content_dividerhttps://www.premierleague.com/)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified statements from the involved clubs published by _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerverified broadcasters@content_dividerrecognized sports broadcasters with official Premier League broadcasting rights)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Resolves 'No' if no such official cancellation or postponement is confirmed by _$TIME_1, if matches proceed as scheduled, or reliable official sources fail to verify any cancellation. Resolution defaults to 'No' if the event never existed (no scheduled match) or if the Premier League season is suspended or fully cancelled for the week. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official Premier League announcements and club statements. Lack of verifiable data by _$TIME_1 also results in 'No'.

Resolves 'No' if no verified new episode is released or confirmed by _$TIME_1, if the podcast comeback is officially cancelled or postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official platform data and host communications. Also resolves 'No' if no new episode exists or the podcast revival never commenced.

Conflicts resolve by prioritizing official NBA and Lakers channels. Non-existence or absence of any retirement announcement by deadline results in 'No'.

items.rules:
This market measures whether Aster publicly launches its Layer-1 blockchain, Aster Chain, defined as first user availability on mainnet with full functionality, according to official announcements or verified blockchain explorer data by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerAster Chain@content_dividerA Layer-1 blockchain by Aster providing mainnet user access with full functionality – derived from project roadmap and industry standards)_$ANNOTATION$_ .

items.title: BTC > $150,000 by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Bitcoin spot price on Binance _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividerdigital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches or exceeds $150,000 USD at any time up to and including _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_, verified using official Binance spot market price data.

Resolves 'Yes' if Binance official spot price data _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerBinance@content_dividerBinance: a global cryptocurrency exchange platform – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ shows BTC trading at or above $150,000 USD at any moment on or before _$TIME_1, confirmed by Binance’s official API endpoints or verified archival data sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerBinance API@content_dividerhttps://binance-docs.github.io/apidocs/spot/en/#spot-market)_$ANNOTATION$_ and corroborated by reputable financial analytics platforms capturing Binance data.

Resolves 'No' if BTC spot price on Binance never reaches $150,000 USD by _$TIME_1, if Binance spot market ceases operation or is delisted, or if official price data is unavailable or unverifiable by deadline. Conflicting or missing data will be resolved by prioritizing Binance’s official published data and archival backups _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerArchival backups@content_dividerInternet Archive snapshots, official Binance historical data repositories)_$ANNOTATION$_. Also resolves 'No' if Binance spot market never existed or was permanently suspended before event completion.

items.title: Demon Slayer Infinity Castle $1B China box office by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the film Demon Slayer: Infinity Castle achieves cumulative box office revenue of at least $1,000,000,000 USD in China by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerDemon Slayer: Infinity Castle@content_divideran animated feature film, part of the Demon Slayer franchise – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerBox office revenue@content_dividerthe total gross income from ticket sales for a film – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reported by official Chinese box office agencies such as Maoyan or EntGroup. Revenue is converted from Chinese RMB to USD using official exchange rates. Resolution references primary data from these agencies with backup from major verified media and archival sources.

This market resolves 'Yes' if cumulative box office revenue in China of Demon Slayer: Infinity Castle is confirmed at or above one billion USD by official Chinese box office reporting platforms or government publications by _$TIME_1. Verification requires published cumulative gross data from Maoyan _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerMaoyan@content_dividera leading Chinese online ticketing and box office tracking platform – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, EntGroup _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerEntGroup@content_dividera Chinese entertainment data analytics firm specializing in box office reporting – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, or official Chinese film regulatory bodies. Alternative confirmation may be obtained through major media outlets with explicit dual tier-1 source verification or archived official statistics.

This market resolves 'No' if the $1 billion threshold is not met by _$TIME_1, if the film's Chinese release is cancelled or indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, if authoritative box office data is unavailable or contradicts the threshold, or if the film never releases in China. Conflicts are resolved by prioritizing official box office agency data and government publications. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the film does not exist, is not theatrically released in China, or if cumulative revenue falls short despite worldwide success.

items.title: President Trump tariff announcement by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether President Trump formally announces new or increased tariffs on China or any other country by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerTariffs@content_dividertaxes or duties imposed by a government on imported goods or services – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ through official White House proclamations or executive orders.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official White House proclamation or executive order _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerWhite House proclamation@content_dividerformal statement issued by the President or administration published on whitehouse.gov or equivalent official government source – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ explicitly announces new or increased tariffs on China or any other country on or before _$TIME_1. Verification includes direct publication on the White House website, Federal Register, or official government archives.

Resolves 'No' if no such official tariff announcement is confirmed by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if authoritative verification is unavailable, or if announcements are later than _$TIME_1. Conflicting information resolves in favor of official government sources. Also resolves 'No' if no tariffs are announced or increased as specified, or if the event never occurred.

items.title: Ethereum EIP-4844 gas fee >50% reduction by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Ethereum’s EIP-4844 upgrade reduces average Layer 2 transaction gas fees and Ethereum network gas prices by more than 50% compared to pre-upgrade metrics by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerEIP-4844@content_dividerEthereum Improvement Proposal 4844: protocol upgrade introducing blob-carrying transactions to reduce data costs and improve scalability – Ethereum.org)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerGas fees@content_dividertransaction costs paid in Ethereum to execute operations on the network – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if official Ethereum Foundation or Ethereum Core developer announcements _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerEthereum Foundation@content_dividernonprofit organization supporting Ethereum development – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified statistics from Ethereum blockchain explorers _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerBlockchain explorers@content_divideronline tools providing real-time blockchain data and analytics – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm average Layer 2 and Ethereum mainnet gas fees decreased to less than 50% of pre-EIP-4844 values by _$TIME_1, with data publicly accessible at https://etherscan.io/gastracker or https://ethereum.org/en/roadmap/danksharding/ by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes archived reports from the Internet Archive and major blockchain analytics firms.

Resolves 'No' if no such verified confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if the upgrade is officially cancelled, indefinitely postponed or materially altered so it does not target gas fee reductions, or if authoritative data is unavailable or contradictory by _$TIME_1. Also resolves 'No' if EIP-4844 never activates on Ethereum mainnet or if Layer 2 average fees do not fall below 50% of pre-upgrade levels. Conflicting evidence is resolved by prioritizing Ethereum Foundation sources, then major blockchain analytics, then independent third-party confirmations.

items.title: Max Verstappen fifth Formula 1 Drivers' Championship by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Max Verstappen _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMax Verstappen@content_dividerDutch professional racing driver competing in Formula 1 – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ wins his fifth Formula 1 Drivers' Championship _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerFormula 1 Drivers' Championship@content_dividerthe annual title awarded to the driver with the highest official points total at the end of the FIA Formula One World Championship season – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by the deadline _$TIME_1 according to official Fédération Internationale de l'Automobile (FIA) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerFIA@content_dividerThe governing body for world motor sport and the federation of the world's leading motoring organisations – Oxford Dictionary)_$ANNOTATION$_ points standings after the final race of the 2025 season.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official FIA published final 2025 Drivers' Championship points standings _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerFIA official standings@content_dividerfinal points table published on FIA website or FIA official communications)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm Max Verstappen holds first place with at least five total championships (counting the 2025 title) by _$TIME_1. Verification requires FIA official website confirmation _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerFIA website@content_dividerhttps://www.fia.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or FIA press releases. Backup verification includes major tier-1 sports media outlets reporting with explicit FIA confirmation or FIA-regulated official race result archives.

This market resolves 'No' if Max Verstappen does not secure his fifth championship by _$TIME_1, if the 2025 season is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if official FIA confirmation is unavailable or contradicts the claim. Conflicting data will be resolved prioritizing FIA official sources first, then major verified media. The market also resolves 'No' if the championship event does not occur or if Max Verstappen does not participate in the 2025 season.

items.title: NewJeans single number one on Billboard Hot 100 by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether any single by NewJeans _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerNewJeans@content_dividerSouth Korean girl group formed in 2022 known for K-pop music – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ attains the number one position on the weekly Billboard Hot 100 chart _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerBillboard Hot 100@content_dividerthe official US singles chart ranking based on sales, streaming, and radio airplay – Billboard)_$ANNOTATION$_ at any time on or before _$TIME_1_$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to data compiled by Billboard magazine and Luminate Data _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerLuminate Data@content_dividerindependent music data provider responsible for Billboard chart metrics – Billboard)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Billboard's official Hot 100 chart _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerBillboard chart@content_dividerweekly US music singles ranking published by Billboard magazine – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms a NewJeans single reached #1 by _$TIME_1. Verification requires Billboard's official publications or website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=6@counter_dividerBillboard official site@content_dividerhttps://www.billboard.com/charts/hot-100)_$ANNOTATION$_ and Luminate Data reports _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=7@counter_dividerLuminate official site@content_dividerhttps://www.luminate.com/)_$ANNOTATION$_. Backup confirmation may include major music industry media with dual tier-1 source verification.

This market resolves 'No' if no NewJeans single attains #1 on Billboard Hot 100 by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if no authoritative verification is available. Conflicting data will be resolved prioritizing Billboard and Luminate Data official sources. Also resolves 'No' if NewJeans has no single released or charted on Billboard Hot 100 by deadline.

items.title: XRP ≥ $5 by December 31 after Ripple lawsuit ends?
items.rules:
This market measures whether XRP price reaches or exceeds $5 USD on any recognized exchange by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerXRP@content_dividerXRP: digital cryptocurrency issued by Ripple Labs – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ after Ripple's lawsuit resolution is officially confirmed by August 2025 through SEC and Ripple public filings.

Resolves 'Yes' if XRP price ≥ $5 USD is confirmed at any time on or before _$TIME_1 by official exchange data aggregated and converted to USD, and Ripple's SEC lawsuit resolution is confirmed by official SEC filings and Ripple announcements by August 31, 2025 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerSEC@content_dividerSecurities and Exchange Commission: U.S. federal regulatory agency overseeing securities markets – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if XRP price never reaches $5 USD by _$TIME_1, or if Ripple's lawsuit resolution is not confirmed by August 31, 2025, or if authoritative price data or legal resolution announcements are unavailable, cancelled, or contradictory. Also resolves 'No' if XRP or Ripple's lawsuit event never existed or is fundamentally different.

items.title: Polymarket official Chinese name release by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Polymarket _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerPolymarket@content_dividera prediction market platform allowing cryptocurrency-based betting on real-world event outcomes – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ releases an official Chinese name by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_. The resolution is based on official announcements from Polymarket or their verified 𝕏 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerX@content_dividersocial media platform formerly known as Twitter – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ account, with verification through backup sources including major media with dual tier-1 confirmation and archival records.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Polymarket or its verified 𝕏 account publishes an explicit official Chinese name release announcement by _$TIME_1. Verification requires a direct statement on Polymarket’s website or verified 𝕏 profile, or press releases on official PR channels or major media sites with at least two independent tier-1 source confirmations.

This market resolves 'No' if no official Chinese name is released by _$TIME_1, if an official cancellation or indefinite postponement of such release is announced, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing direct official sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never existed or no plans for such a release were made.

items.title: USDC or USDT depeg > 3% by December 24?
items.rules:
This market measures whether USDC or USDT stablecoins _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerUSDC@content_dividerUSDC: USD Coin, a U.S. dollar-backed stablecoin issued by Circle Internet Financial LLC – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUSDT@content_dividerUSDT: Tether, a U.S. dollar-pegged stablecoin issued by Tether Limited – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ lose their dollar peg by at least 3% (price ≤ $0.97) between _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerstart_time@content_divider2025-10-25T00:00:00Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerend_time@content_divider2025-12-24T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_, measured by volume-weighted average price across major global exchanges reported by CoinMarketCap and CoinGecko.

Resolves 'Yes' if either USDC or USDT price drops to or below $0.97 USD confirmed by official aggregated reports from CoinMarketCap https://coinmarketcap.com and CoinGecko https://coingecko.com by _$TIME_1. Verification includes archived snapshots and API data from both platforms. Secondary confirmation may include official issuer statements or regulatory filings.

Resolves 'No' if neither stablecoin’s price drops to or below $0.97 USD by _$TIME_1, if stablecoins maintain peg, if official data is unavailable or contradictory, or if the event is cancelled or the stablecoins cease to exist. Conflicts resolved by prioritizing CoinMarketCap and CoinGecko data, then issuer disclosures. Also resolves 'No' if stablecoins do not trade or never existed during the window.

items.title: LeBron James > 65 NBA games by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether LeBron James _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerLeBron James@content_dividerAmerican professional basketball player – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ plays more than 65 regular season games _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerregular season games@content_dividerNBA scheduled games excluding playoffs – NBA.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ in the 2025-26 National Basketball Association (NBA) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerNBA@content_dividerNorth American professional basketball league – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ season by _$TIME_1 according to official NBA records published at NBA.com.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official NBA statistics _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerofficial NBA statistics@content_dividergame participation data published by NBA.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm LeBron James has played at least 66 regular season games by _$TIME_1. Verification includes cross-checking NBA.com box scores, game logs, or official Lakers announcements _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerLos Angeles Lakers@content_dividerprofessional NBA team based in Los Angeles – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_. Backup confirmation may use major sports media reports with dual tier-1 source verification.

This market resolves 'No' if LeBron James plays 65 or fewer regular season games by _$TIME_1, if the NBA season is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if LeBron James is officially ruled out for the season or does not exist as a player, or if official NBA or authoritative sources fail to confirm game participation. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing NBA.com official records. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the 2025-26 NBA regular season does not occur or LeBron James does not participate in any games.

items.title: Luka Dončić > 25 points per game by April 15, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Luka Dončić averages more than 25 points per game during the entire 2025-2026 NBA regular season based on official NBA statistics _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerPoints per game@content_divideraverage number of points scored per game by a player – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ compiled and published after the season ends by the NBA _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerNBA@content_dividerNational Basketball Association, the major professional basketball league in North America – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if official NBA statistics published on the NBA website or equivalent authoritative NBA sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial NBA statistics@content_dividerhttps://www.nba.com/stats/player/ Luka Dončić)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm Luka Dončić's points per game average exceeds 25 by _$TIME_1, using the official regular season games only, excluding playoffs and exhibitions.

Resolves 'No' if Luka Dončić's official regular season points per game average is 25 or less by _$TIME_1, if the 2025-2026 NBA season is cancelled or indefinitely postponed before completion, if Luka Dončić does not play any official regular season game, or if reliable official data is unavailable by _$TIME_1. Conflicting information will be resolved by prioritizing NBA official publications and archived versions from the Internet Archive as fallback. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event (the 2025-2026 NBA season or Dončić's participation) does not exist.

items.title: 户晨风 accounts unblocked by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether 户晨风’s social media accounts are unblocked by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerAccount unblock@content_dividerthe restoration of full user access rights to a previously blocked or suspended social media account – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ as verified by official social media platforms or authoritative news outlets.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official statement or explicit confirmation from 户晨风’s verified accounts on Douyin, Weibo, Bilibili, or Xiaohongshu, or a report by at least two major authoritative news outlets _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerAuthoritative news outlets@content_dividernationally or internationally recognized media organizations with editorial verification standards – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms unblocking by _$TIME_1. Alternative verification includes screenshots, videos, or posts from verified accounts archived or publicly accessible.

Resolves 'No' if no verifiable confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if the unblocking is officially denied, indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if the accounts remain inaccessible. Conflicting information resolves in favor of official platform statements or multiple verified media reports. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the accounts were never blocked or if the event never occurred.

items.title: Luckin Coffee largest store count in China by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Luckin Coffee has more total stores in mainland China than Starbucks as of _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerStore count@content_dividerthe total number of retail outlets or stores operated by a company in a defined region – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, based on official company disclosures and verified store listings.

Resolves 'Yes' if official disclosures from Luckin Coffee _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerLuckin Coffee@content_dividerChinese coffee chain company – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and Starbucks _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerStarbucks@content_dividerAmerican multinational coffeehouse chain – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ published on their official websites or regulatory filings by _$TIME_1 confirm Luckin Coffee’s store count in China exceeds Starbucks’ by that date. Verification includes publicly accessible, authoritative databases or filings such as quarterly earnings reports, regulatory submissions, or company press releases.

Resolves 'No' if no such confirmation occurs by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if official data is unavailable or unverifiable, or if Starbucks maintains equal or greater store count. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing official company disclosures and regulatory filings. Additionally, resolves 'No' if official store count data does not exist or if the comparison is fundamentally different from the defined criteria.

items.title: Nvidia AI chip sales to China by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Nvidia records any AI chip revenue from sales to China markets by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerNvidia@content_dividerthe American technology company specializing in graphics processing units and AI chips – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, as reported in official Nvidia financial disclosures or verified regulatory filings.

Resolves 'Yes' if official Nvidia financial statements, regulatory filings, or credible company announcements _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerofficial Nvidia disclosures@content_dividerNvidia’s quarterly or annual reports published on https://investor.nvidia.com and filings to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission – SEC)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm recorded revenue from AI chip sales to China by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes major financial media reporting with dual tier-1 source confirmation or official trade data from authoritative agencies.

Resolves 'No' if no verifiable AI chip sales revenue to China is reported by Nvidia by _$TIME_1, if sales are officially denied or cancelled, if China bans or restricts Nvidia AI chip imports _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerChina ban@content_dividerChinese regulatory prohibitions on Nvidia AI chips reported by credible sources such as Financial Times)_$ANNOTATION$_, or if authoritative sources confirm non-existence of such sales. In case of conflicting data, official Nvidia disclosures and SEC filings take precedence. This market also resolves 'No' if the event of Nvidia selling AI chips to China never existed or was indefinitely postponed.

If official financial data or authoritative sources are unavailable by _$TIME_1, resolution defaults to 'No'. Verification includes persistent archive checks such as the SEC EDGAR database, Internet Archive snapshots, and major financial news archives. Conflicts or ambiguities are resolved by prioritizing primary company disclosures and regulatory reports.

items.title: Superintelligent AI agent readiness audit platform launch by April 30, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Superintelligent, an AI technology company _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerSuperintelligent@content_dividercompany developing advanced artificial intelligence systems and platforms – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, officially launches its Agent Readiness Audit platform _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerAgent Readiness Audit platform@content_dividera software platform using AI voice agents to assess enterprise readiness for AI agent adoption – company official descriptions)_$ANNOTATION$_ for enterprise customers by _$TIME_1. Resolution depends on confirmation from official Superintelligent announcements or verified platform availability notices.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Superintelligent publicly announces the launch of the Agent Readiness Audit platform or makes the platform available to enterprise customers by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial launch confirmation@content_dividerstatement or notice published on Superintelligent’s official website, verified social media, or major tier-1 media with direct company confirmation)_$ANNOTATION$_. Backup verification includes archived official statements or platform access records confirming enterprise availability.

This market resolves 'No' if no such official announcement or platform availability confirmation is published by _$TIME_1, if the launch is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if reliable verification is unavailable. In case of conflicting information, resolution follows official Superintelligent sources first, then major tier-1 media. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the platform never existed or was never planned.

items.title: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander NBA MVP by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Shai Gilgeous-Alexander _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerShai Gilgeous-Alexander@content_dividerCanadian professional basketball player for the NBA's Oklahoma City Thunder – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ wins the NBA Most Valuable Player (MVP) award _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerNBA MVP Award@content_dividerannual award given to the best performing player of the National Basketball Association regular season – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ for the 2025-26 NBA season, confirmed by an official NBA announcement or publication on NBA.com by _$TIME_1.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the NBA officially announces Shai Gilgeous-Alexander as the MVP winner for the 2025-26 season via NBA.com _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerNBA.com@content_dividerOfficial website of the National Basketball Association with authoritative announcements – https://www.nba.com/)_$ANNOTATION$_ or an official NBA press release by _$TIME_1. Verification includes direct NBA publications or major media outlets citing NBA.com or NBA official statements.

This market resolves 'No' if no official NBA confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if the award is given to another player, if the 2025-26 NBA MVP award is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicts are resolved prioritizing official NBA sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the NBA MVP award for the 2025-26 season does not exist or was not awarded.

items.title: 币安人生 listing on Binance Spot by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the cryptocurrency token 币安人生 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_divider币安人生@content_dividera digital token associated with Binance branding and ecosystem – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ is officially listed for trading on the Binance Spot market _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerBinance Spot market@content_dividerthe cryptocurrency spot trading platform operated by Binance exchange – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 according to official Binance.com announcements or verified trading commencement notices.

Resolves 'Yes' if Binance.com or its verified official communication channels _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerBinance official channels@content_dividerBinance.com website, verified social media accounts, official press releases – Binance)_$ANNOTATION$_ publish a listing confirmation or if active trading of 币安人生 on Binance Spot begins on or before _$TIME_1. Backup confirmation includes major tier-1 media reports citing official Binance sources or verified exchange data providers.

Resolves 'No' if no official listing announcement or verified trading activity occurs by _$TIME_1, if Binance announces cancellation or indefinite postponement of the listing, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory. If the token never existed or Binance Spot never planned to list it, resolves 'No'. Conflicts are resolved prioritizing official Binance sources. This market defaults to 'No' absent positive confirmation.

items.title: MegaETH public token sale oversubscribed > 200× by October 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the MegaETH public token sale receives subscription commitments at least 200 times the planned offering size by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerOversubscription@content_dividerpublic token sale receiving commitments ≥200× planned offering size – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, verified by official subscription volume data from MegaETH and Cobie's Sonar platform _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCobie's Sonar platform@content_dividera crypto token sale and market data platform operated by Cobie, a recognized crypto analyst – Official Project Sources)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official subscription volume data confirming ≥200× oversubscription is published by MegaETH's official website or verified social media accounts _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial source@content_dividerMegaETH official website or verified social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, or if Cobie's Sonar platform reports matching subscription metrics by the same deadline. Backup verification includes archived snapshots via Internet Archive or reputable crypto industry reports.

This market resolves 'No' if the oversubscription threshold is not met by _$TIME_1, if the token sale is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if no authoritative verification is available by the deadline. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing MegaETH official disclosures, then Cobie's Sonar platform. The market also resolves 'No' if the token sale does not occur or never existed.

items.title: SpaceX DOGE-1 launch by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether SpaceX successfully launches the DOGE-1 CubeSat funded entirely by Dogecoin and deploys its payload according to official mission parameters by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerDOGE-1 mission@content_dividera CubeSat lunar mission funded entirely with the cryptocurrency Dogecoin, planned by Geometric Energy Corporation and launched by SpaceX Falcon 9 – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if official statements from SpaceX or Geometric Energy Corporation _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial statements@content_dividerpress releases, verified social media posts, or official company websites)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm the DOGE-1 mission launch and payload deployment on or before _$TIME_1, and confirmation is corroborated by reputable space industry trackers such as Nanosats Database or major space news outlets _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerSpace industry trackers@content_dividerdatabases or media outlets tracking satellite launches and space missions – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if the DOGE-1 mission is not launched or payload not deployed by _$TIME_1, if the mission is officially cancelled or postponed beyond _$TIME_1, if reliable official confirmation is unavailable, or if the event never existed or is fundamentally different from the specified CubeSat lunar mission. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official SpaceX and Geometric Energy Corporation sources, followed by reputable industry trackers. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the DOGE-1 mission does not occur as defined.

items.title: Avalanche most used enterprise blockchain by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Avalanche achieves the highest usage among enterprise blockchain networks by _$TIME_1 based on institutional deployments, transaction volume share, and integration with regulated financial products as reported by official Avalanche ecosystem updates and institutional announcements _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerAvalanche@content_dividerAvalanche: a decentralized open-source blockchain platform supporting smart contracts and customizable interlinked blockchains – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerEnterprise blockchain@content_dividerenterprise blockchain: a blockchain network designed for business use, enabling secure and permissioned transactions among institutions – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official Avalanche sources or verified institutional announcements _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial Avalanche sources@content_dividercompany websites, verified social media accounts, or regulatory filings)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm by _$TIME_1 that Avalanche leads all enterprise blockchain networks in institutional deployments, transaction volume share, and regulated financial product integrations, with verification available through major tier-1 media reports or published ecosystem statistics.

This market resolves 'No' if the conditions for 'Yes' are not met by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if authoritative verification is unavailable, or if official sources confirm that Avalanche is not the leading enterprise blockchain network by the deadline. Conflicting reports resolve in favor of primary official sources. Also resolves 'No' if the enterprise blockchain market or Avalanche ecosystem updates do not exist or cannot be verified by _$TIME_1.

items.title: Ripple partners with Mastercard or PayPal by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Ripple, a blockchain payment solutions company _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerRipple@content_dividera technology company specializing in blockchain-based cross-border payment solutions – company website)_$ANNOTATION$_, publicly announces a formal partnership agreement with a major global financial institution such as Mastercard _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerMastercard@content_dividera multinational financial services corporation known for payment processing – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or PayPal _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerPayPal@content_divideran online payments company facilitating digital transactions – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. The date of the official press release or verified company statement is the measurement point.

This market resolves 'Yes' if by _$TIME_1 Ripple publishes an official press release or statement on its verified website or verified social media accounts _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividerstatement published on company’s official website or verified social media channels)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirming a new formal partnership with Mastercard or PayPal. Backup verification may include corroboration by Mastercard or PayPal official announcements or at least two independent tier-1 media outlets with explicit confirmation.

This market resolves 'No' if no such official announcement is made by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed before _$TIME_1, if authoritative verification is unavailable at resolution, or if the partnership does not meet the formal agreement definition. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing direct official sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never existed or no partnership was formed.

items.title: Cobie hosts Jeff Yan on Up Only podcast by April 30, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Jeff Yan appears as a guest on the Up Only podcast hosted by Cobie by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerUp Only podcast@content_dividera cryptocurrency-focused podcast hosted by Cobie featuring interviews with industry figures – Official Up Only website)_$ANNOTATION$_, according to official announcements or verified statements by the host.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official source _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial source@content_dividerUp Only podcast official website, verified social media accounts of Cobie or Up Only, or official podcast episode listings)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms Jeff Yan’s guest appearance by _$TIME_1, supported by public episode release or host confirmation _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerVerification methods@content_dividerofficial podcast episode page, verified Twitter announcements from Cobie or Up Only, or major crypto media outlets with dual verification)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if no verified official confirmation of Jeff Yan’s guest appearance exists by _$TIME_1, if the event (podcast episode) is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative sources do not verify the appearance. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing primary official sources. This market also resolves 'No' if the event never occurred or was never scheduled.

items.title: Los Angeles Dodgers win 2025 World Series by November 30?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Los Angeles Dodgers _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerLos Angeles Dodgers@content_dividera professional Major League Baseball team based in Los Angeles, California – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ win the 2025 World Series _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerWorld Series@content_dividerthe annual championship series of Major League Baseball, contested in a best-of-seven format – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by official MLB announcement after the final game and before _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'Yes' if the official Major League Baseball (MLB) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerMajor League Baseball@content_dividerthe professional baseball organization governing the highest level of play in North America – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ announcement confirms the Dodgers as 2025 World Series champions by _$TIME_1, based on the official best-of-seven series outcome with verification from MLB.com _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerMLB.com@content_dividerofficial MLB website https://www.mlb.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ and corroborated by at least two major tier-1 sports media outlets.

Resolves 'No' if the Dodgers do not win the 2025 World Series as confirmed by MLB by _$TIME_1, if the World Series is cancelled, indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if authoritative confirmation is unavailable or contradictory. In case of conflicting information, MLB official sources take precedence. Also resolves 'No' if the event never occurs or the Dodgers do not participate in the final series.

items.title: Bitcoin > $100,000 by February 29, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin's USD closing price, aggregated across major cryptocurrency exchanges, is strictly greater than $100,000 at any time during the day of February 29, 2026 according to official financial data providers and cryptocurrency market aggregators.

Resolves 'Yes' if at any time on February 29, 2026, the official aggregated USD closing price of Bitcoin exceeds $100,000, confirmed by at least one primary source such as CoinMarketCap, CoinGecko, or major regulated exchange data published by official company websites or major financial news outlets by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividera digital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification includes archived snapshots or official API data accessible at settlement. Alternative confirmation may come from major financial media with dual tier-1 source verification and/or official cryptocurrency exchange closing price data.

Resolves 'No' if Bitcoin's price never exceeds $100,000 on February 29, 2026, if the event is cancelled (e.g., market closure or trading halt on that day), if reliable price data is unavailable or unverifiable by _$TIME_1, or if conflicting authoritative information negates the price threshold. In cases of data conflict, official aggregated exchange data and primary cryptocurrency market aggregators take precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Bitcoin or the price market does not exist or is suspended on that date.

items.title: Apple foldable iPhone release before September 1, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Apple Inc. _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerApple Inc.@content_dividerAmerican multinational technology company specializing in consumer electronics and software – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ officially releases its first foldable iPhone _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerfoldable iPhone@content_dividera smartphone by Apple with a display that can be folded along a hinge – Oxford Dictionary)_$ANNOTATION$_ at any time before _$TIME_1, determined by official Apple announcements or verified supply chain disclosures.

Resolves 'Yes' if Apple publicly confirms the availability or launch date of a foldable iPhone by _$TIME_1 via official website announcements _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerApple official website@content_dividerhttps://www.apple.com)_$ANNOTATION$_, verified press releases, or credible supply chain disclosures from major suppliers such as Samsung Display with corroboration from at least one tier-1 technology news source.

Resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation or credible supply chain disclosure is published by _$TIME_1, if release is officially cancelled or postponed indefinitely, or if evidence is insufficient or contradictory. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official Apple communications, followed by major supplier announcements and authoritative media reports. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Apple never plans or announces such a product before the deadline.

items.title: MegaETH mainnet launch and Token Generation Event by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether MegaETH officially launches its mainnet _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMainnet@content_dividerthe fully operational blockchain network distinct from a testnet – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and conducts its Token Generation Event (TGE) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerToken Generation Event@content_dividerthe event where a new cryptocurrency token is created and distributed – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, as confirmed by official announcements or documented token distributions from MegaETH or its authorized partners.

Resolves 'Yes' if official confirmation _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial confirmation@content_dividerstatement published on MegaETH's official website, verified social media accounts, or regulatory filings)_$ANNOTATION$_ is published by _$TIME_1 explicitly stating the mainnet launch and completion of the TGE, or if verifiable blockchain data _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerBlockchain data@content_dividerpublic ledger records confirming token distribution events – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ indicate the TGE occurred by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes major media reports _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerMajor media@content_dividertop-tier news outlets with dual source verification)_$ANNOTATION$_ and archived snapshots _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=6@counter_dividerInternet Archive@content_dividerhttps://archive.org)_$ANNOTATION$_ of official announcements.

Resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation or verifiable token distribution is found by _$TIME_1, if the mainnet launch or TGE is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if verification data is unavailable or contradictory by _$TIME_1. This includes cases where MegaETH mainnet or TGE never occurred or was never scheduled. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official MegaETH sources and regulatory filings.

items.title: MegaETH mainnet launch and Token Generation Event by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether MegaETH officially launches its mainnet _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMainnet@content_dividerthe fully operational blockchain network distinct from a testnet – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and conducts its Token Generation Event (TGE) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerToken Generation Event@content_dividerthe event where a new cryptocurrency token is created and distributed – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, as confirmed by official announcements or documented token distributions from MegaETH or its authorized partners.

Resolves 'Yes' if official confirmation _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial confirmation@content_dividerstatement published on MegaETH's official website, verified social media accounts, or regulatory filings)_$ANNOTATION$_ is published by _$TIME_1 explicitly stating the mainnet launch and completion of the TGE, or if verifiable blockchain data _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerBlockchain data@content_dividerpublic ledger records confirming token distribution events – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ indicate the TGE occurred by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes major media reports _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerMajor media@content_dividertop-tier news outlets with dual source verification)_$ANNOTATION$_ and archived snapshots _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=6@counter_dividerInternet Archive@content_dividerhttps://archive.org)_$ANNOTATION$_ of official announcements.

Resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation or verifiable token distribution is found by _$TIME_1, if the mainnet launch or TGE is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if verification data is unavailable or contradictory by _$TIME_1. This includes cases where MegaETH mainnet or TGE never occurred or was never scheduled. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official MegaETH sources and regulatory filings.

items.title: Polymarket funding round $15B valuation by October 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Polymarket completes a funding round _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerFunding round@content_dividera financing event where an investor or group invests capital in exchange for equity or convertible securities – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ at a valuation of at least $15 billion USD _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerValuation@content_dividerthe estimated worth or market value of a company or asset expressed in USD – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, as confirmed by official Polymarket or investor announcements with valuation based on agreed investment terms at round closing.

This market resolves 'Yes' if credible confirmation of funding round completion at or above $15 billion USD valuation is published by Polymarket or lead investors by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividerstatement published on Polymarket’s official website, verified social media accounts, or investor press releases)_$ANNOTATION$_. Backup verification includes major tier-1 financial media reports with explicit valuation details and corroboration from two or more independent sources.

This market resolves 'No' if the funding round is not completed at or above $15 billion USD valuation by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled, postponed indefinitely beyond _$TIME_1, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the funding round does not exist or never takes place by the deadline. In case of conflicting data, priority is given to official Polymarket or investor disclosures.

items.title: Bitcoin > $124,128 by October 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin's price in USD exceeds $124,128 according to aggregated prices from major cryptocurrency exchanges by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividera digital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if authoritative price data from at least two major exchanges such as Coinbase, Binance, or Kraken _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerMajor exchanges@content_dividerleading cryptocurrency trading platforms providing USD price data – Investopedia)_$ANNOTATION$_ shows Bitcoin's highest traded price exceeds $124,128 at any point before or at _$TIME_1. Verification requires published official exchange data or aggregated market data reports _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerPrice data verification@content_dividerpublicly accessible price charts, exchange APIs, or regulatory filings)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if Bitcoin fails to exceed $124,128 by _$TIME_1, if trading is halted or markets are closed preventing price discovery, if official price data is unavailable or unverifiable by _$TIME_1, or if the event never occurs. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing official exchange data and verified market aggregators. The market also resolves 'No' if Bitcoin trading ceases or the price index is discontinued before _$TIME_1.

items.title: Polymarket and UMA next-gen oracle launch with token choice by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Polymarket and UMA officially launch a next-generation prediction market oracle enabling selection of dispute resolution tokens beyond the $UMA token by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerNext-generation oracle@content_divideran advanced oracle system improving prediction market dispute resolution with token choice capability – derived from search context)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to official announcements from Polymarket or UMA.

Resolves 'Yes' if an explicit launch confirmation is published by official UMA or Polymarket channels _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_divinerespective official channels@content_dividerofficial websites, verified social media accounts, or press releases of UMA or Polymarket)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, confirming markets can select dispute tokens other than the $UMA token for dispute resolution as defined in the market description.

Resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation is available by _$TIME_1, if the launch is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, if the functionality does not include token choice beyond $UMA, or if verification sources are unavailable or contradictory. Conflicting information resolves by prioritizing official UMA or Polymarket sources. Also resolves 'No' if the event never existed or was never planned.

items.title: Ethereum price > $4,300 by November 20, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the closing price of Ethereum (ETH) in USD exceeds $4,300 on any major cryptocurrency exchange by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerEthereum@content_dividera decentralized open-source blockchain platform with smart contract functionality – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerClosing price@content_dividerthe final trading price recorded at the end of a trading period – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, based on aggregated exchange data including Coinbase, Binance, Kraken, and Bitstamp.

Resolves 'Yes' if at least one major cryptocurrency exchange officially reports a closing price for ETH strictly greater than $4,300 USD on _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerDeadline@content_divider2025-11-20T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification requires data from official exchange APIs, published end-of-day price summaries, or authoritative financial data providers such as CoinMarketCap or CoinGecko accessible at or immediately after _$TIME_1. Backup confirmation may include archived snapshots from the Internet Archive or regulatory filings referencing ETH prices.

Resolves 'No' if no major exchange reports ETH closing price above $4,300 USD on _$TIME_1, if trading is halted or the market is closed on _$TIME_1, if ETH is delisted or ceases to exist by _$TIME_1, or if reliable price data is unavailable by resolution. Conflicting data resolves by prioritizing official exchange publications followed by aggregated market data providers. Additionally, resolves 'No' if ETH fundamentally ceases to exist or is replaced by a different asset before _$TIME_1.

items.title: Polymarket IPO by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Polymarket completes an Initial Public Offering (IPO) according to official company announcements or credible news sources by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerInitial Public Offering (IPO)@content_dividerthe first sale of stock by a private company to the public – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and a real-money trade occurs on a regulated Polymarket-operated Designated Contract Market before _$TIME_1.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Polymarket or its parent company Circle publicly confirms IPO completion by official statements published on company websites or verified social media accounts _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial announcements@content_dividerstatements published on company websites or verified social media accounts – Primary source)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, and if trading of Polymarket shares or equivalent real-money securities is confirmed on a regulated Polymarket-operated Designated Contract Market by that time. Backup verification includes major media reports corroborated by two or more tier-1 sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerTier-1 sources@content_dividerleading established media or regulatory filings – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'No' if no verified IPO completion is confirmed by _$TIME_1, if the IPO is officially cancelled or postponed indefinitely, if Circle is acquired by a public company before IPO, or if no real-money trading occurs on a regulated Polymarket-operated Designated Contract Market by _$TIME_1. In case of conflicting information, official Polymarket or Circle disclosures take precedence. This market also resolves 'No' if the IPO event never existed or did not take place as specified.

items.title: San Antonio Spurs win 2025 Emirates NBA In-Season Cup by December 16?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the San Antonio Spurs _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerSan Antonio Spurs@content_dividerprofessional NBA basketball team based in San Antonio, Texas – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ win the 2025 Emirates NBA In-Season Cup _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerEmirates NBA In-Season Cup@content_divideran official NBA mid-season tournament sponsored by Emirates airline, held during the 2025 NBA season – NBA.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 according to the official NBA Cup Final result as published by NBA authorities.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the San Antonio Spurs are officially declared the winners of the 2025 Emirates NBA In-Season Cup Final by the National Basketball Association (NBA) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerNBA@content_dividerNational Basketball Association, the professional basketball league in North America – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Verification requires official NBA announcements on NBA.com or verified NBA social media accounts. Backup verification includes major tier-1 sports media with explicit NBA confirmation.

This market resolves 'No' if the Spurs do not win the Cup Final by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if official NBA confirmation is unavailable by that time. In case of conflicting or missing data, resolution prioritizes direct NBA sources, then major verified sports media, and finally archived NBA official records. The market also resolves 'No' if the tournament or final does not occur or if the Spurs do not participate.

items.title: Lando Norris regains lead over Oscar Piastri by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Lando Norris surpasses Oscar Piastri in the official 2025 Formula 1 drivers' championship points standings by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerLando Norris@content_dividerBritish Formula 1 racing driver – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOscar Piastri@content_dividerAustralian Formula 1 racing driver – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ , as published by Formula 1's official channels after the final scheduled 2025 race.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the final official 2025 F1 drivers' standings published by Formula 1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerFormula 1@content_dividerthe highest class of international single-seater auto racing sanctioned by the FIA – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or the race organizers show Lando Norris's points strictly greater than Oscar Piastri's by _$TIME_1. Verification includes official Formula 1 website standings, FIA publications, or authorized race organizer reports.

This market resolves 'No' if Lando Norris's points do not surpass Oscar Piastri's in the final official 2025 standings by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or postponed beyond that date, if official results are unavailable, or if authoritative verification fails. Conflicting data resolves to the official Formula 1 published standings. The market also resolves 'No' if the 2025 F1 season or the drivers' championship does not occur as specified.

items.title: BTS, EXO, BIGBANG K-pop tour box office record by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether combined global tour box office revenue generated by BTS, EXO, and BIGBANG during calendar year 2026 surpasses all previous K-pop global tour records as defined by official financial and industry reports by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBox office revenue@content_dividertotal income from ticket sales and related earnings at live performance events – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if authoritative sources such as official financial disclosures from BTS's, EXO's, and BIGBANG's management companies, recognized industry reports (e.g., Billboard Boxscore, IFPI), or major verified media outlets _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_divinereliable sources@content_dividerofficial company websites, industry-standard box office data, verified news organizations)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm combined 2026 global tour earnings exceed all prior K-pop records by _$TIME_1. Confirmation requires published aggregated revenue data or official announcements available at primary sources or through archival records.

This market resolves 'No' if combined 2026 tour earnings do not exceed prior records by _$TIME_1, if any of the tours are cancelled, indefinitely postponed, or if official box office data and reliable verification remain unavailable or contradictory by _$TIME_1. In case of conflicting data, resolution defaults to highest-priority official financial disclosures. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the tours do not occur or never existed as scheduled.

items.title: OpenAI AI agent full task management by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether OpenAI officially rolls out a fully functional AI agent _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerAI agent@content_divideran autonomous software entity performing tasks on behalf of a user – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ capable of managing real tasks including email handling and scheduling _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerFull task management@content_dividerautonomous handling of emails, scheduling, and related user tasks as announced by OpenAI)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, according to official OpenAI announcements or product releases _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOpenAI@content_dividerOpenAI: AI research and deployment company, https://openai.com)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if OpenAI publishes explicit, verifiable confirmation _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOfficial confirmation@content_dividerstatements on OpenAI's official website, verified social media, or regulatory filings)_$ANNOTATION$_ of such AI agent availability by _$TIME_1, supported by product documentation or API/SDK release notes _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerAPI and SDK@content_dividerapplication programming interface and software development kit enabling agent use)_$ANNOTATION$_ accessible to general or commercial users. Backup verification includes major technology media reports with dual tier-1 source confirmation.

This market resolves 'No' if no authoritative confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if the release is officially cancelled, indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, if the product lacks full autonomous task management capability as defined, or if verification data is unavailable or contradictory. In case of conflicts, priority is given to official OpenAI sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the AI agent rollout event never existed or was never planned.

items.title: Rain in Michigan on Halloween night, October 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures measurable precipitation occurrence during October 31, 2025, local time in Michigan _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMeasurable precipitation@content_dividerprecipitation recorded as measurable rainfall or equivalent by official weather services – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and resolves using official weather data and forecasts from Farmers' Almanac and AccuWeather.

Resolves 'Yes' if any official weather service _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial weather service@content_dividergovernment meteorological agencies such as National Weather Service or National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or Farmers' Almanac _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerFarmers' Almanac@content_dividera US-based long-range weather forecast publication – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or AccuWeather _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerAccuWeather@content_dividera global commercial weather forecasting company – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reports measurable precipitation in Michigan during October 31, 2025 local time (Eastern Time Zone), verified by official publications or archived data by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'No' if no measurable precipitation is recorded by official sources or valid forecasts by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed (e.g., if Michigan experiences no weather data reporting for the date), or if insufficient reliable verification exists. Conflicting data resolves by prioritizing official government meteorological sources, followed by Farmers' Almanac and AccuWeather. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event or measurement does not exist.

items.title: US airstrikes on Venezuelan soil by October 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the United States conducts any kinetic military attack _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerKinetic military attack@content_dividera physical use of force involving explosives or weapons causing damage – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on the mainland territory of Venezuela by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerDeadline@content_divider2025-10-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ .

Resolves 'Yes' if an official announcement or statement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividera public declaration from an authorized government source – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirming such airstrikes is published by the US Department of Defense or the White House by _$TIME_1, verifiable at https://www.defense.gov or https://www.whitehouse.gov. Alternative verification includes credible government statements reported by at least two major tier-1 media outlets or official US government social media accounts.

Resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed beyond that time, if authoritative verification is unavailable, or if the attacks occur only on vessels off the coast but not on Venezuelan mainland territory. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official US government declarations. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never occurred or was never planned.

items.title: Fogo Chain Token Generation Event by November 30, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Fogo Chain completes its Token Generation Event (TGE) by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerToken Generation Event@content_divideran event where a blockchain project issues and distributes its tokens to investors or the public – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, defined as official issuance and distribution announcements by the Fogo Foundation.

Resolves 'Yes' if the Fogo Foundation publishes an official announcement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerFogo Foundation@content_dividerthe organization responsible for the development and governance of Fogo Chain – official website)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirming token issuance and distribution by _$TIME_1. Verification includes official website publications, verified social media accounts, or major media reports citing official statements.

Resolves 'No' if no official announcement occurs by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or postponed indefinitely beyond _$TIME_1, if authoritative sources deny occurrence, or if reliable verification is unavailable. In case of conflicting information, official Fogo Foundation statements take precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the Token Generation Event never existed or was never planned.

items.title: Louvre robbers caught by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether at least one suspect involved in the Louvre museum robbery _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerLouvre museum robbery@content_dividerthe theft of valuable jewels from the Louvre museum in Paris on October 19, 2025 – Reuters)_$ANNOTATION$_ is officially confirmed as arrested by French law enforcement or INTERPOL by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ .
