This market resolves 'Yes' if an official announcement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerofficial announcement@content_dividerstatement published by French authorities or INTERPOL on their verified websites or official communications)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms at least one suspect has been caught by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes credible reports from major tier-1 media outlets corroborated by two or more independent sources or verified visual evidence with source attribution.

This market resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation is available by _$TIME_1, if the event of arrest is officially denied, postponed beyond the deadline, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the robbery event never occurred or if no suspects exist. Conflicting reports resolve by prioritizing official French government and INTERPOL sources.

items.title: FC Barcelona defeats Real Madrid by October 26, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether FC Barcelona wins the official La Liga match against Real Madrid played on October 26, 2025, at Estadio Santiago Bernabéu, Madrid, as determined by the final official score published by La Liga _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerLa Liga@content_dividerthe top professional football division of the Spanish football league system – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and verified authoritative sources.

Resolves 'Yes' if FC Barcelona’s official final score exceeds Real Madrid’s as confirmed by the official La Liga website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerLa Liga official website@content_dividerhttps://www.laliga.com/en-ES)_$ANNOTATION$_ or equivalent official communications by _$TIME_1. Verification may also use major tier-1 sports media outlets such as ESPN _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerESPN@content_dividermajor sports news organization – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and Flashscore _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerFlashscore@content_dividerreal-time sports score tracking website – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ with cross-confirmed match reports and official score announcements.

Resolves 'No' if FC Barcelona does not win by _$TIME_1, if the match is cancelled or postponed indefinitely, if official final results are unavailable or unverifiable, or if the event does not occur as scheduled. Conflicting information resolution prioritizes official La Liga sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the match is never played or officially does not exist.

items.title: Fluent standard for cross-VM execution by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Fluent _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerFluent@content_dividera blockchain platform enabling atomic execution across multiple virtual machines – derived from official Fluent technical documentation and blockchain industry sources)_$ANNOTATION$_ becomes the primary standard for cross-VM execution _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCross-VM execution@content_dividerthe capability to execute transactions atomically across different virtual machine environments – industry blockchain terminology)_$ANNOTATION$_ in the blockchain ecosystem by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'Yes' if official Fluent communications or major blockchain projects publish _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividerstatements on Fluent’s website, verified social media, or major media outlets)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirming adoption of Fluent as the primary cross-VM execution platform by multiple projects and developers by _$TIME_1, corroborated by developer activity metrics _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerDeveloper activity metrics@content_dividerquantitative data on developer engagement and deployment on Fluent – from blockchain analytics providers)_$ANNOTATION$_ and ecosystem integration reports _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerEcosystem integration reports@content_dividerauthoritative third-party or blockchain consortium reports on platform integration)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if no authoritative confirmation of Fluent as the primary cross-VM standard exists by _$TIME_1, if official sources deny or contradict the adoption, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if the ecosystem adopts a different platform. Conflicts in data resolve by prioritizing official Fluent sources, major blockchain project announcements, and verified analytics. Additionally, resolves 'No' if cross-VM execution standards do not coalesce around Fluent or if the concept is obsolete or non-existent.

items.title: UEFA Champions League knockout qualification by April 30, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether any team qualifies for the 2025–26 UEFA Champions League knockout phase by official match results before or at _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerUEFA Champions League knockout phase@content_dividerthe post-league phase competition rounds in the UEFA Champions League where teams advance toward the final – UEFA official competition rules)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to UEFA official records and match reports.

Resolves 'Yes' if UEFA publishes official confirmation _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUEFA official confirmation@content_dividerstatements or match results on UEFA.com or verified UEFA social media)_$ANNOTATION$_ that at least one team has officially qualified for the knockout phase by _$TIME_1, validated by UEFA match results and the knockout phase draw release at https://www.uefa.com/uefachampionsleague/fixtures-results/ or equivalent official UEFA sources. Backup verification includes major tier-1 sports media with explicit UEFA confirmation.

Resolves 'No' if no official UEFA confirmation of any team qualifying occurs by _$TIME_1, if the knockout phase is cancelled or postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if official data is unavailable or contradictory. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing UEFA official sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the knockout phase does not exist or no matches occur before _$TIME_1.

items.title: Peter Schiff x Changpeng Zhao Bitcoin vs Tokenized Gold debate by October 30, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether a public debate comparing Bitcoin _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividera decentralized digital currency without a central bank or single administrator – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and tokenized gold assets _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerTokenized gold@content_dividerdigital representation of gold ownership on a blockchain – Oxford Dictionary)_$ANNOTATION$_ featuring Peter Schiff _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerPeter Schiff@content_dividerAmerican financial commentator, economist, and author known for gold advocacy – Wikipedia)_$ANNOTATION$_ and Changpeng Zhao _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerChangpeng Zhao@content_dividerFounder and CEO of Binance, a major cryptocurrency exchange – Wikipedia)_$ANNOTATION$_ occurs by _$TIME_1 and is confirmed by public announcements or credible media reports.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official statements, verified social media posts from either Peter Schiff or Changpeng Zhao, or credible media coverage _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerCredible media@content_dividermajor reputable news outlets with explicit event confirmation)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm the debate's occurrence by _$TIME_1. Verification includes event listings on official platforms, press releases, or video evidence from verified sources.

This market resolves 'No' if no verifiable evidence confirms the debate by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative sources explicitly deny it. In case of conflicting information, official statements from either participant or major media with dual confirmation prevail. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the debate never existed or was never scheduled.

items.title: United States deposes Nicolás Maduro by January 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Nicolás Maduro ceases to be President of Venezuela by legal, political, or military means by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerDeposition@content_dividerthe removal or replacement of a person from office by lawful, political, or military actions – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to official government announcements or credible international agency reports.

Resolves 'Yes' if official U.S. or Venezuelan government sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial government sources@content_dividerofficial government publications, verified websites, or authoritative agency reports)_$ANNOTATION$_ or credible international organizations such as the Organization of American States _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOrganization of American States@content_divideran intergovernmental organization focused on regional solidarity and cooperation – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ explicitly confirm Nicolás Maduro’s removal or replacement as President of Venezuela by _$TIME_1. Verification requires official statements or legal documents published at recognized sites or major verified media outlets with dual tier-1 source confirmation.

Resolves 'No' if Maduro remains in office without official confirmation of removal by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if authoritative verification is unavailable, or if Maduro’s departure occurs through non-legal or non-political/military means. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing official government declarations and major international agency reports. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never occurred or no credible deposition attempt exists.

items.title: Donald Trump completes second presidential term by January 20, 2029?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Donald Trump completes his full second term as President of the United States ending precisely at _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividersecond term@content_dividera full four-year period as President following a successful election and inauguration – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ based on official U.S. presidential records and inauguration schedules.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official U.S. government sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerofficial U.S. government sources@content_dividerpresidential records, National Archives, or White House announcements available at https://www.archives.gov or https://www.whitehouse.gov)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm Donald Trump’s continuous presidency through January 20, 2029, with no interruption, resignation, impeachment removal, death, or incapacity, verified by inauguration schedules and presidential succession records by _$TIME_1.

This market resolves 'No' if Donald Trump does not hold the office continuously through _$TIME_1, if he is not inaugurated for a second term, if the term ends prematurely for any reason, if official sources explicitly contradict term completion, or if verification data is unavailable. Resolution also defaults to 'No' if the second term never exists or is cancelled. Conflicting evidence is resolved by prioritizing official U.S. government presidential records and National Archives.

items.title: BTC > $200,000 by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin's USD price level reaches or exceeds $200,000 at any time by _$TIME_1 as recorded by major cryptocurrency exchange closing prices in USD _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividerdigital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCryptocurrency exchange@content_dividera digital marketplace for buying and selling cryptocurrencies – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if any major cryptocurrency exchange reports an official price of Bitcoin at or above $200,000 USD by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerMajor cryptocurrency exchanges@content_dividerexchanges such as Coinbase, Binance, Kraken, Gemini, or Bitstamp with public market data APIs or verified official publications)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification requires publicly available price data or official announcements from these exchanges or corroborated tier-1 financial news sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerTier-1 sources@content_dividerleading global financial news organizations with direct data verification – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if Bitcoin does not reach or exceed $200,000 USD on any major exchange by _$TIME_1, if all official exchanges remain below that price, if trading of Bitcoin is suspended or exchanges are closed preventing price discovery, or if authoritative verification sources are unavailable or contradictory by _$TIME_1. Conflicts are resolved prioritizing official exchange data and regulatory filings. Also resolves 'No' if Bitcoin ceases to exist or trading halts permanently before _$TIME_1.

items.title: Trump lowers US-China tariffs by October 30?
items.rules:
This market measures whether President Donald Trump formally lowers the official U.S. tariff rates on imports from China by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerTariff rate@content_dividerthe percentage tax imposed on imported goods – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ as announced or implemented through official U.S. government or U.S. Trade Representative communications _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerU.S. Trade Representative@content_dividerexecutive agency responsible for developing and coordinating U.S. international trade policy – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official announcement or published implementation confirms a lower tariff rate on China imports by President Trump or the U.S. Trade Representative on or before _$TIME_1, as documented on official U.S. government websites _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial U.S. government sources@content_dividerhttps://ustr.gov and https://www.whitehouse.gov)_$ANNOTATION$_ or in verified federal regulatory filings _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerFederal Register@content_dividerofficial journal of the U.S. government publishing agency rules and notices – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if no verified official confirmation occurs by _$TIME_1, if tariff reductions are explicitly denied or postponed beyond _$TIME_1, if the event never occurred or was cancelled, or if authoritative sources fail to verify a tariff rate decrease. Conflicting reports resolve by prioritizing official U.S. government publications and statements. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the underlying event does not exist or no tariff change is announced or implemented.

items.title: US government shutdown ends before November 30, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the US federal government shutdown ends at any time on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerUS government shutdown@content_dividera partial or complete cessation of federal government operations due to funding lapses – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ as confirmed by official government announcements from authoritative US federal sources.

This market resolves 'Yes' if an official announcement explicitly ending the shutdown is published by a US federal government agency or the White House by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividerstatement published on government websites or verified social media)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification may also be supported by major tier-1 media outlets corroborating the end of the shutdown, or direct statements from Congressional leadership. Backup verification includes archival records from the Government Publishing Office and Internet Archive snapshots.

This market resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation of shutdown termination is available by _$TIME_1, if the shutdown is officially extended, cancelled, or indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. In case of conflicting information, official US federal government sources take precedence. Additionally, this market resolves 'No' if the shutdown never existed or the event parameters are not met.

items.title: Ethereum (ETH) > $5,000 by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Ethereum (ETH) cryptocurrency price in USD exceeds $5,000 at any time by _$TIME_1 according to major exchange closing prices aggregated from authoritative market data providers _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerEthereum (ETH)@content_dividera decentralized, open-source blockchain platform with its native cryptocurrency Ether – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividercryptocurrency@content_dividera digital currency using cryptography for secure transactions – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if at least one major cryptocurrency exchange _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividercryptocurrency exchange@content_dividera platform for buying and selling cryptocurrencies – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reports Ethereum’s USD price closing at or above $5,000 by _$TIME_1, verified by official exchange records or reputable financial data aggregators such as CoinMarketCap _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerCoinMarketCap@content_dividera leading cryptocurrency price tracking website – Official Site https://coinmarketcap.com)_$ANNOTATION$_. Backup verification includes archived exchange APIs and major financial news outlets with dual tier-1 source confirmation.

This market resolves 'No' if Ethereum price does not reach or surpass $5,000 by _$TIME_1, if major exchanges suspend ETH trading or delist ETH before the deadline, or if reliable price verification data is unavailable. In case of conflicting data, priority is given to official exchange records, with CoinMarketCap and Internet Archive snapshots as fallbacks. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Ethereum or ETH token ceases to exist or is fundamentally altered (e.g., replaced by another token) before _$TIME_1.

items.title: BTC ≥ $120,000 by October 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin price in USD reaches or exceeds $120,000 at any time on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividera digital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, based on aggregated exchange data verified by major crypto platforms and financial news.

Resolves 'Yes' if authoritative sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerAuthoritative sources@content_dividerofficial exchange data aggregators, established financial news outlets, and major crypto platforms)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm Bitcoin traded at ≥ $120,000 USD at any moment on or before _$TIME_1 through published price charts, official exchange APIs, or verified reports.

Resolves 'No' if Bitcoin price never reaches $120,000 USD by _$TIME_1, if data is unavailable or unverified by deadline, or if market trading ceases. Conflicting or absent verification resolves to 'No'. Also resolves 'No' if Bitcoin or trading data do not exist by deadline.

items.title: Grok best large AI model by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Grok, a large-scale artificial intelligence _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerArtificial intelligence@content_dividerthe capability of a machine to imitate intelligent human behavior – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ model developed by xAI _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerxAI@content_divideran artificial intelligence technology company founded by Elon Musk – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, achieves the highest performance on recognized AI evaluation leaderboards such as ARC AGI _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerARC AGI@content_dividerAI Research Challenge assessing progress toward artificial general intelligence – Official ARC website)_$ANNOTATION$_ and standardized math competitions by _$TIME_1.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Grok is confirmed by official leaderboards, xAI announcements, or at least two major tier-1 technology news sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividertier-1 sources@content_dividertop global media outlets with verified reporting standards – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ as achieving the best benchmark scores and demonstrating superior real-world application effectiveness by _$TIME_1. Verification requires benchmark data published on recognized platforms _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerAI benchmark platforms@content_dividerofficial AI performance leaderboards such as ARC AGI, standardized math competition sites)_$ANNOTATION$_, official xAI statements _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=6@counter_dividerxAI official statements@content_dividerstatements on xAI.com or verified xAI social media)_$ANNOTATION$_, or corroborated major media reports.

This market resolves 'No' if Grok does not meet the above conditions by _$TIME_1, if credible sources officially deny Grok’s status as best, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory. In cases of conflicting information, official xAI sources take precedence, followed by recognized benchmark platforms and major media corroboration. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Grok or the relevant benchmarks do not exist or are discontinued before _$TIME_1.

items.title: Sam Bankman-Fried pardon by Donald Trump by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether former FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerSam Bankman-Fried@content_dividerAmerican entrepreneur and former CEO of cryptocurrency exchange FTX – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ receives a presidential pardon _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerPresidential pardon@content_divideran official forgiveness of a crime granted by the President of the United States – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ from Donald Trump _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerDonald Trump@content_divider45th President of the United States, serving 2017-2021 – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 according to official White House or verified government announcements.

This market resolves 'Yes' if an explicit, official pardon announcement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOfficial pardon announcement@content_dividera formal statement by the White House or U.S. government confirming a presidential pardon)_$ANNOTATION$_ for Sam Bankman-Fried by Donald Trump is published by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerDeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ on official White House platforms or verified government releases. Backup verification includes corroboration by major tier-1 media outlets with direct evidence or official government documents.

This market resolves 'No' if no such official pardon confirmation occurs by _$TIME_1, if the pardon effort is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if Donald Trump is unable or ineligible to grant a pardon by that date, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official government sources. Also, resolves 'No' if the pardon event never occurs or never existed.

items.title: Ethereum > 50% NFT mint share by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether over 50% of all globally minted non-fungible tokens (NFTs) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerNFT@content_dividernon-fungible token: a unique digital asset verified on a blockchain – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by count of ERC-721 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerERC-721@content_dividerERC-721: Ethereum token standard for unique NFTs – Ethereum Foundation)_$ANNOTATION$_ and ERC-1155 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerERC-1155@content_dividerERC-1155: Ethereum multi-token standard supporting fungible and non-fungible tokens – Ethereum Foundation)_$ANNOTATION$_ mint events are minted on the Ethereum blockchain _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerEthereum blockchain@content_dividerpublic decentralized blockchain platform supporting smart contracts and NFTs – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 with share verified through data from reliable NFT marketplaces and analytics platforms.

This market resolves to 'Yes' if authoritative NFT analytics providers, verified NFT marketplaces (e.g., OpenSea _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerOpenSea@content_dividerleading NFT marketplace verifying collections and mint events – OpenSea official)_$ANNOTATION$_), or blockchain explorers provide explicit, verifiable statistics confirming Ethereum accounts for over 50% of total global NFT mint volume (ERC-721 and ERC-1155 mint counts combined) by _$TIME_1. Verification requires published reports, official platform dashboards, or permanent archival data accessible at settlement.

This market resolves to 'No' if no authoritative source confirms Ethereum's NFT mint share exceeds 50% by _$TIME_1, if data is unavailable or unverifiable, if the event is effectively cancelled (e.g., NFT minting ceases or shifts entirely to other blockchains), or if conflicting data is unresolved after escalation prioritizing primary official sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if NFT minting globally does not occur or Ethereum minting does not exist by _$TIME_1.

items.title: Bitcoin mining carbon neutral by December 31, 2030?
items.rules:
This market measures whether global Bitcoin mining achieves net zero carbon emissions _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerCarbon neutrality@content_dividernet zero carbon emissions, meaning total emissions are balanced by carbon removal or offset – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 according to verified emissions data from authoritative environmental and industry reports.

Resolves 'Yes' if official publications from recognized environmental agencies or industry consortia _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerAuthoritative environmental agencies@content_dividersuch as United Nations University Institute for Water, Environment and Health, Crypto Carbon Ratings Institute)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm net zero carbon emissions for Bitcoin mining globally by _$TIME_1, supported by data transparency from major Bitcoin mining operators and corroborated by at least two independent tier-1 sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerTier-1 sources@content_dividermajor verified media outlets or government publications)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if verified data does not confirm net zero emissions by _$TIME_1, if authoritative sources explicitly deny carbon neutrality, if relevant data is unavailable or unverifiable by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if the event never existed. In case of conflicting data, official environmental agency reports take precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Bitcoin mining is fundamentally not carbon neutral as defined.

items.title: US government shutdown ends by October 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the US government shutdown ends by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerGovernment shutdown@content_dividera lapse in federal government funding causing partial closure of government operations – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ through the passage of a valid appropriations bill or continuing resolution as confirmed by official Congressional records.

Resolves 'Yes' if the US Senate officially passes an appropriations bill or continuing resolution ending the shutdown by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCongressional confirmation@content_dividerrecorded vote or official announcement by the US Senate or House of Representatives – https://www.congress.gov)_$ANNOTATION$_ and the US government publicly announces the end of the shutdown through authoritative government sources by that time.

Resolves 'No' if no such legislative passage or official announcement occurs by _$TIME_1, if the shutdown is officially declared ongoing beyond this deadline, if authoritative sources fail to confirm shutdown end, or if the event never occurred. Conflicting information will be resolved by prioritizing official Congressional records and US government announcements. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the shutdown never began or was cancelled before the start date.

items.title: Oscar Piastri maintains first place in 2025 F1 drivers' championship by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Oscar Piastri holds first place in the official FIA Formula One World Championship driver standings after the final race of the 2025 season as published on Formula1.com by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerFIA Formula One World Championship@content_dividerinternational motor racing championship governed by Fédération Internationale de l'Automobile – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and updated driver standings _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdriver standings@content_dividerranked list of Formula 1 drivers by accumulated points during the season – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Oscar Piastri is ranked first in the official final 2025 driver standings published on Formula1.com _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerFormula1.com@content_dividerthe official Formula One website providing authoritative race results and standings – https://www.formula1.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 with verification allowed through FIA official press releases _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerFIA official press releases@content_dividerpublished communications by Fédération Internationale de l'Automobile – https://www.fia.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or major tier-1 motorsport media outlets confirming official standings.

This market resolves 'No' if Oscar Piastri is not first in the official driver standings at season end, if the 2025 FIA Formula One World Championship is cancelled or postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if official verification is unavailable or contradictory by _$TIME_1. In case of conflicting data, priority is given to FIA official sources and Formula1.com. Additionally, this market resolves 'No' if the championship or driver standings do not exist or are never published.

items.title: AV actress 河北彩伽 cheating report by October 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether 河北彩伽 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_divider河北彩伽@content_dividerJapanese AV actress, a performer in adult video industry – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ is publicly reported involved with other men cheating _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividercheating@content_dividerengaging in a sexual or romantic relationship outside of a committed partnership – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by credible media, legal confirmations, or official statements by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'Yes' if one or more credible sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividercredible sources@content_dividermedia outlets with established reputations, official legal documents, or direct statements from involved parties)_$ANNOTATION$_ publish explicit, verifiable confirmation or allegations of cheating by 河北彩伽 by _$TIME_1. Confirmation requires official announcements, court filings, or corroborated investigative journalism accessible at official URLs or archives.

Resolves 'No' if no credible confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if reports are officially denied by involved parties, if event is cancelled or never occurred, or if verifiable data is unavailable. Conflicts prioritize official legal documents and direct statements. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the cheating report event never existed or is unverifiable.

items.title: Trump Xi meeting bullish market reaction by November 1, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the meeting between President Donald Trump _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerDonald Trump@content_divider45th President of the United States (2017–2021) – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and President Xi Jinping _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerXi Jinping@content_dividerGeneral Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party and President of the People's Republic of China – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on November 1, 2025, causes a bullish reaction in major U.S. stock indices (Dow Jones Industrial Average, Nasdaq Composite, and S&P 500) as measured by positive price movement on or immediately after the meeting date by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerTIME_1@content_divider2025-11-01T00:00:00Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_. The resolution uses official index closing prices and intraday trading data from primary exchanges with verification through major financial news outlets and government announcements.

This market resolves 'Yes' if an official statement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOfficial statement@content_dividerpublic announcement by the White House or Chinese government website)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified major media report _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerMajor media report@content_dividercoverage by Reuters, Bloomberg, or The Wall Street Journal with corroboration)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms the meeting occurred on November 1, 2025, and if at least two of the three major U.S. indices close higher _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=6@counter_dividerBullish market reaction@content_divideran increase in price or positive percentage change in index closing price – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on the meeting day or the next trading day. Backup verification includes index data archives from official exchange websites (NYSE, Nasdaq, S&P Dow Jones Indices).

This market resolves 'No' if the meeting does not occur by _$TIME_1, if it is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if no authoritative confirmation of the meeting exists, or if the major indices do not show a bullish reaction as defined. In cases of conflicting data, official government announcements take precedence followed by major media corroboration. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the meeting event never existed or was scheduled on a different date. If index data or confirmation sources are unavailable by deadline, the market resolves 'No'.

items.title: Jay Chou Bitcoin assets recovery by October 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Jay Chou _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerJay Chou@content_dividerTaiwanese singer, songwriter, and actor – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ recovers Bitcoin assets worth over 100 million yuan _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividerdigital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ held by Cai Weize _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerCai Weize@content_dividerindividual alleged to be holding Jay Chou's Bitcoin assets – search context)_$ANNOTATION$_ by legal resolution or verified return by _$TIME_1, verified through official legal documents or credible media with primary source confirmation.

This market resolves 'Yes' if credible evidence from official court filings, government regulatory disclosures, or direct statements from Jay Chou or his authorized representatives _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOfficial court filings@content_dividerlegal documents submitted to courts related to asset recovery)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm recovery or legal resolution of Bitcoin assets exceeding 100 million yuan by _$TIME_1. Alternative confirmation includes verified major media reports with at least two tier-1 source corroborations or authenticated social media posts from verified accounts of involved parties.

This market resolves 'No' if no authorized confirmation occurs by _$TIME_1, if recovery efforts are officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed beyond that date, if verification sources are unavailable or insufficient, or if evidence contradicts recovery. If the underlying event (Bitcoin assets held by Cai Weize) never existed, or if the asset value is below threshold, the market resolves 'No'. Conflicts are resolved prioritizing official legal confirmations and government publications.

items.title: Donald Trump meet Changpeng Zhao by October 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Donald Trump and Changpeng Zhao mutually meet in person at any time before or on _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMeeting@content_dividera face-to-face encounter or gathering between two or more persons – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, confirmed by official statements or credible media reports.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official statement from Donald Trump, Changpeng Zhao, their authorized representatives, or a major media outlet with dual verified tier-1 source confirmation explicitly confirms the meeting by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial statement@content_dividerstatement published by primary sources such as company or governmental websites, verified social media, or major media outlets – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_. Backup verification includes documented visual evidence attributed to a verified source.

Resolves 'No' if no verified confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if the meeting is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative sources explicitly deny the meeting. Also resolves 'No' if the meeting never took place or cannot be verified by the deadline. In case of conflicting data, official direct statements take precedence.

items.title: Polymarket Chinese name release by October 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Polymarket _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerPolymarket@content_dividera crypto-based prediction market platform – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ officially releases a Chinese name by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-10-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_. The resolution is determined by explicit announcement on Polymarket's verified channels or authoritative news outlets with verifiable documentation.

This market resolves 'Yes' if an official public naming announcement in Chinese is published by Polymarket on its verified website, verified social media, or via press release posted on authoritative news media _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial release@content_dividerpublic naming announcement on Polymarket platforms or authoritative news outlets)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, verifiable through archival records or authoritative secondary sources.

This market resolves 'No' if no such official Chinese name release is confirmed by _$TIME_1, if the announcement is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. In case of conflicting information, official Polymarket sources take precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never existed or Polymarket did not plan or attempt a Chinese name release.

items.title: Changpeng Zhao reposts Trump threads by October 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Changpeng Zhao reposts any Twitter or Threads post originally from Donald Trump by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerRepost@content_divideran act of posting content on social media that contains direct content or links from another user's threads – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, using verified social media accounts with timestamped public posts.

This market resolves 'Yes' if a timestamped public post by Changpeng Zhao on verified Twitter or Threads accounts containing direct content or hyperlinks to President Trump's threads is confirmed by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerVerified social media accounts@content_dividerofficially authenticated social media profiles verified by platform authorities – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification requires direct observation, official platform archives, or major media reports citing such posts.

This market resolves 'No' if no such repost is verified by _$TIME_1, if Zhao publicly denies reposting, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if reliable verification data is unavailable. Conflicting information is adjudicated by prioritizing direct platform data and official statements. Also, resolves 'No' if the event never occurs or no relevant social media posts exist.

items.title: Taylor Swift Wedding Cancellation by October 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Taylor Swift officially cancels her wedding plans _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerWedding cancellation@content_dividera formal, public announcement or credible confirmation that scheduled wedding plans are called off – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official public announcement or credible confirmation from Taylor Swift or her authorized representatives _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividerstatement published on verified social media accounts, official websites, or reputable news outlets)_$ANNOTATION$_ declares the cancellation of wedding plans by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes corroboration by two or more major tier-1 media sources or visual evidence attributable to official channels.

Resolves 'No' if no verified cancellation announcement exists by _$TIME_1, if the wedding is postponed beyond _$TIME_1 without cancellation, if official sources deny cancellation, or if verification is unavailable. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing official statements from Taylor Swift, her representatives, or major verified media outlets. Additionally, resolves 'No' if no wedding plans exist or the event never took place.

items.title: 100% tariff on Chinese imports in effect by November 1, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether a 100% tariff _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividertariff@content_dividera tax imposed by a government on imported goods or services – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on imports from China _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerChina@content_dividerthe People's Republic of China, a sovereign country in East Asia – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ is officially in effect on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-11-01T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ as confirmed by authoritative U.S. government sources or the U.S. President's official communications.

This market resolves 'Yes' if by _$TIME_1 there is explicit confirmation from official U.S. government publications, regulatory filings, or authoritative statements _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerofficial U.S. government publications@content_dividergovernment websites, Federal Register, or U.S. Trade Representative announcements – https://ustr.gov/)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified presidential posts _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerverified presidential posts@content_dividerofficial presidential social media or statements published on White House website – https://www.whitehouse.gov/)_$ANNOTATION$_ that a 100% tariff on Chinese imports is in force starting no later than November 1, 2025. Backup verification includes major tier-1 media reports with dual source confirmation and archived official releases.

This market resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation is published by _$TIME_1, if the tariff imposition is officially cancelled, indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if the event never existed. In case of contradictory information, official U.S. government sources take precedence. Also resolves 'No' if reliable verification is unavailable or if the tariff effective date differs from the specified deadline.

items.title: U.S. casualties <20 in Venezuela conflict by April 30, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the total number of U.S. military and government personnel deaths or injuries directly caused by combat or military operations related to the conflict with Venezuela is fewer than 20 by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerFewer than 20 casualties@content_dividerless than twenty deaths or injuries caused directly by conflict – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, based on verified official U.S. government and military reports.

Resolves 'Yes' if official U.S. Department of Defense or other verified U.S. government sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerU.S. Department of Defense@content_dividerthe federal executive department responsible for military affairs – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ publicly confirm fewer than 20 total casualties related to the conflict by _$TIME_1, with verification through independent government publications, major media reports from at least two tier-1 sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividertier-1 sources@content_dividertop-level media outlets with rigorous editorial standards – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, or official casualty statistics published at https://www.defense.gov/.

Resolves 'No' if casualty count reaches or exceeds 20 by _$TIME_1, if the conflict is officially deemed to have caused 20 or more casualties by authoritative U.S. government or military reports, if credible major media with dual verification report 20 or more casualties, or if verification data is unavailable or contradictory by _$TIME_1. This market also resolves 'No' if the conflict never existed, was cancelled, or if no verifiable casualties are reported by official sources.

items.title: Arsenal Premier League title by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Arsenal Football Club _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerArsenal Football Club@content_dividerprofessional football club based in London competing in England's Premier League – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ finishes first in the official English Premier League _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerPremier League@content_dividerthe top tier professional football league in England – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ standings determined after all scheduled matches of the 2025 season by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'Yes' if Arsenal is officially declared the Premier League champion by The Football Association Premier League Limited _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerThe Football Association Premier League Limited@content_dividerthe organization responsible for operating the English Premier League – Official EPL site https://www.premierleague.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ through published final league standings by _$TIME_1. Verification includes official EPL website, verified club announcements, or major UK sports media with dual tier-1 source confirmation.

Resolves 'No' if Arsenal is not first in the final official Premier League table by _$TIME_1, if the season is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if the league is suspended, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicts are resolved by priority to official EPL communications. Also resolves 'No' if the Premier League season does not occur or is not completed as scheduled by _$TIME_1.

items.title: Cobie interview Coinbase by November 30?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Cobie conducts an interview with Coinbase _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerCobie@content_dividera cryptocurrency content creator and commentator – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ during November 2025 as confirmed by official Coinbase announcements or verified Coinbase blog posts by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCoinbase@content_dividera leading cryptocurrency exchange headquartered in San Francisco – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if Coinbase officially announces or publishes a verified blog post confirming Cobie’s interview during November 2025 by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial Coinbase announcements@content_dividerstatements or blog posts on coinbase.com or verified Coinbase social media channels)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification includes timestamped posts within the period 2025-11-01T00:00:00Z to _$TIME_1, adjusted from PST/PDT timezone _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerPST/PDT timezone@content_dividerPacific Standard/Daylight Time zone of Coinbase headquarters in San Francisco)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if no official confirmation is published by _$TIME_1, if the planned interview is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative sources are unavailable or contradictory. Resolution defaults to 'No' if the interview does not occur or never existed. In case of conflicting data, official Coinbase source declarations take precedence.

items.title: @leap_xyz streaming with Threadguy by November 1, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether @leap_xyz (a digital content creator active on Twitch and Twitter) appears on stream with Threadguy (another digital content creator) by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerStreaming appearance@content_dividera live or recorded video broadcast on platforms like Twitch – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ as confirmed by official Twitch channel announcements or verified Twitter updates.

Resolves 'Yes' if explicit confirmation is published by the official Twitch channel of Threadguy or verified Twitter accounts of either party by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial Twitch channel@content_dividerthe verified Twitch account managed by Threadguy or @leap_xyz)_$ANNOTATION$_ and includes scheduled stream announcements or post-stream recaps indicating @leap_xyz streamed with Threadguy. Backup verification includes recorded video evidence with reliable source attribution or multiple tier-1 media reports.

Resolves 'No' if no such verified announcement or evidence exists by _$TIME_1, if the streaming event is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory. This market also resolves 'No' if the streaming event never existed or was never scheduled. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing official Twitch and Twitter confirmations. If primary sources are inaccessible, Internet Archive captures of official announcements shall be used.

items.title: Monad retains ≥10% active users by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Monad blockchain retains at least 10% of its initially active users according to user engagement metrics by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerActive user retention@content_dividerthe percentage of users remaining active on a platform relative to an initial user base – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ as confirmed by official Monad network statistics or verified blockchain analytics platforms.

Resolves 'Yes' if official Monad or its authorized analytics providers publish verified data showing 10% or more of the initial active users remain active on Monad blockchain by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial source@content_dividercompany website, verified social media, or authorized blockchain explorer platform)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification includes published reports or dashboards with user retention data accessible at official URLs or archived sources.

Resolves 'No' if no official or verified confirmation of ≥10% retention occurs by _$TIME_1, if Monad blockchain is discontinued or indefinitely postponed before _$TIME_1, if reliable data is unavailable, or if the event never existed. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official Monad sources and authoritative blockchain data providers. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Monad blockchain or its user base does not exist at the measurement date.

items.title: Solana close ≥ $300 by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Solana (SOL) closes at or above $300 USD on any major exchange during the UTC day ending _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerSolana@content_dividera blockchain platform and cryptocurrency token – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, with price closing defined as the last traded price before market close UTC on _$TIME_1 on exchanges Coinbase, Binance, or Bybit _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerMajor exchange@content_dividera centralized cryptocurrency trading platform with high reputation and volume – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if the closing price of SOL on any of Coinbase, Binance, or Bybit is at least $300.00 USD by _$TIME_1, confirmed by official exchange data or verified API endpoints such as Coinbase Pro API _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerCoinbase Pro API@content_dividerofficial API providing real-time and historical cryptocurrency prices – https://docs.cloud.coinbase.com/sign-in-with-coinbase/docs/api-prices)_$ANNOTATION$_, Binance API _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerBinance API@content_dividerofficial API for market data from Binance exchange – https://binance-docs.github.io/apidocs/spot/en/)_$ANNOTATION$_, or Bybit public API _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerBybit API@content_dividerofficial API for market data from Bybit exchange – https://bybit-exchange.github.io/docs/spot/v3/)_$ANNOTATION$_. Backup verification includes archived exchange snapshots via Internet Archive _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=6@counter_dividerInternet Archive@content_dividerdigital archive preserving web content for future verification – https://archive.org)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if no major exchange closing price is at or above $300 USD on _$TIME_1, if any of the exchanges cease trading SOL before _$TIME_1, if official price data is unavailable or unverifiable by _$TIME_1, or if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed. In case of conflicting data, priority is given to official exchange APIs, then verified exchange websites, then major tier-1 financial or crypto media with corroboration. Additionally, resolves 'No' if SOL or the exchanges do not exist or do not trade on _$TIME_1.

items.title: Up Only podcast mentions prediction markets by October 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Up Only podcast publicly releases a full episode mentioning prediction markets by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerPrediction markets@content_dividermarkets where participants trade contracts based on event outcomes to aggregate information – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ with the complete discussion included according to official podcast distribution channels.

This market resolves 'Yes' if a full episode including explicit discussion of prediction markets is officially released on the Up Only podcast’s verified website or major podcast platforms _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial source@content_dividerverified Up Only podcast website or platforms like Spotify, Apple Podcasts)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Partial previews, promos, or excerpts do not qualify. Verification may include archived audio files or official episode metadata.

This market resolves 'No' if no such full episode is publicly available by _$TIME_1, if the episode is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if verification data is unavailable or insufficient. Conflicts are resolved by prioritizing official podcast sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the Up Only podcast does not exist or never planned to mention prediction markets.

items.title: UpOnly podcast episode release by October 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether a new full episode of the UpOnly podcast _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerUpOnly podcast@content_dividera cryptocurrency-focused podcast series hosted by Cobie and others, distributed on major podcast platforms – official website and major platforms)_$ANNOTATION$_ becomes publicly available by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-10-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ on major podcast platforms such as Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Google Podcasts, or Stitcher.

This market resolves 'Yes' if a full new episode (not a preview or teaser) is published and publicly accessible on at least one major podcast platform _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividermajor podcast platforms@content_dividerwidely recognized podcast distribution services including Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Google Podcasts, Stitcher)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, confirmed via direct platform listing, official UpOnly social media announcements, or verified public archives.

This market resolves 'No' if no such full episode is available by _$TIME_1, if the episode release is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification of release is unavailable or contradictory. In case of conflicting information, official UpOnly or Coinbase announcements take precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the podcast episode event does not exist or never occurred.

items.title: China GDP > US GDP by December 31, 2028?
items.rules:
This market measures whether China's nominal gross domestic product _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerNominal GDP@content_dividerthe total market value of all final goods and services produced in a country in a year, unadjusted for inflation – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ in US dollars exceeds that of the United States by the end of calendar year 2028, based on official data published by the International Monetary Fund _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerInternational Monetary Fund@content_divideran international organization promoting global monetary cooperation and economic growth – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and World Bank _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerWorld Bank@content_divideran international financial institution providing loans and economic data to developing countries – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ after final 2028 data release.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the IMF or World Bank officially publish nominal GDP rankings by country for 2028 by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerDeadline@content_divider2028-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ showing China's nominal GDP strictly exceeding that of the United States. Verification requires direct data publication or official country ranking tables on IMF or World Bank websites _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerIMF data URL@content_dividerhttps://www.imf.org/en/Data)_$ANNOTATION$_ or _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=6@counter_dividerWorld Bank data URL@content_dividerhttps://data.worldbank.org/indicator/NY.GDP.MKTP.CD)_$ANNOTATION$_. Backup verification includes archived snapshots on the Internet Archive and corroboration from at least two tier-1 economic news organizations.

This market resolves 'No' if by _$TIME_1 no official source confirms China’s nominal GDP exceeds the US in 2028, if the data release is indefinitely postponed, if authoritative verification sources are unavailable or contradictory, or if the event never occurs. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing IMF and World Bank official publications. Additionally, resolves 'No' if either country’s final GDP data for 2028 is not published or the ranking is not established by the deadline.

items.title: Lamine Yamal scores vs Real Madrid by October 26, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Lamine Yamal _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerLamine Yamal@content_dividera professional footballer playing for FC Barcelona – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ scores at least one goal against Real Madrid _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerReal Madrid@content_dividera professional Spanish football club competing in La Liga – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ in the official La Liga match held at Santiago Bernabéu Stadium on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-10-26T14:15:00Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_. The official match report and statistics from La Liga _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerLa Liga@content_dividerSpain’s top professional football division – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ determine the outcome with data collection from authoritative league sources.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official La Liga match records _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerofficial La Liga match records@content_dividermatch statistics published on La Liga or FC Barcelona and Real Madrid official websites)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm that Lamine Yamal scores at least one goal during the specified match by _$TIME_1. Verification includes official match reports published on the La Liga website (https://www.laliga.com) or the official club websites _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=6@counter_dividerofficial club websites@content_dividerhttps://www.fcbarcelona.com and https://www.realmadrid.com)_$ANNOTATION$_. Backup confirmation may use major sports media with dual tier-1 source verification such as ESPN or official league social media.

This market resolves 'No' if Lamine Yamal does not score by _$TIME_1, if the match is cancelled or postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if official sources fail to confirm any goal by him. In case of conflicting data, official La Liga records take precedence. Additionally, the market resolves 'No' if the match does not occur as scheduled, Lamine Yamal does not participate, or reliable verification is unavailable by _$TIME_1.

items.title: Polymarket $POLY token airdrop by November 30, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Polymarket officially performs a $POLY token airdrop to its users by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerAirdrop@content_dividera distribution of cryptocurrency tokens to multiple wallet addresses, often for promotional or incentive purposes – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ as confirmed by official Polymarket announcements or on-chain evidence.

Resolves 'Yes' if Polymarket publishes a clear official announcement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividerstatement on Polymarket’s official website or verified social media channels)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verifiable blockchain transaction data _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOn-chain evidence@content_dividerpublicly accessible blockchain records confirming token distribution – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, confirming the execution of the $POLY token airdrop to users.

Resolves 'No' if no official announcement or on-chain evidence is available by _$TIME_1, if the airdrop is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if authoritative verification sources are unavailable or contradictory. In case of conflicting information, priority is given to official Polymarket sources and blockchain data. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the airdrop event never existed or was never planned.

items.title: Luckin Coffee China lead by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Luckin Coffee remains China’s number one coffee chain by store count, revenue, and market share within China by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerLuckin Coffee@content_dividera Chinese coffeehouse chain founded in 2017, specializing in technology-driven retail and rapid expansion – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to official company disclosures and authoritative market research reports.

Resolves 'Yes' if Luckin Coffee is confirmed by official sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial sources@content_dividercompany filings, official websites, verified statements)_$ANNOTATION$_ or major market research firms such as Euromonitor _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerEuromonitor@content_dividera global market research company focusing on consumer markets – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ to have the highest store count, revenue, and market share among coffee chains in China by _$TIME_1. Verification requires at least two independent authoritative confirmations by the deadline.

Resolves 'No' if Luckin Coffee does not lead in any one of the three specified metrics by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled, postponed indefinitely, or if authoritative data confirming leadership is unavailable or contradictory. In case of conflicting information, official company disclosures take precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Luckin Coffee ceases to exist or withdraws from the Chinese market before _$TIME_1.

items.title: Tesla FSD surpasses Waymo safety metrics by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Tesla's Full Self-Driving (FSD) system surpasses Waymo's autonomous driving safety and intervention performance by exceeding miles between interventions, crash rates, and regulatory safety standards as per official Tesla and Waymo data by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerFull Self-Driving (FSD)@content_dividerTesla's advanced driver-assistance system enabling autonomous vehicle control – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerWaymo@content_dividerWaymo LLC, a subsidiary of Alphabet Inc., developing autonomous driving technology – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if verified official data from Tesla and Waymo, published by their respective corporate websites, regulatory filings, or authoritative government agencies, confirm Tesla FSD exceeds Waymo's metrics in miles between interventions, crash rates, and meets or surpasses regulatory safety standards by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes corroborating reports by at least two major tier-1 media outlets with direct official source citation and/or regulatory safety investigation reports _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerNHTSA@content_dividerNational Highway Traffic Safety Administration, US federal agency overseeing vehicle safety – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'No' if no verified official confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if the data reveals Tesla FSD does not surpass Waymo's metrics, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if official or authoritative data is unavailable or contradictory, or if Tesla FSD or Waymo cease to operate or report relevant metrics. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing primary official sources and government regulatory publications. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the underlying comparison event never existed or metrics were not published by the deadline.

items.title: Ukraine recaptures Donetsk by March 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Ukrainian military forces regain effective control over the territory of Donetsk region _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerDonetsk region@content_divideran administrative region (oblast) in eastern Ukraine, center: Donetsk city – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ before or at _$TIME_1 according to official military reports or credible independent military analyses.

Resolves 'Yes' if verified official Ukrainian government statements or major independent military analysis sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerofficial Ukrainian government@ycontent_dividerofficial Ukrainian government websites, Ministry of Defence reports, or verified social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm Ukrainian forces have established effective control of Donetsk region by _$TIME_1. Confirmation requires at least one of: government publication, verified military briefing, or credible independent analysis published by recognized defense research organizations (e.g., Institute for the Study of War).

Resolves 'No' if no such verified confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if official sources deny recapture, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative data is unavailable. In case of conflicting information, priority is given to official Ukrainian government disclosures and widely recognized independent military reports. This market also resolves 'No' if the event never occurred or Donetsk region was not subject to active military contest during the period.

items.title: China mediates Russia Ukraine peace deal by July 1, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether China formally mediates a peace deal between Russia and Ukraine as confirmed by official engagement and announcement of a formal peace deal framework by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerPeace deal@content_divideran agreement to end armed conflict and establish peace terms – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if both the Russian and Ukrainian governments officially engage China as a mediator and a formal peace deal framework is publicly announced by an authoritative source _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial source@content_dividerofficial government websites, verified social media accounts, or major international organization statements)_$ANNOTATION$_ on or before _$TIME_1. Verification includes official statements or major media reports with dual tier-1 source confirmation. Backup verification may include United Nations or neutral international organizations acknowledging China's mediation role.

Resolves 'No' if either government does not officially engage China as mediator or if no formal peace deal framework is announced by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing official government and international organization sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the mediation event does not occur or never existed.

items.title: US-China Taiwan agreement by November 30, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the United States and China formally announce a bilateral agreement on Taiwan-related policies during the Trump-Xi meeting at the APEC summit by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBilateral agreement@content_dividera formal mutual confirmation between two parties on policy matters – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, as evidenced by official government statements or joint communiqués.

Resolves 'Yes' if either the US or Chinese government issues an official statement or a joint statement explicitly confirming an agreement on Taiwan policies by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial statement@content_dividera formal announcement published by government agencies or verified official channels – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification includes statements published on government websites, verified social media accounts, or major media outlets with dual tier-1 source confirmation.

Resolves 'No' if no such official bilateral agreement is confirmed by _$TIME_1, if the meeting is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if only unilateral or vague statements occur without formal agreement, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing official government sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the Trump-Xi meeting or the Taiwan policy discussion does not occur as specified.

items.title: North Korea nuclear test by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether North Korea detonates any underground or aboveground nuclear explosive device detected by international monitoring systems by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerNuclear test@content_dividera nuclear explosive device detonation underground or aboveground detected by monitoring systems – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_. Detection and confirmation rely primarily on the Comprehensive Nuclear-Test-Ban Treaty Organization (CTBTO) monitoring network and related international non-proliferation treaty frameworks.

This market resolves 'Yes' if a nuclear test conducted by North Korea is explicitly confirmed by official CTBTO reports _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCTBTO@content_dividerComprehensive Nuclear-Test-Ban Treaty Organization: international body monitoring nuclear tests worldwide – https://www.ctbto.org/)_$ANNOTATION$_ or by official statements from authoritative governments (e.g., U.S., South Korea, Japan) published by _$TIME_1 with verification through at least one major international agency or multiple tier-1 media sources corroborating the event.

This market resolves 'No' if no such nuclear test is confirmed by _$TIME_1, if the test is officially cancelled, indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. In cases of conflicting reports, official CTBTO data and government declarations take precedence. Additionally, this market resolves 'No' if the event does not occur or never existed.

If primary sources become inaccessible, verification will rely on archived CTBTO publications, official government archives, and corroborating reports from major international organizations such as the United Nations or International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA).

The deadline includes all nuclear tests conducted up to and including December 31, 2025 UTC, as defined by precisely timed CTBTO data and official international treaty records.

items.title: Manchester United defeat Brighton & Hove Albion by October 25, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Manchester United Football Club wins the English Premier League match against Brighton & Hove Albion Football Club held at Old Trafford on October 25, 2025, based on the official final full-time score recorded by the Premier League _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerEnglish Premier League@content_dividerthe top professional football division in England – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and official match reports.

Resolves 'Yes' if Manchester United is officially recorded as the match winner by the Premier League's published results by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial Premier League results@content_dividerhttps://www.premierleague.com/match/2025-10-25-Manchester-United-Brighton-Hove-Albion)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification requires confirmation from at least one additional authoritative source such as major sports media with explicit Premier League verification or the official Manchester United website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerManchester United official website@content_dividerhttps://www.manutd.com)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if Manchester United does not win, if the match is cancelled, postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if no verifiable official results exist by _$TIME_1. In case of conflicting reports, Premier League official data takes precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the match does not occur or is never scheduled by the deadline.

items.title: OpenAI GPT-6 release by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether OpenAI officially launches the product named 'GPT-6' _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerGPT-6@content_dividerthe sixth generation of OpenAI's Generative Pre-trained Transformer language model series – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 according to official OpenAI announcements or verified major media reports.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official OpenAI statement or verified press release _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividerstatement published on OpenAI’s official website or verified social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms the public launch of GPT-6 on or before _$TIME_1. Backup confirmation includes major technology news outlets with dual tier-1 source verification or authoritative documentation such as regulatory filings.

Resolves 'No' if no authoritative confirmation occurs by _$TIME_1, if OpenAI officially cancels or indefinitely postpones GPT-6’s release beyond _$TIME_1, or if verification sources are unavailable or conflicting. Also resolves 'No' if the product is rebranded, replaced by a different name, or never existed as specified. In all cases, non-occurrence or lack of verifiable evidence results in 'No'.

items.title: Elon Musk net worth > $650B by January 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Elon Musk’s net worth _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerNet worth@content_dividerthe total assets owned by an individual minus all liabilities – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches or exceeds USD 650 billion as of _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerDeadline@content_divider2026-01-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to the Forbes Real-Time Billionaires tracker _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerForbes Real-Time Billionaires tracker@content_dividera continuously updated list of billionaires’ net worth published by Forbes – https://www.forbes.com/real-time-billionaires/)_$ANNOTATION$_ and Bloomberg Billionaires Index _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerBloomberg Billionaires Index@content_dividera daily ranking of the world’s richest people based on market valuations – https://www.bloomberg.com/billionaires/)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if either Forbes or Bloomberg publish data confirming Elon Musk’s net worth is at least USD 650 billion at any time on or before _$TIME_1, supported by valuation of assets including stock holdings and other investments. Verification requires official publication on their websites or via verified social media accounts. Backup verification may include major financial news outlets with dual tier-1 source confirmation.

Resolves 'No' if neither Forbes nor Bloomberg confirm the net worth threshold by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled, data is unavailable, or contradictory. If sources disagree, priority is given to direct official publications. Also resolves 'No' if Elon Musk’s net worth never reaches the threshold by the deadline or if the event never existed.

items.title: MegaETH 5% MEGA token auction completion by November 30, 2025?
items.rules:

This market resolves 'Yes' if authoritative confirmation from MegaETH's official communications or Echo's Sonar platform _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerEcho's Sonar platform@content_dividera public token launch and auction platform founded by crypto personality Cobie – official Sonar website)_$ANNOTATION$_ verifies full conclusion of the 72-hour auction covering exactly 5% of MEGA token supply by _$TIME_1. Verification includes official announcements, platform transaction records, or blockchain explorer data published on or before _$TIME_1. Backup verification may include major crypto news outlets with dual-tier-1 source confirmation.

This market resolves 'No' if the auction is not completed by _$TIME_1, if it is officially cancelled or postponed beyond that date, if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory, or if the auction differs materially (e.g., less than 5% token supply auctioned, different auction format). In case of conflicting information, official MegaETH or Echo sources have priority. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the auction event never commenced or did not exist.

items.title: Polymarket IPO completion by October 25, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Polymarket completes an initial public offering _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerInitial Public Offering@content_dividera company's first sale of stock to the public, typically through a regulated stock exchange – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by enabling first publicly available trade on a Polymarket-operated regulated Designated Contract Market _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerDesignated Contract Market@content_dividera board of trade designated by the U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission to operate a regulated derivatives trading platform – CFTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1.

Verification includes Polymarket corporate disclosures, U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) filings, Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) approvals, or verified exchange release statements _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerPolymarket official sources@content_dividercompany websites, verified social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_.
