This market resolves 'No' if no verifiable IPO completion is confirmed by _$TIME_1, if the IPO is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if Polymarket never operated a regulated DCM with publicly available trading, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory. In disputes, official filings and regulatory agency statements take precedence. Also, resolves 'No' if the IPO event does not exist or never occurred.

items.title: Bitcoin > $150,000 by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the price of Bitcoin _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividerdigital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches or exceeds USD 150,000 at any time on or before _$TIME_1 according to aggregated price data from major cryptocurrency exchanges _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCryptocurrency exchanges@content_dividerdigital platforms for buying and selling cryptocurrencies – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if authoritative price data _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerAuthoritative price data@content_dividerofficial aggregated price indices or exchange-reported prices)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm Bitcoin trades at or above USD 150,000 at any moment before or on _$TIME_1. Verification requires price confirmation from at least two major exchanges such as Coinbase, Binance, or Kraken, or from aggregate indices like CoinMarketCap _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerCoinMarketCap@content_dividercryptocurrency price tracking platform aggregating exchange data – https://coinmarketcap.com)_$ANNOTATION$_, backed by archival snapshots or official exchange API data.

Resolves 'No' if Bitcoin never reaches or exceeds USD 150,000 by _$TIME_1, if trading data is unavailable or unverifiable, if the event is cancelled (e.g., trading halt or delisting), or if price data contradicts the threshold. In case of conflicting sources, resolution prioritizes direct exchange data and major aggregator APIs. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Bitcoin trading or the price event never existed.

items.title: DJ Cuppy marriage by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether DJ Cuppy officially marries by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerOfficial marriage@content_dividera legally recognized union between two persons sanctioned by law – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, confirmed by verifiable legal documentation or personal announcements from DJ Cuppy or trusted media outlets.

Resolves 'Yes' if explicit confirmation of DJ Cuppy's marriage is published by DJ Cuppy on verified social media or official website, or reported by at least two major Nigerian media sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerTrusted Nigerian media@content_dividerestablished Nigerian news organizations with editorial verification, e.g., The Guardian Nigeria, Punch, Channels TV)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, or if legal marriage records are accessible through Nigerian vital records offices before that time.

Resolves 'No' if no verified official or legal confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if DJ Cuppy publicly denies the marriage, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if legal records and trusted media fail to confirm. In case of conflicting information, official personal statements or Nigerian government marriage registry data take precedence. Also resolves 'No' if no marriage event occurred or if no legal marriage process was initiated.

items.title: Buzzing number 1 prediction market app by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Buzzing _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBuzzing@content_dividera prediction market application platform enabling users to buy, sell, or trade contracts on future events – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ becomes the number 1 prediction market app globally by user base size or market share according to official app store metrics or credible market analysis reports by _$TIME_1.

This market resolves 'No' if no such official or credible confirmation is available by _$TIME_1, if Buzzing is officially declared number 1 but after _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or Buzzing ceases to exist as a prediction market app before _$TIME_1, or if verifiable data is unavailable or contradictory. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Buzzing never existed or was not classified as a prediction market app.

items.title: Star Xu posts about XX LIFE by October 31, 2025?
items.rules:

Resolves 'Yes' if an explicit, public social media post by Star Xu containing 'XX LIFE' is confirmed by direct access to his verified social media accounts _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial social media@content_dividerverified accounts on platforms such as Twitter, Weibo, Instagram, or equivalent)_$ANNOTATION$_ or official website by _$TIME_1, or if corroborated by major media outlets with dual tier-1 source confirmation _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerTier-1 source@content_dividerleading global news organizations with editorial standards – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if no such verified post exists by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory, or if the phrase 'XX LIFE' is never publicly referenced by Star Xu by the deadline. items.title: Orlando Magic win NBA game vs Chicago Bulls by October 25, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Orlando Magic basketball team officially wins the NBA game against the Chicago Bulls on October 25, 2025, determined by the official NBA final score at the end of regulation time as published by the NBA and verified sports data providers _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerNBA@content_dividerNational Basketball Association, the professional basketball league in North America – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerRegulation time@content_dividerthe standard playing time in a basketball game excluding overtime periods – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the Orlando Magic's official final score exceeds that of the Chicago Bulls at the end of regulation time on October 25, 2025, as confirmed by the NBA’s official game report available at https://www.nba.com/games and verified primary data providers such as Sportradar _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerSportradar@content_dividerOfficial data provider of NBA statistics combining on-venue and advanced metrics – https://sportradar.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Backup confirmation may be obtained from other major sports data sources such as CBS Sports or Yahoo Sports with dual tier-1 source verification.

This market resolves 'No' if the Orlando Magic do not win by the close of regulation time, if the game is cancelled, postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing NBA official sources and Sportradar data. If the scheduled game does not occur or never existed, the market resolves 'No'.

items.title: Satoshi Nakamoto Bitcoin movement by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures any on-chain transfer of Bitcoin from wallets attributed to Satoshi Nakamoto according to blockchain analytics. The resolution is determined by authoritative blockchain explorers and analytics platforms with backup archival verification.

Resolves 'Yes' if at least one Bitcoin transfer from Satoshi-era wallets is confirmed by an official blockchain analytics source or widely recognized platform such as Arkham Intelligence by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerArkham Intelligence@content_dividera blockchain analytics platform aggregating wallet and transaction data – Arkham)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification requires publicly accessible transaction evidence on the Bitcoin blockchain confirmed by multiple independent sources.

Resolves 'No' if no verified Bitcoin transfer from Satoshi-era wallets occurs by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification data is unavailable. Conflicting reports will be adjudicated by prioritizing direct blockchain data and recognized analytics platforms. This market also resolves 'No' if Satoshi-era wallets are proven inaccessible or never existed.

items.title: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander > 100 points in next 3 NBA games by November 1?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Shai Gilgeous-Alexander _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerShai Gilgeous-Alexander@content_dividerCanadian professional basketball player for the Oklahoma City Thunder of the National Basketball Association – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ scores a combined total of more than 100 points in his next three consecutive NBA games starting from the market creation date according to official NBA game statistics _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerNBA statistics@content_dividerofficial recorded data of player performance maintained by the National Basketball Association – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_. Data is collected and verified from NBA official box scores and verified league sources.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the sum of points scored by Shai Gilgeous-Alexander in his next three consecutive NBA games is strictly greater than 100 as confirmed by official NBA statistics published on the NBA website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerNBA official website@content_dividerhttps://www.nba.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or equivalent authoritative NBA data providers by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes NBA game box scores from verified media outlets such as ESPN _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerESPN@content_dividermajor sports media outlet with verified NBA reporting – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and archived game data from the NBA’s official statistics API or the Internet Archive _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerInternet Archive@content_dividerdigital archive of web pages and data for persistent verification – Oxford Dictionary)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'No' if Shai Gilgeous-Alexander does not score more than 100 points over his next three consecutive NBA games by _$TIME_1, if any of the games are cancelled or indefinitely postponed preventing completion of three games, if he does not participate in three consecutive games due to injury or rest, if the NBA season or games are suspended or cancelled, or if official scoring data is unavailable or unverifiable by the deadline. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing NBA official sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the three consecutive games do not occur or if the player is inactive for the entire period.

items.title: LeBron James > 65 games in 2025-26 NBA regular season by April 13?
items.rules:
This market measures whether LeBron James appears in at least 66 NBA regular season games during the 2025-26 season, verified by official NBA game logs and Los Angeles Lakers team reports _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerNBA regular season@content_dividerthe set of scheduled games before playoffs in the National Basketball Association – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if official NBA statistics or team publications _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial NBA statistics@content_dividerofficial game logs and player participation records published by the National Basketball Association – nba.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm LeBron James has played 66 or more regular season games by _$TIME_1. Verification may include team announcements, verified media reports, or archived NBA data sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerBackup verification@content_dividerCBS Sports official stats pages or archived NBA reports via Internet Archive)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if LeBron James plays 65 or fewer games by _$TIME_1, if the NBA season is cancelled, postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if official and backup sources fail to confirm the 'Yes' condition. This includes cases where LeBron is inactive for games due to injury, suspension, or other reasons. Conflicting data resolves by prioritizing NBA official records. Also resolves 'No' if the 2025-26 NBA regular season does not occur or LeBron James does not participate in the season.

items.title: Nuclear weapon detonation in military conflict by January 1, 2029?
items.rules:
This market measures whether any tactical or strategic nuclear weapon _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividernuclear weapon@content_divideran explosive device whose destructive force derives from nuclear reactions – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ is detonated during a military conflict anywhere globally by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2029-01-01T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ . Detection methods include seismic, hydroacoustic, infrasound, satellite, or air sampling monitoring by authoritative international bodies.

Resolves 'Yes' if at least one nuclear explosion in military conflict is explicitly confirmed by official sources such as the Comprehensive Nuclear-Test-Ban Treaty Organization (CTBTO) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerCTBTO@content_dividerInternational organization monitoring nuclear explosions worldwide – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified government statements by _$TIME_1. Verification requires documented detection data published in official CTBTO bulletins (https://www.ctbto.org/specials/detection-missions) or government releases, or corroborated reports by two or more tier-1 media sources with explicit source verification.

Resolves 'No' if no authoritative confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, or if the event is officially denied, cancelled, or if detection data is insufficient or unavailable. If detection systems are offline or data disputed, resolution follows escalation to international monitoring archives and official government declarations. Additionally, resolves 'No' if no military conflict involving nuclear detonation occurs or if the event never existed.

items.title: BTC > $130,000 by December 25?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin's market price _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividera digital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches or exceeds $130,000 USD on any major cryptocurrency exchange or authoritative market aggregator by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-12-25T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ . The resolution is determined by verified price data from leading exchanges and aggregators with backup from archived data sources.

This market resolves 'Yes' if at any time before or on _$TIME_1 the highest recorded Bitcoin trading price on at least two major exchanges or authoritative market data aggregators _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerMajor exchanges@content_dividerCoinbase, Binance, Kraken, Bitstamp, or CoinMarketCap, CoinGecko as aggregators – official exchange websites and aggregators)_$ANNOTATION$_ equals or exceeds $130,000 USD. Verification requires archival screenshots, official exchange API data, or timestamped public records accessible at resolution.

This market resolves 'No' if Bitcoin's price does not reach $130,000 USD by _$TIME_1, if market data is unavailable or unverifiable, or if trading is suspended or exchanges cease operation before the deadline. Conflicting data is resolved by precedence of official exchange direct data and archived records. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Bitcoin or the referenced market never existed or if relevant exchanges are delisted or permanently closed before the deadline.

items.title: BTC > $130,000 by December 25?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin's market price _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividera digital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches or exceeds $130,000 USD on any major cryptocurrency exchange or authoritative market aggregator by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-12-25T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ . The resolution is determined by verified price data from leading exchanges and aggregators with backup from archived data sources.

This market resolves 'Yes' if at any time before or on _$TIME_1 the highest recorded Bitcoin trading price on at least two major exchanges or authoritative market data aggregators _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerMajor exchanges@content_dividerCoinbase, Binance, Kraken, Bitstamp, or CoinMarketCap, CoinGecko as aggregators – official exchange websites and aggregators)_$ANNOTATION$_ equals or exceeds $130,000 USD. Verification requires archival screenshots, official exchange API data, or timestamped public records accessible at resolution.

This market resolves 'No' if Bitcoin's price does not reach $130,000 USD by _$TIME_1, if market data is unavailable or unverifiable, or if trading is suspended or exchanges cease operation before the deadline. Conflicting data is resolved by precedence of official exchange direct data and archived records. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Bitcoin or the referenced market never existed or if relevant exchanges are delisted or permanently closed before the deadline.

items.title: Bitcoin halving triggers global adoption wave by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin's next halving triggers a global adoption wave defined as a measurable increase in cryptocurrency ownership rates, institutional participation, and transaction volumes exceeding 2025 baselines by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin halving@content_divideran event that halves the reward miners receive for adding blocks to the Bitcoin blockchain – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, verified via authoritative blockchain research and institutional reports.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official statistics or reports from recognized blockchain research organizations _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerblockchain research organizations@content_dividerentities conducting empirical studies and publishing data on blockchain usage and adoption – Oxford Dictionary)_$ANNOTATION$_, institutional investor participation disclosures, or transaction volume data from major exchanges _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividermajor exchanges@content_dividercryptocurrency trading platforms with verified market data – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ show adoption metrics exceeding 2025 baselines by _$TIME_1, confirmed by at least two independent authoritative sources.

This market resolves 'No' if no verified increase in adoption metrics above 2025 baselines is confirmed by _$TIME_1, if the halving event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative data is unavailable or contradictory. In case of conflicting information, resolution prioritizes official blockchain analytics and institutional reports. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the halving event does not occur or never takes place.

items.title: Ethereum fully deflationary by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Ethereum's total burned ETH exceeds new issuance by network activity as measured by authoritative blockchain analytics by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerEthereum@content_dividerEthereum: a decentralized blockchain platform with its native cryptocurrency ETH – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and institutional inflows, indicating full deflationary status.

Resolves 'Yes' if verified data from at least one primary blockchain analytics source such as ultrasound.money _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerultrasound.money@content_dividera widely recognized Ethereum burn and issuance analytics platform – InvestingHaven)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms cumulative ETH burned exceeds total ETH newly issued on or before _$TIME_1, corroborated by institutional inflow reports from credible financial institutions or regulatory filings.

Resolves 'No' if the total burned ETH does not exceed new issuance by _$TIME_1, if authoritative sources report indefinite postponement of Ethereum protocol changes affecting issuance or burn rates, if reliable verification is unavailable by deadline, or if the event never materializes. Conflicting data will be resolved by prioritizing blockchain on-chain data and official institutional reports. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Ethereum network ceases operation or the metric is unmeasurable by deadline.

items.title: Solana DAU ≥ 1M by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Solana blockchain _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerSolana@content_dividera high-performance layer-1 blockchain platform known for fast transactions and smart contracts – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ attains at least 1,000,000 daily active users (DAU) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerDaily active users@content_dividerthe count of unique blockchain addresses initiating at least one transaction per day – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, based on blockchain data aggregated by Token Terminal _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerToken Terminal@content_dividera blockchain analytics platform providing on-chain metrics and financial data – TokenTerminal.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ and official Solana Foundation reports _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerSolana Foundation@content_dividera nonprofit organization supporting the Solana ecosystem and providing official data – solana.org)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if authoritative sources confirm Solana’s DAU is ≥ 1,000,000 on any day on or before _$TIME_1, with confirmation published by Token Terminal or Solana Foundation official channels _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerOfficial confirmation@content_dividerofficial website, verified social media, or published reports)_$ANNOTATION$_. Backup verification includes archived blockchain data snapshots accessible via Internet Archive or third-party blockchain explorers with transparent methodology.

Resolves 'No' if DAU never reaches 1,000,000 by _$TIME_1, if official sources explicitly deny reaching this milestone, if Solana network ceases operation before _$TIME_1, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory. In case of conflicting data, precedence is given to Solana Foundation statements, then Token Terminal data. Also resolves 'No' if Solana blockchain or DAU metric ceases to exist or is fundamentally redefined before _$TIME_1.

items.title: Real Madrid wins El Clásico by October 26?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Real Madrid wins the official El Clásico football match against Barcelona at Santiago Bernabéu Stadium by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerEl Clásico@content_dividera football match between Spanish clubs Real Madrid and Barcelona – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, as determined by the official final score published by La Liga or the match organizer.

Resolves 'Yes' if Real Madrid is officially recorded as the winner of the El Clásico match played at Santiago Bernabéu Stadium on October 26, 2025, according to the official match report published on the La Liga website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerLa Liga official site@content_dividerhttps://www.laliga.com/en-GB)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified reports from at least two major sports news sources by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes official club websites and validated live match data providers such as FlashScore _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerFlashScore@content_dividerhttps://www.flashscore.com/football/spain/laliga/)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if Real Madrid does not win by _$TIME_1, if the match is cancelled, postponed indefinitely, or if no authoritative final score confirming a Real Madrid win is available. In case of conflicting information, official La Liga match report takes precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the match does not take place or is replaced by a different event.

items.title: Solana > $1,000 by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the price of Solana (SOL) reaches or exceeds $1,000 USD at any time up to and including _$TIME_1 based on USD closing prices from major cryptocurrency exchanges _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerSolana (SOL)@content_dividera blockchain platform and cryptocurrency used for decentralized applications and payments – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividercryptocurrency exchange@content_dividera digital marketplace for buying and selling cryptocurrencies – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if any authoritative source such as major exchange price data (e.g., Binance, Coinbase, Kraken) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerauthoritative price data@content_dividerofficial price listings from recognized cryptocurrency exchanges)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms SOL price ≥ $1,000 USD at any point by _$TIME_1. Verification requires archived historical price data or official exchange APIs _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerofficial exchange data@content_dividerprice data published directly by exchanges or archived on Internet Archive)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if SOL price never reaches or exceeds $1,000 USD by _$TIME_1, if major exchanges are permanently delisted or suspended before that time, or if reliable price verification is unavailable. Conflicting data resolves by prioritizing direct exchange data and archived sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Solana or SOL token ceases to exist or trading is fully halted before _$TIME_1.

items.title: U.S. Federal Reserve interest rate cut by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the U.S. Federal Reserve announces any reduction in the federal funds target rate _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerFederal funds target rate@content_dividerthe interest rate at which depository institutions trade federal funds with each other overnight – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ at an official Federal Open Market Committee meeting by _$TIME_1. Resolution is based on published statements by the Federal Reserve Board _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerFederal Reserve Board@content_dividerthe governing body of the Federal Reserve System responsible for U.S. monetary policy – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ with verification through official FOMC press releases and meeting minutes.

This market resolves 'Yes' if any explicit official announcement of a federal funds target rate reduction is published by the Federal Reserve Board on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerFOMC meetings@content_dividerscheduled public meetings of the Federal Open Market Committee where monetary policy decisions are made – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification requires direct publication on the Federal Reserve's official website https://www.federalreserve.gov/monetarypolicy/fomc.htm or equivalent authoritative government sources. Backup confirmation may include major financial news outlets with multiple tier-1 source corroboration.

This market resolves 'No' if no official announcement of any federal funds target rate cut occurs by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially cancelled or postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory. Conflicting information is resolved prioritizing Federal Reserve Board publications and official FOMC statements. Additionally, resolves 'No' if no FOMC meetings take place or no rate cut event exists during the period.

items.title: India military strike Pakistan by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether India launches an official or confirmed military strike _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMilitary strike@content_dividera planned attack by armed forces against a target – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by Indian armed forces against Pakistan on or before _$TIME_1 according to government or major news agency reports.

Resolves 'Yes' if an Indian government official statement, verified major news agency report _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerMajor news agency@content_dividera globally recognized news organization with editorial standards – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, or visual evidence with credible source confirms a military offensive operation by India against Pakistan by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes official Pakistani government confirmation or independent international observer reports.

Resolves 'No' if no verified military strike occurs by _$TIME_1, if the strike is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory, or if the event never existed or did not take place as defined. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing official government sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event fundamentally differs from the specified military strike.

items.title: Somnia 2M Transactions by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Somnia blockchain _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerSomnia blockchain@content_dividera decentralized distributed ledger technology platform enabling digital transactions and smart contracts – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ processes at least 2 million total cumulative transactions on its mainnet _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividermainnet@content_dividerthe primary public blockchain network where actual transactions are permanently recorded – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, verified by on-chain data from open-source block explorers such as Blockscout _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerBlockscout@content_divideran open-source blockchain explorer for viewing transactions, smart contracts, and network activity – official Blockscout documentation)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official on-chain transaction count data published by Somnia mainnet block explorers, including Blockscout or equivalent verified explorers, shows cumulative transactions ≥ 2,000,000 by _$TIME_1. Verification requires snapshot data or API results published or archived on or before _$TIME_1 from these explorers or Somnia official sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerSomnia official sources@content_dividerSomnia project website, validated social media accounts, or official validator announcements)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'No' if cumulative Somnia mainnet transactions are below 2 million by _$TIME_1, if the mainnet is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if the blockchain never launched or ceased operating, or if on-chain data sources are unavailable or unreliable by _$TIME_1. In case of conflicting data, resolution prioritizes official Somnia mainnet statistics and Blockscout data archives. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the Somnia mainnet or transaction event never existed.

items.title: Anichess $CHECK Token Generation Event launch by October 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Anichess $CHECK Token Generation Event (TGE) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerToken Generation Event (TGE)@content_divideran event during which a new cryptocurrency token is created and distributed to participants – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ officially launches during October 2025 by _$TIME_1 according to official Anichess or Checkmate ecosystem announcements.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official announcement from Anichess, Checkmate ecosystem, or their verified representatives _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividerstatement published on official websites, verified social media accounts, or press releases)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms the $CHECK TGE launch occurred during October 2025 by _$TIME_1, supported by verifiable token distribution or launch milestones documented at https://anichess.io or https://checkmate.gg by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes major blockchain news outlets or Animoca Brands official channels _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerAnimoca Brands@content_dividerAnimoca Brands: a leading blockchain gaming and NFT company – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if no verified official confirmation is available by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially cancelled or postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if the $CHECK TGE launch does not occur in October 2025. Conflicting information resolves in favor of official Anichess or Checkmate ecosystem sources. Also resolves 'No' if the event never existed or is fundamentally different from the described TGE.

items.title: Paris Saint-Germain win Ligue 1 match vs Lorient by October 29, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Paris Saint-Germain wins the Ligue 1 match against Lorient based on the official final score at the end of regulation time as declared by Ligue 1 authorities by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerLigue 1@content_dividerthe top professional football division in France, organized by LFP – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerParis Saint-Germain@content_dividerFrench professional football club based in Paris competing in Ligue 1 – Oxford Dictionary)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if official Ligue 1 sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial Ligue 1 sources@content_dividerLigue de Football Professionnel (LFP) website or verified Ligue 1 social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm Paris Saint-Germain wins the match by the end of regulation time on October 29, 2025, 18:00 UTC, without extra time or penalties. Verification includes match reports, official score announcements, or authoritative live score providers such as LiveScore _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerLiveScore@content_dividerlive sports score website providing real-time verified results – https://www.livescore.com)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if PSG does not win by the deadline, if the match is cancelled, postponed beyond _$TIME_1, if official results are unavailable or inconclusive, or if the event never occurred. Conflicts are resolved prioritizing Ligue 1 official announcements, then verified major sports media. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the match never took place or the result differs from the market specification.

items.title: Los Angeles Lakers win NBA game against Sacramento Kings by October 27, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Los Angeles Lakers _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerLos Angeles Lakers@content_dividerprofessional basketball team based in Los Angeles, California – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ win their National Basketball Association (NBA) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerNBA@content_dividerthe professional basketball league in North America comprising 30 teams – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ game against the Sacramento Kings _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerSacramento Kings@content_dividerprofessional basketball team based in Sacramento, California – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on October 27, 2025 by official final score at the end of regulation time as announced by the NBA and verified sources, with game time specified as Pacific Daylight Time (PDT, UTC-7) based on Los Angeles venue context.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the official NBA final score _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerNBA final score@content_dividerthe final points tally at the end of regulation time in an NBA game – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ shows the Los Angeles Lakers scoring more points than the Sacramento Kings on October 27, 2025, confirmed by official NBA game reports published on the NBA website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerNBA official website@content_dividerhttps://www.nba.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified NBA social media accounts by _$TIME_1, with backup verification permitted through major sports media outlets with explicit official confirmation or trusted sports statistics databases.

This market resolves 'No' if the Lakers do not have a higher official final score than the Kings at the end of regulation time on October 27, 2025, if the game is cancelled, postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. In case of conflicting or missing data, resolution follows official NBA announcements as primary source. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the game never occurred or was never scheduled for the specified date.

items.title: MegaETH mainnet launch by January 10, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether MegaETH _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMegaETH@content_divideran upcoming high-performance Ethereum Layer-2 blockchain network – derived from search context)_$ANNOTATION$_ launches its mainnet _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividermainnet@content_dividera blockchain network fully operational on its own main chain rather than a test network – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 according to official MegaETH team announcements and verified Sonar platform updates.

This market resolves 'Yes' if an explicit official announcement from MegaETH's verified social media accounts _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerverified social media@content_dividersocial media accounts officially confirmed by MegaETH team or platform)_$ANNOTATION$_ or the Sonar ICO platform _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerSonar platform@content_dividerICO platform created by crypto personality Cobie for MegaETH presale and updates – search context)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms mainnet launch by _$TIME_1. Confirmation must be published on or before _$TIME_1 and be verifiable by archive or direct source.

This market resolves 'No' if no official confirmation is published by _$TIME_1, if the launch event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if reliable verification sources are unavailable or contradictory. If MegaETH mainnet launch never occurs or the project is abandoned, resolves 'No'. Conflicting reports defer to official MegaETH team sources. Absence of the event by deadline results in 'No'.

items.title: BTC > $150,000 by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividera digital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches or exceeds a USD market price of $150,000 on any major cryptocurrency exchange on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerDeadline@content_divider2026-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_. The price is determined by the timestamped closing trade price or official spot price index from authoritative exchange sources with backup from aggregated market data providers.

This market resolves 'Yes' if at any time on or before _$TIME_1, Bitcoin's USD price is confirmed at or above $150,000 by at least two major exchanges such as Coinbase, Binance, or Kraken _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerMajor exchanges@content_dividerleading cryptocurrency trading platforms with high liquidity and verified data – see https://www.coinbase.com, https://www.binance.com, https://www.kraken.com)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification requires official published price data or exchange API records accessible at settlement, or corroborated by reputable industry data aggregators like CoinMarketCap or CoinGecko.

This market resolves 'No' if Bitcoin does not reach or exceed $150,000 USD on any major exchange by _$TIME_1, if trading on major exchanges is suspended indefinitely prior to the deadline, or if reliable verification sources are unavailable or contradictory. Conflicting data will be resolved by prioritizing official exchange APIs and major market data aggregators. Additionally, this market resolves 'No' if Bitcoin ceases to exist, is delisted, or if the price measurement event never occurs.

items.title: Ethereum > $25,000 by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the closing price of Ethereum in USD exceeds $25,000 at any point on or before _$TIME_1 according to aggregated data from major cryptocurrency exchanges compiled by authoritative financial data providers.

Resolves 'Yes' if at least one verified authoritative source _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerAuthoritative source@content_dividerofficial cryptocurrency price aggregators such as CoinMarketCap, CoinGecko, or Bloomberg Crypto – Finance Yahoo)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms Ethereum’s daily closing price exceeds $25,000 USD by _$TIME_1. Verification requires publicly accessible closing price data published on or before _$TIME_1 and corroborated by at least two independent authoritative providers.

Resolves 'No' if the closing price does not exceed $25,000 USD by _$TIME_1, if the cryptocurrency market or Ethereum trading is suspended, delisted, or data is unavailable from authoritative sources at settlement, or if no verifiable confirmation exists. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing official exchange data and major aggregator consensus. If Ethereum ceases to exist or is delisted before _$TIME_1, the market resolves 'No'.

items.title: idOS Network Token Generation Event complete by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the idOS Network completes its Token Generation Event (TGE) defined as the minting and launch of 1 billion IDOS tokens on the Arbitrum blockchain by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerToken Generation Event@content_dividera process by which a blockchain project issues its native tokens to the public or investors – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and blockchain launch confirmation from official idOS sources.

This market resolves 'Yes' if credible official confirmation from idOS Network (via their website or verified social media) verifies completion of minting and launch of 1 billion IDOS tokens on Arbitrum by _$TIME_1, corroborated by blockchain explorer data (e.g., Arbiscan) showing token contract deployment and circulating supply as specified.

This market resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation or verifiable blockchain evidence is available by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if the token launch does not meet the defined parameters (e.g., different token quantity, chain, or partial launch). In cases of data conflicts, official idOS announcements take precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the token generation event never existed or was never initiated.

items.title: Verified extraterrestrial alien invasion confirmed by October 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether a verified extraterrestrial alien invasion event on Earth will be publicly confirmed by credible government or scientific agencies by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerVerified extraterrestrial alien invasion@content_dividera verifiable event of extraterrestrial contact with Earth acknowledged by credible government or scientific agencies – defined in market scope)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if an official announcement confirming extraterrestrial alien invasion is published by NASA _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerNASA@content_dividerNational Aeronautics and Space Administration: U.S. government agency responsible for the civilian space program – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, ESA _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerESA@content_dividerEuropean Space Agency: intergovernmental organization dedicated to space exploration – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, SETI _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerSETI@content_dividerSearch for Extraterrestrial Intelligence: scientific effort to detect intelligent extraterrestrial life – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, or a United Nations-affiliated scientific organization by _$TIME_1. Confirmation requires public, explicit acknowledgment or evidence release at official websites or verified communications. Backup verification includes major media reports with corroboration from at least two tier-1 sources or official UN scientific publications.

This market resolves 'No' if no such confirmation is made by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially denied, cancelled, or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official agency declarations. This market also resolves 'No' if the event never occurred or no credible extraterrestrial contact event exists within the timeframe.

items.title: World War III conflict begins by October 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether an officially recognized global conflict termed 'World War III' _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerWorld War III@content_dividera hypothetical global war involving multiple major powers and theaters of conflict, recognized by governments or international organizations – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ begins involving any of the specified flashpoints (Taiwan Strait, NATO's eastern front, Israel-Iran, Korean Peninsula, India-China Himalayas) by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2026-10-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_. Official recognition requires formal declarations or authoritative confirmations from national governments or international organizations.

Resolves 'Yes' if by _$TIME_1 at least one official government or international organization _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerauthoritative source@content_dividerofficial government publications, regulatory filings, verified government websites, United Nations or NATO statements – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ explicitly declares or confirms the start of World War III involving multiple specified flashpoints, or if credible, widely accepted military escalation meeting the global war criteria is documented by at least two tier-1 media sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividertier-1 media@content_dividermajor international news organizations with verified reporting and source corroboration – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification includes official statements, published treaties, or visual evidence with verified attribution.

Resolves 'No' if no such official or authoritative confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially denied, cancelled, or indefinitely postponed, if verification sources are unavailable or contradictory, or if the conflict does not meet the multiple flashpoint or global war criteria. In case of data disputes, resolution prioritizes official government declarations and international organization statements. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never occurred or did not exist.

items.title: BTC > $120,000 closing price by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin's closing price on major global cryptocurrency exchanges is at or above $120,000 USD at the UTC close of December 31, 2026, using aggregated authoritative price data _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividerdigital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerClosing price@content_dividerthe final trading price recorded by an exchange at the end of a trading session – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if the aggregated, volume-weighted closing price of Bitcoin on at least two major global cryptocurrency market aggregators such as CoinMarketCap _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerCoinMarketCap@content_dividera widely recognized cryptocurrency market data aggregator – https://coinmarketcap.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ and CoinGecko _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerCoinGecko@content_dividera leading cryptocurrency data aggregator providing market information – https://coingecko.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ is at or above $120,000 USD by _$TIME_1. Verification requires official published closing prices or snapshots taken at or immediately after UTC 23:59:59 on that date.

Resolves 'No' if the closing price is below $120,000 USD on _$TIME_1, if Bitcoin trading is halted or the market is closed on that date, if authoritative data sources fail to publish or verify closing prices, if the event is cancelled (e.g., Bitcoin delisting from major exchanges), or if reliable verification data is unavailable. In cases of conflicting data, resolution follows a hierarchy prioritizing official exchange data and major aggregator consensus. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Bitcoin or the specified market does not exist or never traded on _$TIME_1.

items.title: Star Xu mentions 'XX人生' > 3 times by October 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Star Xu explicitly mentions the phrase 'XX人生' at least four times on verified social media accounts by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerStar Xu@content_dividerfounder of OKX, a cryptocurrency exchange platform – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ across any social media platform.

Resolves 'Yes' if at least four separate posts or comments containing 'XX人生' authored by Star Xu appear on verified social media accounts before or at _$TIME_1, verified by direct access to official accounts or archived records _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerverified social media accounts@content_divideraccounts confirmed by platform verification badges or official website references – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ .

Resolves 'No' if fewer than four mentions occur by _$TIME_1, if Star Xu’s verified accounts do not exist or are inaccessible, if posts are deleted before verification, or if no authoritative confirmation of mentions is available by _$TIME_1. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing primary source verification and archived data. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event (mentions) never occurred or if the accounts do not exist.

items.title: Polymarket IPO completion by October 25, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Polymarket, a New York-based prediction market platform _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerPolymarket@content_dividera prediction market platform headquartered in New York City – company website)_$ANNOTATION$_, completes its initial public offering (IPO) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerIPO@content_dividerinitial public offering: the first sale of stock by a private company to the public – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2026-10-25T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to official company announcements or credible financial news reports.

Resolves 'Yes' if Polymarket publicly confirms IPO completion via an official company statement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerofficial company statement@content_dividerannouncement published on Polymarket's official website or verified social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_ or if at least two independent tier-1 financial news outlets (e.g., Bloomberg, Reuters) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividertier-1 financial news outlets@content_dividermajor, internationally recognized financial news organizations such as Bloomberg or Reuters – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ explicitly report IPO completion by _$TIME_1. Alternative verification includes official filings with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=6@counter_dividerSEC@content_dividerU.S. Securities and Exchange Commission: federal agency overseeing securities markets – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ accessible via EDGAR database _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=7@counter_dividerEDGAR database@content_dividerElectronic Data Gathering, Analysis, and Retrieval system for SEC filings – SEC.gov)_$ANNOTATION$_ .

Resolves 'No' if no authoritative confirmation of IPO completion is available by _$TIME_1, if the IPO is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if reliable verification sources are unavailable or contradictory. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official Polymarket disclosures and SEC filings. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Polymarket never initiated an IPO or if the event fundamentally differs from the market definition.

items.title: Polymarket IPO completion by October 25, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Polymarket, a New York-based prediction market platform _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerPolymarket@content_dividera prediction market platform headquartered in New York City – company website)_$ANNOTATION$_, completes its initial public offering (IPO) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerIPO@content_dividerinitial public offering: the first sale of stock by a private company to the public – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2026-10-25T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to official company announcements or credible financial news reports.

Resolves 'Yes' if Polymarket publicly confirms IPO completion via an official company statement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerofficial company statement@content_dividerannouncement published on Polymarket's official website or verified social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_ or if at least two independent tier-1 financial news outlets (e.g., Bloomberg, Reuters) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividertier-1 financial news outlets@content_dividermajor, internationally recognized financial news organizations such as Bloomberg or Reuters – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ explicitly report IPO completion by _$TIME_1. Alternative verification includes official filings with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=6@counter_dividerSEC@content_dividerU.S. Securities and Exchange Commission: federal agency overseeing securities markets – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ accessible via EDGAR database _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=7@counter_dividerEDGAR database@content_dividerElectronic Data Gathering, Analysis, and Retrieval system for SEC filings – SEC.gov)_$ANNOTATION$_ .

Resolves 'No' if no authoritative confirmation of IPO completion is available by _$TIME_1, if the IPO is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if reliable verification sources are unavailable or contradictory. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official Polymarket disclosures and SEC filings. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Polymarket never initiated an IPO or if the event fundamentally differs from the market definition.

items.title: Lionel Messi return to FC Barcelona by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Lionel Messi formally returns to FC Barcelona by signing an official contract or through a public announcement from FC Barcelona or Lionel Messi's management by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerLionel Messi@content_dividerArgentine professional footballer widely regarded as one of the greatest players – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerFC Barcelona@content_dividerProfessional football club based in Barcelona, Spain, competing in La Liga – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official contract signing or a public announcement confirming Messi's return is published by FC Barcelona or his management by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerofficial contract signing@content_dividerformal agreement documented by the club or player’s representatives – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and verified on official club websites, verified social media accounts, or major tier-1 media with corroboration.

Resolves 'No' if no such official signing or announcement occurs by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if Messi remains under contract with another club without transfer, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicting reports resolved by prioritizing official FC Barcelona and Messi’s management sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never exists or is fundamentally different from market definition.

items.title: BTC > $115,000 by November 28, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the price of Bitcoin _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividera digital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ in United States Dollars (USD) exceeds $115,000 at least once by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerDeadline@content_divider2025-11-28T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ based on closing prices from major cryptocurrency exchanges.

Resolves 'Yes' if on or before _$TIME_1 at least one official closing price on a major exchange _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerMajor exchange@content_dividercryptocurrency trading platforms with high liquidity and recognized market data such as Coinbase, Binance, Kraken – Industry standard)_$ANNOTATION$_ for Bitcoin in USD exceeds $115,000. Verification requires published price data from at least two independent major exchanges accessible via official websites or reputable financial data aggregators _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerVerification sources@content_dividerCoinbase https://www.coinbase.com/price/bitcoin, Binance https://www.binance.com/en/price/bitcoin)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'No' if Bitcoin price does not reach above $115,000 on any major exchange by _$TIME_1, if all major exchanges are closed or trading halted for the entire period, or if verifiable price data is unavailable. In cases of conflicting data, priority is given to official exchange closing prices from Coinbase and Binance; if these are unavailable, secondary sources include CoinMarketCap and CoinGecko data archives. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Bitcoin as an asset ceases to exist, trading is permanently suspended, or if the event never occurs as defined.

items.title: Donald Trump imposes new China tariff by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether former U.S. President Donald Trump officially announces or enforces additional tariffs on Chinese imports by the U.S. government before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerNew tariff imposition@content_dividerthe official announcement or enforcement of additional import taxes levied on goods from China by the United States government – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if an official U.S. government source _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial U.S. government source@content_dividerincluding White House statements, U.S. Trade Representative website, Federal Register trade notices)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified major media outlets _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerMajor media outlets@content_dividerreputable news organizations with explicit verification from two or more tier-1 sources – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ publish confirmation of new tariffs on Chinese imports announced or enforced by Trump by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes official regulatory filings or authoritative trade agency reports.

This market resolves 'No' if no such official new tariff imposition occurs by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory, or if the event never existed. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official U.S. government sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Trump is not in authority to impose tariffs or if tariffs announced differ from those specified.

items.title: Donald Trump imposes new China tariff by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether former U.S. President Donald Trump officially announces or enforces additional tariffs on Chinese imports by the U.S. government before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerNew tariff imposition@content_dividerthe official announcement or enforcement of additional import taxes levied on goods from China by the United States government – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if an official U.S. government source _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial U.S. government source@content_dividerincluding White House statements, U.S. Trade Representative website, Federal Register trade notices)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified major media outlets _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerMajor media outlets@content_dividerreputable news organizations with explicit verification from two or more tier-1 sources – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ publish confirmation of new tariffs on Chinese imports announced or enforced by Trump by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes official regulatory filings or authoritative trade agency reports.

This market resolves 'No' if no such official new tariff imposition occurs by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory, or if the event never existed. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official U.S. government sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Trump is not in authority to impose tariffs or if tariffs announced differ from those specified.

items.title: Tesla robotaxi launch in Austin by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Tesla officially launches its robotaxi service operating without safety monitors in Austin, Texas, by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerRobotaxi@content_dividera driverless taxi vehicle operating autonomously without a safety driver – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, confirmed by Tesla or verified authoritative sources.

Resolves 'Yes' if Tesla publicly confirms and operates robotaxis without safety monitors in Austin by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial confirmation@content_dividerTesla company announcements on Tesla.com, verified Tesla social media, or regulatory filings)_$ANNOTATION$_, or if multiple tier-1 media outlets explicitly verify operational robotaxis without safety drivers in Austin by that date.

Resolves 'No' if no verifiable evidence of robotaxis operating without safety monitors in Austin exists by _$TIME_1, if Tesla officially cancels or postpones the launch beyond _$TIME_1, or if only robotaxis with safety monitors operate. Conflicting reports resolve by prioritizing Tesla's direct statements and official regulatory sources. Also resolves 'No' if the robotaxi service never existed or was never planned.

items.title: Shanghai Composite Index > 4300 points by October 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Shanghai Composite Index _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerShanghai Composite Index@content_dividera stock market index tracking the performance of all A-shares and B-shares listed on the Shanghai Stock Exchange – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ closes above 4,300 points at the official market close _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividermarket close@content_dividerthe designated end of a trading day when final prices are recorded – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on October 31, 2025, as published by the Shanghai Stock Exchange _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerShanghai Stock Exchange@content_dividerChina's primary stock exchange located in Shanghai – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_. The closing value is the final official numeric index value for that trading day.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the official closing value of the Shanghai Composite Index on October 31, 2025 (Shanghai Stock Exchange website https://www.sse.com.cn) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOfficial source@content_dividerShanghai Stock Exchange official website providing daily closing values)_$ANNOTATION$_ is strictly greater than 4,300 points. Backup verification may include major financial data providers such as Reuters https://www.reuters.com/markets/ and Investing.com https://www.investing.com/indices/shanghai-composite, with at least two independent sources confirming the closing value by _$TIME_1.

This market resolves 'No' if the closing value does not exceed 4,300 points by the official close on October 31, 2025, if the market is closed or trading is halted on this date, if the Shanghai Stock Exchange is suspended, or if authoritative data is unavailable or conflicting by _$TIME_1. In case of disputes, resolution defaults to the Shanghai Stock Exchange official publication. Additionally, this market resolves 'No' if the Shanghai Composite Index or the trading day on October 31, 2025, does not exist or is cancelled.

items.title: Barron and Kai Trump golf par videos on YouTube by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether full-length golf par videos featuring Barron Trump and Kai Trump together are uploaded on YouTube by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerYouTube@content_dividera video-sharing platform operated by Google – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified related official channels.

Resolves 'Yes' if official YouTube channels _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial YouTube channels@content_dividerchannels owned or directly managed by Kai Trump or verified related accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_ publish full videos clearly showing Barron Trump and Kai Trump playing golf, confirmed by metadata and visual evidence by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerDeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if no such verified video upload exists by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if official sources fail to confirm, or if videos lack required participants or content. Conflicting evidence is resolved by prioritizing official YouTube channel postings and direct verification. Also resolves 'No' if the event or videos never existed.

items.title: U.S. sanctions Jair Bolsonaro by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the United States government publicly sanctions former Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerJair Bolsonaro@content_dividerformer President of Brazil from 2019 to 2022 – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 according to official announcements by the U.S. Department of the Treasury or Department of State _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerU.S. Department of the Treasury@content_dividerU.S. federal executive agency managing national finances and sanctions – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerU.S. Department of State@content_dividerU.S. federal executive department responsible for foreign affairs – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official public sanction of Jair Bolsonaro is announced by the U.S. Department of the Treasury’s Office of Foreign Assets Control (OFAC) or the U.S. Department of State by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerSanction Announcement@content_dividera formal, public declaration by the U.S. government blocking property or restricting activities of a designated person – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, verified by official U.S. government websites (treasury.gov, state.gov) or authoritative government press releases _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerOfficial source verification@content_dividerprimary source statements from U.S. government agencies or official publications)_$ANNOTATION$_. Backup verification includes major tier-1 media outlets referencing official U.S. government sources or archived regulatory filings.

Resolves 'No' if no such sanction announcement is publicly issued by _$TIME_1, if the sanction event is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if authoritative sources fail to confirm sanctions, or if contradictory official statements deny sanctions. In case of conflicting reports, resolution prioritizes direct U.S. government publications. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Jair Bolsonaro is not sanctioned at all or if the sanction applies only to different individuals or entities unrelated to him.

items.title: Solana (SOL) > $300 by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the price of Solana (SOL) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerSolana (SOL)@content_dividera blockchain platform and cryptocurrency token – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches or exceeds $300 USD _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUSD@content_dividerUnited States dollar, the official currency of the United States – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by the official closing price on major cryptocurrency exchanges by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerDeadline@content_divider2026-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ as reported by reputable crypto market data providers such as Bitget and SolanaFM.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the highest official closing price of SOL on any major centralized or decentralized exchange, aggregated and verified by authoritative sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerAuthoritative sources@content_dividercompany websites, verified APIs, or major crypto data aggregators)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches or exceeds $300 USD at any time on or before _$TIME_1. Verification requires price data published by at least two independent reputable platforms or an official announcement from Solana-related entities _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerOfficial sources@content_dividerSolana Foundation or major exchange websites)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'No' if the price of SOL does not reach $300 USD by _$TIME_1, if trading is halted or the token is delisted permanently before the deadline, if the event is officially cancelled, or if authoritative price verification data is unavailable or contradictory. Conflicting data will be resolved by prioritizing official exchange closing prices and Solana Foundation reports. The market also resolves 'No' if Solana (SOL) ceases to exist or never had active trading by the deadline.

items.title: Avalanche top 3 DeFi TVL by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Avalanche (AVAX) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerAvalanche@content_dividera decentralized layer-1 blockchain platform designed for decentralized applications and financial primitives – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ ranks within the top three blockchains by total value locked (TVL) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerTVL@content_dividethe aggregate value of crypto assets deposited in decentralized finance protocols – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ for decentralized finance (DeFi) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerDeFi@content_dividerfinancial services using smart contracts on blockchains without intermediaries – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ as reported by DeFi Llama _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerDeFi Llama@content_divideran open-source analytics platform aggregating TVL data across DeFi protocols with focus on accuracy and transparency – https://defillama.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ at or before _$TIME_1.

This market resolves 'Yes' if DeFi Llama publishes official TVL rankings showing Avalanche among the top three blockchains by TVL at or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerDeFi Llama official@content_dividerhttps://defillama.com homepage or API endpoints)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification requires archived snapshots or official API data confirming Avalanche’s top 3 position. Alternative verification includes major media reports explicitly citing DeFi Llama data or other reputable DeFi analytics platforms corroborating the ranking before _$TIME_1.

This market resolves 'No' if Avalanche is not ranked in the top three by TVL in DeFi Llama’s official data at or before _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or the ranking discontinued, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory. If DeFi Llama data becomes inaccessible, resolution uses archived data from Internet Archive or regulatory filings. The market also resolves 'No' if Avalanche or DeFi Llama never existed or if the TVL metric differs fundamentally from the market definition.

items.title: Arbitrum or Optimism daily transactions surpass Ethereum by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether either Arbitrum or Optimism daily transaction counts _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerDaily transaction count@content_dividerthe total number of confirmed blockchain transactions processed in one calendar day – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ exceed Ethereum mainnet daily transaction counts by _$TIME_1 according to authoritative blockchain analytics platforms.

Resolves 'Yes' if official daily transaction volume data from at least one authoritative source such as Dune Analytics _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerDune Analytics@content_dividera blockchain analytics platform providing on-chain data dashboards – https://dune.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or The Block _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerThe Block@content_dividera digital asset research and analytics company – https://www.theblockcrypto.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm that Arbitrum or Optimism surpass Ethereum mainnet on any day on or before _$TIME_1. Verification requires publicly accessible, timestamped reports or dashboards from these sources or official project websites.

Resolves 'No' if no verified evidence shows Arbitrum or Optimism surpassing Ethereum mainnet transaction volume by _$TIME_1, if transaction data from authoritative sources is unavailable or contradictory, or if either project ceases operation or data reporting prior to _$TIME_1. In case of conflicting data, resolution prioritizes direct official platform data, followed by multiple independent analytics corroborations. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never occurs or if the networks do not exist by the deadline.

items.title: India Women's cricket team reaches ICC Women's ODI World Cup final by November 30, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the India Women's cricket team qualifies for and competes in the final match of the 2025 ICC Women's One Day International (ODI) World Cup held by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerICC Women's ODI World Cup@content_dividerthe international cricket tournament for women's national teams played in the One Day International format – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ with match dates as per the International Cricket Council (ICC) schedule, verified by official match results and announcements.

Resolves 'Yes' if the India Women's cricket team is officially confirmed by the ICC _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerInternational Cricket Council@content_dividerthe global governing body for cricket – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ as a participant in the World Cup final match held on November 2, 2025, based on semifinal results from October 30, 2025, published on the ICC official website or verified ICC social media accounts by _$TIME_1. Confirmation includes official match scorecards, verified live match data, or ICC press releases.

Resolves 'No' if India does not qualify for the final by _$TIME_1, if the semifinal or final matches are cancelled or indefinitely postponed beyond the deadline, if official ICC confirmation is unavailable or contradicts participation, or if the event does not occur as specified. In case of conflicting information, official ICC sources take precedence. Also resolves 'No' if the tournament or matches do not exist or are not held as scheduled.

items.title: Solstice TVL > $250M by November 30, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Solstice Finance's total value locked (TVL) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerTotal Value Locked@content_dividerthe total amount of cryptocurrency assets deposited and secured in a decentralized finance protocol – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ in USD equals or exceeds $250 million by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerDeadline@content_divider2025-11-30T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_. The TVL measurement must be based on official Solstice Finance protocol data or verified blockchain analytics.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official protocol data or independently verified blockchain analytics _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerBlockchain analytics@content_divideranalysis of blockchain transaction data by reputable third parties – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm that Solstice Finance’s TVL reaches or surpasses $250 million by _$TIME_1. Confirmation must come from Solstice Finance’s official website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOfficial website@content_dividerhttps://solstice.finance)_$ANNOTATION$_, verified Solstice social media accounts, or major tier-1 media sources explicitly citing these official data points. Backup verification includes reputable blockchain data aggregators with archived snapshots.

This market resolves 'No' if TVL does not reach $250 million by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if Solstice Finance ceases operations before the deadline, or if no authoritative verification of the milestone is available by _$TIME_1. Conflicting or delayed data will be resolved by prioritizing official Solstice Finance disclosures and blockchain data archives. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Solstice Finance protocol never existed or data is unverifiable.

items.title: India government implements 8th Pay Commission pay hike by January 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Government of India officially implements the pay hike recommended by the 8th Pay Commission with an effective date on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_divider8th Pay Commission@content_dividera government-appointed panel to review and revise salary structures and pensions of central government employees in India – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, confirmed by official government notification or cabinet announcement.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official notification or cabinet announcement explicitly confirming the pay hike implementation and specifying the effective date on or before _$TIME_1 is published on the Government of India’s official website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerGovernment of India official website@content_dividerhttps://india.gov.in)_$ANNOTATION$_ or in the Gazette of India _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerGazette of India@content_dividerofficial public journal of the Government of India publishing legal and statutory notifications – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Backup verification may include verified cabinet press releases or major Indian media outlets with corroboration from at least two tier-1 sources.

Resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation is published by _$TIME_1, if the pay hike implementation is officially postponed beyond _$TIME_1, cancelled, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing official government sources first, followed by Gazette notifications and verified media reports. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the 8th Pay Commission recommendations are not implemented or if the event does not exist.

items.title: Flamengo wins 2025 Copa Libertadores by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Clube de Regatas do Flamengo _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerFlamengo@content_dividerBrazilian sports club known for its football team – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ wins the 2025 CONMEBOL Copa Libertadores _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCopa Libertadores@content_dividerannual South American club football tournament organized by CONMEBOL – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ as determined by the official result of the single final match held at Estadio Monumental in Lima by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerEstadio Monumental@content_dividermajor football stadium in Lima, Peru – Oxford Dictionary)_$ANNOTATION$_.
