This market resolves 'Yes' if Flamengo is officially declared the winner of the 2025 Copa Libertadores final match by CONMEBOL _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerCONMEBOL@content_dividerSouth American Football Confederation, governing body of football in South America – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ with public confirmation by _$TIME_1 via CONMEBOL's official website or verified statements _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerOfficial source@content_dividerhttps://www.conmebol.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or major tier-1 sports media outlets with dual independent verification. Backup confirmation includes official match reports, verified social media from Flamengo or CONMEBOL, or authenticated visual evidence.

This market resolves 'No' if Flamengo does not win the final by _$TIME_1, the final is cancelled, postponed indefinitely beyond _$TIME_1, if Flamengo is officially declared not the winner, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory. If the final match does not occur or is replaced by a different format, this market resolves 'No'. Conflicts in verification defer to CONMEBOL official announcements. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never existed or Flamengo did not participate in the final.

items.title: MetaMask $MASK token rewards distribution by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether MetaMask _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMetaMask@content_divideran Ethereum wallet software product developed by ConsenSys – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ distributes $MASK tokens _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_divider$MASK tokens@content_dividera native utility token associated with MetaMask, used as user rewards tied to onchain activity and wallet engagement)_$ANNOTATION$_ as user rewards to eligible active wallet users or contributors by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_, confirmed by official MetaMask or ConsenSys announcements and verifiable onchain or web evidence.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official statement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerofficial statement@content_divideran explicit company declaration published on MetaMask or ConsenSys websites or verified social media accounts – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or regulatory filing from MetaMask or ConsenSys confirms the distribution of $MASK tokens as user rewards by _$TIME_1, and verification includes accessible claim portals (e.g., claim.metamask.io) or onchain transaction evidence reflecting token distribution to users.

Resolves 'No' if no authoritative confirmation or verifiable evidence of $MASK token rewards distribution exists by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if the distribution occurs differently than specified (e.g., no user rewards or outside the defined criteria). Conflicting information defaults to 'No' without official confirmation. Also resolves 'No' if the token distribution event never existed or was never initiated.

If primary official sources are inaccessible at resolution, secondary verification via major tier-1 media reporting with explicit MetaMask/ConsenSys confirmation or archived web records (e.g., Internet Archive) will be used. In absence of reliable data, the market resolves 'No'.

Settlement time is strictly by _$TIME_1, with all timestamps in UTC. Any evidence appearing after this cutoff is disregarded.

items.title: Hyperliquid (HYPE) price > $90 by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the closing price of Hyperliquid (HYPE) cryptocurrency in USD reaches or exceeds $90 on any major cryptocurrency exchange by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerHyperliquid (HYPE)@content_dividera digital cryptocurrency token known as HYPE traded on multiple exchanges – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ , using aggregated price data in USD from recognized exchanges.

Resolves 'Yes' if official aggregated USD price data from at least two major cryptocurrency price aggregation platforms, such as CoinMarketCap or Cryptocompare _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCoinMarketCap@content_dividera widely used cryptocurrency price aggregator – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, confirm a closing price of $90 or higher reached by _$TIME_1. Verification includes snapshot data, official API records, or historical OHLC (open, high, low, close) data published by these platforms or major exchanges.

Resolves 'No' if the closing price of HYPE does not reach or exceed $90 by _$TIME_1, if data is unavailable or insufficient for verification, or if HYPE trading is suspended, delisted, or the market is otherwise disrupted. Resolution follows authoritative source precedence and defaults to 'No' if verification fails or event never occurred.

items.title: Polymarket IPO by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Polymarket completes an initial public offering (IPO) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerIPO@content_dividerthe first sale of stock by a private company to the public – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 as confirmed by official company announcements or credible news sources.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Polymarket publicly files and completes an IPO according to official statements from Polymarket or its underwriters, regulatory filings such as with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerSEC@content_dividerU.S. federal agency regulating securities markets – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, or major financial media outlets with dual tier-1 source verification by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes archived filings and press releases on official company websites or verified social media.

This market resolves 'No' if no IPO completion is confirmed by _$TIME_1, if Polymarket is acquired by a public company before _$TIME_1, if the IPO is cancelled, postponed indefinitely, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or conflicting. This market also resolves 'No' if the IPO event never existed or was never initiated.

items.title: BLACKPINK Lisa marriage by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether BLACKPINK member Lisa _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerLisa; stage name of Lalisa Manoban, Thai singer and dancer, member of K-pop group BLACKPINK _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerBLACKPINK; South Korean girl group formed by YG Entertainment in 2016 _$ANNOTATION$_)_) legally marries by _$TIME_1 according to official public statements or legal documentation from authoritative sources.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official public statement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial public statement; a declaration issued by a directly involved party or representative through verified channels – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or legal documentation _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerLegal documentation; certified records such as marriage certificates issued by government authorities – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirming Lisa's marriage is published by or before _$TIME_1, verified via primary sources such as Lisa's official website, verified social media accounts, government vital records, or major news outlets with explicit confirmation.

Resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation is available by _$TIME_1, if the event is explicitly denied, indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is absent. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official and government sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the marriage event never occurred or did not exist within the specified timeframe.

items.title: Kalshi Inc. IPO completion by October 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Kalshi Inc. completes an initial public offering (IPO) defined as the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) declaring effective the company's Form S-1 registration statement or equivalent public offering registration by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerIPO@content_dividerinitial public offering: the first sale of stock by a company to the public – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerSEC@content_dividerSecurities and Exchange Commission: U.S. federal agency regulating securities markets – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, with verification from official SEC records or equivalent authoritative filings.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official SEC filings _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerSEC Filings@content_dividerpublicly accessible documents filed with the SEC, such as Form S-1 and effective notices – SEC.gov)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm the Form S-1 or equivalent registration statement for Kalshi Inc. is declared effective on or before _$TIME_1. Verification may also include direct company announcements on official websites or verified social media accounts by _$TIME_1.

This market resolves 'No' if the IPO registration is not declared effective by _$TIME_1, if the IPO is officially cancelled or postponed beyond _$TIME_1, if no verifiable confirmation exists from authoritative sources by _$TIME_1, or if the event never existed. Conflicting information will be resolved by prioritizing SEC official records. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the IPO event differs from the defined Form S-1 effectiveness or equivalent registration.

items.title: MegaETH mainnet live by November 30, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the MegaETH mainnet becomes operational and publicly accessible by _$TIME_1 according to official announcements or block production logs from authorized sources.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official statement from MegaETH's verified website or official social media accounts _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMegaETH official source@content_dividerhttps://megaeth.io or MegaETH verified Twitter/X account)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms mainnet launch by _$TIME_1 or if blockchain explorers or logs show block production on MegaETH mainnet by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'No' if no verified confirmation of mainnet operation occurs by _$TIME_1, if the mainnet launch is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if authoritative sources deny launch, or if data is unavailable for verification. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing official MegaETH sources and verified blockchain data. Also resolves 'No' if the mainnet event never existed or never took place.

items.title: Federal Reserve interest rate cut ≥ 0.25% by October 29, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerFOMC@content_dividerFederal Open Market Committee: principal monetary policymaking body of the Federal Reserve System – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ announces a decrease of at least 0.25 percentage points in the federal funds target rate _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerfederal funds rate@content_dividerthe interest rate at which depository institutions lend balances to each other overnight – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ during its October 29, 2025 meeting before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-10-29T18:00:00Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to official Federal Reserve communications.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the FOMC publicly announces a federal funds target rate decrease of at least 0.25 percentage points during the official October 29, 2025 meeting, as published on the Federal Reserve website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerFederal Reserve website@content_dividerhttps://www.federalreserve.gov/monetarypolicy/fomc.htm)_$ANNOTATION$_ or via verified statements by the Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerJerome Powell@content_dividerChair of the Federal Reserve Board of Governors – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes Federal Reserve press releases, FOMC meeting minutes, or major tier-1 financial media reports with explicit confirmation.

This market resolves 'No' if no official announcement confirms a rate cut of at least 0.25 percentage points by _$TIME_1, if the meeting is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative sources do not verify the cut. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing Federal Reserve official sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the FOMC meeting does not occur or if the rate change is less than 0.25 percentage points.

items.title: Bear-related deaths exceed 15 in Japan by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the cumulative number of people killed by bears in Japan exceeds 15 by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBear-related deaths@content_dividerfatalities caused by bear attacks in Japan – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to official data from the Japan Environment Ministry and government announcements.

Resolves 'Yes' if official Japan Environment Ministry reports or government announcements _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerJapan Environment Ministry@content_dividerJapan's national governmental agency responsible for environmental protection and wildlife management – https://www.env.go.jp/en/)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm more than 15 bear-related fatalities by _$TIME_1. Verification requires published statistics or statements on official ministry websites or verified government communication channels. Backup verification may include major Japanese media outlets with corroboration from at least two tier-1 sources.

Resolves 'No' if the cumulative fatality count does not exceed 15 by _$TIME_1, if official sources confirm fewer deaths, if the event is cancelled or does not exist, or if authoritative data is unavailable or contradicts the claim. In case of conflicting reports, official Japan Environment Ministry data takes precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if bear-related deaths are not officially recorded or the event never occurred.

items.title: 2025 hottest year on record by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether 2025 is officially ranked as the hottest calendar year on record based on global mean near-surface temperature according to assessments by authoritative climate organizations _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerGlobal mean near-surface temperature@content_divideraverage temperature of Earth's surface air and ocean surface waters – NOAA)_$ANNOTATION$_ such as the World Meteorological Organization, NOAA, NASA GISS, UK Met Office, and Copernicus Climate Change Service.

This market resolves 'Yes' if an official ranking or statement from at least one authoritative climate organization _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerAuthoritative climate organization@content_dividerWMO, NOAA, NASA GISS, UK Met Office, or Copernicus Climate Change Service – official agencies providing validated climate data)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms that 2025 is the hottest year on record by _$TIME_1. Verification requires publication of quality-controlled global temperature data or a formal statement on official websites or verified channels, with backup confirmation from at least one other independent agency or major media outlet citing the official sources.

This market resolves 'No' if by _$TIME_1 no authoritative confirmation exists that 2025 is the hottest year, or if official data indicate another year remains hotter. It also resolves 'No' if the event is cancelled, data is unavailable, or the ranking is not published by the deadline. Conflicts are resolved by prioritizing official agency reports and WMO statements. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the data event never exists, is indefinitely postponed, or if no reliable verification is obtainable.

items.title: UN global AI regulation framework by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the United Nations declares a global artificial intelligence regulation framework by official UN General Assembly resolution or Secretary-General announcement by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerUnited Nations@content_divideran intergovernmental organization established in 1945 to promote international cooperation – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerArtificial intelligence@content_dividerthe capability of a machine to imitate intelligent human behavior – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ governance standards.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official UN General Assembly resolution or a formal announcement by the UN Secretary-General explicitly declares a global AI regulation framework by _$TIME_1, verified through the UN official website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerUN official website@content_dividerhttps://www.un.org/en/)_$ANNOTATION$_ or UN press releases _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerUN press releases@content_dividerhttps://press.un.org/en)_$ANNOTATION$_ . Alternative verification includes major media reports that cite direct UN sources or archived official UN documentation.

Resolves 'No' if no such official declaration exists by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory, or if the declaration differs fundamentally from a global AI regulation framework. In case of conflicting information, resolution prioritizes official UN sources and archived records. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the underlying event never occurred or was never planned.

items.title: AI-generated song wins Grammy Award by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether a song with significant AI-generated content and human creative contribution _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerAI-generated song@content_dividera musical composition created using artificial intelligence technologies combined with human artistic input – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ wins a Grammy Award _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerGrammy Award@content_divideran award presented by the Recording Academy recognizing outstanding achievement in the music industry – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by any Grammy Awards ceremony held on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2026-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_. The Recording Academy's official winner announcements serve as the primary verification source.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the Recording Academy _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerRecording Academy@content_dividera professional organization of music creators responsible for the Grammy Awards – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ officially awards a Grammy to a song identified as containing significant AI-generated content with human creative contribution by _$TIME_1, confirmed by official Grammy website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerGrammy official website@content_dividerhttps://www.grammy.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified Recording Academy social media accounts. Verification includes publicly available winner lists and press releases. Backup confirmation may be obtained through major media outlets with cross-verification from at least two tier-1 sources.

This market resolves 'No' if no such award is confirmed by _$TIME_1, if the Grammy Awards ceremony is cancelled or postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if official verification is unavailable or contradictory. In case of conflicting information, official Recording Academy sources take precedence. This market also resolves 'No' if no Grammy Awards ceremony occurs before or on _$TIME_1, or if no song meeting the AI-generated content and human creative contribution criteria wins. Verification also includes absence of credible announcements or winner listings.

items.title: Markets pump after Jerome Powell FOMC speech by October 29?
items.rules:
This market measures whether major US stock indices _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerstock indices@content_dividerstatistical measures of stock market performance such as the S&P 500 and Nasdaq – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ demonstrate a measurable upward movement (a 'pump') in price and trading volume within one trading day following the official Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) announcement at 18:30 UTC on October 29, 2025 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerFOMC@content_dividerFederal Open Market Committee: principal monetary policymaking body of the Federal Reserve System – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_. The resolution is determined by official market data from primary exchanges and verified financial data providers.

This market resolves 'Yes' if by 23:59:59 UTC on October 29, 2025, at least two major US stock indices (e.g., S&P 500, Nasdaq) show a statistically significant positive price change and increased trading volume compared to the previous trading day, confirmed by authoritative sources such as the New York Stock Exchange _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerNYSE@content_dividerleading US stock exchange – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, Nasdaq _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerNasdaq@content_dividerUS electronic stock market focusing on technology stocks – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, or official CME Group data _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerCME Group@content_dividermajor global derivatives marketplace and data provider – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification requires published official market summaries or regulatory filings accessible via respective websites or archived repositories.

This market resolves 'No' if the specified price and volume increase conditions are not met by the deadline, if the FOMC speech or announcement is cancelled, postponed beyond October 29, 2025, or if reliable verification data is unavailable. In case of conflicting data, resolution follows official exchange reports prioritized over media sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the FOMC speech does not occur or if the market is closed on the announcement day.

items.title: Solana new all-time high by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Solana (SOL) cryptocurrency price exceeds its previous maximum USD value on Binance exchange using 1-minute candle 'High' prices from March 11, 2025 12:00 ET to December 31, 2025 23:59 ET, verified via official Binance trading data _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerSolana (SOL)@content_dividercryptocurrency token native to the Solana blockchain, traded under symbol SOL – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerBinance@content_dividermajor cryptocurrency exchange platform established in 2017, providing spot and derivatives trading – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if any Binance 1-minute candle 'High' price for SOLUSDT in the specified interval in Eastern Time zone exceeds the highest such price recorded prior to March 11, 2025 12:00 ET, confirmed by official Binance API or website data _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerBinance official data@content_dividerhttps://www.binance.com/en/markets/spot/SOL_USDT candlestick data with 1m granularity)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Verification can be supplemented by archived Binance data or major cryptocurrency market aggregators reporting Binance-sourced 1-minute high prices.

This market resolves 'No' if no such new all-time high occurs by _$TIME_1, if Binance trading data is unavailable or unverifiable, if Binance delists SOL or halts trading before _$TIME_1, or if the asset never traded using the specified parameters. Conflicting or unavailable data defaults to 'No'. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event of a new all-time high never occurs within the specified interval.

items.title: Bear-related deaths in Japan > 15 by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the total number of bear-related human fatalities in Japan exceeds 15 during the fiscal year starting April 1, 2025, through December 31, 2025, as officially confirmed by the Environment Ministry or police investigations _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBear-related deaths@content_dividerhuman fatalities caused by bear attacks – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if official Environment Ministry announcements or police investigation reports _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial Environment Ministry announcements@content_dividerpublic statements or reports issued by Japan's Ministry of the Environment – https://www.env.go.jp/en/)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm that more than 15 bear-related deaths occurred in Japan within the specified period by _$TIME_1. Verification requires publication on official ministry websites or police press releases. Backup confirmation may include major Japanese national media reports with explicit source attribution.

Resolves 'No' if the total confirmed bear-related deaths do not exceed 15 by _$TIME_1, if credible official sources deny or fail to report such fatalities, if the event is cancelled or non-existent, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. In case of conflicting evidence, priority is given to official Environment Ministry and police sources. This market also resolves 'No' if bear-related death events did not occur or were otherwise unconfirmed in the specified timeframe.

items.title: T.O.P jail sentence during 2026 by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether T.O.P _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerT.O.P@content_dividerstage name of Choi Seung-hyun, South Korean rapper and actor – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ will serve any jail time _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerJail time@content_dividerperiod of imprisonment ordered by a court – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ during calendar year 2026 as confirmed by official South Korean court rulings or appeals by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2026-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if an official South Korean judiciary source _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerSouth Korean judiciary source@content_dividerofficial South Korean court rulings published on government or court websites)_$ANNOTATION$_ or a verified legal announcement confirms T.O.P is sentenced to and serves jail time during 2026 by _$TIME_1. Verification may include court rulings, government press releases, or major South Korean media reports corroborated by two or more tier-1 sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividertier-1 sources@content_dividertop reputable news organizations with verified fact-checking processes – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'No' if no official confirmation of jail time exists by _$TIME_1, if the case is dismissed, if sentencing is postponed beyond 2026, if T.O.P is acquitted, or if authoritative sources deny imprisonment. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing South Korean court rulings and official government sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the legal case never existed, was withdrawn, or data is unavailable or unverifiable by the deadline.

items.title: China superpower status by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether China attains recognized superpower status by _$TIME_1, defined by combined economic, military, and geopolitical influence as established by global consensus from reputable expert analyses and international institutions _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerSuperpower@content_dividera nation recognized for predominant influence in economic, military, and geopolitical domains – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerGlobal consensus@content_dividera general agreement among authoritative experts and institutions worldwide – Oxford Dictionary)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if by _$TIME_1 at least two independent authoritative sources among international organizations (e.g., United Nations, World Bank), major global think tanks (e.g., Council on Foreign Relations, Brookings Institution), or expert consensus reports explicitly recognize China as a superpower based on measurable economic size, military capability, and geopolitical influence published in official reports or statements _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerAuthoritative sources@content_dividerofficial government publications, international organizations, verified expert analyses, or major media with dual tier-1 verification)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if no such authoritative recognition exists by _$TIME_1, if official reports or expert analyses explicitly deny superpower status, if data is insufficient or unavailable, or if the concept of superpower status is officially redefined excluding China. Conflicting information resolves in favor of primary official sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event (global consensus on China’s superpower status) never materializes or is invalidated before _$TIME_1.

items.title: Donald Trump visits China before February 17, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Donald Trump makes an official visit to China _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerOfficial visit@content_dividera formal trip by a head of state or government to another country for diplomatic purposes – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ at any time before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerDeadline@content_divider2026-02-16T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to official diplomatic schedules and government announcements.

Resolves 'Yes' if credible confirmation of Donald Trump’s visit to China is published by official government sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial government sources@content_dividerwebsites or verified announcements from the U.S. Department of State or Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs)_$ANNOTATION$_ on or before _$TIME_1, or if major tier-1 media outlets report the visit with explicit verification from both U.S. and Chinese official channels. Backup confirmation includes official diplomatic event schedules and verified visual evidence.

Resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if the visit is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if the event never existed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official diplomatic sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Donald Trump does not enter China territory on an official diplomatic visit before _$TIME_1.

items.title: Wan2.2 best AI video generator by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Wan2.2, an AI video generator developed by Alibaba's Wan-AI initiative _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerWan2.2@content_divideran open-source AI video generation model featuring a Mixture-of-Experts architecture for image-to-video tasks – source: Alibaba Wan-AI official releases)_$ANNOTATION$_, is recognized as the best AI video generator by December 31, 2025 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ based on video generation quality, stability, architectural innovation, resolution support, and inference efficiency as assessed by expert reviews and user adoption metrics published by authoritative AI industry analysts or platforms.

This market resolves 'Yes' if at least two independent, authoritative sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerauthoritative sources@content_dividerofficial expert review platforms, major AI industry analyst reports, or Alibaba’s verified official statements)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm Wan2.2 as the best AI video generator by _$TIME_1, supported by measurable evaluations including benchmark reports or comprehensive user adoption statistics published on or before _$TIME_1. Verification includes official Alibaba announcements _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerAlibaba official@content_dividerhttps://wan-ai.alibaba.com or verified social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_ and expert reviews from leading AI technology evaluators.

This market resolves 'No' if no authoritative confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if competing models are officially ranked higher by at least two independent expert sources, if Wan2.2 is officially discontinued or superseded without regaining best status by _$TIME_1, or if verification data is unavailable, contradictory, or insufficient. In case of conflicting evidence, resolution prioritizes official Alibaba statements, followed by major AI industry analyst consensus. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Wan2.2 never achieved or ceased to exist as a video generation product by _$TIME_1.

items.title: Buzzing app > Polymarket user base by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Buzzing app has a larger user base than Polymarket by _$TIME_1 based on unique active users counted through blockchain on-chain data and app analytics as confirmed by reputable blockchain analytic firms and electionbettingodds.com aggregator _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerUser base@content_dividerthe total number of unique active users of a digital application during a specific period – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerBlockchain@content_dividera distributed digital ledger technology recording transactions across a network without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if at least one official report from a reputable blockchain analytics firm or the electionbettingodds.com aggregator publishes end-of-day December 31, 2025 data showing Buzzing’s unique active user count exceeds Polymarket’s by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial report@content_dividera verified publication or dataset released by a recognized analytics firm or aggregator with direct data attribution – market standard)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification requires publication on the firm’s official website or electionbettingodds.com, or corroboration by a second independent reputable source.

This market resolves 'No' if no verified report confirms Buzzing’s user base exceeds Polymarket’s by _$TIME_1, if either application ceases operation before the deadline, or if official user data is unavailable or contradicts the condition. Conflicting data are resolved by prioritizing direct blockchain on-chain analytics and multiple independent confirmations. Additionally, this market resolves 'No' if either app never existed at the measurement date or user base data cannot be reliably verified.

items.title: Kalshi IPO announcement by December 31, 2027?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Kalshi Inc. _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerKalshi Inc.@content_divideran American financial exchange and prediction market based in New York City – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ publicly announces an initial public offering (IPO) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerInitial Public Offering@content_dividerthe first public sale of stock by a company on a regulated securities exchange – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ of common equity securities on a regulated securities exchange by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerDeadline@content_divider2027-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC, corresponding to December 31, 2027 EST)_$ANNOTATION$_ .

This market resolves 'Yes' if a verifiable public announcement of Kalshi's first IPO is published by an official source _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOfficial source@content_dividerregulatory filings (e.g., SEC Form S-1), press releases from Kalshi or the listing exchange, or announcements by securities regulators)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Verification requires explicit reference to Kalshi's initial public offering on a regulated exchange. Backup confirmation methods include major tier-1 financial media reports with dual-source verification or official exchange website disclosures.

This market resolves 'No' if no such announcement is confirmed by _$TIME_1, if the IPO is cancelled, indefinitely postponed, or if no verifiable evidence exists. If Kalshi was previously public or listed under any form, any subsequent offering is not a first IPO. Conflicting or insufficient data resolves to 'No' following authoritative hierarchy prioritizing official regulatory and exchange sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Kalshi never initiates or announces an IPO by the deadline.

items.title: Shanghai Composite Index > 4200 points by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Shanghai Composite Index _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerShanghai Composite Index@content_dividerstock market composite index of all A-shares and B-shares traded on the Shanghai Stock Exchange – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ closes above 4200 points on any official trading day on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_. The index level is determined by official Shanghai Stock Exchange closing prices with data verified through the SSE website and major financial data providers.

Resolves 'Yes' if at least one official daily closing price of the Shanghai Composite Index exceeds 4200 points by _$TIME_1, confirmed by the Shanghai Stock Exchange's official published data _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerShanghai Stock Exchange@content_dividerChina's main stock exchange, operator of Shanghai Composite Index – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, accessible at https://www.sse.com.cn and corroborated by at least one additional major financial data source (e.g., Bloomberg, Reuters) by the deadline.

Resolves 'No' if no official closing price exceeds 4200 points by _$TIME_1, if the Shanghai Stock Exchange is closed indefinitely or ceases publishing the index before _$TIME_1, or if authoritative data is unavailable or contradictory by the deadline. Conflicts in data resolve in favor of the Shanghai Stock Exchange official data. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the Shanghai Composite Index ceases to exist or is replaced by a fundamentally different index prior to _$TIME_1.

items.title: Ethereum (ETH) > $4,500 by November 15, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the price of Ethereum (ETH) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerEthereum (ETH)@content_dividera decentralized, open-source blockchain platform with smart contract functionality – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ exceeds $4,500 USD based on closing prices on major cryptocurrency exchanges by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-11-15T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ . Resolution uses aggregated official closing price data from leading exchanges such as Coinbase, Binance, Kraken, and Bitstamp with USD as the pricing currency.

This market resolves 'Yes' if at any time on or before _$TIME_1, the closing price of Ethereum on any major verified exchange is strictly greater than $4,500 USD, confirmed by official exchange data published on their websites _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial source@content_dividerhttps://www.coinbase.com, https://www.binance.com, https://www.kraken.com, https://www.bitstamp.net)_$ANNOTATION$_ or trusted financial data aggregators such as CoinMarketCap _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerData aggregator@content_dividerhttps://coinmarketcap.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ . Backup verification can use archived price snapshots from Internet Archive or official regulatory filings if live data is unavailable.

This market resolves 'No' if no verified closing price exceeds $4,500 USD by _$TIME_1, or if reliable price data is unavailable, the market’s event is cancelled, or Ethereum ceases trading on major exchanges. Conflicting or ambiguous data resolves in favor of official exchange sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Ethereum does not exist or trading halts indefinitely before _$TIME_1.

items.title: Donald Trump or Melania Trump announce divorce intention by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Donald Trump or Melania Trump publicly announce their intention to divorce by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerDivorce intention@content_dividera clear statement of intent to legally dissolve marriage – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ via official statements or press briefings.

Resolves 'Yes' if a verifiable public announcement or press briefing explicitly confirming intention to divorce by either party is issued by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividerstatement published on verified company websites, official social media accounts, or major media outlets with dual tier-1 verification)_$ANNOTATION$_. Confirmation may also be obtained through official legal filings or court documents made publicly available by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'No' if no such official announcement is confirmed by _$TIME_1, if the event is explicitly denied or refuted by authoritative sources, if the announcement is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if verification sources are unavailable or insufficient. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never occurred or if no intention to divorce was publicly expressed by either party.

items.title: US China tariff agreement by November 10, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the United States and China formally reach a tariff agreement involving publicly declared and mutually recognized tariff rate adjustments by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerTariff agreement@content_dividera formal arrangement between countries to modify import duties on goods – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ as confirmed by official government or trade commission announcements.

Resolves 'Yes' if both the US and Chinese governments or their authorized trade commissions officially announce a formal tariff agreement by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividerstatements published on official government websites, verified social media accounts, or regulatory filings)_$ANNOTATION$_ with publicly accessible documentation of tariff rate changes mutually recognized by both parties. Backup verification includes major tier-1 media reports corroborated by at least two independent sources.

Resolves 'No' if no such official mutual tariff agreement is confirmed by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if authoritative verification is unavailable, or if the announcement lacks mutual recognition or formal tariff rate changes. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing official government and trade commission sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if no tariff agreement event exists or the outcome differs from defined terms.

items.title: MetaMask token launch by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether MetaMask _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMetaMask@content_dividera cryptocurrency wallet and gateway to blockchain apps developed by ConsenSys – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or ConsenSys _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerConsenSys@content_dividerblockchain technology company and developer of MetaMask – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ officially launches a public token, defined as an issuance or airdrop _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerairdrop@content_dividera distribution of cryptocurrency tokens to multiple wallet addresses – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ available to users by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official announcement confirming the public availability of a MetaMask token or airdrop is published by MetaMask or ConsenSys on their official website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerMetaMask official website@content_dividerhttps://metamask.io)_$ANNOTATION$_, official social media accounts, or verified press releases by _$TIME_1. Backup verification may include major tier-1 media outlets reporting with explicit confirmation from these official sources.

Resolves 'No' if no verifiable official confirmation of any MetaMask token launch or airdrop occurs by _$TIME_1, if the launch is cancelled or indefinitely postponed beyond this time, or if reliable verification is unavailable. Conflicting information resolves in favor of official MetaMask or ConsenSys sources. This market also resolves 'No' if the token launch event never exists or does not meet the public issuance definition.

items.title: Cardano Hydra 1M TPS by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Cardano’s Hydra _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerHydra@content_dividera Layer 2 scaling protocol for the Cardano blockchain designed to increase transaction throughput – Input Output)_$ANNOTATION$_ achieves sustained throughput of at least 1 million transactions per second (TPS) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerTransactions per second@content_dividerthe number of individual transaction operations a system can process each second – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on the Hydra Layer 2 protocol under realistic conditions by _$TIME_1.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official technical benchmarks or performance tests conducted or validated by Input Output _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerInput Output@content_dividerthe technology company behind Cardano blockchain development – https://iohk.io)_$ANNOTATION$_ or equivalent authoritative technical reports confirm sustained Hydra throughput ≥1,000,000 TPS by _$TIME_1. Verification requires published documentation on Input Output’s official website or peer-reviewed technical reports, with backup confirmation from major blockchain analytics firms or academic publications.

This market resolves 'No' if the 1 million TPS milestone is not confirmed by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if authoritative verification is unavailable, or if performance tests do not meet the specified sustained throughput under realistic conditions. In case of conflicting information, official Input Output publications take precedence. Additionally, this market resolves 'No' if Hydra or Cardano’s Layer 2 scaling solution does not exist or the milestone was never pursued.

items.title: PEPE top 10 crypto market cap by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether PEPE _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerPEPE token@content_dividera meme cryptocurrency token based on the Pepe the Frog meme – CoinMarketCap)_$ANNOTATION$_ ranks among the top 10 cryptocurrencies by market capitalization as of or before _$TIME_1, using circulating supply multiplied by token price according to CoinMarketCap or CoinGecko data.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official listing from CoinMarketCap _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCoinMarketCap@content_dividera cryptocurrency market data aggregator providing rankings and market capitalization – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or CoinGecko _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerCoinGecko@content_dividera cryptocurrency data aggregator tracking price and market capitalization of tokens – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms PEPE is ranked in the top 10 by market cap on or before _$TIME_1 via their published historical snapshots or API data. Verification includes archived snapshots (e.g., Internet Archive) and major crypto news outlets with corroboration.

Resolves 'No' if PEPE is not in the top 10 by market cap on or before _$TIME_1, if the token is delisted, suspended, or if data from authoritative sources is unavailable or contradicts a top 10 ranking. Also resolves 'No' if PEPE never existed, is permanently inactive, or if verification data is insufficient by _$TIME_1.

items.title: BTC > $111,111 by October 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin's closing price in USD exceeds $111,111 on any major cryptocurrency exchange by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividera digital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if a closing price strictly greater than $111,111 USD is confirmed by official price data from at least two major exchanges (e.g., Coinbase, Binance, Kraken) by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividermajor exchanges@content_dividerprominent cryptocurrency trading platforms with significant volume and regulatory compliance – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification requires publicly accessible trade records or official exchange APIs archived at settlement, cross-checked with at least one reputable financial data aggregator _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerfinancial data aggregator@content_dividerentities providing verified aggregated market data such as CoinMarketCap or CoinGecko – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if no closing price exceeds $111,111 USD by _$TIME_1, if data from major exchanges are unavailable or conflicting, or if Bitcoin trading is halted, suspended, or the cryptocurrency ceases to exist by that time. In case of data conflicts, resolution prioritizes official exchange API data over third-party aggregators. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Bitcoin does not exist or trading ceases before _$TIME_1.

items.title: Golden State Warriors NBA champions by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Golden State Warriors officially win the NBA championship for the 2025-2026 season according to the NBA's formal announcement by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerNBA championship@content_dividerthe title awarded to the team winning the National Basketball Association Finals – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if the NBA officially confirms the Golden State Warriors as the 2025-2026 NBA champions by _$TIME_1 through an announcement on the NBA's official website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerNBA official website@content_dividerhttps://www.nba.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified NBA social media accounts, or via major tier-1 media outlets corroborated by at least two independent sources. Backup verification includes official NBA Finals statistics and records.

Resolves 'No' if no official confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if the championship is awarded to another team, if the Finals are cancelled or indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official NBA announcements and verified sources. This market also resolves 'No' if the 2025-2026 NBA Finals do not occur or the Golden State Warriors do not exist as a competing team in that season.

items.title: BTC > $131,000 by November 12, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin's USD price _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividera digital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches or exceeds $131,000 at any official market closing time on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-11-12T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_, as reported by major cryptocurrency exchanges such as Coinbase, Binance, Kraken, or Coingecko.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the closing price of Bitcoin in USD on any of the authoritative major exchanges equals or surpasses $131,000 by _$TIME_1, verified through official exchange tickers or publicly accessible market data APIs. Backup verification includes aggregated price indices and archived exchange data accessible via Internet Archive or equivalent repositories.

This market resolves 'No' if Bitcoin does not reach $131,000 by _$TIME_1, if all major exchanges cease trading Bitcoin before the deadline, or if reliable price data is unavailable or contradicted by authoritative sources. In the event of conflicting data, resolution prioritizes official exchange data over secondary sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Bitcoin trading is suspended indefinitely or if Bitcoin ceases to exist as a tradable asset by the deadline.

items.title: US government shutdown ends by November 7, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the US federal government shutdown ends by formal passage of an appropriations bill or continuing resolution restoring funding before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerGovernment shutdown@content_dividera partial or complete closure of government operations due to failure to enact funding legislation – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, using official government legislative records as primary source.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the US Congress and President enact and publish a valid appropriations act or continuing resolution that formally reopens government operations by _$TIME_1, verified through the official Congressional Record _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCongressional Record@content_dividerthe official record of proceedings and debates of the US Congress – US Government Publishing Office https://www.govinfo.gov/app/collection/crecb)_$ANNOTATION$_, or the US Government Publishing Office website, or official White House announcements _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerWhite House announcements@content_dividerverified official statements on whitehouse.gov)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'No' if no such funding legislation is enacted and published by _$TIME_1, if the shutdown continues beyond the deadline, if the event is indefinitely postponed or cancelled, or if no authoritative evidence confirms government reopening. Conflicting or ambiguous reports defer to official Congressional and Executive Branch records. Also resolves 'No' if the shutdown never occurred or government operations were never closed.

items.title: Oscar Piastri maintains first place in 2025 F1 drivers' championship by November 9?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Oscar Piastri _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerOscar Piastri@content_dividerAustralian Formula One racing driver competing in the 2025 FIA Formula One World Championship – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ holds the highest position in the official 2025 Formula One Drivers' Championship standings _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerDrivers' Championship@content_dividerannual competition ranking Formula One drivers by points accumulated over the season – Oxford Dictionary)_$ANNOTATION$_ at or before _$TIME_1 according to official FIA results following the Brazil Grand Prix _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerBrazil GP@content_dividerFormula One Grand Prix held in Brazil, a race event contributing to the World Championship – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_. Official standings reflect cumulative points through all completed races including Brazil GP.

Resolves 'Yes' if official FIA _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerFIA@content_dividerFédération Internationale de l'Automobile, the governing body for world motor sport – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ published standings show Oscar Piastri ranked first in the drivers' championship by _$TIME_1. Verification requires publication on the FIA official website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerFIA official website@content_dividerhttps://www.fia.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or Formula 1 official website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=6@counter_dividerFormula 1 official website@content_dividerhttps://www.formula1.com)_$ANNOTATION$_. Backup verification includes major tier-1 sports media reports (e.g., ESPN, Sky Sports) with corroboration and archived results from Internet Archive.

Resolves 'No' if Oscar Piastri is not ranked first by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or postponed beyond _$TIME_1, if official standings are unavailable or unverifiable, or if the championship does not exist. Conflicting data resolves in favor of FIA official publications. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the championship or Brazil GP does not occur or official results are withheld.

items.title: Donald Trump meets Changpeng Zhao by November 7, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Donald Trump, former President of the United States _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerDonald Trump@content_dividera former President of the United States, businessman, and political figure – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, meets Changpeng Zhao, founder and CEO of Binance _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerChangpeng Zhao@content_dividerfounder and CEO of Binance, a global cryptocurrency exchange platform – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, in any official or publicly confirmed private meeting by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official announcement from Donald Trump's office, Binance, or a credible U.S. government source _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividerstatement published on official websites or verified social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_ or at least two tier-1 major media outlets _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerTier-1 media@content_dividermajor media organizations with verified editorial standards)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm the meeting by _$TIME_1. Verification may also be based on authenticated visual evidence such as photographs or videos with source attribution.

Resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation or credible reporting exists by _$TIME_1, if the meeting is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative sources explicitly deny the meeting. In case of conflicting information, priority is given to direct official statements. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the meeting never occurred or was never planned.

items.title: Polymarket Chinese name release by November 7, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Polymarket, a decentralized prediction market platform _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerPolymarket@content_divideran online platform that enables users to create and trade prediction markets – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, publicly confirms its official Chinese name by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'Yes' if Polymarket's official website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerPolymarket official website@content_dividerhttps://polymarket.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified regulatory filings _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerRegulatory filings@content_dividerofficial documents submitted to regulatory authorities confirming corporate or product details)_$ANNOTATION$_ publicly confirm the Chinese name by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes official Polymarket social media accounts with verification badges or major media reports citing direct Polymarket confirmation.

Resolves 'No' if no authoritative confirmation is published by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if reliable verification sources are unavailable. Conflicting information is resolved using the official Polymarket website and regulatory filings as primary sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Polymarket never announced or planned a Chinese name release.

items.title: Player exceeds 10 deaths in 2025 League of Legends Worlds final by November 9?
items.rules:
This market measures whether any individual player records more than 10 deaths during the 2025 League of Legends World Championship final match on November 9, 2025, according to official tournament statistics _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerLeague of Legends World Championship@content_divideran annual esports tournament organized by Riot Games featuring the game League of Legends – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and official death counts _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerDeath@content_dividerthe event of a player character being eliminated in a match as recorded by game organizers – Riot Games official statistics)_$ANNOTATION$_ .

This market resolves 'Yes' if official match statistics or authoritative tournament organizer announcements _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial tournament organizer@content_dividerRiot Games or its designated official partners responsible for event oversight – Riot Games website)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm at least one player exceeded 10 deaths in the final match on or before _$TIME_1. Verification includes published match reports, official player stat pages, or verified media coverage citing official data.

This market resolves 'No' if no player exceeds 10 deaths by _$TIME_1, if the final match is cancelled, postponed indefinitely, or if official death data is unavailable or unverifiable. Conflicting or missing data defaults to 'No'. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the final match does not occur as scheduled or the event never exists.

items.title: Changpeng Zhao reposts Trump threads by November 7, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Changpeng Zhao publicly reposts or retweets any Twitter threads related to Donald Trump on X (formerly Twitter) by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerChangpeng Zhao@content_dividerfounder and CEO of Binance, the world's largest cryptocurrency exchange – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerReposting@content_dividerany public post or retweet of Trump-related threads on X, identified by social media timestamps in UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if verified social media activity logs from Changpeng Zhao's official and verified X account show at least one public post or retweet of Trump-related threads by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerVerification sources@content_dividerofficial X platform logs, verified social media archives, or major media reports with dual tier-1 source confirmation)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if no such repost or retweet is confirmed by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if reliable verification is unavailable. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing direct official X account logs and major media confirmation. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the repost event never occurs or if Changpeng Zhao’s official account is inactive or inaccessible.

items.title: Polymarket token launch by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Polymarket officially launches its native token generation event by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerToken Generation Event@content_dividera process by which a blockchain-based project issues new tokens to the public or users, often including airdrops or sales – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ as confirmed exclusively by official Polymarket announcements or verified Intercontinental Exchange (ICE) or New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) sources.

This market resolves 'Yes' if an explicit official announcement or confirmation of the token launch event is published by Polymarket via their official website or verified social media _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerPolymarket official announcements@content_dividerhttps://polymarket.com and verified social media handles)_$ANNOTATION$_, or by ICE/NYSE via regulatory filings or official press releases _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerICE@content_dividerIntercontinental Exchange, a global operator of exchanges and clearing houses – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerNYSE@content_dividerNew York Stock Exchange, a major U.S. stock exchange owned by ICE – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes major tier-1 financial media corroborated by at least two independent sources.

This market resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation occurs by _$TIME_1, if the token launch is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory, or if the event fundamentally differs from a Polymarket token generation event. Additionally, this market resolves 'No' if Polymarket never planned or never initiated a token launch event by the deadline.

items.title: Taylor Swift wedding cancellation by November 7, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Taylor Swift formally cancels her planned wedding to Travis Kelce by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerCancel@content_dividerto decide not to proceed with a planned event, announced publicly or through verified representatives – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ as confirmed by official statements from Taylor Swift, Travis Kelce, or their verified representatives.

Resolves 'Yes' if an explicit cancellation announcement or credible confirmation that the wedding will not occur as planned is published by Taylor Swift, Travis Kelce, or their verified representatives by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial statements@content_dividerstatements published on official websites, verified social media accounts, or authorized spokespersons)_$ANNOTATION$_. Alternative verification includes major media outlets with dual tier-1 source confirmation or official public declarations.

Resolves 'No' if no such cancellation confirmation is available by _$TIME_1, if the wedding proceeds as planned, if authoritative verification is unavailable, or if the event never existed. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the wedding is postponed indefinitely or if reliable data is lacking.

items.title: @BuzzingApp 10,000 followers on X by November 30, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Twitter account '@BuzzingApp' _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerTwitter@content_dividerthe social media platform now known as X – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ publicly displays a follower count of at least 10,000 by _$TIME_1, using data from official X follower counts and verified third-party follower tracking applications updated in real time.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the follower count shown publicly on '@BuzzingApp' on X is 10,000 or more by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial source@content_dividerthe verified X platform follower count visible on the profile page https://x.com/BuzzingApp and corroboration by live follower counters such as Livecounts.io or Circleboom)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification requires at least one authoritative source with independent corroboration prior to the deadline.

This market resolves 'No' if '@BuzzingApp' does not reach 10,000 followers on X by _$TIME_1, if the account is suspended, deleted, or otherwise inaccessible, or if follower data is unavailable or unverifiable by authoritative sources. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing direct X platform data and official tracking apps. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the '@BuzzingApp' account never existed or was never active on X.

items.title: Taliban attack Pakistan by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Taliban or Tehrik-i-Taliban Pakistan (TTP) conduct militant cross-border attacks _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerAttack@content_dividermilitant actions involving armed violence or incursions – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ into Pakistan during December 2025, based on verified reports from official government or United Nations sources.

Resolves 'Yes' if authoritative confirmation _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerAuthoritative confirmation@content_dividerexplicit verified reports or statements from official Pakistan or Afghanistan government agencies, or the United Nations Mission in Afghanistan (UNAMA) – https://unama.unmissions.org)_$ANNOTATION$_ documents Taliban or TTP forces crossing into Pakistan to carry out militant attacks between 2025-12-01T00:00:00Z and _$TIME_1. Verification includes official government publications, intergovernmental organization reports, or major media with dual tier-1 source confirmation.

Resolves 'No' if no verified militant cross-border attack occurs by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially denied, cancelled, or indefinitely postponed, or if verification sources are unavailable or contradictory. In case of conflicting data, official government and UN sources take precedence. Also resolves 'No' if the event never occurred or the Taliban/TTP did not attack Pakistan as defined.

items.title: Dogecoin > $1 by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Dogecoin (DOGE) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerDogecoin@content_dividera cryptocurrency created as a peer-to-peer digital currency without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches or exceeds the price of $1.00 USD on any exchange by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ based on the volume-weighted average price (VWAP) aggregated from global cryptocurrency exchanges.

Resolves 'Yes' if the aggregated VWAP of Dogecoin equals or exceeds $1.00 USD at any point on or before _$TIME_1, as confirmed by official price data from CoinMarketCap, CoinGecko, or equivalent authoritative cryptocurrency market data providers _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerCoinMarketCap@content_dividerleading cryptocurrency market data aggregator – CoinMarketCap.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ and corroborated through at least one major financial news outlet reporting with verification.

Resolves 'No' if Dogecoin does not reach $1.00 USD by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled (e.g., Dogecoin delisted or trading halted indefinitely), or if verifiable price data is unavailable or contradictory by _$TIME_1. In case of conflicting data, resolution defaults to data from CoinMarketCap or CoinGecko, with fallback to Internet Archive snapshots. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Dogecoin ceases to exist as a tradable cryptocurrency before _$TIME_1.

items.title: China invades Taiwan by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the People's Republic of China initiates any military action to seize or forcibly control Taiwan by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerInvasion@content_dividerany military action by one state to seize or forcibly control territory of another – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ .

Resolves 'Yes' if official government sources of China or Taiwan, verified major media outlets with dual tier-1 confirmation, or authoritative international organizations confirm such military action by _$TIME_1. Verification includes official military statements, government publications, or credible visual evidence _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerVerification sources@content_dividerofficial websites, government announcements, major media such as New York Times, Reuters, or United Nations reports)_$ANNOTATION$_ .

Resolves 'No' if no verified invasion occurs by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially denied, cancelled, or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory. Also resolves 'No' if the event never existed or China undertakes only non-invasion military exercises. Conflicting reports resolve by prioritizing official government sources and major intergovernmental organizations.

items.title: BTC > $110,000 by November 10, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the _Bitcoin_ closing price in USD on any major US cryptocurrency exchange equals or exceeds 110,000 by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin@content_dividerdigital cryptocurrency created and held electronically without central authority – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_. Price levels use official closing prices published by recognized US exchanges and verified through aggregated market data providers.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official data from at least two major US crypto exchanges _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUS crypto exchanges@content_dividercryptocurrency trading platforms registered or recognized in the United States – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm the closing price of Bitcoin meets or exceeds $110,000 at any point on or before _$TIME_1, verified via The Block crypto price data page _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerThe Block URL@content_dividerhttps://www.theblock.co/data/crypto-markets/spot)_$ANNOTATION$_ or equivalent authoritative sources.

This market resolves 'No' if no verified closing price on any major US exchange reaches or exceeds $110,000 by _$TIME_1, if Bitcoin trading is halted, delisted, or the event cannot be confirmed through authoritative sources. Conflicting data will be resolved by prioritizing official exchange data and The Block reports. The market also resolves 'No' if Bitcoin or the specified price measurement does not exist or data is unavailable at settlement.

items.title: 1X humanoid robots deployed in households by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether 1X Technologies _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_divider1X Technologies@content_dividerNorwegian robotics startup specializing in humanoid robots – Company website)_$ANNOTATION$_ deploys at least 1,000,000 humanoid robots _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerhumanoid robot@content_dividera robot resembling the human body in shape and movement – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ physically operating in private households by _$TIME_1 according to verified company reports, official press releases, or validated sales and distribution data.

Resolves 'Yes' if reliable documentation from 1X Technologies _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial source@content_dividercompany website, SEC filings, or verified press releases)_$ANNOTATION$_ or corroborated major media reports confirm deployment of at least 1 million humanoid robots in private homes by _$TIME_1, supported by validated operational data or audited sales figures. Backup verification may include third-party market research firms or regulatory filings.

Resolves 'No' if the deployment threshold is not met by _$TIME_1, if 1X Technologies officially cancels or indefinitely postpones mass household deployment, if no authoritative confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, or if the event never existed. Conflicting data resolves in favor of official company disclosures or regulatory submissions. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the product is rebranded or fundamentally differs from humanoid robots as defined.

items.title: Cosmos (ATOM) > $30 by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the closing USD price of Cosmos (ATOM) reaches or exceeds $30 on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerCosmos (ATOM)@content_dividerCosmos is a decentralized network of independent blockchains interoperable via its native cryptocurrency ATOM – Merriam-Webster, CryptoCompare)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to aggregated market data from multiple cryptocurrency exchanges.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the official aggregated closing price of Cosmos (ATOM) in USD equals or exceeds $30 at the close of trading on any cryptocurrency exchange or combined exchange index by _$TIME_1. Verification sources include CoinMarketCap _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCoinMarketCap@content_dividerhttps://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/cosmos/)_$ANNOTATION$_, CoinGecko _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerCoinGecko@content_dividerhttps://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/cosmos)_$ANNOTATION$_, and other tier-1 crypto market data aggregators, with backup from exchange official closing price records.

This market resolves 'No' if the closing price never reaches $30 by _$TIME_1, if Cosmos (ATOM) is delisted, trading is suspended indefinitely, or if authoritative price data is unavailable or contradictory by the deadline. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing official exchange filings and CoinMarketCap data. Also, resolves 'No' if Cosmos (ATOM) ceases to exist or trading never occurs by _$TIME_1.

items.title: Cristiano Ronaldo acquires Chinese nationality by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Cristiano Ronaldo legally obtains Chinese nationality _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerChinese nationality@content_dividerlegal citizenship status granted by the People's Republic of China – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 as confirmed by official PRC passport issuance and registration with the Chinese Football Association.

Resolves 'Yes' if official documentation _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial documentation@content_dividergovernment-issued PRC passport and registration records from the Chinese Football Association – PRC Ministry of Public Security and CFA official websites)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms Ronaldo's naturalization and football registration by _$TIME_1. Verification may also include official announcements from Chinese government portals or verified CFA communications.

Resolves 'No' if no verified issuance of PRC passport or CFA registration occurs by _$TIME_1, if the naturalization process is officially cancelled or postponed indefinitely, or if authoritative sources fail to confirm the event. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing PRC government publications and CFA records. Also resolves 'No' if Ronaldo never initiated or completed the naturalization process.

items.title: Gold rally continuation by November 7, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether gold prices maintain or exceed $4,000 per ounce by the close of November 7, 2025, using official closing prices of COMEX futures _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerCOMEX futures@content_dividerfutures contracts for gold traded on the Commodities Exchange, NYMEX – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and major gold ETF holdings data from recognized providers.

Resolves 'Yes' if COMEX futures official closing prices and aggregated major ETF holdings data confirm gold prices at or above $4,000 per ounce by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerTIME_1@content_divider2025-11-07T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification requires data published by CME Group official website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerCME Group official website@content_dividerhttps://www.cmegroup.com/)_$ANNOTATION$_ and ETF data from providers such as SPDR Gold Shares (GLD) or iShares Gold Trust (IAU) with backup confirmation from LBMA price benchmarks _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerLBMA@content_dividerLondon Bullion Market Association, a global authority on precious metals pricing – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ .

Resolves 'No' if gold prices fall below $4,000 per ounce at COMEX futures close and ETF data by _$TIME_1, if official sources report market closure, suspension, or cancellation, or if authoritative data is unavailable or contradictory. Conflicting evidence is resolved prioritizing CME Group data followed by LBMA and major ETF disclosures. This market also resolves 'No' if the price data or ETF holdings do not exist or cannot be verified by deadline.

items.title: Gold price < $2000 by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the spot price of gold in USD per ounce falls to or below $2000 at any time by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerSpot price@content_dividerthe current market price at which an asset is bought or sold for immediate payment and delivery – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, using authoritative price data from major market sources including LBMA and COMEX benchmarks.

Resolves 'Yes' if official market data from at least one primary source _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerPrimary source@content_dividerLondon Bullion Market Association (LBMA) or Commodities and Mercantile Exchange (COMEX) spot gold price data – official market benchmarks)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms the spot gold price is at or below $2000 USD per ounce at any time on or before _$TIME_1. Verification includes archival data from goldprice.org _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerGoldPrice.org@content_dividerhttps://goldprice.org/, a reputable aggregator of gold price history and live data)_$ANNOTATION$_ and/or major financial data providers such as Bloomberg or Reuters.

Resolves 'No' if no verified price at or below $2000 USD occurs by _$TIME_1, if spot gold price data is unavailable or insufficient for verification, or if the event is effectively cancelled by market closure or data unavailability. Conflicting data resolves by deferring to LBMA or COMEX official published prices. This market also resolves 'No' if gold spot price benchmarks never recorded such a price by the deadline.
