Verification requires publication on official government websites, state media outlets, or verified major media with source attribution.

Resolves 'No' if no such confirmed ICBM launch occurs by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification sources are unavailable or contradictory. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing official North Korean announcements and allied monitoring agencies. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never occurred or never existed.

items.title: United States military operations targeting Islamist terrorists in Nigeria by May 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the United States conducts military operations _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMilitary operations@content_dividerdeployment or direct combat actions by armed forces against hostile targets – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ in Nigeria _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerNigeria@content_dividera country in West Africa – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ targeting Islamist terrorist groups _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerIslamist terrorist groups@content_dividerarmed groups motivated by Islamist ideology engaging in terrorism – Oxford Dictionary)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official U.S. government sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerU.S. government sources@content_dividerofficial statements, Department of Defense publications, or verified agencies)_$ANNOTATION$_ or credible tier-1 media outlets _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividertier-1 media outlets@content_dividermajor established news organizations with verification standards)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm deployment or direct combat by U.S. forces against Islamist terrorist groups in Nigeria by _$TIME_1. Confirmation includes public announcements, verified military reports, or visual evidence from authoritative sources.

This market resolves 'No' if no verified military operations occur by _$TIME_1, if operations are officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if credible verification is unavailable by the deadline, or if the event never takes place. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official U.S. government sources, followed by major media with dual verification. Additionally, resolves 'No' if no such operations exist or are never initiated.

items.title: Virtuals token $5 before $0.5 by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures if the Virtuals token price in USD reaches $5.00 before it reaches $0.50 at any time up to and including _$TIME_1, based on aggregated exchange data from major cryptocurrency trading platforms using USD pricing.

Resolves 'Yes' if official exchange aggregate price data _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerAggregated exchange data@content_dividercombined price data from multiple cryptocurrency exchanges weighted by volume – Finance)_$ANNOTATION$_ shows Virtuals token price equals or exceeds $5.00 at any time before first reaching or falling below $0.50 by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerDeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification requires published price records from at least two major exchanges such as Binance _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerBinance@content_dividerleading global cryptocurrency exchange platform – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or Coinbase _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerCoinbase@content_dividermajor US-based cryptocurrency exchange platform – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and corroborating data from CoinMarketCap _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerCoinMarketCap@content_dividercryptocurrency market data aggregator providing real-time price and volume information – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if by _$TIME_1 the token price never reaches $5.00 before hitting $0.50, if the token price falls to or below $0.50 before ever reaching $5.00, if trading of the Virtuals token ceases, or if authoritative price data is unavailable or insufficient for verification. In case of conflicting data, priority is given to official exchange APIs and regulatory filings. Also resolves 'No' if the Virtuals token is delisted, the market is halted, or the token never existed or is discontinued before _$TIME_1.

items.title: Shandong GDP > 10 trillion yuan by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Shandong Province's gross domestic product (GDP) exceeds 10 trillion yuan within the 2025 calendar year according to official provincial statistical releases and the National Bureau of Statistics data, resolved by authoritative government publications.

Resolves 'Yes' if official cumulative GDP for Shandong in 2025, as published by the Shandong Provincial Bureau of Statistics or the National Bureau of Statistics of China _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerNational Bureau of Statistics of China@content_dividerChina's official government agency responsible for statistical data collection and publication – National Bureau of Statistics of China https://www.stats.gov.cn/)_$ANNOTATION$_, exceeds 10 trillion yuan by _$TIME_1. Verification requires official year-end statistical communiqués or government releases available on their official websites or credible government archives.

Resolves 'No' if the official reported GDP does not exceed 10 trillion yuan by _$TIME_1, if the event (GDP report) is cancelled or indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, if official data is unavailable or unverifiable, or if conflicting authoritative sources fail to confirm surpassing the threshold. Also resolves 'No' if Shandong Province ceases to exist as an administrative entity or if GDP data is fundamentally altered. Conflicts are resolved by prioritizing official government data and archival records.

items.title: Base token distribution by January 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Base cryptocurrency token _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBase token@content_dividera digital asset native to the Base blockchain network used for transactions or governance – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ is distributed to users via any airdrop or official token launch event by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2026-01-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_, as confirmed by official announcements from Coinbase or the Base network.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official statement or publication _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial statement@content_dividera verified communication from Coinbase or the Base network on their official website or verified social media)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms token distribution or airdrop by _$TIME_1. Verification includes direct announcements on Coinbase.com, Base.org, or Coinbase’s verified Twitter account, or coverage by two or more tier-1 crypto news sources such as CoinDesk or The Block.

Resolves 'No' if no verifiable official confirmation of Base token distribution is published by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if the token launch never occurs. Conflicting information will be resolved prioritizing official Coinbase or Base sources. This market also resolves 'No' if the event never existed or if reliable verification is unavailable by deadline.

items.title: U.S. ground incursion into Nigeria by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the U.S. military deploys ground troops on Nigerian soil beyond aerial or naval presence by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerGround incursion@content_dividerdeployment of military ground forces onto foreign territory, excluding aerial or naval operations – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, confirmed by official announcements from the U.S. or Nigerian governments with verification from authoritative sources.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official U.S. government source _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUS government source@content_dividerofficial U.S. government websites, Department of Defense publications, or verified social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_ or Nigerian government source _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerNigerian government source@content_dividerofficial Nigerian government websites, Ministry of Defence announcements, or verified social media)_$ANNOTATION$_ publicly confirms deployment of U.S. ground forces inside Nigeria by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes major international media with dual tier-1 source confirmation or verified visual evidence with source attribution.

Resolves 'No' if no such deployment is confirmed by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if authoritative verification is unavailable or contradictory, or if the U.S. military presence is limited to aerial or naval operations only. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing official government declarations. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never existed or did not occur by _$TIME_1.

items.title: Aster reaches all-time high by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the trading price of Aster, a cryptocurrency _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerAster@content_dividera digital cryptocurrency traded on major exchanges – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, reaches or exceeds its highest recorded trading price in USD equivalent on recognized major crypto exchanges by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'Yes' if an authoritative data source _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerauthoritative data source@content_dividerofficial exchange price data, company website, or verified exchange API)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms that Aster’s trading price equals or surpasses the all-time high price published prior to _$TIME_1. Verification requires access to historical price data from at least one major exchange such as Bitget or Binance and secondary confirmation from a recognized crypto market data aggregator.

Resolves 'No' if Aster’s price does not reach or exceed the prior all-time high by _$TIME_1, if trading on major exchanges is halted, if Aster is delisted or suspended, or if reliable verification data is unavailable. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing official exchange data and major market aggregators. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Aster never existed or was never traded on recognized exchanges.

items.title: Russia withdraws from Ukrainian territory by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Russia officially and publicly confirms the withdrawal of its armed forces from any Ukrainian territory by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerWithdrawal@content_dividerthe act of moving back or away from a position or territory – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, supported by corresponding confirmation from Ukraine or credible media reports.

Resolves 'Yes' if both Russian and Ukrainian official sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial sources@content_dividergovernment statements, verified social media accounts, or authorized publications – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm by _$TIME_1 that Russian forces have moved out of any Ukrainian-controlled region, or if major verified media outlets _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerMajor media outlets@content_dividernews organizations with tier-1 verification standards and multiple confirmations – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ report such withdrawal with corroborated evidence. Verification may include official announcements, public statements, or widely accepted credible media coverage.

Resolves 'No' if no reliable evidence of withdrawal is confirmed by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially denied, indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative sources are unavailable or contradictory. Resolution follows official government declarations first, then major media consensus. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never occurred or was never planned. Ceasefire agreements do not count as withdrawal unless accompanied by actual troop movements confirmed by both parties.

items.title: United Nations recognize Palestine full member by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the United Nations formally recognizes Palestine as a full member state through a General Assembly resolution following a Security Council recommendation by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerUnited Nations@content_divideran international organization established in 1945 to promote peace and cooperation among countries – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official UN General Assembly resolution admitting Palestine as a full member state is adopted by _$TIME_1, verified by documentation on the United Nations official website or Security Council and General Assembly official records _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUN official sources@content_dividerhttps://www.un.org/en/sections/documents/general-assembly-resolutions/)_$ANNOTATION$_, with backup confirmation from major tier-1 media reporting and archival sources such as the UN Treaty Database _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerUN Treaty Database@content_dividerhttps://treaties.un.org/Pages/ParticipationStatus.aspx)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if no such formal resolution is adopted by _$TIME_1, if the Security Council fails to recommend, if the General Assembly resolution is explicitly rejected, if the event is indefinitely postponed or cancelled, or if reliable verification is unavailable. In case of conflicting verification, priority is given to official UN records. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Palestine is not recognized as a full member state by the deadline or if the event never existed.

items.title: Linea Mainnet Alpha launch by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Linea completes the launch of its Mainnet Alpha and enables unrestricted developer access to deploy decentralized applications (dapps) on its blockchain platform by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMainnet Alpha@content_dividerthe initial live blockchain network version allowing real transactions and developer deployment – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ as confirmed by official ConsenSys or Linea communications.

The market resolves 'Yes' if official statements or announcements from ConsenSys _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerConsenSys@content_dividera blockchain software technology company specializing in Ethereum infrastructure – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or Linea _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerLinea@content_dividera blockchain platform developed by ConsenSys for ZK rollup scaling on Ethereum – official company sources)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm by _$TIME_1 that the Mainnet Alpha is launched with full developer access for deploying dapps without restrictions. Verification includes official website posts, verified social media accounts, or press releases.

The market resolves 'No' if no such confirmation is published by _$TIME_1, if the launch is cancelled, indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if official sources explicitly deny full developer access availability. If data is unavailable or conflicting, resolution follows the highest priority authoritative source. Additionally, the market resolves 'No' if the event never existed or the Mainnet Alpha launch does not meet the defined criteria by the deadline.

items.title: Bayern Munich stadium hosts UEFA Champions League final by December 31, 2028?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bayern Munich's stadium _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBayern Munich stadium@content_dividerthe Allianz Arena located in Munich, Germany, home stadium of FC Bayern Munich – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ hosts the UEFA Champions League final _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUEFA Champions League final@content_dividerthe concluding match of the annual UEFA Champions League football tournament organized by UEFA – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2028-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to official UEFA announcements and confirmations.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the UEFA Executive Committee _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerUEFA Executive Committee@content_dividerthe governing and decision-making body of the Union of European Football Associations – UEFA official website)_$ANNOTATION$_ officially confirms the Allianz Arena as the venue for the 2028 UEFA Champions League final on or before _$TIME_1, evidenced by a public announcement on UEFA's official website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerUEFA official website@content_dividerhttps://www.uefa.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified UEFA communications. Backup verification includes major international sports media outlets reporting with explicit UEFA confirmation or official UEFA press releases archived by reputable repositories.

This market resolves 'No' if no official confirmation by the UEFA Executive Committee is published by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if the final is assigned to a different venue, or if all authoritative sources fail to verify the Allianz Arena as host. In case of conflicting information, official UEFA documents and statements take precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the UEFA Champions League final scheduled for 2028 does not take place or the stadium does not exist or ceases to be operational before _$TIME_1.

items.title: Monad TGE FDV > $5B by November 25, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Monad's token generation event (TGE) fully diluted valuation (FDV) exceeds $5 billion USD at launch by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerToken Generation Event@content_divideran event where a cryptocurrency project's tokens are first distributed to the public – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerFully Diluted Valuation@content_dividermarket capitalization calculated as official token price times total token supply at TGE – Finance industry standard)_$ANNOTATION$_, using official market price and total token supply data from authoritative sources.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Monad Foundation or the official Monad website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerMonad Foundation@content_dividerthe organization responsible for Monad blockchain development and announcements – official company site)_$ANNOTATION$_ or major tier-1 crypto media outlets _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerTier-1 crypto media@content_dividerleading cryptocurrency news organizations with verified reporting – industry standard)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm Monad's TGE FDV exceeds $5 billion USD by _$TIME_1, supported by published official token price and total supply data at launch time (November 24, 2025, 14:00 UTC). Verification may include CoinMarketCap, CoinGecko, or blockchain explorers recording token metrics.

This market resolves 'No' if Monad's TGE does not occur by _$TIME_1, if official sources confirm FDV below $5 billion USD at TGE, if the event is cancelled or postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if reliable authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicting data prioritizes official Monad Foundation announcements and major crypto data aggregators. This market also resolves 'No' if the TGE never occurs or is fundamentally different than specified.

items.title: Manchester United win vs Tottenham Hotspur by November 8?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Manchester United wins the official Premier League match against Tottenham Hotspur held on November 8, 2025, based on the final score at the end of regulation time as officially announced by the Premier League _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerPremier League@content_dividerthe top level English professional football league – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and verified by recognized sports outlets.

Resolves 'Yes' if Manchester United is confirmed by the Premier League official website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial Premier League website@content_dividerhttps://www.premierleague.com/match/2025/fixtures)_$ANNOTATION$_ or at least two tier-1 sports news sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerTier-1 sports news sources@content_dividermajor global sports media outlets with editorial verification, e.g., BBC Sport, Sky Sports)_$ANNOTATION$_ to have won the match by the final score at the end of regulation time by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes official match reports, league statistics, or verified live score services with archival access.

Resolves 'No' if Manchester United does not win the match by _$TIME_1, if the match is cancelled or postponed beyond _$TIME_1, if official results are unavailable or unverified by deadline, or if the event never occurred. In case of conflicting reports, official Premier League announcements take precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the match was never scheduled or played on the stated date.

items.title: Taiwan joins APEC summit by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Taiwan formally confirms participation in the APEC summit held by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerAPEC summit@content_dividerAsia-Pacific Economic Cooperation summit, an annual regional economic forum of 21 Pacific Rim member economies – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ through official APEC or government announcements.

Resolves 'Yes' if Taiwan's formal participation is confirmed by an official statement from the APEC Secretariat or Taiwan's government by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial statement@content_dividerpublication on official websites or verified social media accounts of APEC or Taiwan government)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification may also include major media outlets with corroboration from at least two tier-1 sources or official summit participant lists published by APEC.

Resolves 'No' if no formal confirmation is published by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or postponed indefinitely beyond _$TIME_1, if official sources deny Taiwan's participation, or if verification data is unavailable or contradictory. This includes the case where Taiwan does not exist as a participant or the summit does not occur. Conflicts are resolved prioritizing official APEC and Taiwan government declarations.

items.title: Israel-Palestine conflict resolved by December 31, 2030?
items.rules:
This market measures whether a formal and sustainable peace agreement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerPeace agreement@content_dividera formal agreement between parties to end conflict and establish peace – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ recognized by key parties and international bodies _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerInternational bodies@content_dividerorganizations such as the United Nations with authority in international relations – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ is documented officially by the United Nations or equivalent diplomatic entity by _$TIME_1.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official United Nations documents or equivalent diplomatic records _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerUN documentation@content_dividerformal resolutions, treaties, or agreements published by the United Nations or similar bodies – UN official website https://www.un.org)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm by _$TIME_1 that a peace agreement has been signed and is publicly recognized as sustainable by the main Israeli and Palestinian parties and at least one major international organization.

This market resolves 'No' if no such formal and sustainable peace agreement is confirmed by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if authoritative verification is unavailable, or if the agreement lacks recognition from key involved parties or international bodies. Conflicting evidence is resolved by prioritizing official UN or equivalent diplomatic sources. This market also resolves 'No' if the event never occurred or was never formally established.

items.title: Monad (MON) ≥50% price drop within 24h after TGE on Nov 24?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Monad (MON) token price drops by 50% or more within 24 hours after its token generation event at 2025-11-24T14:00:00Z, based on major exchange price data such as Kraken.

Resolves 'Yes' if a verified 50% or greater decrease in MON token price from its price at 2025-11-24T14:00:00Z to any time before 2025-11-25T14:00:00Z is confirmed by official exchange data published by Kraken or equivalent authoritative sources by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerKraken@content_dividerKraken: major cryptocurrency exchange providing live and historical price data – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_. Confirmation requires public price charts or official API data snapshots at launch and during the 24-hour window.

Resolves 'No' if no 50% or greater price drop occurs within 24 hours after the token generation event by _$TIME_1, if the token generation event is cancelled, indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative price data is unavailable or insufficient for verification. Conflicting data shall be resolved by prioritizing official exchange APIs, archived price data, and secondary verified exchange listings. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the token generation event does not occur or MON token is never listed on major exchanges by _$TIME_1.

items.title: Avalanche hosts billion-dollar metaverse project by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Avalanche _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerAvalanche@content_divideran open-source blockchain platform developed by Ava Labs – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ officially hosts a metaverse project valued at one billion U.S. dollars or more by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerDeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_. Hosting means Avalanche is the underlying blockchain platform supporting the project, confirmed by finalized deals or official announcements from Avalanche or Ava Labs _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerAva Labs@content_dividerthe company commercializing Avalanche blockchain technology – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official statements or finalized contracts from Avalanche or Ava Labs _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOfficial statements@content_dividerpublicly published announcements on company websites or verified social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm by _$TIME_1 that Avalanche hosts a metaverse project worth at least one billion USD. Confirmation includes press releases, regulatory filings, or major media reports verifying the project's value and platform association. Backup verification includes archived web records or filings from regulatory bodies.

This market resolves 'No' if no verified official announcement or finalized deal from Avalanche or Ava Labs exists by _$TIME_1, if the project is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if reliable verification data is unavailable. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing direct company sources or regulatory filings. Also resolves 'No' if no such metaverse project exists or Avalanche is not the hosting blockchain platform.

items.title: Chainlink data secured for >1000 DeFi apps by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Chainlink _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerChainlink@content_dividera decentralized oracle network connecting blockchain smart contracts to real-world data – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ secures data for more than 1000 decentralized finance (DeFi) applications _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerDeFi applications@content_dividerblockchain-based financial applications operating without central intermediaries – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by counting verified integrations documented in Chainlink’s official ecosystem resources by _$TIME_1.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Chainlink’s official documentation or announcements _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial documentation@content_dividerhttps://docs.chain.link and https://blog.chain.link)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm more than 1000 distinct DeFi application integrations using Chainlink data feeds by _$TIME_1, verified through Chainlink’s published ecosystem statistics or official communications via company website or verified social media.

This market resolves 'No' if the verified integration count does not exceed 1000 by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled, postponed beyond the deadline, or if no authoritative verification is available. Conflicting data are resolved by prioritizing Chainlink’s official sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Chainlink or the DeFi application integrations do not exist as specified.

items.title: MegaETH > Monad throughput by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether MegaETH processes a higher average on-chain transaction throughput _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividertransaction throughput@content_dividerthe number of transactions processed per second by a blockchain network – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ than Monad by _$TIME_1, based on official on-chain metrics published by the projects or credible blockchain analytics services _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerblockchain analytics services@content_dividerindependent entities providing verified blockchain data and metrics – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if official or verified sources confirm that MegaETH’s average transactions per second exceed Monad’s as of or before _$TIME_1, supported by direct project disclosures or at least two independent tier-1 blockchain data providers _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividertier-1 sources@content_dividermajor, authoritative sources with high reliability and direct access to data – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if MegaETH does not surpass Monad by _$TIME_1, if official throughput data is unavailable or contradictory, if project launches or performance metrics are officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if the event never existed. Conflicting evidence resolves in favor of official project statements or regulatory filings. This market defaults to 'No' absent positive confirmation.

items.title: Consensys IPO completion by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Consensys completes an initial public offering (IPO) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerIPO@content_dividerthe first sale of stock by a private company to the public – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerDeadline@content_divider2026-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to official filings with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission or announcements by Consensys and lead underwriters JPMorgan and Goldman Sachs.

Resolves 'Yes' if official SEC filings _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerSEC filings@content_dividerdocuments submitted to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission for regulatory compliance – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or explicit announcements from Consensys or JPMorgan or Goldman Sachs _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerLead underwriters@content_dividerinvestment banks managing the IPO process – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm IPO completion by _$TIME_1. Verification includes company websites, SEC EDGAR database, or verified press releases.

Resolves 'No' if no verifiable IPO completion is confirmed by _$TIME_1, if the IPO is cancelled or indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if authoritative sources are unavailable or contradictory. If the event never existed or was never planned, the market resolves 'No'. In case of conflicting data, official SEC records take precedence.

items.title: Fluent Labs mainnet launch by November 30, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Fluent Labs publicly launches a mainnet _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMainnet@content_dividerthe primary blockchain network fully operational and accessible by the public – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ of their blended execution network supporting Wasm _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerWasm@content_dividerWebAssembly: a binary instruction format for a stack-based virtual machine enabling high-performance web applications – Mozilla Developer Network)_$ANNOTATION$_, EVM _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerEVM@content_dividerEthereum Virtual Machine: the runtime environment for smart contracts in Ethereum enabling code execution on the blockchain – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, and SVM _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerSVM@content_dividerSolana Virtual Machine or Smart Virtual Machine: a blockchain virtual machine supporting smart contract execution, depending on context – Oxford Dictionary and industry usage)_$ANNOTATION$_ smart contracts by _$TIME_1 as a unified public smart contract execution environment.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Fluent Labs publishes an official mainnet launch announcement or the mainnet becomes publicly accessible with confirmed Wasm, EVM, and SVM support by _$TIME_1, verified by official Fluent Labs communication channels _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerOfficial Fluent Labs channels@content_dividercompany website, verified social media accounts, or official press releases)_$ANNOTATION$_ or major technology news outlets with dual tier-1 source confirmation. Backup verification includes blockchain explorers or public network status dashboards demonstrating unified smart contract execution.

This market resolves 'No' if the mainnet launch is not officially announced or publicly accessible by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled, indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official Fluent Labs sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the blended execution network or mainnet launch event does not exist or was never planned.

items.title: Ethereum Fusaka upgrade launch by December 5, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Ethereum blockchain _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerEthereum@content_dividerEthereum: a decentralized open-source blockchain system with smart contract functionality – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ activates the Fusaka upgrade _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerFusaka upgrade@content_dividerFusaka upgrade: a scheduled Ethereum mainnet protocol upgrade featuring PeerDAS and increased gas limits to improve scalability and performance – Ethereum Foundation announcement)_$ANNOTATION$_ on its mainnet by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'Yes' if the Fusaka upgrade activation is confirmed by finalization of Ethereum mainnet block slot 13,164,544 timestamped on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerblock slot 13,164,544@content_dividerthe specific Ethereum mainnet block number marking Fusaka activation, timestamped 2025-12-03T21:49:11Z UTC – Ethereum Foundation)_$ANNOTATION$_ and verified by official Ethereum Foundation sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerEthereum Foundation@content_dividerEthereum Foundation: the primary organization coordinating Ethereum protocol development – https://ethereum.org/en/foundation/)_$ANNOTATION$_ or core developer announcements, including client software updates and consensus layer finalization proof.

Resolves 'No' if the Fusaka upgrade has not activated by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed by Ethereum governing bodies, if no authoritative confirmation is available by that time, or if the mainnet block activation differs from the specified block slot. In case of conflicting data, official Ethereum Foundation declarations take precedence. This market resolves 'No' if the upgrade event never existed or was never scheduled.

items.title: Donut Browser beta launch for traders by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Donut Browser releases its first publicly available beta version for cryptocurrency traders by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBeta launch@content_dividerthe first publicly accessible test version of software intended for user evaluation – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, as verified by official announcements or product releases from Donut Labs or authoritative technology media.

The market resolves 'Yes' if Donut Labs _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerDonut Labs@content_dividerNew York-based developer of AI-driven cryptocurrency trading tools – company website)_$ANNOTATION$_ publishes an official announcement or release notice confirming the availability of the Donut Browser beta for traders by _$TIME_1, accessible to the public via Donut Labs’ official website, verified social media accounts, or major technology news outlets with explicit verification. Backup verification may include GitHub release pages or authoritative software distribution platforms hosting the beta.

The market resolves 'No' if no verifiable official confirmation or public release occurs by _$TIME_1, if the beta launch is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if the product is rebranded or replaced with a fundamentally different offering. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing Donut Labs’ official communications. Also, resolves 'No' if Donut Browser or its beta never existed or was never intended for traders.

items.title: Shardeum market cap > $1,000,000 by November 14, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Shardeum's market capitalization, defined as circulating token supply multiplied by the aggregated latest USD price from multiple exchanges, exceeds $1,000,000 by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMarket capitalization@content_dividertotal market value of a company's outstanding shares, calculated as price times circulating supply – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official aggregate market cap data from authoritative cryptocurrency data aggregators such as CoinMarketCap _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCoinMarketCap@content_dividera leading cryptocurrency data platform aggregating price, volume, and market cap from multiple exchanges – CoinMarketCap.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or CoinGecko, confirmed on or before _$TIME_1, show Shardeum’s market cap strictly exceeding USD 1,000,000. Verification includes cross-checking volume-weighted average price calculations from at least three major exchanges listed on such platforms.

This market resolves 'No' if the market cap does not exceed $1,000,000 by _$TIME_1, if Shardeum is delisted or its market data is officially discontinued before the deadline, if trading is permanently halted, or if authoritative data is unavailable or contradictory by _$TIME_1. Conflicting data are resolved by prioritizing official aggregator reports and archived snapshots. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Shardeum token or market cap data never existed or is proven to be fabricated or invalid.

items.title: ZEC < $300 before November 15, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the closing price of Zcash (ZEC) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerZcash@content_dividera cryptocurrency focused on privacy and anonymity, launched in 2016 – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ in USD remains strictly below $300 at all times before _$TIME_1, using official closing prices from reliable cryptocurrency exchanges.

Resolves 'Yes' if no verified closing price equal to or exceeding $300 USD is recorded on any recognized exchange _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividercryptocurrency exchange@content_dividera digital marketplace for trading cryptocurrencies – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Verification requires official daily closing price data from primary source Bitget _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerBitget@content_dividera reputable cryptocurrency exchange platform providing historical and real-time price data – https://www.bitget.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or alternatively Binance _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerBinance@content_dividera leading global cryptocurrency exchange offering comprehensive market data – https://www.binance.com)_$ANNOTATION$_, with backup confirmation from CoinGecko or Coinbase official price feeds.

Resolves 'No' if any official closing price equals or exceeds $300 USD before _$TIME_1, if verified data is unavailable, or if the event is cancelled or trading halted on all primary exchanges. Conflicting data will be resolved prioritizing Bitget, then Binance, then CoinGecko. If ZEC trading never occurs or price data is permanently inaccessible by _$TIME_1, the market resolves 'No'.

items.title: Union membership < 1 million by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether total union membership among wage and salary workers in the United States falls below 1 million members by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerUnion membership@content_dividerthe number of workers officially reported as union members nationwide – U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics)_$ANNOTATION$_, using official statistics from the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics (BLS) and recognized union membership databases.

Resolves 'Yes' if official data from the BLS or the Union Membership and Coverage Database _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUnion Membership and Coverage Database@content_dividera comprehensive dataset compiled by Barry Hirsch and David Macpherson on union membership in the U.S. – University of Georgia)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm total union membership is less than 1,000,000 as of _$TIME_1. Verification requires publication of annual or quarterly union membership statistics by _$TIME_1 from the BLS website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerBLS union data@content_dividerhttps://www.bls.gov/news.release/union2.htm)_$ANNOTATION$_ or the official unionstats.com database _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerUnionstats.com@content_dividerhttps://www.unionstats.com/)_$ANNOTATION$_ .

Resolves 'No' if total union membership is equal to or above 1,000,000 as confirmed by the same sources by _$TIME_1, if the data is unavailable or unverifiable by _$TIME_1, or if union membership data is officially revised to indicate membership above the threshold. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event of measuring union membership does not exist or if union membership data is not reported or collected by authoritative sources by _$TIME_1.

items.title: Lando Norris leads Formula 1 Drivers' Championship by November 10, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Lando Norris is ranked first in the official FIA Formula 1 Drivers' Championship standings _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerFormula 1 Drivers' Championship@content_dividerthe ranking of Formula 1 drivers by points accumulated across races in a season – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ as published after the last race completed on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-11-10T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ based on official race results and points awarded by the Fédération Internationale de l'Automobile (FIA) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerFIA@content_dividerthe international governing and sanctioning body for motorsport – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ . Verification uses official FIA standings published on FIA and Formula 1 websites and supplemented by major accredited sports media.

Resolves 'Yes' if official FIA Formula 1 Drivers' Championship standings show Lando Norris in first place by _$TIME_1 as confirmed by FIA publications _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerFIA official source@content_dividerhttps://www.fia.com and https://www.formula1.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified Formula 1 official channels. Backup verification includes corroboration from at least two tier-1 sports news outlets with explicit reference to FIA points standings.

Resolves 'No' if Lando Norris is not first in the official FIA Drivers' Championship standings by _$TIME_1, if the championship is cancelled or suspended before _$TIME_1, or if official verification data is unavailable or contradictory. Conflicts are resolved by prioritizing FIA official publications. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the 2025 Formula 1 season or specified race results do not exist or are not published by the deadline.

items.title: BNB ≥ $1,100 by November 15, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Binance Coin (BNB) price in USD reaches or exceeds 1,100 according to global aggregated exchange data by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBinance Coin (BNB)@content_dividera cryptocurrency token native to Binance Chain and Binance Smart Chain – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and price aggregation platforms with real-time updates.

Resolves 'Yes' if credible aggregated price data from major cryptocurrency exchanges and price aggregators _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerPrice aggregation platforms@content_dividerwebsites or services consolidating prices from multiple exchanges for accurate market price – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm BNB’s USD price is equal to or above 1,100 at any time on or before _$TIME_1. Verification requires direct data from official Binance exchange charts _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerBinance exchange@content_dividerworld’s largest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume – https://www.binance.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or trusted third-party aggregators (e.g., CoinMarketCap, CoinGecko). Backup verification includes archived snapshots via Internet Archive and regulatory filings reporting daily prices.

Resolves 'No' if BNB price never reaches or exceeds 1,100 by _$TIME_1, if official price data is unavailable or insufficient for verification, or if the market is cancelled or indefinitely postponed. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing Binance official data and major aggregator consensus. Additionally, resolves 'No' if BNB trading ceases, Binance exchange closes, or BNB token is delisted before _$TIME_1.

items.title: Apple AI-first iPhone release by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Apple officially commercially releases a new iPhone model with AI-first capabilities by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerAI-first iPhone@content_divideran iPhone model whose primary features or marketing emphasize artificial intelligence integration as a core function – Merriam-Webster, Apple Inc.@content_dividerAmerican multinational technology company specializing in consumer electronics and software – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ verified through Apple announcements or product availability.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Apple publicly confirms the commercial release of such an AI-first iPhone model by _$TIME_1 via official Apple channels _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerApple official channels@content_dividerApple’s website https://www.apple.com/, verified press releases, or verified social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_ or if the product is commercially available for purchase through Apple or authorized retailers with serial number verification on Apple’s website. Backup verification includes major tier-1 media reports explicitly confirming the model’s AI-first nature.

This market resolves 'No' if no authoritative confirmation occurs by _$TIME_1, if Apple officially cancels or indefinitely postpones the release, or if available information contradicts the existence of an AI-first iPhone model. In cases of conflicting information, official Apple communications take precedence. If official sources or credible media fail to verify the release by _$TIME_1, the market resolves 'No'. Also, resolves 'No' if the event or product never existed or was never planned.

items.title: OpenAI GPT-6 launch by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether OpenAI officially launches GPT-6 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerOpenAI@content_divideran artificial intelligence research laboratory consisting of the for-profit OpenAI LP and its parent company OpenAI Inc. – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerGPT-6@content_dividerthe sixth generation of OpenAI's Generative Pre-trained Transformer language model series – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by the end of December 31, 2026 UTC according to official OpenAI announcements or verified product release statements.

This market resolves 'Yes' if OpenAI publishes an explicit official announcement or verified product release statement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividerstatement published on OpenAI's official website or verified social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirming the GPT-6 launch at any time on or before _$TIME_1. Verification includes direct OpenAI sources or corroboration by major tier-1 technology news outlets with dual confirmation.

This market resolves 'No' if no official confirmation of GPT-6 launch is available by _$TIME_1, if the launch is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if reliable verification data is unavailable. Conflicting claims are resolved by prioritizing OpenAI's official communications. Additionally, this market resolves 'No' if GPT-6 is never launched or the event does not exist.

items.title: xAI overtakes ChatGPT daily users by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Elon Musk’s xAI chatbot surpasses OpenAI’s ChatGPT in active unique daily users by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerDaily user counts@content_divideractive unique users engaging with each chatbot on a daily basis as reported by authoritative analytics and company disclosures – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to official or verified analytics data.

Resolves 'Yes' if authoritative sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerAuthoritative sources@content_dividerofficial company websites, regulatory filings, verified social media, or major media with dual tier-1 source confirmation)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm xAI’s daily users exceed ChatGPT’s by _$TIME_1, supported by published user metrics or direct company disclosures found at official xAI or OpenAI channels _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial channels@content_dividerhttps://x.ai/ and https://openai.com/)_$ANNOTATION$_ or through reputable third-party analytics platforms.

Resolves 'No' if xAI does not surpass ChatGPT daily users by _$TIME_1, if user data is unavailable or unverifiable, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if official sources explicitly contradict the claim. Conflicting data resolves by prioritizing primary company disclosures, followed by major media and independent analytics. Resolves 'No' if either chatbot is discontinued or if the event never existed.

items.title: Samsung Electronics stock price > 10% by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd. _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerSamsung Electronics Co., Ltd.@content_dividera South Korean multinational electronics company – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ stock closing price on the Korea Exchange _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerKorea Exchange@content_dividerthe main stock exchange of South Korea – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ increases by at least 10% relative to the closing price as of November 2025, by _$TIME_1, adjusted for regular market hours.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official closing price data published by the Korea Exchange or Samsung Electronics’ official investor relations website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerSamsung Investor Relations@content_dividerhttps://www.samsung.com/global/ir/)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms a ≥10% increase by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes major tier-1 financial news sources reporting with explicit citation of Korea Exchange data or official filings.

This market resolves 'No' if the closing price increase is less than 10% by _$TIME_1, if the Korea Exchange is closed or trading halted indefinitely before _$TIME_1, if Samsung Electronics stock is delisted or suspended, or if authoritative price data is unavailable. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing Korea Exchange official publications and Samsung’s official disclosures. The market also resolves 'No' if the stock or event never existed or ceased to exist before _$TIME_1.

items.title: Grand Theft Auto VI release by November 19, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Grand Theft Auto VI, a video game developed by Rockstar Games _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerRockstar Games@content_divideran American video game developer known for the Grand Theft Auto series – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, is officially released and made available for purchase or download through Rockstar's official distribution channels or major digital storefronts by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2026-11-19T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if Rockstar Games or its parent company releases an official announcement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividera statement published on Rockstar Games' official website or verified social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirming Grand Theft Auto VI's release on or before _$TIME_1, and the game becomes available for purchase or download on official channels (e.g., Rockstar Games Launcher, PlayStation Store, Xbox Store, Steam) by that time.

Resolves 'No' if the game is not released and available through official channels by _$TIME_1, if Rockstar Games announces cancellation, indefinite postponement beyond _$TIME_1, or if no verifiable confirmation of release exists by the deadline. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing Rockstar Games' official communications and verified digital storefront listings. Also resolves 'No' if the product never existed or the release event is fundamentally different from the specified market definition.

items.title: Zcash > $1000 by November 15, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the closing price of Zcash (ZEC) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerZcash@content_dividera decentralized digital cryptocurrency focusing on privacy and anonymity – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on any major USD cryptocurrency exchange _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividercryptocurrency exchange@content_dividera digital marketplace where cryptocurrencies are traded – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches or exceeds $1,000 USD by _$TIME_1, based on official closing prices.

Resolves 'Yes' if at least one major cryptocurrency exchange _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividermajor cryptocurrency exchange@content_dividerleading digital currency trading platform with high liquidity and regulatory compliance)_$ANNOTATION$_ publishes an official closing price for ZEC of $1,000 USD or higher on or before _$TIME_1. Verification requires price data from exchanges such as Coinbase, Binance, Kraken, or Bitstamp _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerexchanges list@content_dividerhttps://www.coinbase.com, https://www.binance.com, https://www.kraken.com, https://www.bitstamp.net)_$ANNOTATION$_ or trusted crypto price aggregators like CoinMarketCap _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerCoinMarketCap@content_dividercryptocurrency price tracking website – https://coinmarketcap.com)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if no such closing price of $1,000 USD or higher for ZEC is confirmed by _$TIME_1, if all exchanges cease trading ZEC before the deadline, if the price data is unavailable or unverifiable, or if the event never occurs. In case of conflicting information, priority is given to official exchange data and major aggregator consensus. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Zcash ceases to exist or is delisted before _$TIME_1.

items.title: Bitcoin Gold (BTG) listed on Kraken by May 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Bitcoin Gold (BTG) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBitcoin Gold@content_dividera digital cryptocurrency and a Bitcoin fork emphasizing decentralization and ASIC resistance – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ appears as a tradable asset on Kraken exchange _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerKraken@content_dividera major cryptocurrency exchange platform founded in 2011 offering trading of digital assets – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividertime deadline@content_divider2026-05-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to official Kraken announcements or listings page.

Resolves 'Yes' if Kraken’s official announcements or the Kraken.com listings page _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOfficial Kraken announcements@content_dividerstatements published on Kraken’s website or verified social media verified by Kraken)_$ANNOTATION$_ explicitly confirm BTG is available for spot trading by _$TIME_1. Verification includes direct inspection of Kraken’s tradable asset listings and official press releases accessible via https://www.kraken.com/ or Kraken’s verified social media.

Resolves 'No' if BTG is not listed as a tradable asset on Kraken by _$TIME_1, if Kraken officially cancels or indefinitely postpones listing BTG, or if no authoritative confirmation is available. Conflicting or absent data defaults to 'No'. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Bitcoin Gold trading on Kraken never existed or was removed prior to the deadline.

items.title: Solana Foundation delegates ≥50 validators by May 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Solana Foundation _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerSolana Foundation@content_dividernon-profit organization supporting the Solana blockchain ecosystem – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ delegates stake to at least 50 distinct validators _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividervalidators@content_dividernetwork nodes that validate transactions and produce blocks in a blockchain – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ through its Delegation Program by _$TIME_1, with delegation count defined as the number of unique validators receiving stake delegation from the Foundation.

Resolves 'Yes' if the Solana Foundation officially confirms delegation to at least 50 validators by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial confirmation@content_dividerexplicit public announcement or report on the Solana Foundation website or verified social media)_$ANNOTATION$_, verified through public reports or Solana Foundation Delegation Program disclosures accessible at https://solana.foundation or official Solana Foundation communication channels.

Resolves 'No' if the delegation count is fewer than 50 at _$TIME_1, if official confirmation is absent or explicitly negated by authoritative sources, or if the Delegation Program is cancelled or indefinitely postponed. Conflicts in data are resolved by prioritizing Solana Foundation official statements and regulatory filings. Also resolves 'No' if the Delegation Program never existed or no delegation activity occurs by the deadline.

items.title: Federal Reserve cuts funds rate by 25 bps by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Federal Reserve lowers the target federal funds rate by an additional 0.25 percentage points (25 basis points) via official Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) announcements by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerFederal Reserve@content_dividerthe central bank of the United States responsible for monetary policy – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerFederal funds rate@content_dividerthe interest rate at which depository institutions lend reserve balances overnight – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerFOMC@content_dividerFederal Open Market Committee: principal monetary policymaking body of the Federal Reserve System – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if the Federal Reserve officially announces one or more cumulative reductions totaling at least 25 basis points in the target federal funds rate by _$TIME_1, as documented in FOMC statements published on the Federal Reserve website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerFederal Reserve website@content_dividerhttps://www.federalreserve.gov/monetarypolicy.htm)_$ANNOTATION$_ or Federal Reserve Board releases, with verification by official FOMC minutes or press conferences. Backup verification includes confirmed reports from major financial news outlets citing Federal Reserve sources.

Resolves 'No' if no official FOMC announcement confirms a cumulative 25 basis point cut by _$TIME_1, if the event is indefinitely postponed or cancelled, or if authoritative confirmation is unavailable. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing Federal Reserve primary sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the Federal Reserve does not reduce the rate by at least 25 basis points cumulatively by _$TIME_1 or if the event never occurred.

items.title: Liverpool defeats Manchester City in Premier League by November 9, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Liverpool Football Club _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerLiverpool Football Club@content_dividerprofessional football club based in Liverpool, England – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ defeats Manchester City Football Club _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerManchester City Football Club@content_dividerprofessional football club based in Manchester, England – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ in the Premier League _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerPremier League@content_dividerthe top division of English professional football – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ match on November 9, 2025 at Etihad Stadium, Manchester, UK, according to the official final score as announced by the Premier League and verified broadcasters.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Liverpool is officially recorded as the winner of the match by the Premier League's official website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerPremier League official website@content_dividerhttps://www.premierleague.com/match/2025)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified broadcasters by _$TIME_1, with verification allowed through multiple independent sources including major sports media outlets (e.g., BBC Sport, Sky Sports) and official broadcast recordings.

This market resolves 'No' if Liverpool does not win by _$TIME_1, if the match is cancelled, postponed indefinitely, or if reliable official verification of Liverpool's victory is unavailable by this deadline. In case of conflicting information, priority is given to the Premier League official results followed by corroborated reports from at least two tier-1 sports media sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the match does not occur or never existed.

items.title: Ethereum > 50% supply staked by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether more than 50% of Ethereum's circulating supply is staked by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerEthereum@content_divideran open-source blockchain-based platform with its native cryptocurrency ETH – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ as indicated by on-chain validator data and reputable staking analytics providers using the circulating supply definition from major aggregators.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official Ethereum blockchain data or reputable staking analytics websites _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerstaking analytics providers@content_dividerentities providing validated metrics on crypto staking participation – CoinLaw.io)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm on or before _$TIME_1 that the amount of ETH actively staked exceeds 50% of circulating supply. Verification requires published metrics from Ethereum's consensus layer clients, official Ethereum Foundation communications _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerEthereum Foundation@content_dividernonprofit organization supporting Ethereum development – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, or staking dashboards like https://coinlaw.io/eth-staking-statistics/.

This market resolves 'No' if the staking threshold is not met by _$TIME_1, if Ethereum staking is officially suspended or indefinitely postponed, or if no authoritative staking data is available by the deadline. Conflicting data will be resolved by prioritizing official Ethereum blockchain explorer statistics and Ethereum Foundation publications. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Ethereum or its staking mechanism ceases to exist or never operated as specified.

items.title: Global mobile-phone shipments decline year-on-year by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether total global smartphone shipment volumes _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividersmartphone shipments@content_dividerthe total number of smartphone units shipped worldwide in a calendar year – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ in 2025 are lower than in 2024 according to International Data Corporation (IDC) official annual reports _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerIDC@content_dividerInternational Data Corporation, a global market research firm specializing in technology markets – IDC website https://www.idc.com/)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if IDC publishes official 2025 calendar year shipment data by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ showing 2025 shipments are strictly less than 2024 shipments. Verification requires IDC’s annual worldwide smartphone shipment report published on https://www.idc.com/research/ by the deadline. Backup verification includes archived IDC reports or corroboration from other major market research firms such as Omdia or Counterpoint Research.

Resolves 'No' if IDC or authoritative sources confirm shipments do not decline by _$TIME_1, if shipment data is unavailable, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if verification cannot confirm a decline. In case of conflicting data, IDC official reports take precedence. The market also resolves 'No' if global smartphone shipments data does not exist or is never published.

items.title: Tech company 30% share drop by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether any publicly traded technology company with a market capitalization exceeding $500 billion USD suffers a single-day closing price drop of 30% or more by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerTech company@content_dividera corporation primarily engaged in technology-related products or services – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_; market capitalization is the total market value of outstanding shares in USD _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerMarket capitalization@content_dividertotal market value of a company's outstanding shares – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_; share price drop is calculated using official closing prices from the primary US stock exchange in US Eastern Time converted to UTC _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerShare price drop@content_dividerpercentage decline in closing stock price from one trading day to the next – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if at least one such company experiences a one-day closing price decrease of 30% or more verified by official stock exchange data _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerOfficial stock exchange@content_dividerprimary regulated marketplace for securities trading – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ published or confirmed by the exchange or the company’s official website or regulatory filings by _$TIME_1; backup verification includes major financial news outlets with corroboration from at least two tier-1 sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerTier-1 sources@content_dividerleading, globally recognized media outlets with verified reporting standards – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if no verified one-day drop of 30% or more occurs by _$TIME_1, if trading is halted or the company is delisted before such drop occurs, if data is unavailable or contradictory by deadline, or if no such companies exist meeting the market cap criterion. Conflicts in data resolve by prioritizing official exchange and regulatory sources. Also resolves 'No' if the event never existed or is unverifiable.

items.title: Major country adopts universal basic income by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether any sovereign country with a population over 50 million _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMajor country@content_dividera country with a population exceeding 50 million individuals as per recent United Nations or national statistical authority estimates – United Nations Population Division)_$ANNOTATION$_ officially adopts a universal basic income (UBI) policy _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUniversal basic income@content_divideran unconditional monthly cash payment of at least 100 US dollars to every individual, without means test or work requirement – Basic Income Earth Network definition)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, confirmed through authoritative government publications or public records.

This market resolves 'Yes' if at least one such country officially enacts or announces a UBI policy providing unconditional monthly payments of at least $100 USD per individual by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial confirmation@content_dividerexplicit declaration, legislation, or regulatory filing published by the national government, central bank, or authorized statistical agency, accessible at official government websites or permanent public records repositories)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification includes official government portals, published legal documents, or major media reports explicitly referencing official sources.

This market resolves 'No' if no country meeting the population threshold adopts such a policy by _$TIME_1, if the policy is explicitly cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if official verification is unavailable or contradictory. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing primary official government sources over media or third-party reports. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never existed or was not implemented as defined.

items.title: Vivian Kong wins Legislative Council seat by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Vivian Kong officially wins a seat in the Hong Kong Legislative Council according to certified election results by the Hong Kong electoral authorities by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerLegislative Council@content_dividerthe unicameral legislature of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region of the People’s Republic of China – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the Hong Kong Electoral Affairs Commission or equivalent official body publishes formal certification confirming Vivian Kong’s election victory by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCertification@content_dividerofficial validation and announcement of election results by authorized electoral agency – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ at their official website or verified government publications. Backup verification includes major Hong Kong media outlets citing official election certification or government gazettes.

This market resolves 'No' if no official certification confirming Vivian Kong’s win is published by _$TIME_1, if the election is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if Vivian Kong withdraws or is disqualified prior to certification, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. In case of conflicting information, official Hong Kong government sources take precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the election or candidacy does not occur as specified.

items.title: Solstice TVL > $300M by November 30, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Solstice Finance's total value locked (TVL) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerTotal Value Locked@content_dividerthe total capital held or staked in a decentralized finance protocol – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ in USD reaches or exceeds $300 million by _$TIME_1 according to official Solstice Finance and verified custody provider APIs.

Resolves 'Yes' if official Solstice Finance sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerSolstice Finance official sources@content_dividercompany website or verified API endpoints)_$ANNOTATION$_ or verified custody provider APIs confirm TVL ≥ $300,000,000 USD at any time on or before _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes data from trusted third-party custody providers and archival API snapshots.

Resolves 'No' if TVL does not reach $300 million by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if Solstice Finance ceases operation before _$TIME_1, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicting data are resolved prioritizing official Solstice sources, then custody providers, then reputable third-party archives. Also resolves 'No' if Solstice Finance or the TVL metric never existed.

items.title: DeepSeek winner in nof1 AI trading contest by November 30, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether DeepSeek remains the winner of the nof1 AI trading competition on Alpha Arena platform by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerDeepSeek@content_dividerDeepSeek: name of AI trading model or competitor – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividernof1 AI trading competition@content_dividernof1.ai: platform hosting AI-powered trading contests; Alpha Arena: official competition environment – official nof1.ai website)_$ANNOTATION$_, as determined by the official final standings published by nof1.ai on the Alpha Arena website.

Resolves 'Yes' if official final standings published by nof1.ai on the Alpha Arena platform _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerofficial final standings@content_dividerfinal ranking list published on nof1.ai’s Alpha Arena website or verified official channels)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 explicitly show DeepSeek as the top-ranked winner. Verification requires direct confirmation from nof1.ai’s official website or verified social media accounts. Backup confirmation may come from multiple tier-1 media sources reporting on the competition results.

Resolves 'No' if DeepSeek is not the winner in the official final standings by _$TIME_1, if the competition is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if verification data is unavailable or contradictory, or if nof1.ai or Alpha Arena platform ceases to exist or does not publish final results. In case of conflicting information, official nof1.ai sources take precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the competition does not exist or never ran by the deadline.

items.title: HyunA health issue announcement by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether HyunA _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerHyunA@content_dividerHyunA: South Korean singer, songwriter, and entertainer – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or her agency officially announces an important health issue _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerimportant health issue@content_divideran official statement regarding significant changes in health status impacting activities or public disclosure – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, verified through official agency releases or major verified media reports.

Resolves 'Yes' if an explicit official statement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerofficial statement@content_divideran authorized public communication from HyunA or her agency – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ from HyunA or her agency _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_divideragency@content_divideran organization representing an artist for public relations and management – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ about a significant health status change is published or broadcast by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2025-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_ on official agency websites, verified social media, or major media outlets with at least two tier-1 source confirmations.

Resolves 'No' if no such official announcement is confirmed by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled, indefinitely postponed, or if reliable verification is unavailable. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing official agency releases and direct statements. Also resolves 'No' if no official health issue announcement exists or the event never occurred.

items.title: Jake Paul x Gervonta Davis match start by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether an official announcement or confirmed fight date for a boxing match between Jake Paul _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerJake Paul@content_dividerAmerican YouTuber-turned-professional boxer – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and Gervonta Davis _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerGervonta Davis@content_dividerAmerican professional boxer, current WBA lightweight champion – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ occurs by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerDeadline@content_divider2026-12-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_, with the start defined by an official fight announcement or confirmed fight date publicized by authoritative sources.

This market resolves 'Yes' if an official announcement or confirmed fight date is published on an authoritative source such as the official websites or verified social media accounts of Jake Paul, Gervonta Davis, their promoters or sanctioning bodies by _$TIME_1. Alternative verification includes corroboration by at least two major tier-1 media outlets _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerTier-1 media@content_dividerleading internationally recognized news organizations with editorial standards – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or official boxing regulatory bodies.

This market resolves 'No' if no such official announcement or confirmed fight date is published by _$TIME_1, if the fight is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if verification data is unavailable or insufficient. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing official announcements and regulatory confirmations. Additionally, if the fight never existed or was not scheduled, the market resolves 'No'.

items.title: Flying Tulip $FT public sale complete by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Flying Tulip's $FT token public sale is fully closed with tokens allocated and on-chain redemption rights enabled by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerPublic Sale@content_dividera sale of cryptocurrency tokens to the public following private rounds – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, verified by official press releases or launchpad confirmations.

Resolves 'Yes' if official Flying Tulip press releases _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerPress Release@content_dividera formal public statement issued to media by a company – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or confirmed statements from recognized launchpads (e.g., CoinList, Impossible Finance) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerLaunchpad@content_dividera platform facilitating token sales – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm the public sale is fully closed with tokens allocated and on-chain redemption rights enabled by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if the public sale is cancelled, postponed indefinitely beyond _$TIME_1, if tokens are not allocated fully, or on-chain redemption rights are not enabled by _$TIME_1. In case of conflicting reports, priority is given to official Flying Tulip sources followed by launchpad announcements. Resolves 'No' if the public sale event never occurred or was never announced.

items.title: Ethereum > $10,000 by July 1, 2026?
items.rules:
