This market measures whether the price of Ethereum in USD, as reported by major global cryptocurrency exchanges at their official daily closing price, reaches or exceeds $10,000 at any time on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerEthereum@content_dividera decentralized blockchain platform with a native cryptocurrency called Ether, used for smart contracts and decentralized applications – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUSD@content_dividerUnited States dollar, the official currency of the United States of America – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if at least one major cryptocurrency exchange _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividermajor cryptocurrency exchange@content_dividera widely recognized and high-liquidity trading platform such as Coinbase, Binance, Kraken, or Bitstamp – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ publishes an official daily closing price for Ethereum in USD equal to or exceeding $10,000 by _$TIME_1, verified through exchange websites or authoritative financial data aggregators such as CoinMarketCap or CoinGecko _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerCoinMarketCap@content_dividera leading cryptocurrency price tracking website – https://coinmarketcap.com)_$ANNOTATION$_, _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerCoinGecko@content_dividera cryptocurrency data aggregator platform – https://coingecko.com)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'No' if no such verified closing price equal to or above $10,000 is reported by _$TIME_1, if all major exchanges cease trading or the Ethereum market is delisted or halted indefinitely before _$TIME_1, or if reliable price data is unavailable. Conflicting data resolves by prioritizing official exchange sources, followed by reputable financial data aggregators. Additionally, if the Ethereum cryptocurrency or its trading market ceases to exist or is suspended indefinitely before _$TIME_1, the market resolves 'No'.

items.title: Solana TVL > Binance Smart Chain TVL by May 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the total value locked (TVL) in Solana _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerSolana@content_dividera high-performance blockchain platform supporting decentralized applications – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ exceeds the TVL in Binance Smart Chain (BSC) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerBinance Smart Chain@content_dividera blockchain platform developed by Binance for decentralized finance applications – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ at any time on or before _$TIME_1, based on aggregated on-chain data from multiple decentralized finance (DeFi) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerDecentralized Finance@content_dividerfinancial services using blockchain technology without centralized intermediaries – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ protocols as reported by DefiLlama _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerDefiLlama@content_divideran independent analytics platform tracking DeFi TVL across blockchain networks – https://defillama.com/)_$ANNOTATION$_. TVL represents the USD value of assets deposited in DeFi protocols on each chain.

This market resolves 'Yes' if authoritative data from DefiLlama or its official API _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerDefiLlama API@content_dividerhttps://api.llama.fi/chains)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms Solana's aggregated TVL surpasses Binance Smart Chain's TVL at any point by _$TIME_1. Verification requires archived snapshots or official DefiLlama historical charts _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=6@counter_dividerDefiLlama Historical Data@content_dividerhttps://defillama.com/chains)_$ANNOTATION$_ accessed via Internet Archive or DefiLlama’s own repository. Backup verification may include corroboration by at least one additional reputable on-chain analytics platform with publicly accessible data.

This market resolves 'No' if Solana does not surpass Binance Smart Chain in TVL by _$TIME_1, if DefiLlama data is unavailable, or if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing DefiLlama official data and its API. Also resolves 'No' if Solana or Binance Smart Chain do not exist, or if aggregated TVL data cannot be verified by authoritative sources by _$TIME_1.

items.title: Monad ≥ $0.03 by May 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the trading price of Monad _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMonad@content_dividera cryptocurrency token native to the Monad blockchain platform – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches or exceeds $0.03 USD _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUSD@content_dividerUnited States dollar, official currency of the United States – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on any reliable cryptocurrency exchange at or before _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'Yes' if any verified cryptocurrency exchange _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividercryptocurrency exchange@content_dividera digital marketplace for buying and selling cryptocurrencies – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ publicly reports Monad trading price ≥ $0.03 USD at any time on or before _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerdeadline@content_divider2026-05-31T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_. Verification requires price data from at least two major exchanges listed on CoinMarketCap _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerCoinMarketCap@content_dividercryptocurrency market data aggregator and price tracker – https://coinmarketcap.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ or CoinGecko _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=6@counter_dividerCoinGecko@content_dividercryptocurrency data platform with exchange price aggregation – https://coingecko.com)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'No' if no verified price of $0.03 USD or higher is documented by _$TIME_1, if Monad is delisted, trading halted, or the market is officially closed before _$TIME_1, or if authoritative price verification is unavailable or insufficient. Conflicting data resolves by prioritizing official exchange APIs and CoinMarketCap data. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Monad token does not exist or trading never commenced by _$TIME_1.

items.title: Humans land on Mars by December 31, 2030?
items.rules:
This market measures whether humans _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerHumans@content_dividerHomo sapiens, the species of bipedal primates that includes modern humans – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ have physically landed on the surface of Mars _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerMars@content_dividerthe fourth planet from the Sun, known for its red surface – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, defined as the first human boots touching Mars' surface as publicly targeted by NASA _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerNASA@content_dividerNational Aeronautics and Space Administration, U.S. government agency responsible for space exploration – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and SpaceX _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerSpaceX@content_dividerprivate aerospace manufacturer and space transport services company founded by Elon Musk – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_. Resolution is determined by official announcements and corroborated visual or documentary evidence.

This market resolves 'Yes' if verifiable confirmation of a human landing on Mars is published by NASA or SpaceX official channels _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerOfficial channels@content_dividercompany websites, verified social media accounts, or government publications)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Verification requires documented evidence such as mission reports, photographs, or videos directly attributed to NASA or SpaceX, archived in publicly accessible and permanent repositories (e.g., NASA.gov, SpaceX.com, Internet Archive).

This market resolves 'No' if no such landing is confirmed by any authoritative source by _$TIME_1, if the mission is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, or if verification data is unavailable or insufficient. In cases of conflicting information, official NASA or SpaceX statements take precedence. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event of human Mars landing never occurred or was never attempted within the timeframe.

Backup verification includes official UEFA match reports, major verified sports media outlets with dual tier-1 confirmation, or official UEFA statistics databases.

Resolves 'No' if UEFA does not confirm Real Madrid as the winner by _$TIME_1, if the final is cancelled, postponed indefinitely beyond _$TIME_1, or if official sources are unavailable or contradict the outcome. Conflicting information defaults to official UEFA declarations. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the competition or final did not occur or if Real Madrid did not participate in the final.

Backup verification includes major verified sports media with dual source confirmation and archived FIFA records.

Resolves 'No' if Uruguay does not qualify to the Round of 16 by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if official FIFA or confederation data is unavailable or contradicts advancement, or if the competition format changes making the event non-comparable. Also resolves 'No' if the World Cup or Round of 16 stage is not held or Uruguay does not participate. Conflicting reports default to official FIFA announcements or authoritative confederation sources.

items.title: Paraguay advances to Round of 16 in 2026 FIFA World Cup by July 10, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures Paraguay's advancement to the Round of 16 stage _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerRound of 16@content_dividerthe first knockout round in FIFA World Cup where 16 teams compete for quarterfinal spots – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ in the 2026 FIFA World Cup _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerFIFA World Cup@content_divideran international football tournament organized by FIFA every four years – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to official FIFA match results published during the tournament's knockout phase.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official FIFA results verify Paraguay qualified and played in the Round of 16 by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerDeadline@content_divider2026-07-10T23:59:59Z UTC)_$ANNOTATION$_, with qualification confirmed by CONMEBOL _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerCONMEBOL@content_dividerSouth American Football Confederation responsible for World Cup qualification in South America – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ qualifiers by November 2025.

This market resolves 'No' if Paraguay does not qualify, is eliminated before the Round of 16, if official FIFA or CONMEBOL sources do not confirm advancement by _$TIME_1, if the World Cup or Round of 16 stage is cancelled or postponed indefinitely, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. If data conflicts arise, official FIFA publications take precedence. This market also resolves 'No' if the event never occurs or Paraguay never participates.

items.title: U.S. digital dollar pilot launch by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the United States officially launches a digital dollar pilot defined as a public announcement or confirmation of pilot start by the U.S. Federal Reserve or U.S. Department of the Treasury by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerDigital dollar pilot@content_dividera controlled experiment or trial deployment of a U.S. central bank digital currency initiative – derived from Federal Reserve and Treasury context)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if an explicit, verifiable public announcement or confirmation of the digital dollar pilot launch is published by the Federal Reserve or Treasury by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial source@content_dividerFederal Reserve or U.S. Department of the Treasury official websites, press releases, or verified statements – https://www.federalreserve.gov, https://home.treasury.gov)_$ANNOTATION$_. Backup verification includes major tier-1 media outlets corroborating the launch with official source citations and archived evidence.

Resolves 'No' if no official confirmation occurs by _$TIME_1, if the pilot is cancelled, indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing official Federal Reserve or Treasury sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the pilot event never existed or was never initiated by the deadline.

items.title: DOJ obtains and publicly discloses majority states voter data by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the U.S. Department of Justice _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerU.S. Department of Justice@content_dividerfederal executive department responsible for law enforcement and legal affairs – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ obtains comprehensive statewide voter registration data from at least 26 U.S. states and publicly discloses it to identify non-citizen voters by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'Yes' if official DOJ statements or federal government publications _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerofficial DOJ statements@content_dividerstatements published on DOJ.gov, federal regulatory filings, or verified official media releases)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm acquisition and public disclosure of voter registration data covering at least 26 states by _$TIME_1, including data made publicly available for identifying non-citizen voters, with verification via multiple tier-1 sources or official federal transparency reports.

Resolves 'No' if no authoritative confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if fewer than 26 states' data are obtained or disclosed, if disclosure excludes data for non-citizen identification, or if sources contradict or do not verify the event. Resolves 'No' if the event never occurred or cannot be verified through official DOJ releases or major government publications.

items.title: Oil prices > $120 per barrel by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the spot price of crude oil, defined as the USD price per barrel for Brent Crude and West Texas Intermediate (WTI) crude oil, exceeds $120 by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBrent Crude@content_divideran international benchmark for crude oil prices originating from the North Sea – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerWTI@content_dividerWest Texas Intermediate, a US crude oil benchmark priced in USD per barrel – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ according to official financial and government data sources.

This market resolves 'Yes' if the official daily closing price published by at least two authoritative sources including the U.S. Energy Information Administration (EIA) _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerEIA@content_dividerU.S. Energy Information Administration, a U.S. government agency providing energy statistics – https://www.eia.gov)_$ANNOTATION$_, the Intercontinental Exchange (ICE) for Brent prices, or the New York Mercantile Exchange (NYMEX) for WTI prices _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerICE and NYMEX@content_dividermajor commodity exchanges providing official price data – https://www.theice.com, https://www.cmegroup.com)_$ANNOTATION$_, reports a daily closing price exceeding $120 USD per barrel on any trading day on or before _$TIME_1. Confirmation requires price data archived or published on official websites or regulatory filings.

This market resolves 'No' if no verified official record shows crude oil prices exceeding $120 per barrel by _$TIME_1, if markets are closed or data unavailable on the deadline, or if authoritative price data is insufficient or contradictory. Conflicting data is resolved by prioritizing U.S. government and major exchange publications. Additionally, resolves 'No' if crude oil price benchmarks or trading never existed or if this market’s measurement criteria cannot be met by _$TIME_1.

items.title: National Heads-Up Poker Championship winner by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the winner of the 2025 National Heads-Up Poker Championship is officially determined by _$TIME_1 based on published tournament results from PokerGO and PokerStars _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerNational Heads-Up Poker Championship@content_divideran officially sanctioned heads-up poker tournament revived in 2025 – PokerGO)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerPokerGO@content_dividera subscription-based poker entertainment service and official tournament broadcaster – PokerGO website https://www.pokergo.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerPokerStars@content_dividerthe world's largest online poker cardroom and tournament organizer – PokerStars website https://www.pokerstars.com)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official results explicitly declare a single winner for the 2025 Championship published on the PokerGO or PokerStars websites or their verified social media accounts by _$TIME_1. Verification may include tournament result pages, official press releases, or authorized video recordings confirming the final match outcome.

This market resolves 'No' if no official winner is confirmed by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed beyond _$TIME_1, if official sources fail to publish results, or if verification data is unavailable or contradictory. Conflicts in data are resolved by prioritizing PokerGO and PokerStars official announcements. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the tournament does not occur or is never scheduled in 2025.

items.title: MrBeast cryptocurrency launch by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether MrBeast officially launches a cryptocurrency by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerLaunch@content_dividerthe first public announcement or first transaction of a cryptocurrency product explicitly branded or operated by MrBeast Financial, a financial services platform affiliated with MrBeast – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official public announcement by MrBeast or MrBeast Financial _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividerstatement published on MrBeast’s verified website, official social media accounts, or MrBeast Financial’s platform)_$ANNOTATION$_ or the first verified transaction involving the cryptocurrency on MrBeast Financial’s platform occurs by _$TIME_1. Verification requires cross-checking at least two independent authoritative sources such as official company filings, major media reports with explicit confirmation, or blockchain transaction records linked to MrBeast Financial.

Resolves 'No' if no such launch is confirmed by _$TIME_1, if the launch is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. Conflicting reports resolve by prioritizing official MrBeast or MrBeast Financial sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the cryptocurrency product does not exist, is not affiliated with MrBeast Financial, or if the platform never facilitates any transaction by deadline.

items.title: World Liberty Financial Layer 2 crypto debit card launch by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether World Liberty Financial officially launches a Layer 2 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerLayer 2@content_dividera secondary framework or protocol built on top of an existing blockchain to improve scalability and efficiency – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ crypto debit card product by _$TIME_1, verified by official company announcements or verified press releases.

This market resolves 'Yes' if World Liberty Financial publicly confirms the launch of a Layer 2 crypto debit card through official statements _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial announcements@content_dividercompany website, verified social media accounts, or press releases from World Liberty Financial)_$ANNOTATION$_ published by _$TIME_1; backup verification includes major financial media reports with explicit confirmation or regulatory filings.

This market resolves 'No' if no authoritative confirmation occurs by _$TIME_1, if the product launch is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if verification sources are unavailable or contradictory. In case of conflicts, official World Liberty Financial sources have priority. Also resolves 'No' if the product launch never existed or differs fundamentally from the defined Layer 2 crypto debit card.

items.title: Avalanche integration with Revolut by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Avalanche blockchain services _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerAvalanche blockchain@content_dividera decentralized platform for building custom blockchain networks and decentralized applications – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ are integrated and available within Revolut apps _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerRevolut@content_dividera UK-based financial technology company offering mobile banking services – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1 as confirmed by official announcements or verifiable documentation.

This market resolves 'Yes' if by _$TIME_1 official sources from Avalanche or Revolut _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial sources@content_dividercompany websites, verified social media accounts, or official press releases)_$ANNOTATION$_ explicitly confirm the availability of Avalanche-based services within Revolut apps, including wallet support, token custody, trading, or other blockchain functionalities. Backup confirmation includes major tier-1 media reports with dual-source verification or archived official announcements.

This market resolves 'No' if no verified official integration confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if integration is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if official sources deny integration, or if data is unavailable or unverifiable by the deadline. In case of conflicting information, resolution prioritizes official company statements. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never occurred or the integration differs from defined scope.

items.title: MegaETH listing on Upbit by January 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the cryptocurrency token MegaETH is officially listed for trading on the Upbit exchange by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerMegaETH@content_dividera cryptocurrency token likely derived from Ethereum blockchain technology – Merriam-Webster; @subject=2@counter_dividerUpbit@content_dividera major South Korean cryptocurrency exchange platform – company website https://www.upbit.com)_$ANNOTATION$_ with confirmation from official Upbit announcements or verified exchange data sources.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official Upbit announcement _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial Upbit announcement@content_dividerstatement published on Upbit’s official website or verified social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_ or a verified listing on Upbit’s trading platform is publicly confirmed by _$TIME_1, including credible secondary confirmation from reputable cryptocurrency market data aggregators or tier-1 media reports with explicit Upbit verification.

Resolves 'No' if no official confirmation occurs by _$TIME_1, if the listing is explicitly cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if verification data is unavailable or contradictory. In case of conflicting information, official Upbit sources take precedence. Resolves 'No' if MegaETH’s token generation event (TGE) does not occur or if Upbit never scheduled or planned the listing for the TGE date.

items.title: China reunifies Taiwan by non-military means by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the People's Republic of China formally achieves reunification with Taiwan through exclusively non-military means by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerReunification@content_dividerthe process of bringing separate political entities under one government without using military force – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, defined as economic, political, or cultural integration without initiating military offensive actions against Taiwan. Resolution depends on official declarations or credible consensus reporting from authoritative sources.

Resolves 'Yes' if by _$TIME_1 there is explicit confirmation from official Chinese, Taiwanese, United Nations, or permanent UN Security Council members' statements _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerAuthoritative confirmation@content_dividerofficial government publications, regulatory filings, verified statements on official websites or social media, or major media reports with dual tier-1 source verification)_$ANNOTATION$_ verifying reunification occurred peacefully without military use. Verification requires documented official announcements or UN resolutions accessible at settlement date.

Resolves 'No' if no authoritative confirmation exists by _$TIME_1, if reunification is achieved by military offensive actions, if event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if verification sources are unavailable or contradictory. Conflicts in evidence prioritize official government and UN sources. Also resolves 'No' if the event never occurred or fundamentally differs from the market definition.

items.title: Donald Trump assassination by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Donald Trump experiences a confirmed assassination attempt resulting in death during the calendar year 2026 according to credible official public reports or confirmations.

Resolves 'Yes' if an authoritative US government source such as the Federal Bureau of Investigation _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerFBI@content_dividerthe United States federal law enforcement agency responsible for domestic intelligence and security – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, United States Secret Service _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerSecret Service@content_dividera federal law enforcement agency protecting national leaders – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, or official death certification _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerDeath certification@content_dividerofficial document certifying a person's death – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ explicitly confirms the assassination or death of Donald Trump by _$TIME_1. Confirmation may also come from official court filings _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerCourt filings@content_dividerformal documents submitted to a court – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ or major tier-1 media sources with direct official source corroboration.

Resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation is available by _$TIME_1, if the event is officially denied, postponed indefinitely, or if verification sources become unavailable. Conflicting information is resolved by prioritizing direct official government announcements and death records. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Donald Trump remains alive throughout 2026 or if the event never occurred.

items.title: Taiwan馆长 Chen Zhihan arrested and imprisoned by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Chen Zhihan, also known as '馆长' _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_divider馆长@content_dividera prominent Taiwanese internet celebrity and public figure – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, is formally arrested and imprisoned by _$TIME_1 according to official judicial announcements from Taiwanese authorities.

Resolves 'Yes' if official sources such as the Taipei Prosecutors' Office or Taiwan government legal channels _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerTaipei Prosecutors' Office@content_dividerthe government agency responsible for prosecuting crimes in Taipei, Taiwan – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ publish explicit confirmation of Chen Zhihan's detention with legal charges filed and imprisonment on or before _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes official government websites, verified social media accounts, or major media reporting with at least two tier-1 source confirmations.

Resolves 'No' if no verified official arrest and imprisonment announcement is made by _$TIME_1, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed beyond this date, if authoritative sources deny the event, or if data is unavailable or insufficient for confirmation. Conflicting reports are resolved by prioritizing official judicial declarations. Also resolves 'No' if Chen Zhihan is never arrested or imprisoned within the specified timeframe or if the event never existed.

items.title: 赖清德 arrested upon Taiwan reunification by December 31, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether 赖清德 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_divider赖清德@content_dividerTaiwanese politician, current Vice President of Taiwan – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ is formally detained or arrested by a recognized authority following Taiwan’s reunification with China by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerReunification event@content_dividerthe political and administrative integration of Taiwan into the People's Republic of China – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, as confirmed by official government or authoritative sources.

Resolves 'Yes' if explicit confirmation of 赖清德's formal arrest or detention by recognized authorities in China or Taiwan during or immediately following an official reunification event is published by an official government source _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial source@content_dividergovernment statements, regulatory filings, verified government websites, or official press releases)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Verification may also include corroboration from major international media with dual tier-1 source confirmation or verified visual evidence (photos/videos) with source attribution.

Resolves 'No' if 赖清德 is not formally detained or arrested by _$TIME_1, if the reunification event does not occur by _$TIME_1, if the arrest event is officially denied, cancelled, or indefinitely postponed, or if authoritative verification is unavailable. In case of conflicting information, priority is given to official government declarations from China or Taiwan. Additionally, resolves 'No' if either the arrest or reunification event never occurs or is fundamentally different from the specified conditions.

items.title: China official notice bans prediction markets by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether an official notice _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerofficial notice@content_dividera public government announcement or publication by a recognized regulatory agency – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ is issued by a recognized Chinese regulatory agency explicitly classifying prediction markets _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerprediction markets@content_dividerplatforms allowing bets on uncertain future events – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ as illegal gambling platforms _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerillegal gambling@content_dividergambling prohibited by law – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and banning platforms like Polymarket _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerPolymarket@content_dividera blockchain-based prediction market platform – PANews)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1.

This market resolves 'Yes' if such an official notice is published on an official Chinese government or regulatory agency website _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerChinese regulatory agency@content_dividergovernment bodies authorized to regulate financial and gambling activities in China such as Ministry of Public Security, Ministry of Culture and Tourism, or Cyberspace Administration of China – Official Chinese Government Portals)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1. Verification also accepts official gazettes, formal press releases, or authoritative state media reports _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=6@counter_dividerauthoritative state media@content_dividerChinese state-controlled media recognized as official government mouthpieces – Oxford Dictionary)_$ANNOTATION$_ that explicitly state the classification and ban. Backup confirmation can include major international media with dual tier-1 source verification and archived records.

This market resolves 'No' if no such official notice is published by _$TIME_1, or if the event is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed. It also resolves 'No' if all authoritative sources deny or contradict the issuance. If verification data is unavailable or conflicting, resolution follows official Chinese government sources as primary. Additionally, resolves 'No' if prediction markets or Polymarket are never classified or banned by the deadline or if no such regulatory event exists.

items.title: Opinion.lab financial collapse or surpassed by December 31?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Opinion.lab experiences financial collapse defined as defaulting or ceasing operations, or is surpassed by another prediction market in leading market share by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerFinancial collapse@content_dividerdefaulting on obligations or ceasing operations – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ and _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerMarket share@content_dividerthe portion of a market controlled by a particular company or product – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ before the deadline according to official company disclosures or authoritative market data sources.

This market resolves 'Yes' if Opinion.lab officially announces default, insolvency, cessation of operations, or if multiple independent authoritative sources _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerAuthoritative sources@content_dividerofficial company statements, verified regulatory filings, or major tier-1 media with dual confirmation)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm Opinion.lab’s financial collapse by _$TIME_1, or if verified market research reports _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerMarket research report@content_dividera detailed study analyzing market shares and competitive positions – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ show Opinion.lab losing leading market share to another prediction market by _$TIME_1.

This market resolves 'No' if no authoritative confirmation of financial collapse or market share loss exists by _$TIME_1, if Opinion.lab continues normal operations without default, or if no verified market share surpassing occurs. It also resolves 'No' if the event is cancelled, indefinitely postponed, or if reliable verification data is unavailable. Conflicting reports will be resolved by prioritizing official company disclosures followed by regulatory filings, then major media sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if Opinion.lab never existed or the event never took place.

items.title: Ethereum ≥ $4000 by December 1, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the price of Ethereum _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerEthereum@content_divideran open-source, blockchain-based distributed computing platform and cryptocurrency – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ reaches or exceeds $4,000 USD _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUSD@content_dividerthe official currency of the United States of America – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ at any time on or before _$TIME_1, based on aggregated market prices from major cryptocurrency exchanges _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerCryptocurrency exchanges@content_divideronline platforms that facilitate the buying, selling, and trading of cryptocurrencies – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ at the UTC day end of December 1, 2025.

This market resolves 'Yes' if official aggregated price data from at least two major cryptocurrency exchanges _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividerMajor cryptocurrency exchanges@content_dividerleading, high-volume digital asset trading platforms such as Coinbase, Binance, Kraken – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm Ethereum’s price hits or exceeds $4,000 USD at any moment on or before _$TIME_1. Confirmation requires published market price snapshots or API data records from these exchanges by _$TIME_1, accessible through official exchange websites or trusted financial data aggregators _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=5@counter_dividerFinancial data aggregators@content_dividerservices compiling and publishing financial market data from multiple sources – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

This market resolves 'No' if Ethereum’s price does not reach $4,000 USD at any time on or before _$TIME_1, if trading is halted, exchanges are closed, or if data is unavailable or unverifiable by the deadline. Disputes or conflicting data will be resolved prioritizing official exchange data and corroborated by independent aggregators. The market also resolves 'No' if Ethereum or the price measurement event ceases to exist, or if the event never occurred.

items.title: Federal Reserve QE start by December 1, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether the Federal Reserve _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerFederal Reserve@content_dividerthe central banking system of the United States – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ officially initiates Quantitative Easing _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerQuantitative Easing@content_dividera monetary policy where a central bank buys government securities to increase the money supply and encourage lending and investment – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ on December 1, 2025, as confirmed by Federal Reserve official announcements and publications by _$TIME_1.

This market resolves 'Yes' if an official Federal Reserve statement or press release _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerOfficial announcement@content_dividera statement published on the Federal Reserve website or verified Federal Reserve social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_ explicitly announces the start of Quantitative Easing effective on December 1, 2025, by _$TIME_1. Backup verification includes Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) meeting minutes or major tier-1 media outlets confirming the QE start date.

This market resolves 'No' if no such official announcement occurs by _$TIME_1, if QE is explicitly postponed or cancelled beyond that date, or if authoritative sources fail to confirm QE initiation. Conflicting information will be resolved prioritizing official Federal Reserve sources. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event never existed or the QE program does not begin exactly on December 1, 2025.

If official sources become unavailable, verification will use the Internet Archive records of the Federal Reserve website, FOMC meeting minutes repositories, or regulatory filings archived by governmental agencies.

Time references in this market follow Eastern Standard Time (EST, UTC-5) localized to Federal Reserve headquarters in Washington D.C. and are converted to UTC for settlement, with the deadline at 2025-12-01T00:00:00Z.

items.title: Lisa performs at Crazy Horse Paris by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Lisa, a member of BLACKPINK _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerBLACKPINK@content_dividera South Korean girl group formed in 2016, known internationally – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_, performs in any Crazy Horse Paris _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerCrazy Horse Paris@content_dividera famous cabaret nightclub in Paris, France, known for its cabaret shows – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ show on or before _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'Yes' if an official announcement from Crazy Horse Paris or Lisa’s verified social media accounts _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=3@counter_dividerVerified social media@content_dividersocial media accounts verified by platform or official representatives)_$ANNOTATION$_ or major tier-1 media outlets with explicit confirmation _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=4@counter_dividermajor media@content_dividerleading international news organizations with verified reports)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirms Lisa's participation in a Crazy Horse Paris show by _$TIME_1. Verification can be supplemented by official event programs, ticketing platforms, or visual evidence (photos/videos) from authoritative sources.

Resolves 'No' if no such confirmation is available by _$TIME_1, if the event or Lisa's participation is officially cancelled or indefinitely postponed, if the show never occurred, or if reliable verification is unavailable. Conflicting data is resolved prioritizing official Crazy Horse Paris and Lisa’s official channels. Additionally, resolves 'No' if the event or Lisa’s participation never existed.

items.title: Buzzing.app Chainlink oracle use by December 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether Buzzing.app integrates Chainlink oracle technology _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerChainlink oracles@content_dividerdecentralized blockchain-based data feeds and services enabling smart contracts to securely access off-chain data – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ into its live environment by _$TIME_1 according to official announcements or verified technical documentation from Buzzing.app or Chainlink.

Resolves 'Yes' if official public confirmation _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerOfficial confirmation@content_dividerexplicit statements or technical documents from Buzzing.app or Chainlink published on their verified websites or official social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_ demonstrates integration of Chainlink oracle services in Buzzing.app’s live platform by _$TIME_1. Backup verification may include major tier-1 media reports citing official sources or demonstrable on-chain usage evidence by the deadline.

Resolves 'No' if no authoritative confirmation is available by _$TIME_1, if Buzzing.app officially cancels or indefinitely postpones Chainlink oracle integration beyond _$TIME_1, if technical documentation disproves integration, or if the event never occurred. Conflicting reports will be resolved prioritizing official Buzzing.app or Chainlink sources. This market also resolves 'No' if Buzzing.app never existed or never planned Chainlink adoption.

items.title: Chinese official confirmation of Wu Yifan death by November 19, 2025?
items.rules:
This market measures whether an official public confirmation of Wu Yifan's death is issued by Chinese government or authoritative media by _$TIME_1 _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerOfficial confirmation@content_dividera public statement from government or state media verifying an event – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_.

Resolves 'Yes' if an explicit statement confirming Wu Yifan's death is published by Chinese government sources, official prison authorities, or state news agencies such as Xinhua News Agency _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerXinhua News Agency@content_dividerChina's official state-run news agency – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1, verified via official websites, government reports, or authoritative media outlets. Backup verification includes archived official records or multiple tier-1 media confirmations.

Resolves 'No' if no such official confirmation is available by _$TIME_1, if authoritative sources explicitly deny the event, if the event is cancelled or indefinitely postponed, or if verification of Wu Yifan's death is unavailable or contradicted by official sources. Conflicting information resolves in favor of official government declarations. Also resolves 'No' if the event never occurred or official confirmation does not exist.

items.title: FC Barcelona win UEFA Champions League by January 31, 2026?
items.rules:
This market measures whether FC Barcelona officially wins the 2025–26 UEFA Champions League at the final match held at the Puskás Aréna, Budapest, as determined by UEFA official records and announcements by _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=1@counter_dividerUEFA Champions League@content_dividerannual European football club tournament organized by the Union of European Football Associations – Merriam-Webster)_$ANNOTATION$_ by _$TIME_1.

Resolves 'Yes' if UEFA or its official channels _$ANNOTATION$_(@subject=2@counter_dividerUEFA official channels@content_dividerofficial UEFA website, UEFA verified social media accounts)_$ANNOTATION$_ confirm FC Barcelona as the winner of the 2025–26 UEFA Champions League league phase by _$TIME_1, based on official match results at the final scheduled on May 30, 2026, with verification through UEFA match calendar and major verified media outlets.
